Ingredient Phrases: 2 1/2 lbs skinless, boneless chicken breasts | 2 pounds ripe tomatoes, undrained | 1 pound dried basil | 1 pound fresh parsley | 3 tablespoons lemon juice | 1 can whole water
Recipe Instructions: place the chicken in a saucepan and place over medium heat ; cook and stir over medium heat, until the chicken is cooked through and well browned, about 10 minutes.  remove chicken from the pan and allow it to cool.  meanwhile, bring the tomatoes to a rolling boil in a saucepan ; add water and reduce the heat to low.  add the fresh basil and parsley and lower the heat to mediumlow ; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.  remove the chicken and vegetables from the pan and let cool to room temperature.  discard the marinade, then rinse under cold running water.  preheat the oven to 400 degrees f 200 degrees c.  sprinkle a baking sheet with aluminum foil.  season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.  place the vegetables in a large roasting pan.  season generously with salt and pepper.  pour enough water into the pan to fill the chicken breasts one and 12 inch depth.  sprinkle the tomatoes with a generous amount of the reserved water.  place the rizini into the chicken breasts, coating well.  arrange half the rizini mixture over the tomatoes.  top with the tomatoes, then top the vegetables with the reserved sauce and herbs.  bake in the preheated oven until the flavors of the tomatoes and the reserved water are thoroughly blended and the chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 45 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Rizini With Tomato and Roasted Tomato

Ingredient Phrases: 3 ounces gouda cheese, grated ( i use a good brandy for this ) | 1 large green capsicum, sliced ( i use 1-1/2 tablespoons of green ) | 2 tablespoons vinegar | 1 tablespoon soya sauce
Recipe Instructions: cut capsicum in half lengthwise and crosswise.  slice capsicum crosswise and then crosswise.  mix together the vinegar, soy sauce and soya sauce and put in the small bowl with capsicum.  serve over lettuce, cucumber, and cheese.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 3/4 ounces vodka or 1 3/4 ounces vodka | 1/4 cup milk | 1 dash parsley, minced ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: puree the vodka, milk, and parsley in a blender until smooth.  pour into a glass and garnish with the marshmallows, if desired.  cut and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 tablespoons corn niblets | 2 tablespoons curry ( paste or more to taste ) | 1/4 cup water chestnut, finely chopped | 4 tablespoons almonds, minced | 7 -8 garlic cloves, chopped | 1 tablespoon fresh coriander seeds or 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh ginger | 4 tablespoons coriander, chopped | 4 teaspoons ground curry | 1 teaspoon coriander powder | 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon | fresh ground black pepper, to taste | 3/4 teaspoon salt, to taste | 3/4 cup sugar | 5 fresh tilapia fillets | 2 teaspoons paprika, or more to taste | 2 tomatoes, halved
Recipe Instructions: drain the niblets in several layers and add to a bowl.  whisk the curry paste, water chestnut, almonds, garlic, and 1 - 12 t of the spices together in a separate bowl until smooth ; pour this mixture into a saucepan over medium heat.  cook, stirring constantly, until the curry is fragrant and the nuts melt ; remove from the heat.  mix the sugar, tilapia fillets, and 1 t of the the spice mixture into the reserved curry mixture.  stir well to combine.  return the mixture to the skillet and heat slowly over medium heat, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom.  cook until the fish is firm but not falling apart, about 10 minutes.  meanwhile, prepare the paprika in a food processor, add the tomatoes and season with salt.  transfer the tomato mixture to the saucepan ; add the salt mixture and heat to a simmer over medium heat.  add the fish and cook over medium heat, swirling or turning the fish from time to time, until well cooked, about 10 minutes.  remove the fish from the heat, leaving a sliver of meat inside.  stir in the paprika.  pour the reserved curry sauce over the fish, mix the paprika, tamari sauce, paprika, ginger mixture to combine, and bring to a boil in the simmering sauce.  remove immediately from heat.  serve immediately in bowls.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 potatoes, peeled and diced | 1 cup chopped onion or 1 cup carrot | 8 eggs, beaten | 3 tablespoons flour | 1/4 teaspoon curry powder | 1/4 cup flat leaf parsley, chopped
Recipe Instructions: dice the potatoes and onion.  make them into small sautees on lowmedium heat until the vegetables just start to soften, about 7 minutes.  add the eggs, and stirfry until foamy, about 5 minutes for the egg and potatoes.  slowly add in flour to the eggs, stirring well then add in the curry powder, parsley and salt and pepper to taste.  continue to stir the mixture, adding more flour as necessary, until everything is well mixed.  spoon the mixture into the prepared shells, and top with the remaining chopped veggies.  cover and bake at 400 degrees for 40 minutes.

Random Ingredients: cooking apple,cayenne pepper,green chilies,cake flour,pie shell,plain flour
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cake flour | 1 tablespoon cooking apple ( not the sliced ) | 1 tablespoon cooking water ( or chicken stock instead ) | 1 teaspoon ground black pepper | 1 pinch ground red pepper | 1 cup plain flour | 1 large cooking apple, peeled and cored | 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  sift together the first five ingredients with a large knife and shape each into a pie shell, about 1 inch thick.  place in the preheated oven and bake for 30 minutes, or until the apples are just tender.  remove from oven and let cool for 5 minutes before slicing across the top.  serve with mashed potatoes to top.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups chopped red onions | 1/4 cup chopped celery salt | 1/4 cup chopped pineapple juice ( optional ) | 1/2 cup slivered almonds ( optional ) | 1 teaspoon sugar | 1/2 cup fresh lime juice ( optional ) | 1/3 cup chopped zucchini ( optional ) | 2 garlic cloves ( chopped ) | 1/4 cup fresh grated fresh chives ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a large skillet with medium heat, combine onion, celery salt and pineapple juice.  cook over mediumhigh heat, stirring frequently, until onion is softened, about 5 minutes.  pour in pineapple juice, almonds if using, sugar and lime juice.  cover and simmer until flavors blend, at least 2 hours and up to a cup.  add zucchini, if using.  season with salt and pepper and serve.

Random Ingredients: coconut milk,whipping cream,salsa,ra el hanout spice mix,chili paste,shortening
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon shortening, melted | 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1 teaspoon chili paste | 1/2 teaspoon ground coriander | 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1/2 cup sweetened condensed milk | 2 tablespoons whipping cream | 1 teaspoon chopped fresh lemon zest | 1/4 cup desiccated coconut leaves
Recipe Instructions: preheat broiler.  in a medium size bowl or food processor, combine shortening, turmeric, chilli paste, coriander,  cinnamon, and spices.  shape into 12inch balls.  brush about 23 tbsp of paste mixture over mixture, then roll each ball between your fingers into a 12 inch rope  then tie ends with string.  refrigerate 4 hours or overnight in refrigerator.  arrange pies on baking sheets, top  side  bbq for an hour or till golden brown.  for the topping  melt the butter over medium heat  then spread the mixture to within 12 inch of the edge.  place pies over hot butter  sprinkle with additional tablespoon of sugar.  cool slightly, then cover and place in an oiled 400 degree oven for 3 - 12 hr or until puffed and puffed and golden.  serve hot with corn tortillas or rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 12 ounces fresh okra, sliced ( or cabbages ) | fresh or canned jalapeno peppers, chopped | 1 lb fresh sushi, broken into pieces ( or cabbages ) | 1 1/4 cups whipping cream | 2 teaspoons ground smoked paprika
Recipe Instructions: sprinkle a layer of oil all over the surface of an okra in a nonstick skillet with some seasoning salt.  cook until the okra begins to brown, about 3 minutes.  remove from the pan, drain, and carefully transfer the skillet to the oven.  in a medium bowl, mix together the cream, garlic, and jalapeno.  place a teaspoon of the cream mixture onto the center of the okra.  starting at the middle of the edge, roll the roll to within about 18 inch of the center point of the filling.  place a large, flat spoonful of sushi or cabbage filling onto the edge of the rolled roll.  tuck the roll in the center with your palm.  press the edges together so it can easily roll up the sushi or cabbages.  cook and stir until the center is golden brown around the edges, about 3 minutes.  place a plate on the plate to allow the okra to relax for a few minutes before putting onto the plate.  the cooked okra will sink to the bottom of the plate as it cooks, and be mushy.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 lbs beef steaks, cut into 1-inch pieces | 1 1/2 cups red lentils, cooked but not mushy | 1 cup beef gravy | 2 tablespoons fresh ground pepper
Recipe Instructions: heat oven to 500f degrees.  heat grill pan with 1 tablespoon of oil on high.  place cooked lentils on hot oil and sear for about 2 minutes.  drain on paper towels, reserving drippings.  add steak to pan.  cook for 5 minutes or until browned on all sides and tender.  stir in gravy and continue cooking for 5 minutes.  pour off any excess drippings.  season with more hot pepper to taste.
Recipe Titile: Roasted Red Lentil - Beef and Lentils

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup sweet paprika | 1/4 cup sugar | 1/2 cup ground nutmeg | peel, cored, and finely chop | 1/2 cup dates, finely chopped | 1 egg, separated | 1/2 cup chopped pecans or 1/2 cup almond | 2 tablespoons dried fruit, drained and chopped | 1 egg yolk | 1 teaspoon citric acid | 1 can chopped canned pepsi beans or ( 14 ounce ) can kidney beans | 8 large salad greens
Recipe Instructions: in a medium bowl, combine paprika, sugar, nutmeg, and lemon pecans.  add egg, egg yolk, citric acid, pepsi beans, and salad greens.  mix well.  cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours, or overnight.

Ingredient Phrases: 24 hot black beans ( with liquid reserved ) | 4 cups water or 4 cups chicken broth | 1 teaspoon chili flakes | 1 package taco seasoning mix | 1 pound ground pork or 1 pound ground beef | 4 large egg yolks, lightly beaten | 2 green onions, chopped
Recipe Instructions: place black beans in a saucepan and soak until cool.  place remaining ingredients and soup in a blender and blend until wellcombined.  pour into a blender bag and cover with plastic wrap.  refrigerate overnight and serve at once.

Random Ingredients: cashew,apple juice,mini marshmallow,green pea,mint leaf,apricot jam
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans peeled and chopped apples, reserve juice | 2 cups apple juice | 1 cup apricot jam | 1/4 cup sweet basil, minced | 1/4 cup cashews, chopped | 1/4 cup mini marshmallows
Recipe Instructions: line 2 tart pans with parchment paper.  combine sliced apples, apricot jam, and sweet basil in a blender.  blend for 4 minutes or just until mixed.  add apple juice, jam mixture, and cashews.  stir into prepared 9 inch tart pan and bake in a 425 oven for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup shredded cooked cod ( may use any favorite ) | 1 jar roasted garlic cloves or ( 12 ounce ) jar roasted garlic sauce | 3 cups roasted red chunky carrots, drained | salt and pepper | 2 cups thinly sliced gingerroot | 1/2 cup grated peeled carrot | 2 lbs ragu roquefort cheese, cubed or 1 lb parmesan cheese | 2 cups fresh lemon juice ( fresh would be best )
Recipe Instructions: heat oven to 35.  place red chunky carrots, ginger, carrot, garlic sauce and salt and pepper in a food processor and puree until smooth.  add the remaining ingredients to a mediumsize bowl and stir until smooth.  spoon the mixture into a 13x9 baking pan.  bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes on the first side or until done to your liking.  transfer to a wire rack to cool.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup quinoa | 1 cup baby spinach | 1/2 tablespoon curry powder ( or to taste ) | 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg | 1/4 teaspoon curry powder ( or to taste ) | 2 cups cooked sauerkraut ( or as desired ) | 1/4 cup chopped fresh spinach, defrosted
Recipe Instructions: cook quinoa according to package directions, drain and set aside.  make soup according to package directions add a little bit of boiling water to the broth, and let thicken.  in a large saucepan, bring quinoa and spinach to a rapid boil.  lower heat, cover and let simmer for 45 minutes.  stir into quinoa mixture and cook 5 minutes longer, until creamy.
Recipe Titile: Quinoa & Aubergine Soup With Sweet and Sour Peas, Spinach & Ricotta

Random Ingredients: bamboo shoot,tilapia fillet,parsley,dark rum,dulce de leche
Ingredient Phrases: 4 tilapia fillets, trimmed | 1/2 cup fresh parsley, chopped | 1/4 cup dulce de leche | 1/8 cup dark rum | 2 -4 cups bamboo shoots or 2 -4 cups halved bamboo shoots, stemmed
Recipe Instructions: preheat griddle over medium heat.  mix together parsley, dulce de leche, and rum and set aside.  sprinkle fish with remaining ingredients and toss to evenly coat.  garnish with fresh parsley and serve warm.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons peanut oil | 2 cups ranch dressing mix | 2 tablespoons vodka | 2 tablespoons molasses | 2 teaspoons amaretto | 2 teaspoons sprite | 2 teaspoons cream, whipped
Recipe Instructions: combine dressing mix and molasses ; stir over low heat.  stir in amaretto and cream ; whip until thick, add whipped cream and molasses mixture ; refrigerate.  serve warm or at room temperature with whipped cream.

Random Ingredients: chicken,cooking spray,cumin seed,mayonnaise,golden raisin,chili powder,beef stew meat
Ingredient Phrases: 3 lbs hot chili powder, fresh | 1 yellow onion, chopped | 1 lb ground beef stew meat | 1 tablespoon minced garlic | 1 teaspoon ground cumin seed | 1/4 teaspoon ground red chili powder | 1/4 cup mayonnaise | 1/4 cup golden raisin | 8 jalapeno peppers, diced | cooking spray | 1 can tomatoes, chopped
Recipe Instructions: in a dutch oven or casserole combine the chili powder, onions, and beef.  mix everything well.  cover, and cook about 15 minutes over low heat.

Random Ingredients: chili pepper flake,sirloin tip roast,chicken wing,red curry paste,pasta,celery
Ingredient Phrases: 8 -10 fresh basil leaves and pieces of fresh oregano, coarsely chopped | 1 lb sirloin tip roast, sliced into matchstick-shaped pieces | 1 1/2 tablespoons red curry paste, or to taste | 6 teaspoons chili peppers ( see my recipe ) | 6 teaspoons crushed roasted red curry paste ( see my recipe ) | 6 stalks celery ( garnish ) | 24 ounces pasta ( with steamed vegetables )
Recipe Instructions: in a large saucepan, cook the basil, 12 tablespoon dried oregano, and 1 teaspoon chili pepper in the hot sauce over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the basil has dried out, about 8 minutes.  set the roast in a large heavy roasting pan with the red curry paste, and season with chili peppers.  in another pan, brown the steak in the remaining 12 tablespoon dried oregano, stirring until evenly browned, about 30 seconds.  add 12 tbsp of the cooking chicken broth to the meat and simmer for 5 minutes.  strain the meat to remove any remaining cooking liquid.  discard the chicken broth and serve the meat and sauce separately.

Random Ingredients: prosciutto,parsnip,gelatin,pizza sauce,madras curry powder,parmigiano reggiano cheese,cauliflower floret,pie shell
Ingredient Phrases: 1 pound cauliflower floret, trimmed | 12 large cooked pinto beans | 24 ounces canned pimento stuffed beans, undrained | 2 cans crushed tomatoes | 1/4 cup chopped fresh basil leaves | 3 teaspoons madras curry powder | 1/4 teaspoon salt and ground black pepper to taste | 4 cups prepared pizza sauce | 1 can pinto beans, drained & rinsed | 1 loaf fresh grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley
Recipe Instructions: heat oven to 400 degrees f.  grease a 9inch pie dish.  place the cauliflower fillet, beans, tomatoes, basil, curry powder, salt, and black pepper in a blender.  pour in the pizza sauce.  puree.  season with salt and pepper.  mix in the pimento and beans.  pour half of the sauce mixture over the cheese.  bake in the preheated oven until the cheese has melted and set, about 2 hours.  remove from heat ; let cool for 10 to 12 minutes.  stir cheese mixture and cheese mixture between 2 plates, and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 500 g pork butt - cut into chunks
Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 200c 190c gas mark 2.  remove the fat from the fat and add the Pork to the cavity of your oven proof tin or the fat from your carbibb.  remove it from the heat and gently rub it in the fat.  put the pork into a baking tray with a rack in the centre and fill with 1 cup of water from the tin.  leave it for 1 hour and then pour it over the tray with a spoon.  you can even cook it in the oven for 1 hour on a foil baking tray.  you can bake it at 200c or 170c for 15 minutes on the rack with the sides down but you must do so according to your specific heat of your oven.  let the pork stand for 30 minutes in the tin.  remove any fat or bits and leave it in the tin and cook it in the oven.  you can cook it at 200c or 170c for 15 minutes on the rack with 3 cups of water from the tin and the sides down.  serve chilled or with biscuits.

Ingredient Phrases: 10 ounces red onions, chopped | 1/2 cup sliced green chilies, toasted | 2 tablespoons minced garlic cloves | 1 1/2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh ginger | 2 tablespoons olive oil | 2 cups thinly sliced pitted peeled thai peppers | 1 teaspoon sugar | freshly ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: stir the onions, chilies, garlic, ginger, olive oil, and chiles into a saucepan over medium heat.  stir and cook, stirring occasionally, until the chiles are soft but not scorched, about 5 minutes.  stir in sugar and pepper.  season with salt and pepper.  cover and cook over medium heat until the sauce has reduced into half, about 5 minutes.  stir frequently to prevent sticking.  cover and chill until serving.  serve over noodles or rice.  note if you plan on cooking on a day ahead, let the sauce cool at least 30 minutes before serving.

Random Ingredients: kernel corn,coffee,salt pepper,rosemary sprig,poblano chile,pea,white onion
Ingredient Phrases: 20 pecans | 6 poblano chiles, deseeded and patted dry | 1 cup white onion, finely chopped | 1/2 cup peas ( not peas packed ) | 1 teaspoon rosemary sprig, chopped | 1 teaspoon salt & pepper, to taste | 2 teaspoons instant coffee, crushed
Recipe Instructions: clean pecans and chop finely.  chop onion and chile.  peel and chop pecans.  saut onion in 3 tbl.  of the hot, butter until translucent.  saute pecans in 3 tbl.  of the butter until tender about 10 minutes.  remove from the heat and add rosemary and salt and pepper.  add beans and beans and pecans to skillet and cook till heated through.  garnish with sprigs of fresh lime, if desired.  if you are serving with chili sauce, stir over mediumlow heat until the sauce thickens.
Recipe Titile: Crock Pot Mexican Peppers Con Poblano

Random Ingredients: espresso powder,black eyed pea,chow mein noodle,deli roast beef,beef,broth,cinnamon,lasagna noodle
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb ground beef | 1/2 cup low-sodium fat-free instant veggie broth | 4 ounces dried white wine | 1 tablespoon espresso powder | 1 teaspoon dry sherry or 1 teaspoon brandy | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 2 teaspoons powdered cinnamon | 1 lb deli roast beef, sliced into 1/2 inch strips | 1/2 cup chopped fresh black-eyed peas | salt & freshly ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: combine meat, broth, wine and espresso powder in a medium saucepan.  bring to a boil ; reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes to set in the refrigerator.  strain liquid into a large resealable plastic bag and add remaining ingredients.  refrigerate for 1 hour ; reserve juices.  heat oil in a skillet over mediumhigh heat ; cook beef strips until browned ; set aside.  in a medium saucepan, melt vegestrone crumbs over high heat.  add beef, browning on all sides.  sprinkle with cinnamon mixture.  reduce heat to medium ; simmer for 1 minute ; stir in peas and season to taste with salt and pepper.  cover ; simmer for 10 minutes.

Random Ingredients: molasses,mustard seed,pine nut,vanilla essence,prawn,cumin powder,italian sausage
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 cups flour | 2 teaspoons baking soda | 2 teaspoons molasses | 3/4 teaspoon cinnamon | 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg | 1 1/2 cups sugar | 1 jar of crushed pineapple nuts, cut into 1/2 inch chunks | 1 teaspoon baking soda | 1 teaspoon baking soda | 1/8 teaspoon fennel seed | 1 egg | 4 ounces italian sausage, sliced | 1/2 cup flaked prawns, slivered
Recipe Instructions: prepare an oblong crust or a 9 inch pie pan in this order.  combine the first nine ingredients in a bowl ; mix well.  shape into a 12inch round and refrigerate for up to 1 day.  spread the remaining ingredients evenly over the dough, overlapping to make 9 round patties, and refrigerate for up to 2 months.  preheat an oven to 350 degrees f.  bake pies 10 minutes or until lightly browned on the top.  allow pies to cool on an ungreased cookie sheet for 20 minutes.  remove and discard the pits and cut into wedges.  transfer to a cooling rack.  bake for 12 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.  allow the prawns to cool completely.  preheat a oven to 300 degrees f and preheat the oven s pan.  cut a 4 inch circle from the center of two circles of dough to make a small depression in the center, leaving a 1 inch border around it.  spoon dough over the center edge of the depression.  starting at the base of each triangle, roll up each circle and place seam side down on cookie sheet.  with fingers to seal, carefully pinch edges of dough together to form a triangle about as wide as the tip of a large fork.  place triangles seam side down on baking sheet.  bake for 25 minutes or until crisp.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 leeks, cut into thin slices | 1/2/3 lb smoked shichimi mushroom, peeled | 2 lbs frozen shiitake mushrooms, thawed
Recipe Instructions: cut leeks in half lengthwise, then cut each half crosswise lengthwise into 12 strips.  cut each strip lengthwise into 13 strips.  in a large pot, combine the mushrooms with water to cover, and cover with boiling water.  heat until mushrooms are tender.  cool 5 minutes.  discard mushrooms to drain again, cool 15 minutes.  remove from water, cool, and cut into quarters.  in a large nonstick frying pan, melt wok over high heat ; add mushroom and saute until golden brown, about 3 minutes.  add shichimi and mushrooms to pan, and stir to coat.  stir in shiitake mushrooms, and return pan to stove.  add water to cover ; stir until liquid comes up to a boil.  return skillet to stove top, and cook 3 minutes, stirring continuously, until hot.  remove from stove, stirring constantly, and transfer to serving bowl.  for additional flavor, pour about 2 tablespoons sour cream into mushroom mixture to combine.  serve with steamed pita or other meat and vegetables.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can black beans | 1 cup canned diced shallot | 1 jar crushed dried hot peppers | 1 tablespoon salt and pepper, to taste | 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, divided
Recipe Instructions: place beans, shallots, hot pepper and salt and pepper in medium saucepan.  cover and simmer gently stirring occasionally for 34 minutes or until mixture returns to a boil, stirring often.  reduce heat to low and cook for 20 minutes or until the beans are tender and the sauce begins to thicken.  add remaining ingredients and stir to combine.  sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Recipe Titile: Black Bean and Black Pepper Chili

Random Ingredients: currant,chicken bouillon,green bean,pecorino cheese,haricot bean,tomato sauce,spice,hamburger
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups cooked hamburger ( cooked but not too raw ) | 1 can petite diced tomatoes and sauce | 1 cup chopped green beans ( or frozen mixed beans, rinsed, drained, and rinsed ) | 1 can tomato sauce | 1/3 cup coarsely crushed haricot bean or 1/3 cup other small bean ( rinsed and drained ) | 14 ounces mixed cooked hamburger, divided | 1/3 cup currants | 1/2 teaspoon ground coriander
Recipe Instructions: mix all ingredients except currants in a resealable bag, shake tightly to blend.  in a skillet over medium heat saut the currants for about 20 seconds, add the remaining ingredients and stir until well blended and all the ingredients are cooked thoroughly.  store in an airtight container.

Random Ingredients: white rice,corn oil,raspberry jam,cranberry,baking potato,balsamic vinegar,ham
Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups white rice ( i used rice brand ) | 2 baking potatoes, peeled and cut crosswise into 1/2-inch-wide strips | 1/2 cup cranberry preserves | 3 tablespoons corn oil | 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar | 1/4 cup raspberry jam
Recipe Instructions: combine the rice, potatoes, preserves, oil, balsamic vinegar and jam in a small bowl.  season to taste with salt and pepper.  heat 4 tablespoons of the oil in a skillet on medium heat and cook rice until the liquid is almost gone ; drain and toss with the rice mixture in a large bowl.

Random Ingredients: carom seed,cider vinegar,breadcrumb,red food coloring,ladyfinger,water,apricot preserve,cherry tomato
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/4 cups water | 1 1/4 cups sugar | 6 teaspoons lemon juice | 1/3 cup cider vinegar | 1 can apricot preserves | 1 cup breadcrumbs | 1 1/2 cups candied cherries or 1 1/2 cups apricots | 1 teaspoon carom seed, crushed | 1/4 teaspoon red food coloring, or to taste | 1 large tart 8 ounces ladyfingers
Recipe Instructions: in saucepan bring water, sugar and lemon juice to a boil.  add vinegar, 1 cup of bread crumbs, and crushed cherries.  simmer until sugar dissolves, about 15 minutes.  stir in preserves and breadcrumbs.  bring mixture to a boil again.  meanwhile, in small saucepan, combine remaining 2 teaspoons flour, fruit, sugar and lemon juice.  add bread crumbs, cherries, spices, and remaining 12 cup bread crumbs.  stir to blend and bring to a simmer on stove top.  remove from heat and refrigerate overnight or more.  preheat an oven to 400 degrees f 200 degrees c.  remove tart from refrigerator and refrigerate overnight.  to serve, place tart, if still in saucepan, in individual plates, topping each tart with fruit mixture.

Random Ingredients: canola oil,mango,monterey jack cheddar cheese,salt black pepper,red cabbage
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup shredded red cabbage | 1 cup diced mango | 2 teaspoons canola oil, or as needed | 1/2 teaspoon salt & freshly ground black pepper to taste | 1 1/2 cups shredded monterey jack and cheddar cheese | 1 can sliced ripe mangoes
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot, add cabbage and toss to coat.  simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.  cool for 5 minutes.  in a large bowl, mix together mango, oil and 12 teaspoon salt and pepper.  spread over half the cabbage mixture ; top with mango cheese.  in 13x9x2in baking dish, layer half of the mango mixture followed by layer of shredded cheese.  repeat for filling of remaining cabbage and cheese layers.  bake at 400 degrees for 2535 minutes, or until cheese is hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups all-purpose flour | 1 cup prepared manicotti | 1/2 cup lemon juice ( or 1/3 cup juice from 1 lemon )
Recipe Instructions: sift together the flour, sugar and lemon juice in a small bowl.  add the dried manicotti and mix well.  add the prepared flour mixture and mix to form a dough.  shape into 24 balls or smaller, if desired.  place about 2 inches apart onto a lightly floured surface, roll each ball of dough into a 14 inch diameter cigar with the palm of your hand and pinch all over with a teaspoon on the side.  place 2 inches away from you your hands on the prepared dough.  repeat this process 3 more times to make 24 logs, depending on size of logs.  with a rolling pin, flatten the log to about 1 inch thick.  cut the logs in half, then cut each half crosswise into 12 wedges.  serve immediately with a dollop of confectioners sugar sauce.

Ingredient Phrases:
4 english cucumbers ( cut in pieces about 1 lb or 1 lb per person, each about 6.
    - ) | salt and pepper | 1 teaspoon fresh peppermint extract | 24 ounces chopped fresh basil pesto | 1/2 red onion, grated | 3/4 cup chopped fresh mint, or more to taste | 4 -6 tortilla | 8 ounces chopped red lettuce | 1 teaspoon bottled peppermint extract
Recipe Instructions: peel and remove seeds and stem ends of all cucumbers and halve lengthwise into 12 pieces.  peel, peel and devein cucumbers and cut into slices about 12 thick.  season cucumbers with salt to taste.  heat small skillet over medium.  add peppers, then remove from skillet and place on paper towels to drain.  set aside on paper towels for later.  heat oil in large skillet.  add onion, and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes.  stir in pesto, then stir in peppers ; season with salt and pepper to taste.  place lettuce in the top portion and arrange cucumber slices on top.  pour hot pesto mixture over cucumber slices, followed by peppermint extract.  drizzle with additional peppermint extract.  serve immediately garnished with fresh mint leaves.

Random Ingredients: tomato green chile pepper,flour tortilla,farfalle pasta,mango,sage,bean sprout
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup finely chopped seeded and finely chopped tomatoes and green chile peppers | 3/4 cup finely chopped chopped mango | 2 tablespoons flour, seasoned with | 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper | 3 1/2 tablespoons fresh sage, finely chopped | 3/4 cup beans sprouts, cooked | 1 cup farfalle pasta
Recipe Instructions: combine first 6 ingredients ; dredge pasta in flour.  dredge in flour.  stir to coat pasta with flour sauce ; heat to boiling.  reduce heat to medium and cook, stirring occasionally, 25 minutes or until pasta is tender but still firm to bite.  remove from heat.  while pasta is cooking, drain and mash tomatoes and peppers ; stir into sauce.  add to tomato mixture ; stir to coat.  bring sauce to boil ; reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer until sauce is thickened.  sauce should be smooth and bubbly.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb spaghetti | 1/3 cup red chili pepper, chopped | 1/3 cup tarragon vinegar | 1 can dark chocolate, melted | 1 jar spaghetti
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  add spaghetti and cook until al dente ; drain.  meanwhile, melt the chocolate in a large skillet over medium heat.  remove from heat, whisk in the sauce ingredients and return to a boil.  cook and stir until just heated through.  stir in the heated spaghetti and keep hot until serving.  if sauce is too thick, stir in a little more sauce as needed.  this recipe can be prepared ahead of time with the spaghetti.  let sit for at least 2 hours before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 large leaves nori ( or rhoda ) or 1/2 cup coriander ( or jalapeno if you don't like khe ) | 1 pound fresh sage ( or fresh cilantro or parsley ) | 1 jicama
Recipe Instructions: place the dried sage, cilantro, and jicama in a food processor, and pulse until the leaves are coarsely chopped or pureed and a few jicabs of sage are formed.  season with salt and pepper.  the leaves should be roughly chopped and the sage and jicabs of sage should be very finely chopped.  drain off the excess water, reserving as much liquid as possible in a large pot.  bring the water to a rolling boil, then drop the mixture into the water, cover, and allow to sit 20 minutes before you prepare the garnish.  if the garnish is too dry to handle, simply add 1 tablespoon of water to thin the soup and let it chill while you prepare the garnish.  in a large heavy soup pot, pour 1 tablespoon of hot water to the bottom and add a little of the garnish.  allow the soup to boil, cover, and allow to steam until reduced to about 13 cup.  the garnish should be thin and syrupy about halfway through, but still very aromatic.  once the soup is nearly as thick as a spoon, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of water.  bring to a gentle boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer, cover, and simmer until the soup is fairly thick, about 20 minutes.  season with salt and pepper before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups whole-grain pasta, uncooked | 6 tablespoons vegetable oil | 6 tablespoons chopped fresh garlic ( or use 4 ) | 1/4 teaspoon minced fresh thyme | 6 tablespoons chopped fresh dill | 1 cup dry white wine | 3 tablespoons tomato paste or 3 tablespoons canned chopped tomatoes | 8 ounces fresh chopped fresh medium head broccoli | 2 tablespoons chopped scallions | 1 teaspoon fresh lime zest | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme
Recipe Instructions: cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water according to directions on packet.  set aside.  meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, heat 3 tablespoons oil over medium heat.  add the garlic and thyme and cook, stirring until fragrant, about 5 minutes.  add the wine and heat through, then stir in both tomato paste and 4 cans of chopped fresh tomatoes.  cover and let simmer for 5 minutes.  stir in the pasta and reserved 3 tablespoons oil.  bring to a boil then remove from heat, add the broccoli, scallions, and lemon zest and season with salt and pepper to taste.  stir in the thyme and serve.
Recipe Titile: Baked Italian Pasta With Salsa and Cilantro

Random Ingredients: rose water,cottage cheese,iceberg lettuce,red potato,green bean,teriyaki sauce
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon green beans, drained and rinsed | 1/3 cup red onion, chopped | 1/3 cup fresh rose water | 1 tablespoon lime juice | 1 teaspoon teriyaki sauce | 1 cup cottage cheese | 1 can crushed red potatoes, drained | 2 cups iceberg lettuce, shredded
Recipe Instructions: sprinkle chopped green beans on salad greens.  mix green beans and onion together.  heat 1 teaspoon of teriyaki sauce in a large frypan over mediumhigh heat.  add cottage cheese and red potatoes.  cook gently until mixture begins to thicken, stirring occasionally, about 1 minute.  spoon mixture evenly over lettuce leaves.  top with red onion and rose water.  cover and cook over mediumhigh heat for 10 minutes or until golden and bubbling.  remove from heat.  top with remaining teriyaki sauce and cottage cheese mixture.  serve with fresh lime salad.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup brown-cured shortening | 1/4 lb boneless skinless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch pieces | 1/2 cup yellow cornmeal | salt and pepper, to taste | freshly ground black pepper, to taste | 16 ounces tomato, undrained, cut into pieces | 18 ounces skinless, boneless crust-cut chicken breasts | 1 can crushed tomatoes ( with liquid )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 375f ; lightly oil an 8x8inch nonstick baking dish.  line the bottom of the prepared baking dish with baking paper ; drizzle with about 12 cup the shortening.  in a skillet over medium heat, cook the chicken for about 5 to 8 minutes or until just cooked through.  remove the chicken from the skillet, reserving 3 cups of the cooking juices.  return the chicken to the pan, and stir in the cornmeal.  cook over low heat until the mixture thickens about 5 minutes.  pour off the excess liquid and set aside.  to the sauce in the skillet, combine the cornmeal and 1 tbsp of the shortening ; pour over the chicken.  spoon over the tomato mixture.  sprinkle the remaining 1 tbsp of shortening over the top.  bake in the preheated oven until the crust is brown, 2025 minutes, then reduce the heat to 350 f and continue ovening until the top is crusty, 2025 minutes more.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can diced tomatoes with green pea ( or less ) | 8 large idaho potatoes | 1 can peeled and sliced green pea | 1 cup peeled and sliced carrots | 6 celery ( chopped fine ( or thinly sliced ) | 1 1/2 cups sugar | 1 cup chopped dried apricot | 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon ( or to taste ) | 1 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg ( or to taste )
Recipe Instructions: place the potatoes into a large pot with enough water to cover.  cover and cook until tender about 15 minutes.  meanwhile, in a large heavy skillet, combine the tomatoes, peas, carrots, celery, sugar and apricots.  saut until vegetables are soft, about 5 minutes.  remove from the heat and set aside.  to the same skillet, bring the remaining canned tomatoes through a cheese grater until smooth.  sprinkle generously with the cinnamon, nutmeg and nutmeg.  stir to coat.  place the mixture into a blender or food processor and puree until smooth.

Random Ingredients: flour,rosemary leaf,olive oil,field mushroom,corn tortilla chip,equal sugar substitute
Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups thinly sliced field mushrooms ( fresh or frozen ) | 3/4 cup buttery or 3/4 cup olive oil | 3 tablespoons white wine | 2 tablespoons flour ( optional ) | 4 cups chicken breasts ( boneless skinless, boneless, boneless or skinless ) | 2 teaspoons capers ( optional ) | 2 tablespoons equal sugar substitute ( substitute with cornstarch ) | 8 ounces reduced-fat chicken breast ( about 6 skinless, boneless, boneless or skinless, boneless or skinless, boneless or shredded, if used )
Recipe Instructions: place the sliced mushrooms, 3 tablespoons butter, a bit of white wine and 3 tablespoons flour together in a glass jar, cover the jar with ice cream, shake, and refrigerate for 24 hours.  preheat the oven to 350f  line a baking sheet with parchment paper.  pour in about 2 tablespoons butter over the mushrooms, pressing a couple of times to not burn any salt.  in a small bowl, beat the butter and the flour together until creamy.  gradually pour the chicken stock mixture into the mixture, stir until the mixture is smooth and slightly sticky.  do not overfill the pan.  bake in the oven for 40 minutes or until the chicken is very tender and the sauce is thickening, stirring constantly.  serve with tortilla chips, cheese, salsa.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 -2 lb hard salami | 5 -7 ounces vegetable-flavored rinsed salad greens | 1/8 - 1/2 cup orange juice
Recipe Instructions: place the salami in a large bowl.  stir in the vegetables.  pour half the dressing in the bottom of each bowl.  squeeze out the excess water and pour the remaining 1/4 cup dressing over the salad.  drizzle the remaining dressing over the salad.

Random Ingredients: orange bell pepper,white chocolate,pinto bean,cheddar cheese soup,tomato
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans black beans, in one package | 2 cans diced tomatoes | 2 cans pinto beans, drained | 3 cans white cheddar cheese soup, undiluted | 1 cup crushed orange bell pepper, chopped
Recipe Instructions: in a 2 quart saucepan, combine the black beans, black beans, tomatoes, cheddar cheese soup, orange bell pepper, and cheddar cheese.  bring to a boil, then partially cover and reduce heat for 1 to 1 - 12 hours, stirring occasionally.  remove the cover with a wire mesh strainer until liquid is reduced to about 2 cups and the cheese is melted.
Recipe Titile: Easy Black Beans and White Chocolate Chili

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can halibut, drained and rinsed | 10 -12 ounces swiss cheese, cut into 3/4 inch chunks | 4 -5 tablespoons grated fresh gingerroot ( or more to taste ) | 12 slices of sliced cheese
Recipe Instructions: heat the oven to 450f.  put the halibut in a large dish or large glass ceramic baking dish lined with aluminum foil.  top with about 1 tablespoon of the cheese and top with another half of the cheese.  spread the halibut on top, leaving a sliver in the center with a slight opening.  fold up the cheese side of the pan and place the foil in the middle to cover the cheese.  top the cheese with the halibut, pressing down firmly so as to seal the edges.  let stand for 15 minutes.  transfer to a serving platter and serve.  note  this recipe can be made ahead and refrigerated before use.  just make sure your steamer is not covered with aluminum foil.  to make the dressing heat the oil in a small sauce pan over medium heat.  cook the sauce, stirring to melt the sauce, for 8 to 10 minute, stirring frequently.  add the ginger, and continue to cook 3 to 4 minutes.  add the ham, and cook 2 to 2 - 12 min until the ham is cooked through and the ham is slightly pink in the center.  mix the cheese, ham and sauce together, and return to the pan.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb ground lean pork in large chunks | 32 ounces sliced zucchini | 32 ounces onions soup mix | 2 tablespoons red pepper flakes | 2 tablespoons garlic cloves | 2 pounds top sirloin steaks | 3 tablespoons chopped pimiento green bell pepper, plus more | salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Recipe Instructions: brown meat in a dutch oven or skillet over mediumhigh heat for 8 to 10 minutes, or until no longer pink and juices run clear.  drain and place in medium bowl.  pour in soup mix.  stir in pepper flakes.  season with red pepper flakes.  pour over beef in skillet.  sprinkle with pimientos, salt and pepper.  cook and stir for 15 minutes, or until beef is very tender.  stir in reserved vegetables and beef.  reduce heat to low and cook 10 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup almonds, blanched and chopped | 1/2 cup pecans, chopped | 1 cup silver beet, chopped | 1 tablespoon brandy, divided | 1 cup buttermilk | 1 cup beets, chopped | 1 dash rum ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot or a heavy skillet bring water to a boil.  add the almonds and pecans and boil until they begin to soften, about 23 minutes.  drain.  add the silver beet, brandy and buttermilk ; season with salt and pepper to taste.  simmer uncovered until the beet is soft and tender, about 15 minutes.  meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil and cook the beets, being careful not to remove the beet.  drain, return the vegetables to the pot, cover and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes longer.  remove from the water and serve immediately.  top with a dollop of rum if desired.

Random Ingredients: cold water,water chestnut,head cabbage,lemon juice,gruyere cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 1 head cabbage | 1 pound water chestnuts, coarsely chopped | 1 pound gruyere cheese, coarsely grated | 1 pinch lemon zest, grated | 1 tablespoon honey or 1 tablespoon agave syrup | 1/4 cup cold water | 2 lemons, zest of, grated
Recipe Instructions: place cabbage in saucepan, and cover with water for 3 to 4 hours.  drain ; let cool.  reserve remaining liquid.  meanwhile, in a bowl, mix water chestnuts with gruyere cheese until combined.  mix in reserved liquid until mixture is well blended.  let cool.  in a small bowl, combine honey, water, lemon zest, and honey mixture.  pour the mixture over all.  cover ; refrigerate 8 to 24 hours.  stir regularly ; refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.

Random Ingredients: navy bean,chicken stock vegetable,fava bean,flour,prawn,head cauliflower
Ingredient Phrases: 1 head cauliflower | 1 lb dried navy beans | 1/4 cup flour | 6 chicken stock or 6 vegetable stock | 1 can fava beans | 1/4 pound chopped fresh raw prawns
Recipe Instructions: rinse and drain the cauliflower.  cut into small pieces.  stir in the navy beans, flour and broth.  bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.  stir in the chopped chickpeas and cook for a few minutes.  add the cooked pasta and toss gently until heated through.  serve hot with chopped rice.

Random Ingredients: cinnamon,watermelon,french bread,chipotle pepper adobo sauce,quinoa,pesto sauce,lime
Ingredient Phrases: 1 package quinoa ( or other dried dried whole wheat or wholemeal ) | 2 lbs green plantains ( about 1 to 2 pounds ) | 2 cups watermelon, cut into 1/2 inch slices | 1 teaspoon cinnamon | 2 tablespoons fresh minced chipotle peppers in adobo sauce | 1 teaspoon minced fresh lime peel | 3/4 cup chopped french bread, plus more for serving | 1 cup prepared pesto sauce
Recipe Instructions: fry the quinoa or wholemeal in a medium skillet over mediumhigh heat until the grains start to brown.  drain well.  sprinkle with 1 tsp cinnamon, 12 tsp chipotle, 1 tsp lime peel and 1 tsp salt.  set aside.  to assemble the quinoa mix the quinoa, watermelon mixture, watermelon, cinnamon, chipotle, lime peel and bread.  cover with aluminum foil.  let soak in a warm place in an hour or overnight.  place the prepared french toast slices at the table and toast with the sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 ripe strawberries, hulled | 6 red jalapeno chiles, seeded and deveined | 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened | 1 tablespoon sugar | 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
Recipe Instructions: peel, core and remove seeds from jalapenos ; discard skin.  place 1 cup of the strawberries, skin side up, in a food processor, and pulse until finely chopped.  in a medium bowl, blend the butter until melted.  whisk in the sugar until smooth ; gradually whisk in the flour until smooth.  fold the strawberries, chiles and sugar into the butter mixture, and blend into the butter mixture.  spoon the cream cheese mixture into small, but wide, bowls.  cover and refrigerate for 6 hours.

Random Ingredients: red bell pepper,fettuccine,hamburger bun,malt vinegar,beef brisket
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 lb beef brisket | 4 cups mozzarella deli fettuccine, cooked to firm, cooled | 1/2 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped | 1 cup malt vinegar | 1 tablespoon malt vinegar
Recipe Instructions: cut brisket into 12inch cubes.  coat with water and place into slow cooker.  cook at high for 8 hours or low for 5 hours.  remove meat, keep warm.  bring a large pot of water to boil over high heat.  when hot, add fettuccine and cook until just tender, about 8 minutes.  drain, place in a medium bowl.  add vegetables and vinegar to the hot fettuccine.  mix until well blended.  cover saucepan, add brisket and simmer, uncovered, for 1 hour.  drain sauce and return to medium saucepan.  stir in the fettuccine, keep warm.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups prepared navy beans | 1/2 cup white sugar | 1 cup shredded sage leaves | 3 tablespoons chopped fresh sage leaves
Recipe Instructions: in a medium saucepan, combine the beans and white sugar.  bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for 3 to 5 minutes, or until mixture thickens and bubbles.  remove from heat and set aside to cool.  in a large bowl, mix together the remaining ingredients except the beans.  pour into an ovenproof dish, and sprinkle with the sage leaf.

Random Ingredients: hot chili sauce,ketchup,cayenne pepper,chicken breast fillet,ice,black olive,spice,thyme
Ingredient Phrases:
2 lbs breasts, cooked and boned | 1 cup ice | 1/2 cup ketchup | 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper | 1/2 teaspoon thyme | 1 tablespoon hot chili sauce ( or sriracha ) | 1 1/2 cups chopped raw black olives ( or 2 tbls.
    - dried, drained, and chopped fresh )
Recipe Instructions: in a slow cooker, combine all ingredients.  cover and cook on low for 2 - 14 hours.  serve over rice or noodles.

Random Ingredients: cooking spray,white mushroom,potato starch,fennel seed,head cabbage,beef rib,egg,kale
Ingredient Phrases: 2 boneless beef rib, cut into 1-inch cubes | 2 tablespoons cooking spray | 1/3 cup potato starch | 1/4 cup white mushroom, finely chopped | 1 lb frozen cut kale, well packed | 1 large egg | 1/2 lb cubed cooked saffron steak
Recipe Instructions: cook beef cubes in 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, stirring often, for 3 minutes, or until meat is browned, breaking up if necessary.  add potatoes, mushrooms, kale, and next 7 ingredients.  cook 3 minutes or until cabbage is tender.  stir in beef cubes.  let stand 5 minutes.  transfer mixture to casserole dish.  cover and refrigerate until needed.

Ingredient Phrases: 3/4 lb swiss cheese, cut into 1/8-inch-thick slices | 2 1/2 ounces sour cream, divided | horseradish, to garnish
Recipe Instructions: remove the cheese from the refrigerator and squeeze out the air.  combine the swiss, sour cream, horseradish, and 2 tbsp of the reserved cheese in a small bowl.  spoon the cheese mixture into 3 individual salad plates ; top each serving with 2 tablespoons of the reserved cheese.

Ingredient Phrases: 8 ounces fresh tomatoes, julienned | 5 red peppers, finely chopped | 3 yellow onions, finely chopped | 1 carrot, finely chopped | 1 celery rib, thinly sliced | 1 celery seed, thinly sliced | 1 red pepper, finely chopped | 1 small onion, finely minced | 1 can diced tomatoes | 1 can green chilies, fresh diced | 1/2 cup dry white wine | 1/2 teaspoon ground caramalind paste or 1/2 teaspoon dried carameling powder | 1/2 teaspoon salt | 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
Recipe Instructions: combine tomatoes, bell peppers, onion, carrot, celery, red pepper, and celery seed in a mixing bowl and stir in wine and caramalind.  season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.  simmer, stirring every 1 to 1 - 12 hours, until very tender.  to serve, arrange on plates and top each with fresh chutney.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup golden syrup | 1 -2 slice crusty pizza crust, thick and light crust
Recipe Instructions: mix 1 of the two  the blueberries in a large bowl.  spray a cookie sheet with nonstick spray.  place the pizza crust on it.  spread remaining  the berries over the pizza crust.  bake at 425 degrees for a few minutes until golden brown, then reduce oven temperature to 500 degrees, cover the baked pizza with aluminum foil, and bake for 12 to 15 minutes until golden brown.  remove from oven, and let cool while making the sauce.  the sauce is just a bit too hot.  serve with additional red, green, yellow or orange slices.

Random Ingredients: chicken breast meat,lasagna noodle,beef stew meat,squid,gorgonzola
Ingredient Phrases: 18 ounces lasagna noodles | 1 cup chicken breast meat, cooked and crumbled | 1 1/2 lbs boneless neck duck breast meat, cooked and crumbled | 2 -3 cups gorgonzola | 1 lb cooked, cubed small squid
Recipe Instructions: cook lasagna noodles in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente ; drain.  add chicken and cook over medium heat ; drain.  stir in sauce until hot.  stir in duck and season with salt and pepper.  cover and cook over medium heat until duck and sauce are heated through.  let stand about 10 minutes then set in the refrigerator and allow to cool.  cut squid into strips and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups chickpeas | 1/2 cucumber | 50 g fish sauce
Recipe Instructions: cook chickpeas, cucumber and cucumber in boiling water until tender and slightly pink.  cool to room temperature.  rinse and drain chickpeas.  chop cucumbers.  place chickpeas, cucumber and fish sauce in a dish and pour over chick peas.  cover and chill for 1015 hours.  serve over rice or noodles.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 liters oil ( or as directed on indian brand ) | 6 tablespoons sea salt
Recipe Instructions: spray and lightly mist two nonstick pans.  place on oil or as directed on Indian brand.  mix 12 tablespoon salt with sea salt and pour this out into the pans, allowing some of the salt to drip out.  place the pan on the stove and immediately heat on the stove top.  keep an eye on it, as the salt will get a little darker.  after 4 minutes, add the salt to the pan and add the saltwater, stirring constantly and making sure not to let water boil off the bottom and out of the pan.  the mixture is done and the saltwater will become a little sticky.  repeat with the remaining saltwater and the last layer of pan.  bake at 180 degrees c for 1012 minutes.

Random Ingredients: onion salt,fettuccine pasta,ginger paste,apple cider,oregano leaf
Ingredient Phrases: 4 cans peeled peeled whole tomatoes | 1/4 cup sweet red wine | 1/4 cup canola oil | 1/4 cup white wine | 2 large onions ( white part only chopped fine ) | 1 garlic clove, pressed | 2 tablespoons ginger paste | 1 teaspoon oregano leaves | 1 teaspoon thyme | 2 tablespoons dried parsley | 1/2 tablespoon red wine ( optional ) | 8 ounces fettuccine pasta
Recipe Instructions: in nonmetallic dish, combine chopped tomatoes, red wine, drained tomatoes, sweet red wine, 1 cup oil, 1 teaspoon of the ginger paste, oregano, thyme  parsley.  dissolve wine in  cup water  blend well.  bring to a boil, then reduce heat to very low and simmer for 15 minutes.  cook pasta just until al dente, but not mushy.  remove pasta from bowl to drain  in a large bowl, combine the tomato mixture.  add pasta  to sauce, toss to coat and serve.  top with desired amount of pasta  or other vegetables  if desired, and serve with a sprinkling of cinnamonsugar.
Recipe Titile: Vegan Fettuccini With Apple Cider Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package simply cheddar cheese soup | 2 cans condensed shredded american cheese | 1/2 cup horseradish | 12 ounces shredded doritos ( optional ) or 12 ounces cracker cutlet ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a slow cooker or soup pot on low heat, combine shredded cheese soup and shredded american cheese.  set off on low to keep warm.  pour half of the soup mixture into a glass measuring cup and then add horseradish if using.  add the shredded cheese and then blend it into soup.  return to low heat and add horseradish mixture if using and blend well into soup.  serve with crackers.

Random Ingredients: tofu,carrot,graham cracker crust,basil,tomato green chilies,brown rice
Ingredient Phrases: 1 can diced tomatoes, undrained | 1 carrot, sliced | 1 celery, sliced | 1 cup diced tofu | 1/2 teaspoon dried basil | 1/2 cup brown rice | 2 teaspoons all-purpose flour | 1/4 cup graham cracker crust
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 325 degrees f 165 degrees c.  prepare a 9x13 inch dish with cooking spray.  season ingredients ingredients, except for the flour, with salt and pepper.  cut dough into 6 pieces.  spoon into prepared casserole dish.  bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons peanut oil | 3 garlic cloves, chopped | 2 tablespoons light sesame seeds | 1 1/2 tablespoons rice wine | 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast halves | 2 ounces ground unsalted peanuts, coarsely chopped | 1/2 cup sesame oil ( can use a food processor to chop the peanuts ) | 8 ounces chunky peanut and peanut butter flavored chicken breast halves | 8 ounces sliced scallions
Recipe Instructions: prepare the marinade as directed on the package.  to do this, heat the oil in a wok over medium high heat.  add the garlic and sesame seeds and saut until fragrant, about 2 minutes.  stir in the rice wine and cook over medium heat until fragrant, 2 to 5 minutes.  remove from heat.  place about 12 cup of the ground peanuts in a large bowl and set aside.  add the chicken to the wok, reduce the heat low and saut until the chicken has lost its pink color and is no longer pink in the center, 7 to 9 minutes.

Random Ingredients: rose wine,kosher salt black pepper,red chile pepper,celery salt,rosemary,cooking oat
Ingredient Phrases: 1 head celery or 3/4 cup parsley | 1/2 teaspoon table salt | 1 cup cooking oatmeal | 1/2 cup red chile pepper, seeded and sliced ( use red if you like ) | 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary ( or 1/2 tsp basil and 1/2 tsp garlic powder ) | 3 tablespoons kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 275f.  coat the bottom and sides of a 9 inch baking dish with cooking spray.  pour the oatmeal into the bottom of the prepared dish to form a sealable shell.  tear and set aside.  add the salt to the sauteed celery, stirring to loosen any lumps.  season with the table salt and season with rosemary, garlic powder, and kosher salt and pepper.

Random Ingredients: bacon,orzo pasta,fine sea salt,wheat flour,grain white rice,hot chili pepper,golden syrup
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups whole wheat flour | 1 1/2 tablespoons fine sea salt | 4 tablespoons dry white sugar | 2 lbs ground pork | 6 tablespoons golden syrup ( any flavoured fat free type ) | 3 cups uncooked orzo pasta ( or cooked ) | 1/2 cup shredded carrot | 1 1/2 tablespoons dried parsley ( or dried ) | 3/4 teaspoon chopped fresh lemon zest | 3 large hot chili peppers ( fresh or canned )
Recipe Instructions: dredge orzo in flour, remove any tough skin if necessary.  put the ground pork into mixing bowl.  add golden syrup, 1 - 14 cups water, 12 cup sugar and 14 teaspoon salt.  add enough ground pork to make a stiff dough.  knead until smooth, adding more flour as needed to keep dough from sticking.  cover and let stand 1 - 12 hours to firm.  combine orzo and remaining sugar, chopped chile peppers.  press into a greased 9 x 13inch baking pan.  sprinkle orzo with reserved orzo mixture and sprinkle with pepper strips.  bake 20 to 25 minutes in a 350 degree pan.  cool.  cut orzo into small pieces and serve hot or cold.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup miracle whip | 1/2 cup whipped cream cheese | 1/4 cup melted butter | 1 1/2 teaspoons dried mint liqueur | 1 pound sour apple slices, cut into halves | 1/2 cup toasted shredded iceberg lettuce, divided
Recipe Instructions: place miracle whip, cream cheese, melted butter, and mint into a blender or food processor and blend until combined.  blend in apple slices, sour cherries, and lettuce.  spread dollops of fruit mixture evenly on each toasted crust.  dot with remaining ingredients.

Random Ingredients: linguine,pink peppercorn,coriander,pineapple,squash,red bean,double cream,purpose white flour
Ingredient Phrases: 6 cups red beans, rinsed and well drained | 1 quart pineapple, halved | 1 can purple-skinned lemongrass, coarsely chopped | 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg ( or to your taste ) | 1/2 teaspoon ground coriander | 2 sprigs fresh orange segments ( to garnish ) | 1 1/2 cups all-purpose white flour | 6 1/2 cups double cream | 2 tablespoons pineapples, chopped
Recipe Instructions: place the beans into a large heavy pot over mediumhigh heat, and bring to a boil.  stir frequently until the beans float to the top, 35 minutes.  add the pineapple, lemongrass, nutmeg, coriander, orange segments and pineapple juice.  simmer until the pineapple is soft but still pink inside, and the liquid is reduced to about 1 cup, about 10 minutes.  combine the flour, cream and reserved pineapple pulp in a medium bowl ; add the mixture alternately with the flour, then whisk until the flour is smooth and the mixture is smooth.  remove the pasta from the heat, rinse in cold water and drain well in a medium bowl.  in a small saucepan, warm the double cream over low heat until foaming, 5 to 7 minutes.  add the pineapples, if using, and continue cooking until softened, about 2 to 3 minutes more.  serve hot over the noodles or rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package light brown rice, soaked in overnight | 1 can cream cheese, softened | 1 package taco seasoning mix | 8 -10 corn tortillas, soaked in water | 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
Recipe Instructions: grease 13x9 baking dish.  cook rice according to package directions.  drain and set aside.  combine cream and taco seasoning in a microwavesafe bowl, stirring well with a fork.  spread on bottom of prepared baking dish.  top with shredded mozzarella cheese, then top with remaining tortillas and mozzarella cheese.  spoon into prepared dish.  cover with plastic wrap, place in the fridge for 30 minutes or until firm.  bake at 375 degrees f for 1215 minutes or until crust is lightly goldenbrown.  let sit for about 2 minutes before slicing.

Random Ingredients: chinese five spice powder,turmeric powder,oregano,lemon juice zest,black pepper,five spice powder
Recipe Instructions: combine the first six ingredients in a small pitcher and stir.  add enough water for at least one gallon of the mixture to come to the top of your steamer.  bring to a boil.  serve immediately on rice.

ing instructions ##
