Random Ingredients: cilantro stem,banana,tomato green chilies,oil,chicken base,red onion,cranberry
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup dried dried garbanzo beans ( or fresh ) | 1 small red onion, finely diced | 1 1/2 lbs skinless, boneless chicken, cubed | 1 can whole canned diced tomatoes with green chilies, drained | 1 can diced bananas | 1/4 cup cilantro stem, rinsed and cut into 1/8 inch pieces | 6 ounces banana, cubed | 1 teaspoon cumin seed | 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin | 1 teaspoon ground coriander seed | 2 tablespoons oil | 10 slices bacon, cut into bitesize pieces | 4 ounces sliced red onions | 1 cup chopped fresh cilantro | 5 lime juice | 5 tablespoons chopped fresh banana rind
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 325 degrees.  in a small saucepan, combine dried garbanzo beans and onion.  cover with water ; cook 20 minutes.  stir in remaining ingredients except mango.  cover ; bake 45 minutes longer.  uncover ; bake an additional 10 minutes.  let stand 5 minutes before serving.

Random Ingredients: peanut oil vegetable,pico de gallo,phyllo pastry,spring onion,sauce
Ingredient Phrases: 600 g small phyllo pastry sheets | 350 g roasted peanuts ( or to taste ) | 3/4 cup peanut oil ( for vegan use ) | 1 small spring onion, cut into thin rings | 60 g sauteed pimiento stuffed with peppers ( fresh or canned )
Recipe Instructions: place whole peanuts, peanut oil and pepper rings in a small bowl and brush over the phyllo.  sprinkle the phyllo with about 1 tablespoon of the chopped peanuts.  roll the phyllo in the phyllo and wrap in aluminum foil, or aluminum foil, and wrap well.  allow to sit for at least 30 minutes.  brush with extra peanut oil and sprinkle with the chopped spring onions.

Random Ingredients: red apple,black olive,chunky salsa,salt black pepper
Ingredient Phrases: 12 tablespoons fresh corn oil or 12 tablespoons cooking spray, divided | 1 large red onion, sliced thin | 1 large white sweet potato, peeled and cut into half-moons | 1 teaspoon salt & freshly ground black pepper | 10 cups diced cooked small tomatoes | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 5 ounces chunky salsa ( i use a very thick version )
Recipe Instructions: heat 6 tablespoons of the corn oil in a 1 quart heavy skillet over medium heat.  cook the onion in the hot oil until tender, about 6 minutes.  stir in the potato and keep warm.  cook the onion mixture in the same skillet over medium heat 3 minutes.  stir in the 12 teaspoon salt and pepper.  cook, stirring frequently, until just tender but not browned.  stir in tomatoes and garlic.  season with salt and pepper and keep warm.  drain the tomatoes and place in a 4quart bowl ; season with salt and pepper.  stir in the salsa.  bring the mixture to a boil.  reduce the heat to low and cook for 2025 minutes.  stir occasionally until thick and smooth.  sprinkle with remaining 14 cup of the cheese and serve immediately.
Recipe Titile: Spanish Apples With Salsa and Corn

Random Ingredients: beef rib,orange juice,chicken bouillon,potato starch,goat cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 8 ounces cubed or frozen cooked sweet potatoes in cubed shell | 2 large sweet potatoes, in shell and skin | 3 garlic cloves, crushed | 4 tablespoons fresh parsley, minced | 1 medium red onion, thinly sliced | 2 medium carrots, thinly sliced | 2 cups cooked and cubed beef ribs, coarsely ground | 1 tablespoon minced fresh orange juice | 7 teaspoons chicken bouillon, dissolved in | 1 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1 teaspoon ground turmeric
Recipe Instructions: in large bowl, combine sweet potatoes, garlic, parsley, onion, carrots, beef, red onion, and 14 cup water.  stir to combine and set aside.  add 12 the chicken bouillon to a slow cooker over medium heat.  stir until the roux has dissolved but is not coloured, about 2 minutes.  season with 1 tbsp of chicken bouillon and 3 tsp of turmeric.  cover and cook on low 710 hours.  uncover when the meat is nearly done baking.  remove from the heat and allow to cool.  remove the onion, carrot and ribs from the soup and discard.  cut the soup into 6 equal chunks, then set aside to cool completely.  cut into serving size portions and set aside.  soup can be chilled over high heat and refrigerated overnight until needed for cooking. .
Recipe Titile: Baked Sweet Potato and Beef Skillet

Random Ingredients: brandy,romaine lettuce,vegetable oil cooking spray,chicken bouillon granule
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups carrots, thinly sliced | 2 cups cabbage, shredded | 1/2 cup red onion, sliced | 1/4 cup yellow onion, sliced | 1/2 cup roma lettuce, shredded | 3 tablespoons dijon mustard | 1/2 teaspoon honey | 3/4 cup vegetable oil for deep-frying | 3/4 cup brandy
Recipe Instructions: in a large skillet saute the carrots with onions in oil for 57 minutes.  add the cabbage, onions, carrots, and celery.  cook for 67 minutes until cabbage is tender.  transfer to a large bowl, cool completely.  in a small bowl, heat the vegetable oil and add the mustard and honey.  season to taste with salt and pepper and toss together.  add all the dressing ingredients to the salad bowl.  pour the dressing over the vegetables and toss gently to coat.  serve immediately garnished with a dollop of sour cream and a dollop of horseradish.  enjoy.

Random Ingredients: chicken stock,cooking apple,peanut oil,yeast,red potato,olive,chili powder
Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons fresh coriander | 1 tablespoon ground red chili pepper flakes | 1 teaspoon turmeric | 1 teaspoon sugar | 3 cups chicken stock | 2 medium red potatoes, cut into 1-inch chunks and cut crosswise into 3-inch chunks | 4 cups cauliflower florets | 16 cooking apples ( cut into 1-inch chunks ) | 3 tablespoons olive oil | 4 1/2 tablespoons peanut oil | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 2/3 cup cooked chicken ( cut into 1/4-inch chunks )
Recipe Instructions: toast coriander and chilli in a large, heavy saucepan over medium heat 8 minutes or until fragrant.  stir in red chili flakes, turmeric, sugar, salt and pepper ; cook and stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds.  pour chicken stock over the mixture ; bring to a boil.  reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes.  melt 1 tablespoon of peanut oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.  cook apple chunks in the hot oil until golden, about 4 minutes, stirring occasionally.  add cauliflower florets to the hot chicken stock ; stir to coat the cauliflower florets.  cover and cook for 8 minutes, stirring often, to loosen crispiness.  spoon 1 tablespoon of olive oil into a deep skillet over mediumlow heat.  add vegetable oil and heat until hot but not smoking ; cook, stirring constantly, until vegetables are tender, 5 to 7 minutes.  transfer vegetables to a platter, cover and keep warm.  toast remaining peanut oil, oil, and hot pepper relish in oven until hot but not smoking, 4 to 8 minutes.  serve in individual bowl over cooked rice, then top with apple relish.

Random Ingredients: chicken bouillon granule,red lentil,amaretto,anaheim chilies,white wine vinegar,pork shoulder
Ingredient Phrases: 2 pounds pork shoulder | 1/3 cup white wine vinegar | 1/4 cup beef bouillon granules | 1 teaspoon amaretto | 1 can sliced red lentils, undrained | 24 ounces sliced fresh anaheim chilies
Recipe Instructions: slice pork in half lengthwise ; secure with toothpicks.  fill a large baking dish with enough water to cover pork.  add pork, cover, and marinate in refrigerator for 2 to 4 hours ; overnight in a small saucepan, stir together vinegar, bouillon, and amaretto in a saucepan.  stir in beans and bring to a boil.  reduce heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Mexican Jerk Pork in A Blanket

Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon garlic, minced | 1/2 cup vinegar | 1/2 cup nepal curry paste | 1 kg boneless lamb shoulder ( cut into chunks, 1 1/2 cm thick ) | 1 cup canned unsweetened coconut milk | 4 tomatoes, quartered | 1 medium onion ( cut in small slivers ) | 2 teaspoons salt and freshly ground black pepper | 20 g napa cabbage, finely diced | 1 slice hamburger ( sliced into 1cm slices )
Recipe Instructions: place garlic, vinegar, curry paste, lamb and coconut milk in a saucepan.  bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer, covered for 15 minutes.  remove from heat, and let stand and cool slightly to room temperature.  meanwhile, place tomatoes, onion, salt, pepper, onion and cabbage in a blender, and blend for 5 seconds.  pour sauce over meat, and stir until smooth.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups fresh mango chutney | 8 slices bread ( cut into 1 '' thick slices ) | 2 cans vodka or 2 cans other low-sodium sweetened condensed milk | 2/3 cup cointreau liqueur | 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1 dash tabasco sauce | 3 slices whole grain tortillas ( about 6 '' )
Recipe Instructions: in a large saucepan set over medium high heat, add chutney and toast until mixture has a dark brown flavor ; do not overcook.  transfer to a paper bag and refrigerate until required.  add vodka and allow to steep, stirring constantly, for 15 minutes.  pour into glass.  top each slice with a slice of bread cut into 1 '' thick slices.  grill tortilla slices on both sides until both sides are crisp.  top each with a slice of mango chutney and a slice of tortilla.  if desired, garnish each serving with an orange wedge, if desired.
Recipe Titile: Mexican Coffee Tart With Mango Chutney

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup sugar ( not corn syrup ) | 2 teaspoons grated fresh cumin | 2 bay leaves | 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1 large white or green onion, diced | 6 cups green lentils or 6 cups dried mixed vegetables | 2 teaspoons chopped fresh herbs, plus additional as needed
Recipe Instructions: in a sauce pan, over medium heat, stir together sugar and cumin.  cook, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes until the sugar dissolves.  remove from heat.  using a potato masher, mix the cinnamon, bay leaves, and cloves with 2 tablespoons of the sugar until the spices are well combined.  add onion, green lentils, and herbs.  mix, stirring, over medium heat, until lentils are soft, about 10 minutes.  stir in more sugar if necessary.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large egg ( noodles ) | 6 cups fat free sour cream ( or reduced fat light cream ) | 3/4 lb lobster meat, chopped | 1 whole chili pepper, seeded and minced and broken in pieces, drained ( or to taste ) | 4 cups cooked noodles, uncooked | 1/3 cup salsa | 1/2 teaspoon chili pepper flakes or 1/2 teaspoon salt
Recipe Instructions: line a 3quart saucepan with nonstick cooking spray.  in a skillet, melt 3 t.  of the oil, brown lobster meat over mediumhigh heat.  remove meat, reserve remaining oil and add remaining 2 t.  of oil.  cook until browned.  set saucepan off burner.  add sour cream to skillet ; simmer until reduced to 3 cups.  add noodles.  continue to simmer 5 minutes on medium low heat.  when noodles are cool enough to handle, transfer all noodles to a 9x13 pan.  stir in chiliz ; heat over low heat, stirring occasionally, until sauce comes to a boil.  in a mixing bowl, stir together salsa, chili flakes and the cooked noodles.  stir in chicken pieces, seafood sauce and chopped chiles, mix well.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups farfalle noodles | 1 can beer | 1 bottle jasmine rice | 1 cup cabbage, shredded
Recipe Instructions: bring the noodles to a boil in a saucepan over medium heat.  reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.  drain and mix in the strained beer, and the cooked noodles ; discard the solids.  bring a small pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  in a large bowl, combine the uncooked rice, beer, and jasmine rice.  pour into the prepared casserole.  cover and marinate at least 1 hour or overnight.  when ready to serve, remove the noodles from the bowl and discard the solids.  top the rice and jasmine rice mixture with shredded cabbage and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup heavy cream | 3 tablespoons minced green olive | 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley | 1/4 cup heavy cream | 1 package fresh orange flavored pears, diced ( orange rind is fine ) | 1/4 cup lard, chopped into 1/3-inch cubes | 3 tablespoons vegetable oil
Recipe Instructions: stir cream, green olives, parsley, heavy cream, orange flavored pears, lard, and oil together in a saucepan over medium heat, stirring frequently.  cook and stir until pears are soft and mixture begins to soften, about 3 minutes.  drain fruit and discard pulp ; discard pulp.  transfer sauce to a blender, blend until smooth.  pour reserved sauce over fruit mixture and stir to coat well.  cover and chill at least 1 hour before serving.  let sauce marinate at room temperature for two hours before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 15 ounces zucchini, sliced | 2 tablespoons olive oil | 3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint | 1 teaspoon grated lemon zest | 1 garlic clove, minced | 1/4 cup yellow onion, minced | 4 large sweet fresh tomatoes packed in oil ( preferably san marzano ) | 2 teaspoons kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper | 4 quarts green beans, rinsed & drained | 1 medium yellow squash, halved and seeded | 7 1/2 ounces spinach, rinsed & stoned | 1 1/2 teaspoons fennel seeds | 1 1/2 cups greek feta paste ( preferably knorr ) | 1 large egg, beaten | 1 egg yolk | 1 1/2 - 2 cups kibber lettuce | 1 cup shredded cheese
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, toss zucchini with the olive oil.  add mint, lemon zest, garlic, onion, tomatoes, salt, pepper and green beans.  let cool.  in a small heavybottomed saucepan, melt the feta paste, bring to a low simmer and add the chopped veggies.  simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes.  remove zucchini from heat and add spinach.  bring a small saucepot to a boil then return skillet to mediumhigh heat and add a little of the feta mixture for a few seconds stir.  cook for a few minutes.  add zucchini mixture to the spinach and heat through.  when the spinach has cooled, add more feta mixture, the egg yolk, and the remaining feta sauce, stirring until thoroughly beaten.  return skillet to a low heat and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package yeast | 1 cup warm water | 2 cups sugar | 3 cups chopped pumpkin | 1 tablespoon baking powder | 2 cups chopped green cardamom pods | 1 1/2 cups shredded cooked or cut pumpkin ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: add yeast to warm water.  sieve together sugar, 1 cup chopped pumpkin, baking powder, green cardamom pods, and 1 cup shredded cooked or chopped pumpkin if using.  mix in yeast mixture with the warm water.  stir in remaining chopped pumpkin if using.  bake in a 350 degree degree f oven for 20 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 pears, peeled, cored and quartered | 1 1/4 cups long-grain white rice, cooked | 3 tablespoons coarse grain white rice | 3/4 teaspoon black peppercorns | 2 peaches, cut into pieces | 1 tablespoon coarse ground cardamom ( or to taste )
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot over medium heat, add the rice, peppercorns, 14 cup water and 23 tablespoons boiling water.  stir to break up rice, and cook until the grains are thoroughly cooked about 1 minute.  remove rice, peel, pit and cut peaches into pieces.  transfer to a large, shallow dish.  add peaches to the rice mixture.  pour in 12 cup water.  cover, and cook until the grains are tender about 20 minutes.  meanwhile, in a large skillet bring the oil sauce to a boil.  add the rice and peaches, and let thicken about 4 minutes.  remove the cover, and let stand 5 minutes.  drain on paper towels.  heat the remaining cooking water into the pan and add the cardamom, cook just until fragrant, then carefully remove from heat.  serve warm with rice mixture.

Random Ingredients: tamarind paste,garlic,confectioner sugar,picante sauce,puff pastry,purpose flour,banana,red kidney bean
Ingredient Phrases: 6 cups dried red kidney beans ( about 8 ounces ) | 1 container picante sauce | 1 cup all-purpose flour | 1/3 cup sugar | 6 tablespoons unsalted unsweetened cocoa | 1 tablespoon minced garlic | 8 ounces ripe bananas, peeled and sliced | 3 tablespoons chopped toasted coconut or 3 tablespoons toasted corn chips
Recipe Instructions: bring beans to a boil in a saucepan of cold water and simmer until tender, 10 to 15 minutes.  while beans simmer, combine 2 1cup water, tomatostyle spices, sugar and cocoa in small saucepan.  bring to a boil and reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, until mixture dissolves, 5 to 8 minutes.  combine beans and picante sauce and stir to combine.  heat 4 tablespoons oil in heavy large saucepan over high heat.  when hot, add drained beans with skin and saute, covered, 2 minutes, or until beans are tender.  stir in vanilla bean mixture and banana mixture.  add coconut chips and cook, 2 to 3 minutes.  transfer salsa to clean side of 9x13 inch pie dish.  cover with foil and refrigerate at least 2 hours.  bake at 325 degrees f 175 degrees c for 15 minutes.

Random Ingredients: chicken bouillon,corn,bay leaf,sesame oil,mushroom,beef chuck,gluten soy sauce,caster sugar
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 lbs chicken and cubed meat | 1 cup celery, diced | 1 tablespoon vegetable oil | 2 cups mushrooms, sliced | 1/2 cup frozen corn | 1 tablespoon baking potatoes, mashed | 1 tablespoon plain gluten-free soy sauce | 1 bay leaf | sesame oil
Recipe Instructions: combine celery, vegetable oil, and the meat cubes into a slow cooker.  cook on low for 8 hours.  add the chicken cubes to the slow cooker.  simmer an additional 4 hours and stir once or twice.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb flour | 1 teaspoon baking powder | saffron thread | 4 cups icing sugar | 4 slices almonds | 2 tablespoons cream
Recipe Instructions: sift flour, cocoa, and baking powder into a large bowl.  add 12 tsp almond powder then stir into melted flour mixture.  slowly add flour to dry ingredients in a steady stream, blending with a metal spoon until dough is smooth and elastic.  shape dough into ball and divide into 1 inch pieces.  roll each piece out very thin, starting at a long edge, then cut a circle in the center of each piece.  cut each circle in half and roll in confectioners sugar to fit a 9x13 pan.  place 1 layer of each into the pan and flatten each sandwich.  sprinkle with remaining almond powder and sprinkle with cream.  refrigerate leftovers for up to 3 days.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 salmon fillets | 300 ml white vinegar | 1/2 lemon, zest of | 2 sprigs thyme sprig, finely chopped | 75 g caster sugar
Recipe Instructions: put all the ingredients in a bowl, mix thoroughly, chill for 2 hrs.  preheat the oven to 180c and then roast for about 1 hour or until theyre done and cooked through.  you can check these measurements with a skewer as to whether or not theyre cooked through in the first 15 minutes.  you can check that the salmon is cooked through now with the skewer, as well as the thyme sprigs and parsley, if required.

Random Ingredients: linguica sausage,cumin powder,ancho chilies,seasoning italian salad dressing mix,sourdough bread,applesauce
Ingredient Phrases: 3 packages sourdough bread, cubed | 1/4 cup low-fat english salad dressing mix | 1 tablespoon ground cumin powder | 1 tablespoon mild paprika | 1/4 teaspoon dried ancho chile | 6 ancho chilies | 1 lb linguica sausage, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
Recipe Instructions: mix sourdough and dressing well in a medium bowl ; let sit in refrigerator for 30 minutes to set flavors.  cut sandwiches crosswise in halves, and arrange on a serving dish.  sprinkle each sandwich with 1 t.  cumin powder, paprika and ancho chiles.  top each with another half of the chiles ; place in a large ovenproof skillet coated with cooking spray ; heat to 400 degrees f.  bake 5 minutes or until bubbly.  cover and let stand on a wire rack for 5 minutes or until ready to serve.  cut up the slices and serve with a dollop of the sauce to serve.

Random Ingredients: flour tortilla,coriander powder,cinnamon swirl bread,cilantro stem,allspice,pepper,okra
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup chopped sweet onion | 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed | 2 tablespoons chopped red onion | 1/3 cup butter, softened | 4 flour tortillas | 4 tablespoons vegetable oil or 4 tablespoons margarine | 5 cups low-fat sour cream | 1 can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained | 1 teaspoon ground allspice | 1/2 teaspoon turmeric | 2 teaspoons sugar | 2 teaspoons ground coriander powder | 1 -2 teaspoon cinnamon swirl bread, grated | 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves | 1/4 teaspoon ground red pepper
Recipe Instructions: mix the first six ingredients in a bowl and set aside.  preheat oven to 350 degrees.  grease a 9x13 pan.  spread the chopped sweet onion on the bottom and sides of the prepared pan.  top with the chickpeas and red onion.  roll the tortillas tightly then gently press the ends together to seal.  bake the tortillas for 30 minutes.  turn the peppers over and bake for 15 minutes, or until the skin is golden and the tortillas are tender.  serve the peppers with the onions in the center, drizzled with some cream cheese and cilantro sprout if desired.  sprinkle with extra sour cream and serve with cilantro sprigs if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups canola oil, divided | 3 cups white onions, finely chopped | 1 stalk celery, finely chopped | 1 red capsicum, sliced | 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced | 3/4 cup carrot, diced | 2 cups fresh pineapple juice | 1 1/2 teaspoons honey | 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper ( or to taste ) | 2 cups cooked pinto beans, drained or 2 cups canned frozen peas | 2 cups chickpeas, rinsed and drained
Recipe Instructions: in a medium saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.  stir in onions and celery and saute until onion is soft and translucent, about 1 minute.  add cayenne pepper and stir with a wooden spoon.  saut, stirring occasionally, until onion is softened.  add chopped vegetables, pineapple juice, honey, and cayenne pepper to onionspan and bring to a boil.  lower heat, cover the pan, and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 8 minutes.  stir in beans and cook until heated through, 5 to 7 minutes more.  serve over rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 lbs pork livers | 4 garlic cloves | 1 1/2 ounces canned poblano chiles | 6 white onions, diced | 3 oranges, juice of
Recipe Instructions: place livers in a large pot on low heat and cover to keep them warm.  cook over a medium heat turning the livers every half hour or so until tender, but not mushy, but not burnt.  place a small amount of chopped onion in each liversidedown pot and add garlic.  cook for 5 minutes, stirring until fragrant.  pour in chilies and remaining garlic, including the juice, and bring to a boil.  cover and cook over low heat for 45 to 60 minutes, turning the pot occasionally.  remove from heat, and serve at once.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup butter | 2 tablespoons sugar | 2 cloves garlic, minced | 2 tablespoons chopped swiss cheese | sugar, to taste | 1/2 teaspoon allspice, to taste
Recipe Instructions: melt butter in a medium saucepan over moderate heat.  add brown sugar, garlic, and swiss cheese.  simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently.  add the nutmeg, mix well, and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened slightly.  remove from the heat and spread with another layer of butter on a parchment lined baking sheet.  allow butter to cool and dust with powdered sugar.  to serve, fold 1 slice of shaved swiss cheese into each dip.  garnish dip if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/4 lbs ground beef | 3 tablespoons dijon mustard | 1/4 lb broccoli florets | 1/2 cup coarse grain mustard | 2 tablespoons quick-cooking instant dry-roasted arugula leaves, soaked in broth for up to 24 hours, drained and dried | 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: trim fat from beef.  combine beef, dijon, cheddar, and broccoli ; toss well.  season generously with salt and pepper.  form into 4 1/4 cups ; reserve.  bring broth to a simmer, set aside.  cut broccoli florets into 34inch long strips.  place strips in a bowl, cover, and refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour.  drain, discarding any excess broth and discard.  place beef in a 9x13inch baking dish.  spread evenly over vegetables ; sprinkle with mustard and arugula.  cover dish and refrigerate at least 1 hour, turning beef occasionally.  heat a skillet over mediumhigh heat and add remaining ingredients ; stir well to coat pan ; cook and stir 2 to 3 minutes, until all vegetables are tender.  remove beef from heat.  pour brine sauce over the mixture, stirring constantly to prevent sticking.  refrigerate until hot and bubbling, about 10 to 15 minutes.  remove beef from brine, drain.  remove any fat with a slotted spoon and transfer to a serving platter.  garnish with fresh chopped or sliced green onions.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 tablespoons rice wine or 1 1/2 tablespoons cornstarch | 6 slices thick slice italian-style parsley | 2 cups shredded lettuce | 2 cups frozen broccoli, thawed and squeezed dry | 1/2 cup chopped green onions | 30 slices cooked beef ( about 4 slices each ) or 30 slices chicken ( about 4 slices each ) | 1/2 cup confectioners'sugar or 1/2 cup maple syrup
Recipe Instructions: mix together the rice wine, parsley, lettuce and broccoli in a bowl.  divide the mixture among 6 shallow 2quart baking dishes.  layer the meat on top of the vegetables, dividing it evenly.  spoon over the cheese.  sprinkle with the onion and sugar and mix lightly.  pour the syrup over the cheese.  cover with plastic bags and refrigerate overnight.  to assemble, top each of 4 plates with the cheese mixture over the top, and sprinkle with the lettuce and chopped green onions.

Random Ingredients: yellow squash,herb,carrot,orange zest,german chocolate cake mix,nonfat milk,red curry paste
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups chopped yellow squash ( or 1 red squash or 1 carrot, cut into chunks depending on size ) | 1 can evaporated fat-free sour cream | 1 cup grated carrot | 1/3 cup nonfat dry-milk granulated sugar, divided | 2/3 cup canola oil | 2 tablespoons baking powder | 1 cup fresh crabmeat, chopped | 2 carrots, thinly sliced | 6 cups german chocolate cake mix
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  grease an 8cup jelly roll pan.  combine squash in a mixing bowl.  stir in sour cream, carrots, sugar, and 2 tablespoons of the reserved liquid ; cover and refrigerate 3 hours to blend flavors.  heat 1 - 12 tablespoons oil in a saucepan over mediumhigh heat.  combine cake mix and 14 cup of the squash mixture in the pan ; cook and stir 5 minutes more.  pour over squash mixture ; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.  combine remaining half cup of mashed potatoes and reserved vegetable mixture in the pan ; heat through, stirring occasionally, until mixture begins to bubble and begins to boil.  pour hot cake mix mixture over hot squash mixture ; cool completely.  pour remaining cake mix mixture over baked squash mixture ; bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into a deep center comes out clean.

Random Ingredients: creole seasoning,tarragon,coffee powder,apple juice,red capsicum,clam juice
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup red capsicum | 1 cup apple juice | 2 tablespoons lemon juice | 1 tablespoon treacle | 1 teaspoon creole seasoning | 1 teaspoon sugar | 1 teaspoon finely crushed clove | 1/4 teaspoon dried tarragon
Recipe Instructions: mash together the red capsicum and apple juice in a pot.  add the lemon juice, the treacle, the creole seasoning, and sugar and cook until thickened.  add the remaining ingredients, simmer for 1520 minutes stirring occasionally.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups long-grain rice ( such as a pita, cubed and boiled ) | 2 teaspoons kosher salt | 3 cups pineapple, peeled and chopped | 1/2 pint red potato, peeled and chopped | 2 teaspoons yeast or 2 teaspoons gluten-free sour cream
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees or 175 degrees f.  combine all ingredients in large pot.  cover and cook over low heat until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed, 45 minutes.  let cool, 15 minutes.  serve, with toppings such as apple slices, sour cream, shredded cabbage or mashed potatoes.
Recipe Titile: Pineapple and Potato Rice (Rice and Apple Rice)

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups refrigerated refrigerated egg rolls or 2 cups frozen sour cream | 1/2 cup chopped lettuce | 7 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature | 2 tablespoons salsa, medium heat | 1/2 jalapeno, minced | 1 package of shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese, divided ( about 4 slices )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.  in a medium bowl, mix egg rolls and lettuce ; mix well.  sprinkle on cream cheese, salsa, and jalapeos.  set aside.  in a small bowl, beat cheddar cheese with 1 tablespoon of salsa, and sprinkle over the cheddar cheese mixture.  pour mixture evenly over the cooled egg rolls, and press firmly to spread evenly.  bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 40 minutes, or until heated through and cheese is melted.  let sit 5 minutes before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 teaspoons vegetable oil | 1 lb ground cabbage or 1 lb ground turkey | 5 potatoes, peeled | 1 -4 stalk celery rib, white and green parts only, finely chopped | 1 can diced tomatoes | 1 1/2 - 2 cups brown bread crumbs | 5 tablespoons vinegar | 1 cup tomato, finely chopped ( white may be substituted, if you must ) | 1 teaspoon garlic paste | 1/2 teaspoon oregano | 1/8 teaspoon celery rib or 1/8 teaspoon parsley, chopped | 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
Recipe Instructions: heat the oil in a heavybased pan.  add the cabbage, potatoes, celery and carrot.  cook until tender, about 10 minutes.  meanwhile, cook the bread to get a firm brown, but not crisp on all sides, turning once or twice.  cut the bread into small pieces and stir in the diced tomatoes, bread crumbs, vinegar, tomato puree and garlic paste, and oregano.  tastes slightly better if served alone and mixed well.  stir in the celery, carrot, and cilantro and cook until bubbly and crisp, a few minutes more.  season with salt and pepper.  serve on a plate topped with crusty bread and sprinkled with fresh parsley.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup margarine | 10 curry paste | 2 tablespoons curry powder
Recipe Instructions: mix first 5 ingredients in a small bowl.  add curry powders and mix well.  refrigerate for several hours or overnight.  serve with steamed basmati rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 pounds canned chili beans | 6 cups tomato juice
Recipe Instructions: place the cooked and drained chiles in a soup pot with the water and bring to a boil.  stir in the canned diced tomatoes and cook until smooth.  strain the chili and cool.  store for up to 4 days in the freezer but do not freeze.  preheat the oven to 400 degrees f 200 degrees c.  fill a 9x13 inch baking dish coated with cooking spray with cooking spray, cover the baking dish with foil to prevent it from touching the ground.  place chilis on the foil and bake at 400 degrees f 200 degrees c for about 30 minutes, until tender and fragrant.  cool the chilis and serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 liter lobster tail, cleaned and trimmed | 1 liter chicken stock | 1 tablespoon sesame oil
Recipe Instructions: rinse lobster tails and pat dry.  mix lobster, lobster stock and sesame oil in a medium saucepan.  bring to a boil and boil for about 1 minute.  strain, discarding lobster bones and bones.  return to the boil.  add lobster bones and stock, cover and simmer for 45 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can whole dried strawberries, drained ( rinsed & rinsed ) or ( 6 ounce ) can cherry tomatoes ( rinsed & rinsed ) | 1/4 cup sun-dried tomato oil | 1 tablespoon strawberry salsa
Recipe Instructions: drain the strawberries if not rinsed thoroughly and set aside.  add all other ingredients to blender or food processor, scraping up any drippings.  process until smooth.  pour into sauce ; top with shredded raspberries.  serve.

Random Ingredients: clove,pastry crust pie,white pepper,steak,tomato green chilies,mirin,anise seed
Ingredient Phrases: 1 pie crust pastry recipe pie | 3/4 cup mirin, divided | 1 1/2 tablespoons honey mustard | 6 whole cloves, minced | 1 teaspoon anise seed, crushed | 1/2 teaspoon white pepper | 1 lb flank steak, cut into 1-inch cubes | 1 can sliced tomatoes, drained and cut into 1-inch cubes
Recipe Instructions: melt the sauce ingredients in the pie crust and add the steaks and stir until the beef is wellcoated.  spread the steak mixture evenly over the base, then sprinkle with half the chopped tomatoes, salt, pepper, and anise seed.  layer the remaining 12 cup chopped tomatoes and half of the sauce over top, then dot generously with the remaining sauce.  bake at 400 degrees f for 25 minutes.  let stand 10 minutes before slicing.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons oil | 1 quart cold unsweetened limes | 2 tablespoons tequila | 1 tablespoon salt | 1 quart shredded swiss cheese | 4 cups crushed croutons
Recipe Instructions: in blender or food processor combine first six ingredients.  blend until smooth.  pour into shallow pan.  let stand in refrigerator at least 1 hour.  top with shredded swiss cheese ; top with cilantro and lime juice if desired.

Random Ingredients: pork tenderloin,red potato,onion powder,green olive,fontina cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs pork tenderloin, trimmed and cut into 1 inch cubes | 3 cups shredded fontina cheese | 1 cup chopped green olives | 3 green onions, thinly sliced thin | 1 teaspoon minced onion powder
Recipe Instructions: place pork in a large casserole, cover loosely with foil and add to casserole.  combine the broth, cheese, olives, onions and onion powder in a large dutch oven over medium heat.  cover and cook until cheese has melted and cheese has melted.  remove from heat and return to pan.  stir in soup and continue cooking until the soup has thickened slightly.  let stand for about 40 minutes to allow soup to cool.  serve immediately with pasta sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large carrot, diced | 1 small red bell pepper, diced | 1/2 small shiitake mushroom, sliced | 1/4 cup water | 1/4 cup vegetable oil | 1/3 cup steamed white rice | 1 package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained | 1/4 cup shallots, thinly sliced | 1 tablespoon soy sauce | 2 tablespoons chili beans or 2 tablespoons hot sauce | 1 small shallot, chopped
Recipe Instructions: in a 4 qt slow cooker or stockpot, cook carrots, bell peppers, shiitake mushrooms, water, oil, rice, broccoli, shallots and soy sauce.  stirring occasionally, cover and cook on medium for 1215 minutes or until all the water has been absorbed.  when rice is done, remove from heat and cool to room temperature.  stir together the broccoli, shallots and soy sauce.  mix remaining sauce ingredients in a separate bowl.  cover and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes.

Random Ingredients: rosemary leaf,yellow squash,pumpkin puree,onion salt,lamb chop
Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs lamb chops, trimmed of fat and cut into 1/4-inch pieces | 2 red carrots, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch pieces | 2 yellow squash, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch pieces | 1 1/2 tablespoons pumpkin puree | 1/4 cup rosemary leaf, packed | 1 teaspoon onion salt, divided | 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: rinse lamb chops in cold water 2 to 4 hours, thoroughly flushing excess water with a fork.  remove and reserve chops.  combine carrots, squash, pumpkin puree, rosemary and 14 teaspoon salt in a large soup kettle.  add chops to soup and bring to a boil.  cover soup mixture.  reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are tender and potatoes are tender, about 1 - 12 hours.  stir rosemary into sauce.  cook until soup is thickened and sauce is thickened, 4 to 6 hours.  ladle into individual soup bowls and serve.  makes 4 servings.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup marinade | 1/2 cup beer | 2 tablespoons honey | 1 tablespoon garlic powder | 1 teaspoon hungarian paprika | 1 teaspoon dry mustard | 4 lbs ground beef chuck roast | 4 bunches red potatoes or 4 cups russet potatoes or 4 green potatoes | 1 cup fontina cheese ( about 16-inch thick ) | 2 cups prepared german-style mustard sauce | 4 tablespoons teriyaki sauce, hot
Recipe Instructions: combine the marinade or beer, honey and garlic powder in a large stainless steel or ceramic bowl.  heat 1 tablespoon of the hot oil in the pan.  saute beef for 1 minute or until browned, stirring occasionally.  remove to absorb excess liquid.  add the paprika, mustard, mustard sauce and salt, stirring until sauce begins to sizzle.  reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 45 minutes or until meat has been completely cooked.  remove to a plate.  transfer beef to a carving board or plate and place it in a single layer on a baking sheet.  bake for 20 minutes, or until an instantread thermometer inserted in the centre registers 130f, but not quite 140f.  turn over roast in pan and let rest for 5 minutes ; set aside to cool slightly and cut into 2inch cubes.  to prepare the sauce combine the teriyaki sauce in a bowl with the sauce and set aside.  slice the roast into 14 inch thick strips.  transfer the meat and sauce to a large bowl.  add cheese, 1 tablespoon of the mustard, 14 teaspoon of the hot paprika and remaining paprika to the bowl.  spoon half of the mixture in the center of each strip.  place 1 bun of beef on each bun and top with reserved steak.  top with remaining remaining half of the mustard and remaining cheese.  serve with sauce on the side.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb turkey meat, cut into strips | 1 ziti pasta, cooked | 2 teaspoons vanilla powder | salt, to taste | 1/2 cup chopped almonds

Ingredient Phrases:
2 chicken breasts, shredded ( about 2 t.
    - each ) | 2 cans stewed chicken broth | 1 can light cream | 2 cups sour cream | 1/2 cup chopped thyme sprig | 4 cups shredded monterey jack cheese

Recipe Instructions: in a bowl, combine the potatoes and chicken breast halves.  toss with the lime juice and seasoning.  cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or freeze.  to serve  spoon the tart shell into four large tart shell, fill each shell with about 1 tablespoon of filling.  brush two spoonfuls of filling.  flatten the top with tongs or tines, roll up and serve cold.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup bulgur, rinsed well ( or other firm but firm ground dried, such as walnuts ) | 1/2 cup asian-style hot sauce | 2 tablespoons peanut oil | 1 teaspoon hot sauce, such as tabasco | 1 bottle navy beans, drained | 1 cup asiago cheese, grated
Recipe Instructions: in a large saucepan, bring together bulgur, asianstyle hot sauce, peanut oil and hot sauce.  bring to a boil over mediumhigh heat, and reduce heat to mediumlow.  cover, and continue to cook until thickly browned.  remove from heat and stir in the beans, toasted bulgur, and cheese.  serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: vegetable oil,red bell pepper,portabella mushroom,marsala wine,haddock fillet,msg,pimiento

Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 500 degrees f.  peel the portabella mushroom and cut the stems off and discard them, set aside.  soak portobello mushrooms in the vermouth of 3 cups water for about 30 minutes, then remove from the water and let cool to about room temperature.  in an ovenproof large deep skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over mediumhigh heat, or to a hot oil about 5 inches in diameter.  add mushroom heads and cook until tender, about 10 minutes.  add more oil if necessary, until the pan starts to brown.  add wine and remaining 3 cups water.  stir until the wine, liquid and spices are dissolved.  reduce the heat to medium.  cover and cook until liquid evaporates a little, adding more water if necessary, about 30 minutes.  add peppers and cook until peppers are cooked through and tender, stirring every 8 minutes, about 15 minutes.  transfer the peppers to a bowl.  strain and discard any drippings.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups cooked chinese fish sauce, thai | 3 tablespoons lime juice | 1/2 shallot, minced | 1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger | 1 small shallot, minced | 2 teaspoons finely seeded coriander | 1/2 cup fresh white corn kernels | 1 teaspoon dried rosemary leaves, crushed | 1 cup fresh water
Recipe Instructions: pour lime juice, shallot, ginger, shallot, coriander, and water and bring to a boil in a saucepan with 2 teaspoons salt.  cook uncovered, stirring until the shallot is well wilted, about 10 minutes.  stir corn kernels and rosemary into the mixture and simmer uncovered until tender, 10 minutes.

Random Ingredients: millet flour,process american cheese,mustard powder,chili oil,splenda sugar substitute,cardamom,pistachio
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup splenda sugar substitute | 2/3 cup whole milklet flour | 1 teaspoon ground cardamom | 1/4 cup whole wheat processed american cheese, grated | 2 cups crushed pistachios | 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder | 1 dash chili oil
Recipe Instructions: set up a saucepan with boiling water.  mix together sugar and milklet flour.  gradually add milk mixture to milk mixture while whisking for a few more minutes until mixed.  keep beating constantly until the mixture is smooth and creamy.  add the whole wheat cheese, crushed pistachios, and mustard powder, stir for a few seconds until the dough forms a ball.  turn dough on its floured and knead gently.  cover and refrigerate for 1 hour to let it rest in a cool place before using.  heat oil in a 12inch dutch oven or a 12quart saucepan until it starts to smoke.  put the dough onto a floured work surface and knead again until you have a smooth crust, about 5 minutes.  brush it with the oil and sprinkle with the remaining breadcrumbs.  press down gently with the floured work surface to smooth it out.  set aside.  preheat oven to 375 degrees.  cover and keep warm until the pudding is ready.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs chuck roast | 2 cups liquid honey | 2 tablespoons liquid honey ( honey must remain in the original recipe ) | 1 can sweet, diced, peeled zucchini, drained | 2 tablespoons granulated sugar | salt
Recipe Instructions: place roast in a 6 quart heavy saucepan over low heat.  cover and cook over high heat stirring often, until meat thermometer reads 160 degrees f, about 10 minutes.  remove cover and transfer meat to a medium size bowl.  stir in remaining ingredients ; season with salt.  serve in 6 qt slow cooker or dutch oven.  baste with reserved liquid honey or vegetable honey.  refrigerate over night or until ready to cook.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 medium dried anchovy | 2 large sun-dried tomatoes | fresh orange or white wine or sparkling wine
Recipe Instructions: place the dried anchovy and the sun dried tomatoes in an attractive container.  cover the container tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least an hour before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans pumpkin puree | 1 can chunky salsa, undiluted | 1/3 cup heavy cream | 6 ounces banana | 1/4 ounce five-spice powder
Recipe Instructions: in a blender, combine the pumpkin puree, chunky salsa, and cream.  blend until smooth.  remove from blender ; stir in banana.  add the puree mixture to the pumpkin mixture ; mix well.  cover and chill until ready to serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons cornstarch | 1/2 cup sugar | 2 tablespoons olive oil | 2 tablespoons extra-sharp cheddar cheese | 200 g apricot jam ( small and small, crushed to a fine powder )
Recipe Instructions: in a large nonstick pan, heat the oil over medium heat.  add the flour and cook for 4 minutes or until smooth and thickened.  add the cornstarch and cook for about 3 minutes, stirring constantly, until thick and glossy.  remove from the heat and reserve, stirring constantly.  add the sugar, the remaining oil, and 2 tablespoons of the cheeses, toss well to coat.  add a pinch of salt to taste.  reduce the heat to a low simmer and cook for 15 minutes, stirring frequently, until it is hot and thickened.  season with pepper and serve right away or chill at room temperature.

Random Ingredients: dill,prosciutto,pork loin,saffron thread,arborio rice,alfredo sauce,pine nut

Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 425 degrees f 220 degrees c.  cut pork into cubes.  in large bowl blend saffron, pine nuts, 2 tablespoons of pork fat, a little of the alfredo sauce, and 1 cup cold water.  pour over pork pieces and stir to coat all sides and sides.  let stand 5 minutes.  drain pork.  cut diagonally into 3inch cubes.  pour a large pot of cold water over top of broth.  bring 3 to 4 inches deep.  place rice cubes in pan.  stir 3 to 4 tablespoons alfredo sauce, 1 to 2 tablespoons alfredo sauce, and 2 tablespoons cold water to bring to a boil.  when rice is cooked enough to coat all sides and sides, transfer to large nonstick skillet.  heat 2 tablespoons oil in pot.  add 1 pound of pork and cook until pork is firm and cooked through, about 8 minutes.  remove from skillet and turn to other side.  spoon 1 tablespoon alfredo sauce evenly over pork.  serve over the rice.

Recipe Instructions: cook the eggs in a large pot of salted water just until fully set.  remove the eggs and set aside.  in a large bowl, combine the eggs, tomatoes, bell peppers, ginger, sweet peppers, onion, paprika, curry powder, chili powder, cinnamon, and black pepper.  season with cayenne and salt to taste.  in a small bowl, combine the garlic, parsley, potatoes, onions, garlic, and half of the avocado ; toss to combine.  in the remaining bowl, combine 2 cups of the salad dressing, the 12 cup the cheese, and the beaten eggs.  mix and add the chicken into the eggs and toss to coat thoroughly.  cover the skillet with a lid and cook over medium to deep heat, adding water as needed to keep the mixture dry.  cook until the sauce is thick and bubbling, about 20 minutes.  remove the skillet from the heat and set aside.  stir the remaining avocado and half of the salad dressing into the eggs.  serve the chicken over the egg and vegetables.  if the dish is too dry, place the chicken, onion mixture, remaining salad dressing, and mozzarella cheese and mix well.  to make the chicken salad dressing, combine salad dressing, remaining 3 cups of salad dressing, and remaining 34 cup of salad dressing ; mix well.  in a large skillet over medium heat, combine the remaining 1 cup of salad dressing and half of the mozzarella cheese.  season with salt to taste.  when the chicken and veggies are cooked and golden, reduce heat to mediumlow and add the reserved chicken and onions.

Recipe Instructions: cook pasta according to package directions, drain.  meanwhile, dice bread crumbs into small dice or in large bowl with water.  heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pot until hot enough to toast.  place bread crumbs in crumbs and toast until goldenbrown.  spread bread crumbs out on baking sheet.  place rice in small pan and place on warm oil.  let brown until crisp on one side, about 10 minutes set aside.  to the bowl with rice, add anchovies and pork and stir until blended.  remove from heat, stir in noodles and riesotto.  serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: hot sauce,tomato green chilies,bay leaf,dark brown sugar,bacon bit,madeira wine,ricotta cheese

Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, combine bacon bits, condensed milk, tomato, chiles and bacon bits.  add bay leaves, cheese and madeira, mix well and chill 10 minutes to marinate.  heat oven to 425f and place soup spoon in a 9 pie plate.  cover the pie plate and bake for 20 minutes.  uncover and cook for 45 minutes longer or until top is light brown and center is brown.  sprinkle some croutons on top and bake, uncovered, for a further 20 minutes.

Random Ingredients: head cabbage,mustard,allspice,purpose flour,phyllo pastry,pine nut,vidalia onion

Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  combine flour, pine nuts, honey, allspice, lemon juice, and lemon juice in a large bowl.  place in a 9x13 inch baking dish.  add cabbage, onion, lettuce, vidalia onion, and salt and pepper.  sprinkle the topping evenly over the cabbage.

Recipe Instructions: in a saucepan over medium heat, stir together the sesame seeds, oil, and egg.  when the egg begins to set, stir in the green onion.  mix thoroughly, set aside.  in a large skillet sprayed with pam, bring about 2 cups of water to a boil.  add the tamari and cook for 8 to 10 minutes.  remove from heat and discard the pulp.  pour into a bowl, and cover with plastic wrap and shake vigorously.  cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and refrigerate at least 2 hours.  to serve, ladle or pipe into warm bowls.  you may make a thin film with the tamari and serve with steamed rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups cauliflower florets | 3/4 cup dry white wine | 12 tablespoons chopped shallots | 2 leaves fresh basil
Recipe Instructions: in a shallow bowl, mix cauliflower florets together.  in a medium saucepan, combine wine and shallots.  bring to boil, stirring often.  continue to boil, covered, for about 2 minutes, until reduced, stirring occasionally.  pour into large saucepan, and cook for 8 minutes or until tender.  place shallots on a salad plate, garnish with basil.

Recipe Instructions: place beans in blender or food processor.  puree until smooth.  in large bowl combine roma, tomato, sugarfree, 1 tablespoon cider vinegar and seasonings.  blend until smooth.  add beans and mix well.  refrigerate until ready to serve.  adjust seasonings if desired.

Recipe Instructions: simmer the asparagus for 5 minutes, remove the pan from heat, drain and set aside.  place the vermouth, garlic paste, celery, water chestnut, celery, vinegar and broth into a blender and puree until smooth.  pour into a soup pitcher, bring to a boil and then lower to a simmer.  meanwhile, cook the bean, stirring regularly, in a 5 to 7 quart slow cooker over medium heat until cooked through but still firm to the bite.  stir in the beans and remaining ingredients.  serve garnished with the bean slices.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 1/2 cups sugar | 1/2 cup water | 2 tablespoons apple juice | 2 cinnamon sticks | 6 cloves | 1 1/2 tablespoons baking soda | 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder | 1/2 teaspoon ground anise seed | 1/2 teaspoon baking soda | 2 1/2 cups walnuts, chopped
Recipe Instructions: combine sugar and water in a large saucepan.  bring to a boil over mediumhigh heat.  reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves and liquid is thickened.  cool to lukewarm.  in a large mixing bowl, combine apple juice, cinnamon, cloves, baking soda and baking powder.  stir into sugar mixture for 2 minutes.  add remaining ingredients and blend well.  allow mixture to cool completely.  store in airtight container.

Recipe Instructions: saut potatoes in a skillet until tender ; do not overcook.  drain, reserving drippings.  stir orange juice and water in a large pot over mediumhigh heat.  bring to a boil, then cover, and reduce heat to mediumhigh ; cook and stir until liquid is evaporated, 5 to 10 minutes.  add vanilla essence, lime juice, salt, and pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until hot and bubbly, about 5 minutes.  pour into a blender along with tomatoes, cilantro, orecchiette, parsley, and cucumber, and puree until smooth.  season to taste with salt and pepper and sprinkle with oregano if desired.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  bake in preheated oven for about 30 minutes, until hot and bubbly.
