Recipe Instructions: in food processor or blender, puree chicken and picante sauce until smooth.  season with parsley and red pepper flakes.  add vegetables bouillon cubes, undrained ziti, broth and 1 cup chicken broth.  process till smooth.  cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Chicken and Veggies With French Faux

Random Ingredients: confectioner ' sugar,cucumber,red onion,green chili,thyme,burgundy wine,tart apple
Ingredient Phrases: 10 ounces spaghetti | 1/2 cup red onion, chopped | 4 cloves garlic, minced | 14 ounces burgundy wine | 2 cups sugar | 1 cup tart apples | 3 tablespoons lemon juice | 1 tablespoon thyme | 1/4 teaspoon clove | 1/4 teaspoon sugar | 1/4 cup confectioners'sugar | 1/4 cucumber, peeled and sliced
Recipe Instructions: bring large pot of salted water to a boil.  cook spaghetti in boiling water for 1 minute ; drain.  meanwhile, chop and saute onion, garlic, and burgundy ; set aside.  chop and saute apples in small pan on low heat, stirring occasionally.  add wine, 1 tablespoon of sweet salsa, cinnamon, sugar, and confectioners sugar.  reduce heat and simmer, stirring often, until sauce thickens, about 5 minutes or more.  sprinkle with cucumber slivers before serving.

Random Ingredients: chicken bouillon,english mustard powder,steak,italian salad dressing mix
Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons italian dressing mix | 1/2 teaspoon ground italian dressing mix | 4 lbs whole cooked flank steaks, each cut 1/2 inch thick
Recipe Instructions: combine all ingredients in food processor ; pulse until smooth.  place in large freezer bag or plastic zipper lock bag and refrigerate overnight.  preheat broiler.  remove steak from freezer before it has fully cooked 10 minutes ; slice into 12 inch chunks.  to make the sauce, in a small bowl, combine the sauce ingredients.  pour over steak ; chill.  serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: potato,chili bean,spring onion,pineapple chunk juice,laurel leaf,purpose flour,purple onion
Ingredient Phrases: 4 sweet potatoes, peeled and diced | 9 ounces sweet potato, diced ( or 1 cup cubed cooked sweet potato ) or 9 ounces sweet potato, diced ( or 1 cup cubed cooked sweet potato ) | 5 ounces chile-infused beans, drained and mashed | 5 ounces canned sweet pineapple chunks in juice, drained and pureed | 1 cup all-purpose flour or 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour | 1/4 cup spring leaf, snipped
Recipe Instructions: place sweet potato, sweet potato, chileinfused beans, pineapple chunks, and sweet potato juice in a large pot and cover lightly with water.  bring to a boil and simmer for 8 to 10 minutes, or until flavors blend.  stir in remaining ingredients and bring to a boil again, whisking occasionally.
Recipe Titile: Sweet Potato, Pumpkin, and Sweet Onion Soup

Random Ingredients: pizza crust,stir fry oil,green mango,green pea,sardine,coriander leaf
Ingredient Phrases: 2 1/3 cups spaghetti sauce or 2 1/3 cups red sauce | 1 bag mixed green peas, rinsed | 1 jar fresh spinach, chopped | 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley ( fresh or frozen ) | 4 garlic cloves, minced | 1 can diced green beans, drained | 1/3 cup sardines | 1/3 cup prepared horsdine, crushed
Recipe Instructions: cut spaghetti sauce into small pieces and cook spaghetti in boiling salted water for 45 minutes.  drain and stir in spinach, parsley, garlic, green bean and sardines.  remove from heat and add horsdine.  return spaghetti to skillet and stir just until heated through.  adjust seasonings.  return to skillet and mix in sauce.  cook until heated through.  adjust seasonings.
Recipe Titile: Dirty Tomato Pizza With Green Peas

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup chopped celery rib | 2 medium potatoes, diced | 1/4 cup chopped celery | 5 eggs, beaten | 3 cups water | 1 can condensed chicken broth | 2 cups cubed diced cooked sweet potatoes | salt and pepper ( to taste )
Recipe Instructions: combine all ingredients in a large saucepan.  simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 4 minutes.  sprinkle in the cubed sweet potatoes and stir just until well coated.  cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours or up to 3 days.  heat the oven to 400f.  stir once or twice before baking.  sprinkle the top with freshly sliced dill, if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 limes, juice of | 2 cups cooked white beans | 3 garlic cloves, minced | 1 tablespoon fresh dill pickle ( or 1 fresh dill pickle ) or 1 fresh dill pickle ( or 1 fresh dill pickle ), minced | 1/2 tablespoon saffron thread | 1/2 lb diced cooked, cut-up chicken wing, trimmed, with fat | 1 tablespoon lime juice | 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped
Recipe Instructions: bring the limes, the beans, the garlic  pickle to the boil, then simmer until the beans are tender.  stir with a fork and bring to the boil ; reduce heat to medium low, cover, and simmer until the beans are tender.  stir in the saffron and chicken, then reduce the heat to mediumlow, cover  simmer until the vegetables are cooked through and tender.  remove the chicken from the sauce, reserving the remaining liquid.  mix the lime juice, thyme, and 2 tablespoons reserved liquid into the beans, stir into the sauce, and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can crushed tomatoes | 1 package boneless beef tenderloin | 3/4 cup plain yogurt | 2 cans crushed cranberries | 1/4 cup water | 1/2 cup butter | salt & freshly ground black pepper | 1 egg, lightly beaten | 1/2 cup chopped fresh tarragon | 6 ounces diced cooked cubed tomatoes | 1 tablespoon minced garlic | 4 tablespoons reduced sodium low sodium chicken broth | 1 dash splenda sugar substitute | 4 pieces cinnamon sticks
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 375 degrees f 190 degrees c.  grease and flour a 9x9 inch baking dish.  place crushed tomatoes, beef tenderloin, yogurt, cranberries, water, egg, tarragon, and 12 cup butter in a blender ; pulse until smooth.  blend in tomatoes, garlic, and broth until well blended.  pour sauce over meat.  cover and refrigerate overnight.  uncover and bake until sauce has thickened, and the top is lightly browned, 30 to 45 minutes.  meanwhile, cut egg into bitesized pieces.  serve warm.
Recipe Titile: Crispy Corned Beef Tenderloin With Pineapple Muesli

Random Ingredients: cauliflower floret,ginger garlic paste,pesto sauce,turmeric,fine sea salt,cornstarch
Ingredient Phrases: 2 heads cauliflower florets | 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger garlic paste | 1 can condensed sweet cornstarch | 4 teaspoons pesto sauce
Recipe Instructions: wash florets thoroughly and drain on paper towel.  combine cauliflower florets, turmeric, ginger garlic paste, and cornstarch in a large saucepan over medium heat, stirring to coat.  cook and stir until thickened but not brown, about 25 minutes.  meanwhile, heat cornstarch in a large saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until foamy.  stir in remaining cornstarch and water.  stir to blend.  bring curry mixture to a simmer, reduce heat, and cook until sauce is smooth, about 15 minutes.

Random Ingredients: cardamom pod,sage leaf,sirloin,spinach,sauce,heavy whipping cream,pearl barley
Ingredient Phrases: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts | 1 lemon, juice of | 1/4 cup butter, melted | 1/2 cup heavy whipping cream | salt and pepper to taste | 4 cups peeled frozen pearl barley | 3/4 pound thinly sliced spinach | 2 medium lemons, juiced | 1 garlic clove, peeled and minced | 2 tablespoons olive oil | 2 cups finely sliced green onions | 1/2 teaspoon dried sage leaf | 1/4 teaspoon dried parsley | 1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom pods | 1/2 teaspoon hot sauce | salt and pepper to taste
Recipe Instructions: place chicken breasts in a large saucepan and cover with enough water to cover.  bring the water to a boil.  reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes, or until done but firm to the bite.  drain with the lemon juice.  stir in the butter and cream to coat completely.  set aside to cool and chop.  melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium heat.  pour in the butter mixture to the pan and stir until smooth and bubbly.  measure off the fat.  cook and stir the green onions, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil in the butter mixture until the onions are tender, about 5 minutes.  stir in the green onions, sage, parsley, cardamom, hot sauce, salt and pepper.  seasoning the soup with salt and pepper to taste before pouring into bowls.

Random Ingredients: curry paste,green cardamom pod,chicken breast,mace,rump steak,lime zest,cooking sherry,maple syrup
Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs skinless, boneless chicken breasts | 3 tablespoons cooking sherry | 1 tablespoon sugar | 2 tablespoons honey | 1 teaspoon cinnamon | 1 teaspoon cumin seed | 2 teaspoons coriander | 2 teaspoons nutmeg | 1 teaspoon ground mace | 1 teaspoon chili | 1/2 teaspoon curry paste | 1/4 cup coriander | 1/2 teaspoon cumin seed | 1/4 cup lime zest | 3/4 cup lemon juice | 1/4 cup canola oil | 1/4 cup maple syrup | 3/4 cup raisins | 1/2 cup sliced fresh green cardamom pods | 1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves | 6 green cardamom seeds ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: combine the first 5 ingredients for marinating chicken in a small saucepan.  bring to a simmer and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes, then remove from heat.  place chicken on individual plates, leaving room for any remaining marinade.  return the marinade to the saucepan, whisk in the remaining marinade, then pour over the chicken.  cook over medium heat until heated through, about 10 minutes, then transfer chicken to a serving platter.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 ounces baby spinach | 2 tablespoons fresh chopped onions
Recipe Instructions: in a large stock pot, cook the Baby Spinach according to package directions.  when the spinach is cool, add the baby spinach to the pot and cook until tender and tender.  add the sliced onions and the cooked spinach.  bring just to one medium boil and then reduce heat to low and simmer until thick and glossy.  serve with plain bread, or with any hot pasta or salad.

Ingredient Phrases:
2 medium bananas, peeled and sliced ( about 8 medium pieces ) | 3 medium sausages ( about 8 medium pieces ) | 1/2 cup dried lentils ( i prefer white ) | 1/4 cup raisins ( optional ) | 1 cup sliced chocolate salami | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 2 medium leeks, thinly sliced | 1 medium mango, peeled and chopped ( about 3/4 lb ) or 1 lime-curd chopped ( about 3/4 lb ) | 1/8 cup sweet basil, chopped | 1/4 cup dry marsala wine | 1 teaspoon ground coriander | 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg | 2 tablespoons sugar | 2 tablespoons milk, well-drained | 1 teaspoon instant tea ( or 4 tsp.
    - milk substitute )
Recipe Instructions: mix together the dried lentils, raisins, chocolate salami, vegetable oil and milk.  heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  cook the leeks, mango and salami in the hot oil until well softened, about 3 minutes.  drain on paper towels.  in a large bowl, cream together the basil, marsala, coriander and nutmeg.  add the sugar, milk and tea and stir until mixed well.  add to the dry ingredients and stir until smooth, about three minutes.  add the milk, stir until slightly thickened.  divide the salad between plates and top each with a serving of cooked ham, rice or noodles.  serve on warm serving platter and drizzle with the mousse.  garnish with the roasted cashews or roasted pecans if you prefer.
Recipe Titile: Moroccan Sausages and Bean Salad With Mousse

Random Ingredients: tomato puree,cider vinegar,butter,lemon juice zest,chickpea,ice,red chile
Ingredient Phrases: 3 teaspoons lemon juice, plus extra for sprinkling ( or enough for spreading into a 9 x 13inch pan ) or 1 teaspoon cider vinegar | 6 -8 tablespoons unsalted butter | 1 bottle tomato puree | 3 tablespoons lemon juice ( or more if needed ) | 2 1/2 tablespoons cider vinegar ( or your favorite ) | 1/2 teaspoon baking powder | 5 1/2 teaspoons crushed red chiles ( or fresh red ) | salt & fresh ground pepper ( or to taste )
Recipe Instructions: place lemon juice, plus additional for sprinkling into a glass or ceramic baking dish or bowl with at least a 1 tblsp.  baking powder and the crushed chilies in a large blender and puree until smooth, set aside.  in a saucepan add 2 tblsp.  baking powder and a splash of water.  bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the liquid is completely absorbed.  while you are stirring, put all the ingredients in a blender jar ; blend until completely smooth, set aside.  the longer you combine, the richer the flavor.  pour this sauce over all, making sure to mix it all properly.  serve with tortilla chips, as a snack or as a main course, topped with extra chopped tomatoes and a wedge of lemon.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large cabbage, shredded | 1 lb pork tenderloin or 1 lb veal beef, strips ( i used veal roast ) | 1/2 lb bacon or 1/2 lb flank steak, sliced ( i used bacon ) | 2 slices bacon | 1/2 cup white sugar | 2 teaspoons grated lemon zest | 3 egg whites | 2 cups cooked white beans | 14 ounces canned dried black beans | 6 tablespoons all-purpose flour | 1 cup chicken broth ( or broth reserved by crockpot for meat ) | 4 cups chicken broth ( or broth reserved by crockpot for meat ) | salt ( to taste ) | 3/4 cup arugula
Recipe Instructions: prepare a pot on simmer to reduce to 4 cups.  remove pork to a medium size bowl.  in another small bowl, beat bacon until no lumps remain.  add 3 teaspoons white sugar to bacon mixture and beat well.  add minced bacon to bacon mixture and beat well.  add white beans, cook until lightly browned, about 15 minutes.  stir in black beans, flour, and broth ; cook, stirring, for 7 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally.  drain and discard liquid, reserving a 1 - 12 cups broth reserve to use as a gravy.  in pot, cook bacon until crisp and browning.  remove bacon to a bowl and drain on paper towels.  remove grease from skillet and keep hot.  in same pot, cook pork and bacon until tender, stirring frequently.  transfer pork to mediumsize, covered, large saucepan ; heat over medium heat.  add sugar mixture to sausage and cook, stirring, for 1 - 12 to 2 minutes or until sugar dissolves.  transfer pork to the slow cooker, stirring for another 5 minutes or until meat is well browned.  add 12 cup arugula and remaining 1 - 12 cups broth, cook and stir 1 more minutes or until broth is reduced.  mix in chicken broth and salt.  stir in arugula to taste until smooth.  divide soup among 4 bowls.  top each with about half of the pork mixture and drizzle some of reserved arugula over soup.

Random Ingredients: ricotta cheese,cake flour,cod,vital wheat gluten,honeydew melon,curry powder,vanilla,apricot
Ingredient Phrases: 2/3 cup cake flour | 1 tablespoon powdered baking powder | 1 teaspoon mixed spice | 1 teaspoon hot cooking spray | 1/4 cup honeydew melon, sliced 1 inch | 2 cups mixed mixed candied coconut | 2 cups superfine ricotta cheese | 2 tablespoons cream | 2 tablespoons vanilla | 1 pinch curry powder | 2 eggs, beaten | 1 lb cod, cubed
Recipe Instructions: mix together first 5 ingredients.  set aside.  in a large bowl, mix together remaining ingredients except cornflour to form a soft dough.  on a lightly floured work surface, roll out dough onto a lightly floured work surface.  cut out 14 circle of dough, leaving edges in with the center of the shape.  place a piece of dough on a greased cookie sheet and fill with cornflour mixture.  bake at 375 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes.  remove from oven.  using a cookie cutter, cut rounds out of the dough.  sprinkle with powdered sugar ; brush with powdered sugar.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 head garlic | 5 tablespoons ghee | 1/2 yellow bell pepper | 3 large white onions | 1 -2 small red onion, diced | 4 tablespoons fresh whole coriander ( for garnish ) | 2 tablespoons lemon juice | 2 tablespoons white onion, minced | 1 cup macadamia nuts or 1 cup roasted almonds | 1/2 lb lean ground macadamia nuts or 1/2 lb ground almonds
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350f, put in the garlic, onions, peppers, corn and nuts.  cook until the vegetables are golden and the liquid has been absorbed, about 34 minutes.  drain the vegetables and place it into a large bowl with the macadamias.  set it aside, and stir in the ground nuts.  in another bowl, with the ghee, combine ground nuts.  add enough lemon juice to make about 2 tablespoons.  add remaining lemon juice, white onion, ground nut, and half the ground nuts and whisk until well mixed.  season to taste with salt and pepper.  heat a large skillet over medium heat.  add a little oil to pan and coat surface quickly.  cook the nuts in the oil on each side until lightly coloured.  turn the nuts out on a board about 5 inches long if they are not lightly coloured.  place on a baking sheet and broil or grill until they are hot brown, about 23 minutes remove from the oven and set on a cooling rack to cool.  to serve, place a dollop of the filling in each of five individual individual serving bowls.  garnish with chopped nuts on the side and serve with the sauce.  the sauce should keep for up to 34 months in the refrigerator.
Recipe Titile: Macadamia Nuts Stuffed With Yogurt Sauce

Random Ingredients: jumbo shrimp,ranch dressing mix,salt pepper,mascarpone cheese,pecorino romano cheese,fennel seed,beef stew meat
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb beef stew meat | 4 teaspoons mustard ( i use kraft's ) | 2 teaspoons dried italian parsley, chopped | 3 medium jumbo shrimp ( about 2 pounds each ) | 1 teaspoon fennel seed | 1 1/2 teaspoons salt and pepper | 1 jar ranch dressing mix | 2 cups premade jumbo shrimp
Recipe Instructions: combine the beef, mustard, parsley, and shrimp.  mix well and marinate at least 2 hours.  preheat a large skillet with oil for mediumhigh heat.  brown the beef in the oil and drain on paper towels.  add the meat mixture with the fennel seeds, salt and pepper to the pan, and simmer the shrimp 2 minutes.  set aside.  when ready to prepare shrimp, mix together the ranch dressing, jumbo shrimp, and shredded iceberg lettuce into a bowl.  spread the ranch mixture evenly across the shrimp.  top with the shrimp and lettuce mixture and continue to simmer for 20 minutes, until the pasta is tender yet not mushy.  serve with fresh minced garlic cloves for garnish.

Random Ingredients: corn syrup,nonfat cream,rigatoni pasta,coriander,cham sauce,green olive
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb rigatoni pasta | 1 1/2 cups nonfat sour cream | 3 tablespoons cham sauce | 1/4 cup corn syrup | fresh ground black pepper | 2/3 cup green olives | 3 shallots, thinly sliced
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil.  add rigatoni and cook until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes.  drain, reserving 1 - 12 cups of cooking water.  simmer pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until al dente, 2 to 3 hours.  stir in sour cream.  simmer and adjust heat to maintain a firm sauce.  sprinkle olives with salt and pepper.  pour sauce over and toss to coat.  return rigatoni to the pan and top with cham sauce, corn syrup and pepper.  taste and add more salt if needed.  garnish with additional shallots.
Recipe Titile: Grilled Rigatoni With Coriander Sauce and Greens

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup arborio rice | 1 1/2 cups black barbados sugar | 1 cup dry vermicelli, soaked, drained and cubed
Recipe Instructions: drain rice and discard rind.  set aside for the night.  in a large saucepan, bring half of the water to a boil.  add rice and brown in it, stirring constantly.  add the sugar, vermicelli cubes, and cook, stirring, 8 minutes.  pour over beans and serve warm or at room temperature.

Random Ingredients: wheat flour,new york,red bell pepper,shrimp,garlic oil
Ingredient Phrases: 3 pounds new york | 3 cups warm water or 3 cups water, divided | 3/4 cup rice flour | shrimps | 1 large white onion, chopped | 3 garlic cloves, minced | 3 tablespoons lime juice | 1/2 cup fresh orange rind | 1/4 teaspoon ground red bell pepper | 1/3 cup olive oil
Recipe Instructions: in a large mixing bowl, combine rice flour, rice flour, onion, and garlic until smooth.  cut rind into 8 wedges and set aside.  in a shallow bowl, combine orange juice, juice, and bell pepper.  scoop out marinade, making sure all of the liquid runs underneath.  whisk with fork or wooden spoon until smooth.  heat 1 tbsp hot oil in a large, deep skillet over medium heat.  add onion and garlic and cook, stirring, about 710 minutes until onion is translucent.  stir in rind and orange rind mixture, stirring continually.  cook for 10 minutes or until onion is golden and no longer cloudy.  pour in reserved marinade to the skillet and mix with onion mixture.  cook, stirring, until coated with sauce.  cover skillet and reduce heat to low.  cook about 20 minutes, or until desired doneness.  add 12 cup water and cook until heated through.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 small dried fenugreek seeds | 1 teaspoon miso ( japanese rice flour )
Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 425 degrees f.  spray a 9x13inch baking dish with cooking spray.  place one of the fenugreek seeds in a small piece of wax paper to dry out.  spread the seeds out with your hands on the baking dish so they dont dry out.  cut each piece of fenugreek seeds in half, then cut each piece into a crosswise strip and place both ends of the soaked fenugreek seeds on the exposed side of your hand.  roll the soaked fenugreek seeds into a rough shape.  arrange the soaked fenugreek seeds all over the soaked fenugreek seeds.  bake in the center of the roasting pan for 25 to 30 minutes.  cut the soaked fenugreek seeds with sharp knife or a sharp sharp knife into rounds about 14 inch long.  store the fried balls in a tightly sealed container in refrigerator.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 tablespoons onion | 1 tablespoon peppermint leaves | 2 cups vegetable stock | 2 chicken stock cubes, split | 1 quart goat cheese | 1 teaspoon sage
Recipe Instructions: in a small saucepan of boiling salted water, saute onion in 1 t.  of the peppersmint until tender.  add the beef and stir until just cooked through.  add the garlic and spices to the pot and cook for 10 minutes.  stir in the goat cheese, simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes more and then stir in half of the mushroom mixture ; simmer for 20 minutes, or until bubbling.  ladle soup in soup bowls and serve.

Random Ingredients: pizza dough,italian sausage,self raising flour,cream cheese,chicken bouillon cube,club soda
Ingredient Phrases: 4 chicken bouillon cubes, drained or 6 chicken cubes | 1 teaspoon chicken flavored sausage | 2 teaspoons italian's finest italian specialty chicken bouillon cubes | 12 ounces self raising flour, approximately as needed | 1/2 cup club soda
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 325 degrees f.  in a large bowl whisk together the chicken cubes and sausage ; season with the bouillon.  in a large bowl place the flour, 1 teaspoon of salt and club soda ; stir thoroughly.  form dough into a ball and pinch together to seal.  on a floured surface roll up the dough to form the filling, about 18inch thick and 30 inch wide.  if necessary press the dough against the inside surface with your fingers to form a sealable dough.  on a lightly floured surface roll the dough out to about 1inch in thickness.  cut into 16 squares and place in a greased baking dish.  cover with a moist towel and bake for 15 minutes.  remove the pizza and keep warm on a wire rack.  to serve cut the dough in half and place the slices on top of each other.  cut into squares and serve warm.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 plum tomatoes, peeled | 1 tablespoon cumin seed | 1 teaspoon garlic paste
Recipe Instructions: wash tomatoes well.  heat oil in a heavybased pan over medium heat.  add tomatoes, and fry until lightly charred on both sides.  remove from the pan.  return juice to the pan with cumin and garlic, cover to keep warm.

Random Ingredients: currant,chicken breast half,kaffir lime leaf,ginger garlic paste
Ingredient Phrases: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breasts ( about 2 pounds total ) | 1 teaspoon ginger-garlic paste | 3 tablespoons red chili | 3 cups plain yogurt | 1/4 cup currant | 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin | 1 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger garlic paste | salt and pepper to taste | 3 tablespoons olive oil | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 1/4 cup chopped of fresh mint
Recipe Instructions: in a medium bowl, stir together the chicken, ginger garlic paste and chilli.  place the yogurt in a blender ; process until pureed.  season to taste with salt and pepper.  scrape the yogurt mixture into a large bowl.  pour the yogurt mixture over the chicken.  stir to coat and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight.  preheat the grill to mediumhigh heat.  remove the chicken from the refrigerator and pat dry with paper towels.  place the chicken in a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray.  cook over mediumlow heat until the chicken is no longer pink and no longer has any liquid, about 5 minutes.  drain on paper towels, reserving 2 t.   of the marinade.  mix the currants, cumin, ginger garlic paste and 2 t.   reserved marinade in a separate bowl.  heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil in the skillet over medium heat.  working in batches, pour the mixture into the oil, then cook until the paste turns a deep golden color, 3 to 4 minutes.  add the garlic to the skillet and stir and cook until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.  stir the yogurt and reserved 1 t.   sauce into the hot chicken mixture.  season with salt and pepper to taste and serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: ginger garlic paste,bamboo shoot,tortilla chip,cardamom,chicken breast,greek yogurt,turnip
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste | 2 tablespoons cilantro, roughly chopped | 2 tablespoons bamboo shoot, thinly sliced ( about 1/2 cup ) | 1 tablespoon ground cardamom | 3 tablespoons turnips, julienned | 4 cups cooked chicken breast, shredded | 12 ounces low-fat greek yogurt
Recipe Instructions: stir the garlic paste, cilantro, bamboo shoots, cardamom, turnip and rice in a bowl with a whisk until thoroughly combined.  pour into a blender and puree until smooth.  add the chicken and blend until smooth.  ladle this into a bowl and top with yogurt.  cover tightly and refrigerate 2 hours or overnight.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 lbs boneless chicken breast halves | 3/4 cup flour | 1/3 cup soy sauce | 1 tablespoon dried oregano | 1/2 teaspoon sugar | 1 tablespoon dried szechuan chili powder | 1 tablespoon rice | 2 teaspoons dried dried onionssalt | 1 teaspoon soy sauce | 1 cup chicken stock cube | 2 carrots, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 1/4 cup raisins
Recipe Instructions: coat skinned chicken pieces with flour, sprinkle with soy sauce, cook until browned on all sides.  drain, add to chicken mixture with oregano, sugar, szechuan chili powder, rice, onion salt, soy sauce, and rice stock mixture.  cover and refrigerate 30 minutes, turning occasionally.  place carrots in a large bowl and pour stock over carrots.  heat to boiling, reduce heat and simmer about 50 minutes, covered.  add garlic to carrots ; continue to cook for 2 minutes or until vegetables are tender.  add chicken mixture to carrots, reduce heat, and simmer 20 minutes longer.

Ingredient Phrases:
1 chicken cutlet or 1 beef brisket, about 8 oz.
    - each | 1/2 lb tomatillo | 4 tablespoons low sodium soybean | 3 tablespoons vegetable oil | 4 white egg whites | 1/4 cup chopped fresh chile pepper or 1/4 cup hot chili sauce ( optional ) | 2 tablespoons pimelo fruit ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: place the pomelo in a plastic bag.  place the meat cutlets with juices on the outside of the cutlets.  add the soybean, soybean oil, and eggs and season with salt and pepper to taste.  marinate the meat at least 24 hours or overnight overnight, turning about every 2 hours, or overnight and turning the meat often.  preheat oven to 375 degrees.  on an ungreased baking sheet, bake meat, uncovered, 2530 minutes or until well done, turning the meat every 15 to 20 minutes.  turn the breasts and roast until nicely browned, at least 1 hour.  remove meat and allow juices to cool completely.  in a bowl, whisk egg and chile peppers for 5 to 6 minutes, or until heated through and slightly puffed.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup feta, crumbled | 2 cups greek yogurt, fresh ( greek feta or feta may be substituted ) | 1/2 teaspoon dry mustard powder | 1/2 cup dry sherry
Recipe Instructions: place half the feta in a saucepan and stir.  bring to a boil add the next 4 ingredients and cook at a low boil for 1013 minutes.  serve with couscous.

Random Ingredients: beef bouillon cube,vegetable,pam cooking spray,fava bean,flour tortilla,ear corn cob,brandy,green bean
Ingredient Phrases: 1 red lentil, rinsed and drained | 4 cloves garlic | 1 can tomato sauce | 2 green beans ( green ) | 1 can coconut chutney | 3/4 cup beef bouillon cubes | 2 tablespoons brown sugar | 2 teaspoons chili powder | 1 tablespoon cumin | 1 teaspoon cinnamon | 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper | 2 tablespoons paprika | 1/2 teaspoon paprika | 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger | 1/2 red onion | 1 jalapeno pepper, minced | 1/2 cup green pepper, seeded and diced ( i use green chilies in this recipe too ) | 1/2 cup cilantro, chopped | 1 can diced tomatoes | 1/4 cup white onion, chopped | 1/2 cup white corn | 3/4 cup water | 3/4 cup sour cream | 3 tablespoons vegetable oil | 1 teaspoon chili powder | 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice | 4 tablespoons flour | 3 tablespoons ground cinnamon | 1/3 cup dried jalapeno peppers | 5 green peppers, stemmed and seeds removed | 8 large beef bouillon cubes | 1 1/2 cups shredded beef top round
Recipe Instructions: soak lentils in water for 12 hour.  in large bowl, combine curry powder, brown sugar, chutney, beef bouillon, brown sugar, chili powder, cumin, cinnamon, paprika, ginger, onions, jalapeno pepper, green pepper, and cilantro.  add green pepper and cilantro, tomatoes, white onion, and corn.  mix well.  add half of soup mixture to lentils.  add green pepper mixture to soup mixture.  mix thoroughly.  add rest of soup mixture to lentils.  add tomato sauce, green beans, coconut chutney, coconut chutney, beef bouillon cubes, brown sugar, chili powder, lime juice, flour, cinnamon, jalepenos, and bell peppers.  mix well.  season to taste.  pour half of the soup mixture into each of the 6 corn tortillas.  top with half of the shredded beef top round.  repeat process with remaining corn tortillas.  sprinkle with the remaining beef top round.  repeat process with remaining soup mixture and corn tortillas.  sprinkle with reserved green pepper mixture and sprinkle with the remaining cilantro.  serve with tortilla and bread.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 granny smith apples, cubed | 1 package cream of corn | 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract | 2 teaspoons cocoa powder
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f.  in a medium bowl, whisk together apple slices, cream of corn, vanilla and cocoa powder.  pour into a large, 9x13 inch baking dish.  bake in the preheated oven for 5 minutes.  pour pie filling over top of apple topping, if desired.  bake for 10 minutes or until the top is browning.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 lb sausages | 1 tablespoon active dry yeast | 1/4 cup vegetable oil
Recipe Instructions: in the bowl of a stand mixer, dissolve yeast in the hot oil and let stand 5 minutes.  add sausages and stir until cooked through but not browned.  stir in 2 teaspoons of yeast in the bowl of the mixer.  increase the speed to medium high and add the vegetable oil and beat for 2 minutes.  add 2 teaspoons of oil and the sausage, stir until incorporated.  refrigerate for at least 1 hour to let the sausage and oil dry slightly.  preheat oven 350f.  toast sausages in a shallow casserole dish if using a nonstick cast iron pan, for a few minutes until done.  remove from oven and set aside.  in a seperate bowl, combine the rest of the oil and yeast and then place sausages aside to cool.  cover and let rest until ready to use.  spoon 12 teaspoon of the sausage mixture down side of center of the sausages.  lay each sausage into a deep roasting pan lined with parchment paper or silpat or aluminum foil.  spread about 2 tablespoons of the tomato mixture over the sausages.  place the rastside down on the pan so that you have 4 layers in the middle.  cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes ; repeat with remaining sausage mixture.  spoon the remaining tomato mixture over the top, sprinkle with the reserved sausage mixture and continue to cover the remaining layer, then turn off the oven.  cover and let rise for 1015 minutes, until the temperature reaches 160 degrees f.  when the oven is at this stage, the oven should be very hot.  transfer the sausages to a large roasting pan.  top the sausages evenly with the remaining 14 cup of tomato sauce.  return the oven to 375f ; bake 2530 minutes until the edges of sausage are caramelized and most of the liquid has evaporated.  cool completely in oven before transferring to a wire rack to finish cooling before slicing, or store in airtight foil foil bag until ready to serve, or freeze in a tightly covered container invert the bag and return to refrigerator until needed.

Ingredient Phrases: 5 tablespoons olive oil or 5 tablespoons light oil | 6 garlic cloves, minced | 4 ounces leg of lamb | 1 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast | 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin | 2 teaspoons ground cilantro | 2 teaspoons salt & pepper | 2 1/4 ounces lima beans, trimmed and sliced | 2 1/2 ounces dried lima beans, trimmed and thinly sliced
Recipe Instructions: in a food processor, pulse olive oil and garlic together until pureed.  place lamb in food processor and pulse until finely chopped.  add more oil if needed.  with machine running, add yeast, cumin, cilantro and salt and pepper to lamb mixture.  transfer lamb mixture to bowl.  mix in beans.  cover and refrigerate until ready to use.  sprinkle with lima beans and serve.
Recipe Titile: Seared Lamb Fajitas With Garlic Crumbles

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups yellow cornmeal | 1/2 teaspoon tahini | 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil | 3 cups cornstarch
Recipe Instructions: mix cornmeal and tahini in a bowl.  place olive oil in a wok to mediumhigh heat.  add cornstarch.  sizzle for a minute or two until bubbly then turn off heat.  add cornstarch and mix until smooth, about 30 seconds.  mix in cornstarch mixture, then serve.  this bread comes in large, but really small, bowl with a tightfitting lid.  you really should have 2 or 3 small breads.  make sure to sprinkle a little more of the olive oil evenly over each bread and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 teaspoons butter | 1 lb beef tenderloin, trimmed | 1/4 cup brown sugar | 1/4 cup vegetable oil, divided | salt and ground black pepper to taste | freshly ground pepper to taste | 2 tablespoons minced red peppers flake | 1 package instant biscuits | 1 cup light sour cream | 1 cup shredded mesclun | 1 cup shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese | 1 cup shredded dishes pie crust
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 400 degrees.  in a medium skillet, melt melted butter over mediumhigh heat.  cook and stir beef until evenly browned, 7 to 10 minutes.  reduce heat to mediumlow.  spoon beef mixture over tenderloin.  cut each round into 6 wedges.  sprinkle red pepper flakes over beef ; drizzle half the brown sugar over each wedge.  arrange biscuits triangles on a baking sheet coated with cooking spray.  bake in the oven for 15 minutes ; remove from oven.  in a large bowl, whisk together sour cream, mesclun, and 1 - 12 cups chopped cheddar, then combine with beef mixture.  divide into 8 triangles, and shape each into a diamond.  arrange remaining cheddar over triangles.  sprinkle with remaining brown sugar and remaining 1 - 12 cups chopped cheddar and dot with remaining shredded pepper flakes.  bake 15 minutes longer or until lightly browned and top is golden.  remove layers from oven, reduce oven temperature to 400 degrees, and bake an additional 10 to 12 minutes.  allow to cool until set.

Ingredient Phrases: 16 ounces beef, browned and cubed | 14 ounces beef stock or 14 ounces stock chicken, cut into thin strips | 1 ounce italian seasoning | 1/2 teaspoon dried sage | 1/4 teaspoon dried thyme | 4 ounces sliced button mushrooms | 1/2 cup drained san marzano tomato paste | 1 cup raisins | 3 tablespoons margarine, melted | 3 cups water
Recipe Instructions: in a large soup pot, heat oven to 400 degrees.  stir together beef, beef stock, italian seasoning, sage, thyme, mushrooms, tomato paste.  stir until well blended.  pour in water, bring to boil.  reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 816 hours.  stir in raisins, margarine, butter, and water.  cover, and continue cooking until meat is tender and no longer pink and bubbling, about 30 to 45 minutes longer.  transfer meat mixture to a bowl.  sprinkle crumb mixture over meat.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups whole wheat milk | 1/2 cup unsalted butter or 1/2 cup margarine | 1/2 cup brown sugar, packed | 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg | 1 egg | 1/4 teaspoon salt | 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon | 1/3 cup all-purpose flour | 1/2 teaspoon clove | 1 1/2 cups lukewarm milk
Recipe Instructions: melt butter or margarine in saucepan and cook butter mixture over mediumlow heat for 1 minute.  add sugar ; cook and stir until mixture is melted and thickened, about 5 minutes.  combine egg, ground nutmeg, salt, cinnamon and allpurpose flour with whisk to form a thick batter.  stir into cream ; remove from heat and cool 5 minutes.  melt 2 teaspoons butter in 2 tablespoons milk ; whisk into mixture.  stir in flour mixture, 1 teaspoon at a time, mixing well after each addition.  gradually stir in milk by whisking constantly to avoid lumps.  stir in butter mixture in batches until mixture is smooth and creamy, about 2 minutes.  stir in 2 teaspoons water ; whisk into milk mixture.  refrigerate until serving time.  note if desired, you can sprinkle the caramelized sugar over the top.  serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: extra virgin olive oil,hot salsa,peanut butter,creme fraiche
Ingredient Phrases: 12 ounces hot salsa | 2 tablespoons peanut butter | 1 tablespoon freshly grated fresh hot salsa | 4 tablespoons shredded freshly grated pecorino romano cheese
Recipe Instructions: combine the salsa, peanut butter, hot salsa, and pepperidge farm cheese blend, in a bowl.  add the dressing and toss to coat.  chill 30 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Salsa With Pepperidge Farm Peanut Sauce

Random Ingredients: consomme,sharp cheddar cheese,beer,white mushroom,green cardamom pod,green pepper,garnish,kahlua
Ingredient Phrases:
1 cup beer | 1/2 cup consomme ( or 2 1/2 oz.
    - cans of white mushrooms ) | 1/2 cup kahlua | 1/2 cup sharp cheddar cheese, grated | 1/4 cup green button, sliced | 6 tablespoons kahlua | 1 large white mushroom, chopped | 1 large red or green pepper, chopped | 1/4 cup finely chopped green pepper
Recipe Instructions: pour beer into crock pot and stir for 1 minute.  remove from the heat and pour over the cheese, stirring to coat.  place in a tightly covered sauce pan with lid.  cover and cook on low until cheese is melted and bubbly, 1 hour.  while cheese is cooking, prepare mushrooms.  remove stem and seeds from mushrooms and shred.  in a large pot, heat kahlua over high heat.  cook until slightly hot.  remove from heat, add mushrooms, green pepper and kahlua, and stir until heated.  ladle into a shallow dish and serve.
Recipe Titile: Crock Pot Cheddar Cheese (Or Tater Tot)

Random Ingredients: extra virgin olive oil,gelatin,chipotle pepper,cocoa powder,garlic powder,basil
Ingredient Phrases: 1 box refrigerated sugar | 4 dried chipotle peppers, cut in strips | 4 whole cloves garlic powder | 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder | 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil | 1/4 cup slivered almonds, toasted and toasted ( optional ) | 1 small dash cinnamon ( optional ) | 1 teaspoon crushed cinnamon sticks
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 300 degrees f 175 degrees c.  in a medium bowl, combine chipotle peppers, garlic powder, cocoa, and oil.  press crushed garlic with a mallet onto baking sheet.  allow to stand at room temperature for 15 minutes.  preheat oven to 375 degrees f 190 degrees c.  heat almonds in a skillet over medium heat until lightly golden but still moist, about 8 minutes.  stir almonds into the roasted garlic and brown chips.  store in an airtight container.
Recipe Titile: Chipotle and Almond Packed Chocolate Chip

Ingredient Phrases: 1 beetroot | 1/2 cup raisins | 1/2 cup capers, drained | 5/8 cup poppy seeds, toasted | 1 lime, juiced | 1/4 cup chopped cilantro stem
Recipe Instructions: cut beetroots into slices about 12 thick, if smaller, about 18inch thick.  bring water to a boil.  cover boil until tender, about 8 to 10 minutes.  remove from heat, cool slightly, and peel beetroot.  cut out cores.  place peeled beetroots along core of each beetroot, along top of each, in a food processor or blender ; blend until smooth.  remove core with slotted spoon.  pour liquid mixture over beetroots as desired, if desired.  cover and chill.  cut each beetroot into slices about 3inch thick ; add a pinch of paprika if you wish.  heat an outdoor grill or large skillet over mediumhigh heat for 5 to 6 minutes or until the top of each cutlet is charred and the edges are blackened.  drain, pat dry, and dry with paper towels.  mash until smooth and arrange greens in a single layer in a 4 inch wide ziptop bag.  cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate while preparing vegetables.  for salad, place sliced beetroots over vinegar in a single layer.  for raisins, arrange slices of the beetroot flesh over raisins, along with capers, poppy seeds, lime juice, and salt and pepper to taste.  in a small bowl, combine juice from 1 lime and cilantro.  place lime juice and cilantro mixture alongside cucumbers and rhodesian.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans tomato juice | 1 cup long grain white rice | 1 lb fresh stewed tomatoes, chopped coarsely | 2 tablespoons oil ( i like olive oil but i prefer olive oil ) | 3 tablespoons fresh oregano, chopped | 5 garlic cloves, peeled and finely chopped | 2 tablespoons sugar | 3 tablespoons tomato juice | 3 cups vegetable broth ( you can use low fat chicken broth, but i prefer low fat chicken broth ) | 1/2 lb dried oregano | 4 bay leaves | 3 bay leaf
Recipe Instructions: in large stock pot, bring 3 cups water to a boil.  add dried oregano ; cook for about 5 minutes or until reduced by half.  stir in tomato juice and rice.  in 3 batches combine meat, oregano, garlic, sugar, and tomato juice, bring to a boil.  reduce heat to low, cover tightly, and simmer for an hour or so.  remove pot from heat and stir in broth.  add water to pot if the soup seems too thick.  serve over hot rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup sugar | 1/4 cup packed light cornstarch | 1/2 cup chopped fennel seed or 1/2 cup ground coriander | 1/8 teaspoon cinnamon | 2 cups frozen or thawed green beans, thawed | 1/4 cup chopped fresh coriander | 3 tablespoons sweet coconut milk
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot, lightly stir together sugar, 34 cup cornstarch, fennel seeds or coriander, cinnamon and fennel seed mixture.  bring to boil the water.  reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes.  remove from heat, cool and set aside.  in a blender or food processor add fennel, 14 cup cornstarch, coriander and 1 tablespoons sweet coconut milk, processing until dough is coarsely chopped.  transfer the mixture to a bowl.  with the motor running, add milk, continuing to process until the mixture forms a ball and pulls away from the sides of the bowl with a very sharp spoon, about 2 minutes.  roll dough into a 7x11 inch rectangle, cutting all the way through the center like a walnut.  place the cutout shape on a parchmentlined baking sheet or baking stone, filling it to the depth of about an inch.  spread the coconut milk mixture over the cutout and sprinkle it with powdered sugar.  bake at 325 degrees for 40 minutes or until the coconut milk is bubbling in the oven, then turn on the heat.  let cool a few moments before slicing.
Recipe Titile: Banana Green Beans in Coconut Milk With Coconut Milk Sauce

Random Ingredients: semolina flour,coriander seed,russet potato,beef,puff pastry,green olive,oregano,sherry
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/4 lbs boneless beef, cut into 4-inch cubes | 2 1/4 cups sherry | 1 tablespoon coriander seed | 1/4 cup fresh russet potato, diced | 2/3 cup green olive, diced | 6 tablespoons sugar | 2 teaspoons oregano, finely chopped | 1 teaspoon coriander seed, freshly grated | 1 teaspoon sugar | 1 1/4 cups dry sherry or 1 1/4 cups vegetable stock, more if needed | freshly shucked green olives ( garnish )
Recipe Instructions: to make the crust in a heavy saucepan combine the beef, sherry, coriander seed, and russet potato in a large bowl ; cover and set aside.  mix in the grated onion ; toss, and set aside.  remove the beef from the liquid.  stir in the olive, sugar, oregano, coriander, and sugar ; stir until mixed.  add the beef and mix to coat ; cover and simmer about 1 - 12 hours, turning frequently.  meanwhile, preheat the oven to 375 degrees.  remove the beef from the marinade and add to the sherry and reserved liquid.  stir together half the olive oil and 12 the stock ; mix well.  arrange the remaining half the beef and remaining olive oil on a baking sheet.  bake uncovered at 375 degrees for about 10 minutes, stirring every 12 minutes to make sure the juices start to run out.  let cool, then slice into 8 pieces, and serve hot.

Random Ingredients: gingerroot,corn syrup,grand marnier,artichoke heart,toast,spice,italian herb seasoning
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup dried white onion | 1/2 lb fresh gingerroot, peeled and sliced | 8 ounces dried artichoke hearts | 2 cups cooked white wine ( i use cabernet sauvignon blanc ) | 2 cups corn syrup | 8 ounces crushed ice cream with granulated sugar | 3 tablespoons italian herb seasoning | 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg | 1 large white onion, chopped | 1/8 teaspoon ground gingerroot or 1/8 teaspoon ground coriander | 1/8 teaspoon ground white pepper
Recipe Instructions: in a medium bowl, combine the drained onion and 1 tbsp of the ginger, and set aside to cool slightly.  add the artichokes until wilted, then stir in the wine, followed by the syrup, sugar, and seasonings ; bring to a boil and simmer until the sugar dissolves.  set aside.  pour the corn syrup over the artichokes and let it thicken slightly.  toss in the crushed ice cream, making sure to coat the sides of the pan and set aside for one minute.  in a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced onion, sliced sweet onion, and sliced sweet onion.  add 12 teaspoon of the pepper to the softened mixture and whisk to combine ; add another teaspoon of pepper, and whisk to combine.  set aside.  toss in the remaining 2 tsp pepper, the remaining ginger, onion, and 12 teaspoon of ginger root and cook for a minute or two, then add the reserved chopped green onion and mix for another minute or two.  gently stir in 2 teaspoons of the lemon juice, bring to a boil, and whisk until it thickens, then pour into a serving jug.  serve immediately.
Recipe Titile:
St.
    - Patricks' Artichoke, Ginger, and Onion Salad

Random Ingredients: beef tenderloin,ziti pasta,kernel corn,beef chuck,brown sugar,coffee,thyme
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil | 4 -5 beef chuck ( cut into 1/2-inch cubes ), cut into thin slabs | 1 lb lean ground beef ( chuck in large dutch oven works the best ) | 1 tablespoon red wine ( optional ) | 1 1/2 cups vegetarian broth | 1 tablespoon packed brown sugar | 1 tablespoon fresh thyme | 3 tablespoons vegetable oil | 2 cans whole kernel corn syrup | 1 jar kraft ziti pasta, drained and flaked ( or your favorite spaghetti sauce )
Recipe Instructions: heat oil in large dutch oven or 4quart pot of boiling water over high heat.  brown beef, breaking up into crumbles as it cooks, and breaking up with fork, 1 minute.  drain fat and return beef to dutch pot.  add wine, and simmer until thickened, about 5 minutes.  return beef and browned beef to pot.  add broth, brown sugar, thyme and oil.  reduce heat to medium simmer and continue simmering until beef is tender, about 15 minutes.  stir ziti and kraft into pot.  add pasta to pot and stir until heated through.  reduce heat to lowlow and simmer until ziti is tender, about 5 minutes.  stir in corn syrup and kraft into pot, and simmer until heated through, 5 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 cups couscous | 1/4 cup portabella mushroom, halved ( about 250g ) | 4 tablespoons red channa dal, crushed | 1/2 cup fresh mint leaves, chopped | 1 tablespoon dried channa dal, crushed ( or 1 tsp dried parsley, for garnish )
Recipe Instructions: simmer the couscous in a stock pot with an occasional drizzle of water.  once the couscous has simmered for 20 minutes or so, add the mushroom, channa dal, mint leaves, channa dal.  mix well.  pour the mixture in bowls and serve warm.

Random Ingredients: baking potato,sherry wine vinegar,lemon juice,onion powder,allspice berry,kidney bean,lemon
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans semi-sweet chocolate chips | 1 cup granulated sugar ( brown sugar ) | 1 cup baking powder | 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
Recipe Instructions: prepare the topping by mixing the first 5 ingredients.

 ## Recipe Name:- ##
 Pumpkin Bars

Ingredient Phrases: 6 baby potatoes, about 6cm | 3 eggplants, white part only, skin removed, peeled, cored, and chopped | 3 tablespoons potato starch | 1 teaspoon fresh thyme sprig
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 200c350f175cgas mark  line baking trays with aluminium foil about 18x7cm.  arrange the potatoes, eggplants, and potato starch in a large bowl ; mix again until everything is evenly coated, then sprinkle with the thyme sprigs.  bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven, about 20 minutes or until golden brown, then transfer to wire rack to cool slightly.  cut into squares if you like.  garnish with a sprig of thyme.

Random Ingredients: romaine lettuce,beef tenderloin,phyllo pastry,leek,red wine vinegar,corn oil,pecorino romano cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups corn oil, divided | 2 large leeks, cleaned and trimmed, cut into 1/2 inch cubes | 1/4 cup crumbled pancetta | 2 tablespoons flour | 2 cups cubed fresh pancetta | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 1/3 cup dried red wine vinegar | 1/4 cup red wine vinegar | 1/2 lb beef tenderloin, trimmed | 1 cup shredded cured & coated leeks ( optional ) | 1 teaspoon minced parsley
Recipe Instructions: heat the 2 cups of oil in a 10inch skillet over medium high heat until it begins to smoke.  add the leeks and cook, stirring frequently, until just tender, about 5 minutes.  add the garlic, vinegar, remaining ingredients and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until reduced by half, about 3 minutes.  spoon the filling into a small plastic bag and set aside.  fill a large, shallow dutch oven with enough water to cover the bottom.  add enough water to cover each of the 4 dutch ovens except the dutch ovens, about 2 tablespoons and cover with baking sheets.  bake the tenderloins in the hot water for 20 to 30 minutes or until just tender and lightly browned, stirring occasionally, then remove from the oven and allow to cool, about 10 minutes.  stir in the reserved filling.  serve warm or at room temperature.
Recipe Titile: Corned Beef Tenderloin in Phyllo Sauce

Random Ingredients: spanish onion,worcestershire sauce,steak,beef bouillon cube,bacon,yellow pepper,italian seasoning,tequila
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 lb flank steak | 1 package frozen chopped red onion | 3 -4 slices smoked sausage ( such as a mild mild or medium hot spanish sausage ) | 1/2 teaspoon italian seasoning ( to taste ) | 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt | 2 -3 tablespoons beef bouillon cubes | 1 tablespoon worcestershire sauce | 2 -3 beef bouillon cubes | 1/3 cup grated cheddar cheese
Recipe Instructions: cut up cooked steak diagonally, and tie with a toothpick.  in a blender saut onion, sausage, sausage, garlic seasoning, worcestershire sauce and bouillon in the same pan.  combine beef broth and beef bouillon cube in a medium pot, then add beef mixture.  stir constantly while cooking.  after approximately 10 minutes boil broth out of heat.  stir in cheddar and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 lb russet potato, cut into small cubes | 2 medium tablespoons vegetable oil | 1/2 cup cream | 1 can sliced mushrooms, undrained | 1 cup shredded cooked penne | 1 teaspoon ground black pepper | 1 tablespoon cornstarch | 1 teaspoon oyster mushrooms, drained
Recipe Instructions: heat 12 of the vegetable oil in a large, heavybottomed pot.  brown the potatoes ; drain and set aside.  set aside.  in a large skillet, heat the remaining oil over medium heat.  add the cream, mushrooms, and pepper ; cook and stir until the mushroom is tender, 10 to 15 minutes.  add the cornstarch and oyster mushrooms ; reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer until the sauce is reduced by half, 5 to 7 minutes.  pour sauce into the potatoes ; season with salt and pepper to taste.  to make the filling, mix the chicken, vegetable oil, cream, cornstarch, and oyster mushrooms in a blender or food processor.  process until smooth.  to serve, fill a large skillet with the mixture in the skillet, making sure that the bottom of the pan is covered with filling, and bring the filling to a boil.  reduce heat to low and simmer until thickened, about 10 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup sweet pure vanilla ice cream | 1 teaspoon dark brown sugar, divided | 1 egg | 1 cup chopped pecans | 1 tablespoon maple syrup | 1 cup chopped canned dark brown sugar
Recipe Instructions: cream together the vanilla ice cream, brown sugar and egg in a bowl until wellcombined.  beat in the coconut syrup, brown sugar and chopped pecans.  pour into a 13 inch cake pan and refrigerate for 30 minutes, until set.  beat the chocolate and ice cream over low heat with a rubber spatula to mix.  remove from the refrigerator 30 minutes before serving.  spoon the mixture into the prepared pan.  sprinkle with the reserved caramel glaze and pour the topping over the top.
Recipe Titile: Mandy's Creme Anglaise - Chocolate & Pecan Cake

Random Ingredients: pumpkin puree,parsley flake,olive oil cooking spray,apple
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons pumpkin puree | 1 lemon, juice of ( about 2/3 cup ) | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 2 tablespoon olive oil flavored cooking spray | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley flakes | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh lemon, rind of | 5 cups apple juice
Recipe Instructions: in a pot add the lemon juice to the pumpkin puree and mix well.  season to taste with salt and pepper.  simmer over low heat, covered at least 15 minutes.  while the pumpkin is simmering, puree the apples until very finely chopped, then puree them into the puree and add to the pot along with the peel, parsley, and lemon.  bring to a boil.  reduce the heat to low and cover completely when the pumpkin puree has simmered for a few minutes.  the puree should thicken by a few millis or as needed.  serve hot with crusty bread cubes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 medium turkey | 2 tablespoons plain nonfat yogurt | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary | 2 teaspoons minced garlic cloves | salt and pepper to taste | 5 fluid ounces sliced cremini mushrooms | 1 lb fresh turkey | 3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme sprig | 1 teaspoon chopped dried rosemary | 1 lb salted salmon fillet | 5 fluid ounces sliced tomato | 6 fluid ounces salsa
Recipe Instructions: in a large nonstick skillet, cook turkey over low heat, stirring constantly, until browned, but still firm.  transfer the turkey to a blender and puree briefly, breaking up the turkey with a fork.  set turkey aside.  remove the skillet from the heat, stir in yogurt, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper, and blend until all the ingredients are incorporated.  heat a nonstick skillet over mediumlow heat.  dip the turkey skewers in the sauce and cook until golden brown on both sides, 1 to 2 minutes per side.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 green onions, minced | 1 can diced apples, drained | 4 slices ham, diced | 1 1/2 lbs cheddar cheese, shredded | 1 package monterey jack cheese, shredded | 3 cups low-fat vegetable oil, for the oven
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees.  place the chopped green onions in ovenproof dish and roast for 3040 minutes.  cut the ham into 12 pieces.  slice the apples in half then place in the casserole dish.  cover with the ham slices and the cheese.  cover with aluminum foil and bake 15 minutes, or until the cheese has melted.  serve warm over cooked brown breads.

Random Ingredients: shrimp paste,hot green chili pepper,lemon juice,tamarind paste,rib celery
Ingredient Phrases: 2 teaspoons turmeric powder | 1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder | 2 teaspoons salt | 1 teaspoon pepper sauce | 1 package imitation shrimp paste | 1 tablespoon hot green chili pepper, minced | 1 teaspoon tamarind paste | 1 cup lemon juice | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 2 tablespoons lemon juice
Recipe Instructions: combine all ingredients.  cook in 350 degree oven for 1520 minutes ; serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups flour | 2 1/2 cups cold rolled potatoes | 1/2 yellow pea, rinsed and squeezed dry | 14 ounces white onion, chopped | 1 large yellow split peas, rinsed and patted dry | 1 lemons, juice of ( to garnish ) | 1 cup grape leaf, rinsed with juice.  1 cup cabbages, coarsely chopped | 1/2 cup celery or 1/2 cup onion, chopped | 1 teaspoon dry mustard | 1 teaspoon sea salt | 1/2 teaspoon thyme | 1/8 teaspoon white pepper | sea salt
Recipe Instructions: place flour and cold rolled potatoes in a bowl and mix well.  add peas, lemon juice, onion, lemon rinsed peas, celery, mustard, and sea salt.  combine ingredients for the filling in a saucepan and stir to combine.  add cheese, stir well.  bring to a boil over high heat.  cover and simmer 5 minutes and remove from heat.  stir in thyme, salt, and pepper to taste.  serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 5 avocados | 1/4 cup packed fresh muscovado sugar ( this is very strong! ) | 1 jar of crushed cooked muscovado sugar
Recipe Instructions: put the avocados in a large glass bowl and pour in the sugar.  pour the mixture over the fruits and mix well.  add salt and pepper and mix just until you have a smooth cream sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup whole wheat flour | 5 tablespoons whole wheat milk | 1 teaspoon salt | 5 tablespoons minced ginger | 2 teaspoons ground coriander powder | 1 tablespoon cinnamon | 2 teaspoons cumin powder | 1 teaspoon red chili powder | 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar | 3 cups water
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot, heat half of the water and milk, add salt, ginger, coriander and cinnamon.  bring to a boil and cook, stirring, until it thickens.  remove from the heat and place in a blender bowl of dry ingredients and blend.  add 12 cup water and blend until all the flour is completely combined.  with a small sharp knife, cut the floured balls into 2inch pieces.  cut in half and set aside.  heat the remaining 1 cup water and add cumin and red chili powder and cinnamon.  when the water is boiling, add one teaspoon of sugar and stir until it is dissolved.  stir in the remaining 12 of sugar and stir until dissolved.  continue to stir the water mixture with the flour and then mix into the flour mix until it is thoroughly mixed.  cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 24 hours.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 lb linguine | 1 small red pepper, 1/2 inch long, chopped | 5 serrano peppers, chopped | 1/4 teaspoon chili powder | 3/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  add the linguine and cook until al dente ; drain.  put the red, serrano peppers, chili powder and crushed red pepper flakes in a saucepan with 2 cups water ; bring to a boil.  reduce the heat to medium, cover and simmer until the peppers and sauce are tender, about 30 minutes.  set aside.  heat one tablespoon of the reserved water in a 2 quart saucepan over high heat ; bring to a boil and reduce heat to low.  cook the linguine uncovered until al dente, about 10 minutes ; remove with a slotted spoon and set aside to cool.  meanwhile, make the chili sauce.  combine the linguine sauce, chilies and chili sauce in a blender ; blend until smooth.  pour in enough hot cooking water to achieve just a thin paste.  cook until a thin paste is formed on the surface.  serve the chili sauce in a small bowl.  note you can substitute other types of chili, such as chiles de mexican, black bean, or cajun, or you can place an onion into the chili sauce.  cook until the onion is translucent and fragrant before adding any more.  cook the chili peppers in the reserved cooking water until heated through ; season with salt and pepper to taste.
Recipe Titile: Black Bean & Chili Chili With Dijon-Style Peppers

Random Ingredients: mozzarella cheese,lettuce,sea salt,pearl barley,chinese five spice powder,cardamom seed,chili pepper,italian sausage
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans pearl barley, drained and rinsed | 2 cups mushroom, sliced | 2 cups sliced onions | 1 cup frozen green onion, diced | 2 cups italian sausage | 1/2 cup pearl barley, washed and drained | 1 tablespoon chili pepper, chopped | 3 tablespoons sea salt | 1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom seed
Recipe Instructions: soak pearl barley in water for about 40 minutes to absorb flavors.  drain, reserving the pot water.  bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  add pearl barley and mushrooms, and simmer for 2 to 3 minutes or until vegetables have softened.  drain and rinse under cold running water, and place mushrooms in a saucepan.  in a large bowl mix together onion, mushrooms, sausage, pearl barley, chili pepper, 12 teaspoons sea salt, and 1 tablespoon ground cardamom seed.  set aside to cool.  heat remaining 2 tablespoons sea salt and 12 teaspoon ground cardamom seeds over medium heat until warm.  add remaining 1 - 14 cups water, and bring to a rolling boil.  drop rolled dough in the hot water for 1 minute.  cook the rolled dough for 1 minute or until lightly browned.  lift out dough from pan, and cut into 6 wedges with a cookie cutter.  cut each wedge in half so they make 8 slices, then repeat process with remaining wedges.  cover and chill 3 to 5 hours or overnight.  preheat oven to 425 degrees f 220 degrees c.  cook for 1 hour.  to serve, spread mushroom mixture over the rolled wedges, and sprinkle with pepperjack cheese.  makes 4 to 6 servings. .

Random Ingredients: pizza sauce,corkscrew macaroni,red bell pepper,cilantro leaf,vanilla essence,island dressing,picante sauce
Ingredient Phrases: 3/4 cup jarred sweet italian tomato ( any type ) | 1/2 cup picante sauce | 1/2 cup sweet cream cheese | 1/8 teaspoon corn | 1/4 cup can tomato sauce | 1/4 cup can corned beef | 1 cup fresh cilantro leaves | 1/4 cup finely shredded green onion | 1/4 cup frozen pizza sauce
Recipe Instructions: in a bowl combine tomato sauce, cream cheese, corn corn and tomato sauce.  mix lightly and set aside.  drain and let cool.  in a large bowl combine shredded corned beef, cheese, cilantro, green onion, and tomatoes.  stir and add to jar, mixing well.  refrigerate several hours.  stuffed shells must stay refrigerated up to 24 hours.  heat oven to 425f spread tomato sauce mixture on shell with a spoon, spreading to within 14 of edge.  top with cilantro and green onions, then slice.  sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake for 34 minutes to warm ; serve with a sprinkle of shredded lettuce.
Recipe Titile: Italian Stuffed Shells With Cheese Pizza Sauce

Random Ingredients: white onion,jarlsberg cheese,pumpkin puree,curry paste,zucchini,parmigiano reggiano cheese,chili sauce,cayenne pepper
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup finely diced white onion | 2 tablespoons curry paste | 3 tablespoons chili sauce | 12 whole canned poblano peppers ( sliced into strips ) | 3 tablespoons chopped fresh jarlsberg cheese ( such as goya, cheddar or parmesan ) | 12 ounces pumpkin puree, canned | 3 tablespoons white onions, thinly sliced | 2 teaspoons pepitas, crushed | 1/4 cup shredded low-fat jarlsberg cheese
Recipe Instructions: place onion, curry paste, chili sauce and jarlsberg cheese in a blender and blend until smooth ; set aside.  reserve remaining vegetables.  preheat oven to 400 degrees.  in a medium saucepan over mediumhigh heat, heat 1 tablespoon curry paste ; cook and stir until fragrant, 3 to 5 minutes ; stir in pumpkin puree and white onions.  cook until vegetables begin to soften, about 10 minutes ; drain.  stir pumpkin mixture into vegetable mixture.  bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat to medium low, and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring frequently.  sprinkle with cheese.  add remaining curry paste, jarlsberg and cheese.  simmer 15 to 30 minutes or until cheese is melted and vegetables are tender.

Random Ingredients: salmon,fruit preserve,halibut fillet,white chocolate,superfine sugar,peanut butter,dark chocolate,lentil
Ingredient Phrases: 18 halibut fillets ( or skinless cutlets of similar size ) | 1/2 cup packed crushed peanuts | 3/4 cup superfine sugar ( plus 1 tbs | 1/2/4 cup ground almonds ) | 1/4 cup unsweetened pineapple chunks or 1/4 cup other soft fruit preserves | 125 g dried mangoes ( peeled, seeded, diced and chopped ) | 1 cup dried mixed fruit preserves | 125 g dark chocolate, cut into 4 pieces ( not unsweetened ) | 2 tablespoons toasted almonds, ground ( optional ) | 2 tablespoons chopped of roasted unsalted unsalted almonds or 2 tablespoons roasted roasted cashews | 1/4 cup walnut slices, for serving
Recipe Instructions: place halibut fillets and nuts on a baking sheet and toast over a medium heat until lightly toasted, about 12 minutes if desired, then pour in syrup, nuts and cherries and season well.  using a slotted spoon, transfer the mixture to a bowl, and pour over the halibut mixture and nuts.  place in oven, and bake until the skewers are cooked, about 40 minutes in a preheated oven.  meanwhile preheat the broiler.  cook chocolate and almonds in a small, heavy pan over moderate heat until slightly melted.  stir in the cooled halibut mixture, then pour mixture over the chocolate and almonds and bake for 5 minutes, until the chocolate has completely melted completely.  to serve, lift the skewers from the baking sheet, leaving the nuts and nuts completely on the skewers.  transfer halibut and almonds to a serving platter and pour dessert sauce over the skewers.
Recipe Titile: Grilled Fruit and Salmon Skewers from Kazakhstan

Ingredient Phrases: 2 1/2 tablespoons light syrup, divided | 8 ounces couscous ( you can use canned ) | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley | 4 egg whites | 4 teaspoons orange extract | 2 teaspoons lemon zest | 3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1 teaspoon ground almonds | 1 pear slice
Recipe Instructions: for the couscous rinse couscous under cold water, to remove excess fat.  heat a large, heavybottomed saucepan over medium heat.  in a medium bowl, whisk together the syrup, couscous, parsley, egg whites, orange extract, lemon zest and cinnamon.  whisk in 1 tbsp of the orange extract and whisk gently until mixture forms a fine paste.  sprinkle the couscous and any accumulated juices over the couscous paste.  cover and refrigerate until warm, at least 10 minutes.  for best flavor, whisk the egg whites, 1 cup orange zest and 1 tbsp of the ground cinnamon into the sauce and cook until foamy, about 3 minutes.  pour the reserved orange mixture over the couscous and toss to coat.  cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until flavors have blended well.  to serve, arrange pear slices on a serving plate and top with remaining orange mixture and pear mixture.

Random Ingredients: chipotle pepper,mint,italian salad dressing mix,romaine lettuce,chili paste,zucchini,saffron,salsa
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb zucchini | 1 cup grated mozzarella cheese | 1/2 cup mayonnaise of olive | 1/2 cup shredded lettuce | 1 garlic clove, minced | 1/2 teaspoon saffron | 2 tablespoons chili paste | 4 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes, thinly sliced, deseeded and chopped | 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato sauce | 4 teaspoons chipotle pepper, grated | 1 1/2 cups salsa | 15 ounces hot cooked sun-dried tomatoes, drained and chopped | 1 egg, lightly beaten | 1/4 cup basil, fresh squeezed into juice | 1/4 cup mint leaf, fresh squeezed dry
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f.  peel and slice zucchini and place in a bowl.  cut off the top and bottom of the green tops with a knife to remove excess moisture.  add to bowl with mozzarella and continue layering with the sliced, chopped, diced zucchini and shredded mozzarella.  mix together the mayonnaise, sundried tomatoes, sundried tomato sauce, chipotle pepper, and chili paste in a bowl.  pour in 1tbsp of the drained, rinsed and diced sun dried tomatoes ; sprinkle with the diced sun dried tomatoes and saffron.  mix in the chopped sun dried tomatoes and remaining sun dried tomatoes.  spread half of the avocado mixture in the bottom of a baking dish, top with the zucchini and the remaining sundried tomatoes.  top with remaining chopped cheeses, a layer of shredded cheese, and then top with remaining diced sundried tomatoes, sundried tomatoes, roasted tomatoes, and mozzarella cheese.  bake for 15 minutes, until the cheese is browned and the cheese just starts to melt.  cool 5 minutes ; serve at room temperature over noodles, or in individual bowls with a dollop of salsa over the top of each.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups dried thai basil leaves | 3/4 cup peanut butter | 4 tablespoons rice wine vinegar, divided | 1 teaspoon sugar | 1 large egg, beaten | 2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar | salt and ground black pepper to taste | 2/3 cup scallion, diced | 1/4 cup orange zest, finely grated | 1 1/3 cups finely chopped fresh sage leaves | 1/4 cup toasted coconut flakes, lightly beaten
Recipe Instructions: place the basil leaves, 1 tablespoon oil, 1 tablespoon rice wine vinegar, sugar, and egg in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat.  cook until the basil is wilted, stirring frequently, about 7 minutes.  let cool.  melt the remaining oil in the pan over medium heat, add the scallion, orange zest, 1 tablespoon water, and reserved basil leaves.  cook, stirring until the basil wilts, about 5 minutes.  pour the mixture into the bottom of a medium bowl, drizzle with 1 tablespoon water and toss to combine.  sprinkle the basil mixture evenly over the basil.  combine the remaining peanut butter, vinegar mixture, 2 tablespoons of rice wine vinegar, salt  pepper in a small bowl.  whisk until smooth.  stir in the reserved basil leaves and sage, and season with salt and black pepper.  pour the mixture over the chicken and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/4 lbs beef chuck roast | 1/4 cup shoyu, fresh ( sweet & chinese ) | 1 tablespoon minced shrimp paste, from 1-1/2/4 cup | 1/4 cup sherry wine vinegar | 2 tablespoons beef paste
Recipe Instructions: cut roast in slices.  place shoyu on top of beef cubes.  combine shrimp paste, sherry and the sauce ; pour over beef cubes.  cover and simmer 30 minutes.  to serve, ladle beef mixture into serving bowls over shrimp and top each serving with sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup water | 1 package active dry yeast | 1 cup packed fresh chile, chopped | 1 teaspoon white wine ( no substitutes ) | 2 cups cubed sharp cheddar cheese | 2 cups cauliflower, chopped | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1 tablespoon curry powder | 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves | 1/2 teaspoon paprika | 1 teaspoon ground ginger | 1/4 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper | 1/4 teaspoon curry powder | 2 tablespoons soymilk
Recipe Instructions: to make this sauce in a small saucepan, combine water, yeast, chile, wine, cubed cheese, cauliflower, garlic, turmeric, curry sauce, spices, and soymilk.  bring to simmer, then cover and simmer for about 2 hours or until the vegetables are tender.  cool and then refrigerate for at least 1 hour before grilling.  melt the butter in a 12inch skillet over medium heat.  add the cauliflower and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side ; drain well.  top it with cheese and stir to coat.  sprinkle with remaining cheese and stir to coat.  grill the cauliflower on a cookie sheet or lightly oil grate over medium heat until golden brown, about 3 minutes.  place the cauliflower layer in oven, then turn it to broil.  broil until cheese bubbles and vegetables are crisptender and browned, 2 to 3 minutes.  spread sauce over each serving ; garnish with chopped cilantro and serve.

Random Ingredients: pearl barley,corn oil,vegetable oil cooking spray,parsley leaf,rice vinegar
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups frozen pearl barley | 1/2 cup chopped parsley leaves | 1 tablespoon vegetable oil flavored cooking spray | 2 tablespoons chopped roasted garlic | 1/4 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper | 4 cups all-purpose rice wine or 4 cups red wine
Recipe Instructions: in a medium bowl, mix together the pearl barley, parsley, vegetable oil, garlic, and pepper.  heat oil in a large skillet over high heat.  when hot, add the rice wine and stir until the wine has absorbed by the grains and turned translucent, about 3 to 3 minutes.  add the reserved marinade and rice wine over the pan mixture.  cover and cook over medium heat until wine has reduced to about 2 cups, 5 to 7 minutes.  add the drained pearl barley and cook another 10 to 15 minutes or until the barley and barley are tender and liquid has been absorbed.  serve over fresh greens, a side dish, or as a topping for rice.

Random Ingredients: dark chocolate,accent seasoning,mustard powder,sesame oil,triple sec,cocoa powder,oat bran,tamari
Ingredient Phrases: 3 lbs boneless, skinless chicken pieces | 1 small red onion | 1 cup rolled oats | 1 can black beans | 1 can whole wheat bran, drained ( drained if desired ) | 1/2 cup fresh lime juice | 1 teaspoon dried tamari ( optional ) | 2 teaspoons sugar | 1/4 teaspoon instant coffee powder | 1/2 tablespoon tamari | 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder | 2 teaspoons red wine vinegar | 2 tablespoons sesame oil | 1/2 cup white rum ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: heat oven to 350f.  place chicken in a roasting pan and cover liberally with water.  roast, uncovered, until chicken is tender on top about 24 hours.  drain well, turning after the first hour for best results.  in a small bowl, with a mortar and pestle or a coffee grinder, crush onion with a tablespoon of salt.  in a large bowl, beat the oats with the white sugar, tea, tamari, sugar, instant coffee, chili powder, and mustard mustard powder.  add to the onion mixture and let the mixture infuse for a few minutes until it becomes creamy.  the longer the mixture absorbs the mixture, the better the quality.  transfer mixture to plastic storage containers.  combine the orange juice, tamari, sugar, lime juice, tamari, and mustard powder in a bowl.  heat 1 tbsp of the oil in the bottom of a skillet or griller.  add chopped onion and saute until golden and slightly browned, about 5 minutes.  add diced chicken and cook over medium heat another 510 minutes or until the meat is no longer pink.  let the chicken rest, covered, for 5 minutes.  remove the chicken and keep warm in the oven.  taste the flavors and add salt, pepper, and tequila if you wish.  garnish with slivered almonds, if desired.

Random Ingredients: italian sausage,chili powder,bean sprout,nacho cheese,red glace cherry,hazelnut,almond meal,egg noodle
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup hazelnut flavored almond meal | 1 can whole roasted roasted whole beans sprouts | 1/2 cup shredded italian sausage | 1 egg, beaten | 1/4 cup sliced almonds | 1/4 cup sliced red glace cherry | 1/2 cup shredded chocolate-flavor italian blend cheese ( or regular ) | 1/3 cup margarine | 1 1/2 cups shredded cooked alton green beans or 1 1/2 cups green bean strips
Recipe Instructions: in a bowl, combine almonds, sausage, eggs, almonds and cherry.  mix in cheesed beans, nuts and glace berries.  mix well.  form into 3 inch noodles.  spray a 15  16 jelly roll pan or jelly roll pan with nonstick cooking spray.  heat the oven to 350 degrees f.  coat the bottom of the pan with sesame oil in several places, then dip each noodle into the hot oil and cook until golden brown on each side, 20 to 25 minutes.  serve hot, garnished with chocolate and sliced almonds.
Recipe Titile: Spicy Sausage and Chocolate Fried Noodles with Hazelnut Nut Dressing

Random Ingredients: rocket,chili pepper,peanut oil,lamb,cream mushroom soup,kernel corn,coconut milk
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons peanut oil | 2 lbs leg of lamb, cut into strips | 3 tablespoons chili pepper, to taste | 3 cups coconut milk | 12 ounces medium cream of mushroom soup | 3 cups whole kernel corn, drained | 1/2 cup chopped peanuts ( optional ) ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: combine all ingredients in a large saucepan.  cook about 10 minutes, stirring halfway through cooking time, until smooth.  serve over cooked meat, onion, and potato, accompanied with chili pepper, coconut milk and corn.  garnish with peanuts.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can black beans, rinsed | 1 -2 tablespoon cooking oil | 1 can diced tomatoes | 1 can whole canned tomatoes with liquid | 8 ounces black olives | 1 can tomatoes with liquid | 1/2 cup coarsely crushed pecorino cheese ( you should use cheddar ) | salt and pepper ( to taste ) | 1 tablespoon chili powder | 2 tablespoons cinnamon | 1 jar roasted and peeled tomatoes
Recipe Instructions: heat the oil in a large nonstick pan over medium heat.  when oil is hot, add the drained beans, tomato juice and olives.  stir and cover the pan completely, cooking for an hour or so until liquid is absorbed and the beans are thoroughly heated.  do not over cook.  remove from pan when liquid has absorbed and pour into a large bowl.  stir in the cheddar and salt and pepper.  divide into equal quarters and sprinkle with chili powder.  add diced tomato juice.  sprinkle with nutmeg or fresh ground black pepper.  cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.  when ready to serve, spoon tomatoes into a serving bowl or bowl with a spoon.  toss remaining canned olives with the tomatoes until well mixed and coated.

Ingredient Phrases: 8 slices white bread : | 9 slices sausages ( thin slices are fine, i use 9 slices ) | 3/4 cup sour cream | 2/3 cup tomato paste | 12 ounces ground auerkraut | 4 cups thinly sliced savoy cabbage
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees.  cut bread slices diagonally into thin strips and set aside.  in a large bowl, mix together sour cream, tomato paste, auerkraut, savoy cabbage, sausage, and sausages.  spoon tomato mixture over bread.  wrap in aluminum foil and chill until needed.  arrange 2 teaspoons of mixture on each of the 4 slices of bread and top each with 13 teaspoon of cheese.
Recipe Titile: Crusty Sauerkraut Dip with Tostitos & Ajillo Roja Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 ounce plain greek yogurt, at room temperature | 4 tablespoons sugar | 1 tablespoon hot chili powder | salt | white wine | 3 tablespoons unflavored gelatin | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 1/2 cup yogurt, at room temperature | 1/4 cup chicken broth | 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into chunks | 1/2 cup chopped fresh snow peas | 6 garlic cloves, chopped | 1 teaspoon chili powder | 8 ounces shredded baguette
