Recipe Instructions: in large glass baking dish, whisk yogurt with sugar.  in a small bowl, cream cheese, yogurt, hot chili powder, salt, white wine, and gelatin until smooth.  in another bowl, whisk chicken and snow peas into yogurt mixture until thoroughly blended.  in large bowl, whisk chicken broth, yogurt and butter.  set aside.  melt 2 tablespoons oil in large skillet over medium heat.  add chicken and snow peas.  stir in garlic.  season with chili powder.  add chicken and snow peas.  stir in yogurt mixture.  cover, reduce heat to mediumlow, and simmer until chicken is tender about 20 minutes.  remove pan from heat, and cool to room temperature 30 minutes.  combine reserved chicken broth and yogurt mixture in a shallow plate.  refrigerate until set, about 1 hour.  place baguette chunks in a large bowl.  stir in garlic and chili powder.  top with reserved chicken broth and yogurt mixture.  spoon mixture onto baguette slices.  top with shredded chicken.  bake at 350f degrees for 15 minutes, until golden brown and crispy.
Recipe Titile: Chicken With Yogurt and Black Pepper Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup marsala wine | 1/2 cup grand marnier | 2 tablespoons allspice berries | salt and pepper | 12 ounces boneless sirloin steaks, cut into thin rounds | 16 ounces unsweetened graham crackers ( any cheese ) | 2 bottles low-fat buttermilk | 4 cups butter, softened | 2 cups low-fat butter, melted
Recipe Instructions: in a small sauce pan over medium heat, combine the marsala wine, grand marnier, allspice berries, salt, and pepper.  stir.  remove from heat.  set aside.  heat the oven to 450f.  butter the top of the saut pan with butter.  lightly saut the top of the sausage over medium heat until goldenbrown.  remove from heat.  place the sausage between two sheets of waxed paper.  arrange half the sausages in the bottom of the pan.  place one of the sausages in the middle of the pan.  spread half the filling over the base of the sausages.  spread the remaining sausage over the sausages.  spoon the filling over the sausages.  cover the sausages with the other layer of sausages.  pour the butter over the sausages.  cover with aluminum foil.  bake, partially covered, for 45 minutes, or until done.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 ripe tart apple, peeled, cored, and thinly sliced | 1 orange, juice of | 2 tablespoons lemon juice | 1 tablespoon fresh oregano, minced | 1 cup prepared tahini | 1 cup apple juice | 2 tomatoes with wedges | 6 lettuce, sliced | 1/4 cup black olives, chopped
Recipe Instructions: place tart apple, orange juice, lemon juice, oregano, tahini, apple juice, tomatoes, lettuce, and olives into a slow cooker i recommend the 2quart way cookbook.  pour remaining juice, tahini mixture and juice to the slow cooker and mix.  cover and cook on high for 20 to 25 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 large egg yolks | 2 tablespoons peanut butter | 6 cups all-purpose flour | 1/4 cup granulated sugar | 1 teaspoon baking powder | 1 teaspoon baking soda | 1/2 cup vegetable oil | 2 cups vegetable oil | 2 egg yolks | 2 tablespoons powdered sugar | 1 cup lard or 1 cup shortening, melted
Recipe Instructions: in a bowl, combine yolks and peanut butter.  in a medium size food processor, combine flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, vegetable oil and 1 cup of sugar ; process until finely ground.  mix in egg yolk mixture alternately with egg yolk mixture.  beat dry ingredients until well blended.  pour in dry ingredients, and process until smooth.  pour batter into greased 9x13in.  baking dish ; bake at 350 for 35 minutes or until golden brown.  in a shallow glass or plastic baking dish, combine egg yolk mixture and vegetable oil ; cover with plastic wrap ; leave 1 - 12 hours.  bake until thickened, about 20 minutes.  remove from oven.  remove plastic wrap ; peel, thinly slice with a cookie cutter.  to prepare lasagna, combine 3 cups of cold margarine or shortening and  cup sugar ; beat until smooth.  spread 14 cup of filling over the bottom of the prepared baking dish.  add 13 of the lasagna mixture to the bottom layer of  cup filling.  fold up the center layer and press edges to seal.  pour lasagna mixture evenly over top.  repeat with the remaining lasagna and filling.  cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

Random Ingredients: pork chop,cilantro leaf,irish whiskey,chicken bouillon cube,beet
Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons butter, at room temperature | 2 -3 lbs chicken chops or 2 -3 lbs pork chops, cut in 1/2-inch cubes | 2 stalks celery ribs, cut up | 2 onions, cut into 1/4-inch cubes | 3/4 cup dried cranberries | 1/2 cup lemon juice | 3 cups chicken bouillon cubes, divided | 1/2 bunch fresh thyme | 1 can sweet red or ( 10 ounce ) can sweet green chappatis, with liquid | 2 cups cranberries, crushed ( canned cranberries do not count in the recipe ) | 1/2 cup carrot, peeled, cut into 1/4-inch rounds | 1/4 cup celery rib, cut into 1/4-inch rounds | 1 cup carrot, peeled, cut into 1-inch rounds | 1/4 cup pumpkin, peeled, cut into 3/4-inch rounds | salt and pepper | 4 tablespoons dried oregano | 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
Recipe Instructions: melt butter in a 4 to 6quart slow cooker.  add chops, celery, onions and celery.  saute until tender, about 15 minutes.  add cranberries, lemon juice, bouillon cubes, thyme, cumin, carrots, celery and pumpkin.  simmer 5 hours.  add remaining ingredients, and cook 5 more hours ; stir occasionally.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups whole wheat flour | 1/2 cup green peas | 1 cup semisweet dry sherry | 1/8 teaspoon sweet sherry
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 400 degrees f 200 degrees c.  butter a 9x13inch baking dish.  combine whole wheat flour, green peas, semisweet sherry, and sweet sherry in a large mixing bowl.  in a separate small mixing bowl toss together green peas mixture, green peas, and sherry.  pour batter into prepared baking dish.  bake in preheated oven until puffed and golden, about 25 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can white hominy, drained | 2 bananas, sliced | 1 orange, quartered lengthwise | 1 can sweetened condensed coconut milk | 5 tablespoons dark chocolate, melted
Recipe Instructions: combine sweetened condensed coconut milk and dark chocolate in a saucepan ; stir in egg yolk mixture and bring to a simmer.  reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer until chocolate is melted and mixture reaches desired consistency, about 10 minutes.  remove from heat.  add egg whites and chocolate and stir with a fork until all the whites are set.  serve sprinkled with reserved chocolate.

Random Ingredients: meatball,red pasta sauce,parmesan cheese,black soy sauce,peach half,white kidney bean,pecan,coconut
Ingredient Phrases: 1 package frozen chopped pecans | 1 can diced white kidney beans | 1 can coconut cream | 1 can low-fat cream | 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese | 1 1/2 cups grated smoked paprika | 1 can white kidney beans, drained | 1 cup uncooked and crushed pineapple chunks
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  spread pecans on a baking sheet and set aside.  in a large large saucepan, cook white kidney beans in the microwave for 15 minutes or until beans are tender, remove from heat and set aside to cool.  in a blender, combine the coconut cream, cream sauce, paprika, and half of the cheese.  blend until smooth.  place in a resealable plastic bag, and refrigerate overnight.  heat a small nonstick skillet over mediumhigh heat ; cook and stir half of the pecans in the skillet until browned, about 5 minutes.  spoon 1 cup mixture in the center of the peas.  wrap in wax paper ; chill 8 hours.  stir white kidney beans, macaroni, and pineapple into the beans.  pour sauce over pecans in hot skillet.  mix in crushed pineapple.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 lb fresh cornflour | 2 tablespoons cornflour, melted | nonstick cooking spray
Recipe Instructions: mix together corn flour, cornflour, melted cornflour, and salt and pepper and roll into small balls.  place on baking sheet and roast for 2025 minutes until crisp and golden.  set aside.  in skillet, melt remaining butter.  brush over surface of tortillas and sprinkle with cornflour mixture.

Ingredient Phrases: 8 ounces brie cheese or 8 ounces monterey jack cheese | 1/2 large carrot, peeled and shredded | 2 -3 tablespoons red enchilada sauce | 1/2 cup green onion, chopped | 1/2 cup green enchilada sauce | 2 tablespoons vegetable stock
Recipe Instructions: in a medium size saucepan, melt the oil over low heat and add the beef.  cook for about 7 minutes remove from pan and set aside.  layer the remaining ingredients together in an earthenware dish on top of the beef layer and sprinkle in the green onions.  add the green onions  sauce.  add the soup in a stream.  bring mixture to a boil for 2 minutes.  lower the heat to medium and slowly pour in the soup.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lemons, sliced horizontally into thin rings, then halved lengthwise
Recipe Instructions: in a bowl, mash the lemons and add as much salt as you wish, and let it sit for a few minutes.  dont over mash.  if that is not the best flavor, use a fork.  add lemon juice and a pinch of cardamom seeds.  mix again, then add salt.  cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight and serve chilled.

Ingredient Phrases:
2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 1/2 inch thick | 2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger | 1/4 cup all-purpose flour | 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, room temp.
    - use | 4 tablespoons vegetable oil | 4 slices stale bread | 3 cups shredded cabbage, divided | 1 bottle stout beer | 1 teaspoon red chili powder
Recipe Instructions: saut the chicken in the 3 tbsp oil for 5 minutes over mediumhigh heat and add the ginger and flour.  reduce the heat to medium and cook until the chicken is brown and crispy and the flour is dissolved, 1 to 2 minutes.  meanwhile, toast the bread slices in the oven at 425f for 1530 minutes or until golden, about 10 minutes.  meanwhile, toast the 2 tbsp butter in a large skillet over medium heat and saut the cabbage for about 4 minutes or until caramelized but still firm, just to lightly brown.  remove from the heat and let cool.  stir the beer and chili powder into the bread layer and top with the chicken.  serve with the mustard and crisp bread.  garnish with parsley.

Random Ingredients: lime juice,onion powder,bicarbonate soda,ice cube,turmeric powder,plain flour,cumin seed
Ingredient Phrases: 8 tablespoons plain flour | 2 teaspoons ground cumin seeds | 2 teaspoons ground coriander seeds | 2 teaspoons turmeric powder | 1 tablespoon sugar | 1 tablespoon garlic powder | 1 tablespoon sugar | 1 lime, juice of | 1 tablespoon cumin seed | 3 fresh coriander leaves, finely chopped | 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 2 pints fresh coriander leaves, finely chopped | 1 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger
Recipe Instructions: combine flour, cumin seeds, coriander and turmeric in a bowl.  add salt, turmeric powder and sugar and let marinate 20 minutes.  in a separate mixing bowl, beat the lime juice and fresh lime.  mix in cinnamon, corriander leaves, cinnamon stick and dried cumin seeds, adding more spices and spices if necessary.  divide dough in equal parts and roll out to approximately 18 circle.  with a rolling pin or cookie cutter, cut out 8 circles of dough and place 12 inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet.  flatten each circle with a fork.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  lightly oil cookie sheet and line bottom and center with parchment paper.  place a teaspoonful into each circle.  bip each circle firmly in the dough, being careful to not poke with the fork.  place each circle on the cookie sheet.  bake in preheated oven until lightly browned.  do not uncover and bake for 15 minutes longer.  remove from oven and let stand for 10 minutes before cutting into slices.

Ingredient Phrases: 125 g plain nonfat yogurt | 1/4 cup butter | 200 g bananas, mashed | 1 1/2 teaspoons harissa | 225 g self-rising flour
Recipe Instructions: mix yogurt, butter and banana in small bowl until smooth.  shape mixture into golfball sized squares by folding dough in half.  place on lightly greased baking sheet and bake 30 to 40 minutes.  cool on wire rack.  store in an airtight container at room temperature until serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons chopped yellow squash | 1/2 cup grated red pepper flakes | 1/2 lb white onion, finely diced | 4 tablespoons sugar | 2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar | 1 teaspoon honey | 1 tablespoon honey | 1/2 teaspoon freshly cracked red pepper flakes | 1 garlic clove, minced
Recipe Instructions: saute onion in saute pan for 1 minute.  add sugar and vinegar and cook until just set.  stir in honey, honey and red pepper flakes.  add garlic, stir often.  stir until well blended.  pour into 9x13 baking dish.  sprinkle top with crushed red pepper flakes.  cover and marinate in fridge for 1 hour.  preheat oven to 350 degrees.  grease large baking dish.  bake, uncovered 20 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon portobello mushrooms | 1 can spanish onions, drained | 2 tablespoons caraway seeds | 2 -3 tablespoons grated fresh spanish-style onion
Recipe Instructions: in a small skillet over medium heat, cook the mushrooms until tender, 1520 minutes.  stir them in with the onions and caraway ; cook until they become slightly browned, about 2030 minutes.  set aside to cool slightly.  scald the portobello mixture with the mushrooms back in the skillet until all ingredients are heated but still moist, about 30 seconds ; transfer to a bowl.  spoon 2 tablespoons of the portobello mixture onto a platter ; top with 1 tablespoon of the onions and grated cheese.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 - 3/4 cup fresh limeade concentrate | 1/2 cup apple cider | 1/2 large fresh garlic | 1 teaspoon apple cider
Recipe Instructions: whisk together first 5 ingredients in a medium sauce pan.  cook over medium heat until thickened and bubbling, stirring occasionally | cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer on mediumlow heat for 1 hour, until thickened.  strain liquid to remove all sediment.  transfer chilled liquid to a serving bowl containing a lid.  garnish with a handful of finely chopped apple, if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 pound beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes | 1/4 cup instant coffee, divided | 1/8 cup long-grain rice, cooked and drained ( or your favorite brand ) | 1 cup dark soy sauce
Recipe Instructions: bring beef, instant coffee, and rice to a boil over medium heat in a saucepan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the beef is forktender, about 3 minutes ; remove from heat ; set aside.  pour rice into an 11x7inch baking dish ; set aside.  pour reserved beef broth from the meat into the baking dish.  bring the beef to a boil over high heat in a large saucepan ; stir in the soy sauce.  spoon the reserved beef broth into the rice dish.  cover, and simmer until the dish is completely dry and water is absorbed, about 30 to 40 minutes.  remove beef from heat ; cover the dish with aluminum foil for easier cleanup.

Random Ingredients: shrimp,mango chutney,peanut,fennel seed,coffee,pork,green cardamom pod,white vinegar
Ingredient Phrases: 3 pork loin | 10 ounces shrimp ( or other large shrimp ) | 1 1/2 tablespoons brown sugar, packed | 1 tablespoon green cardamom pod | 1 teaspoon fennel seed | 1 teaspoon mango chutney | 1 teaspoon white vinegar | 2 ounces chutney | 4 ounces mango chutney
Recipe Instructions: rinse and pat dry pork chops and cook pork with tongs for about 15 minutes.  place pork chops into a large mixing bowl.  combine sugar, green cardamom and fennel seed.  add chutney, vinegar and chutney ; mix well.  add pork, mixing well.  pour mix into a 2quart mold and refrigerate until set.  when ready to serve, fill with sliced chutney and serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases:
1/3 cup salsa ( i like my milder sour cream ) | 1/2 cup sour cream | 1/2 cup mexican blend chili powder | 2 tablespoons dry sardines chile powder ( or more ) | 1 tablespoon cumin | 0.
    -5 can tomato sauce | 1/2 cup crushed red onion | 1/2 cup diced green chilies | 1/2 cup diced white pepper ( optional ) | 2 teaspoons chopped pimiento ( optional ) | 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
Recipe Instructions: in a small pot bring everything to a boil.  add salsa, sour cream, chiles, onion, green chilies and white pepper.  simmer 5 min.  serve with tortilla chips or rice for dipping.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups cubed rye bread | 2 tablespoons sliced peeled peeled peeled peeled apples | 3/4 cup apple juice | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh gingerroot | 1 dash cayenne pepper to taste
Recipe Instructions: place soaked bread in mediumsized bowl.  add apple juice, gingerroot, cayenne pepper, and cider vinegar.  let stand 12 hour.  meanwhile, preheat oven to 400 degrees f 200 degrees c.  pour 14 cup salsa into a medium bowl and spread with 12 of the bread.  sprinkle another 14 cup salsa on top of each bread, then top with remaining bread.  drizzle apple slices with salsa and then serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 cups currants | 1 cup honey | 1/2 cup confectioners'sugar | 1 1/2 cups water | 1 tablespoon cocoa powder | 2 tablespoons margarine
Recipe Instructions: pour currants in a mediumsized bowl and let stand until dissolved, about 1 minute.  stir in honey.  stir in the confectioners sugar and water.  stir the cocoa powder into the currants until moistened ; set aside.  melt margarine in saucepan over medium heat.  stir in milk until smooth, about 3 minutes.  gradually blend into currant mixture.  place over moderate heat until mixture foams, about 1 minute.  remove from heat and let cool slightly.  to assemble frosting, arrange cake, in a single layer, in a 9 inch springform pan.  cover and chill in the refrigerator 1 - 12 hours.  invert cake onto a wire rack.  garnish with confectioners sugar icing and chocolate chips.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb firm to tender tofu | 1 lb firm firm to tender thai peppers ( about 6 ounces each, or use jalapeno peppers, chilies, onions if using ) | 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar | 1/2 cup chili sauce | 1/2 cup toasted sesame seeds, or to garnish
Recipe Instructions: cut tofu into quarters.  add to a large bowl and top with vinegar, chili sauce, and sesame seeds.  heat to boiling and cook until tofu is just tender, about 5 minutes.  remove from heat and stir in soybeans and sesame seeds.

Random Ingredients: wheat spaghetti,red wine vinegar,asparagus spear,italian parsley,water chestnut,italian sausage
Ingredient Phrases: 6 whole wheat spaghetti | 3 lbs asparagus spears ( about 1-inch thick ) | 6 tablespoons red wine vinegar | 3/4 cup water | 1 teaspoon fresh basil leaf | 2 tablespoons italian parsley, minced | 1 pound asparagus spears, ends trimmed and cut into 1 inch chunks
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil.  cook asparagus in boiling water for 1 minute ; drain and reserve 1 cup liquid.  mix together the red wine vinegar and water in a medium bowl.  set aside.  add asparagus and vinegar mixture to the saucepan.  bring to a boil, then reduce heat to mediumlow, and simmer for 1 minute.  toss asparagus and sauce with parsley ; season with salt and pepper.  toss with remaining sauce.  serve with pasta and a few salad greens.
Recipe Titile: Asparagus Asparagus, Beef and Asparagus Soup

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup dark rum | 1 tablespoon finely grated fresh ginger | 1 garlic clove, minced | 4 medium onions, julienned | 2 cans chicken broth | 4 lbs pork tenderloins, trimmed and cut into 3/4 inch thick slices | 1 teaspoon coarse sugar
Recipe Instructions: combine the rum, ginger, garlic, onion, broth, and pork in a heavybottomed saucepan.  bring to a bare boil, simmer uncovered, until the pork is falling and no longer pink and falling apart, about 20 minutes.  remove pork ; discard bones and fat.  return pork to the saucepan, cover and reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer, stirring occasionally, until nearly tender, about 9 hours.  transfer pork to a plate and allow to cool completely.  to serve, remove pork to a platter, reserving fat in pan.  transfer pork to platter ; drizzle with reserved fat and return pork to saucepan.  whisk sugar into the pork mixture.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon ginger paste | 1/2 cup diced cooked chicken breast | 3 tablespoons white wine | 1/8 teaspoon vanilla pod | 1/4 cup unsweetened coconut milk, smooth | 1/4 cup banana | 1 tablespoon potato starch or 1 tablespoon low sodium soy paste | 1 lemon, zest of ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: mix ginger and the chicken and place in the top of a buttered 9 spring form pan.  allow the ginger to marinate for 12 hour.  heat the white wine in the oven and cook the skin side up till it starts to boil.  this happens after 2 minutes.  remove from the oven and stir in the coconut milk.  reduce the heat to medium and add the banana and mashed potato starch.  cook for 1015 minutes.  this tastes best when the skin is white.  add the lemon zest and lemon peel if using if using.  reduce the heat to low and add the ginger paste before cooking until it thickens.  you may also add the lemon zest if using.  pour the mixture over the chicken and bake for 2530 minutes until the skin is golden brown and cooked through.  garnish with powdered sugar if desired.

Random Ingredients: vegetable,rigatoni pasta,lamb,great northern bean,taco seasoning mix
Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs lamb, cut into cubes | 1 lb ground beef | 1/2 cup water | 2 garlic cloves, crushed | 2 cups chopped great northern beans ( or you can substitute the dried beans ) | 1 packet taco seasoning mix ( or your favorite packet ) | 1 package rigatoni pasta
Recipe Instructions: preparation.  brown meat in large skillet over medium heat.  drain and set aside.  bring water to boil in large skillet over medium heat.  add garlic, beans and taco seasoning mix.  mix well until beans are soft and the liquid has reduced significantly.  when liquid has cooked down to a smooth consistency, add a bit more water if necessary to make dough a smooth mass.  punch dough down again and form into a log ; it should be about 8 inches long and 5 inches in diameter.  if you like better meat, you can add a little more flour to form a soft dough.  form meat into round patties about 12 inch in diameter ; remove to a large plate.  cover and keep warm if you are using a rotisserie.  to make stuffing.  remove 12 cup hot water from the bottom of the pan with a spatula ; add the beef ; drain excess water.  mix together the meat, water and bean water.  cover and let simmer for 25 minutes.  preheat broiler.  remove meat from heat ; remove plastic wrap and wrap as much as you wish.  broil about 9 inch above middle of flame on high heat until meat reaches halfway up the sides of pan.  remove with slotted spoon to cutting board ; cut meat into bitesize portions.  transfer to a cutting board and cut again, cutting sides down.  cut each pattie into 4 pieces.  sprinkle beef with salt and pepper.  cook until beef is cooked through, about 3 minutes.  transfer beef to cutting board and sprinkle on flour to coat.  chill 1 hour.  spoon reserved cooking water from skillet and return it to saucepan.  heat to boiling, then reduce heat to mediumlow.  when mixture boils, add pasta and toss with reserved sauce.  serve as is.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 lb beet, peeled and cut into chunks | 1/2 cup raisins, plus extra for garnish ( or 2-3 tablespoons ) | 2 teaspoons dry mustard
Recipe Instructions:
blanch carrots at 350 degrees for 45 minutes, or until very soft and easily flaked with a fork.  stir in the raisins and mustard.  chill for at least 30 minutes, at least overnight.  serve in salad bowls.  enjoy                                                                                    

 ## Cooking instructions ##
 for the dressing  combine all the dressing ingredients  refrigerate until used.

Ingredient Phrases: 2/3 cup unsweetened coconut milk | 8 tablespoons vegetable shortening | 1 tablespoon sugar | 1 teaspoon ground coriander | 1/2 teaspoon salt ( or to taste ) | 1 lb firm puff pastry, cut into 1-inch pieces | 2 tablespoons chopped garlic | 1/8 cup sliced fresh mango | 2 cups shredded cooked rice, or as needed ( optional ) | 1 -2 tablespoon fresh coarsely chopped fresh coriander
Recipe Instructions: heat 2 tablespoons of the vegetable shortening in a saucepan over mediumhigh heat.  add sugar and toss until mixture begins to caramelize, about 20 seconds.  add half of the coconut milk, followed by one cup of the shortening and whisk until the shortening melts.  mix the remaining 2 tablespoons of shortening, 2 teaspoons vegetable shortening, and half of the mango into the saucepan and mix until smooth.  remove from heat.  spread half of the tofu mixture on the 1 inch of the pastry dough in the bottom of a 9inchsquare or doublelayered baking dish.  fold up the flan so that it hangs from the edge.  press firmly into the bottom of the prepared pan.  repeat with remaining pastry and tofu.  using a pastry brush, paint evenly over the tofu mixture.  refrigerate until set, about 1 hour.  preheat oven to 450 degrees f 230 degrees c.  brush a castiron skillet with 2 tablespoons of vegetable shortening.  cook and stir the tortilade over low heat until the oil begins to brown, 20 to 25 minutes.  using a slotted spoon, transfer the cooked tortilade to a plate.  drain the oil from the pan.  remove the pan from the heat.  spoon the hot oil on top of the tortilade.  bake for a thin, brown, about 2 minutes.  drain any remaining oil from the pan.  serve with the remaining mango sauce.  to make the coconutflan  whisk together the reserved cooking coconut milk, half the rice, 6 tablespoons of coriander, and 1 - 12 teaspoons salt in a medium bowl.  whisk in the mango sauce, 3 tablespoons of the lime juice, remaining 12 teaspoons sugar, and remaining teaspoon of salt until smooth.  add the remaining coriander, and toss with 1 - 12 teaspoons of the lime juice mixture until smooth ; stir with a spatula until combined.  spoon evenly over the hot flan, leaving just enough space between.  top with the coriander mixture when the flan is completely set and slightly warm, and drizzle with some chopped fresh cilantro.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/3 cups dried danish herbs, washed, chopped | 4 tablespoons cornstarch | 1 cup fresh parsley leaves
Recipe Instructions: stir the dried herbs with 1 tbs cornstarch in a small bowl until they are dissolved.  mix in 1 tbs cornstarch with a fork until the mixture is smooth and liquid, using 1tbs as necessary.  stir in 1 tbs parsley, 2 teaspoons dry oregano, or about 1tbs parsley leaves, 1 tsp dried basil, and a teaspoon warm water.  stir with a fork until thoroughly combined.  shape the mixture into a tortilla or bread, cut side down, and grill for about 40 minutes or until desired degree of doneness.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup coconut cream | 1/4 cup sugar | 1 egg, beaten | 2/3 cup vegetable oil | 1 small green onion, sliced and separated into rings | 10 ounces egg noodles ( small pasta ) | 8 ounces egg noodles ( small pasta ) | 2 teaspoons fresh dill ( chopped ) | 1 tablespoon fresh lemon peel ( grated ) | 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce
Recipe Instructions: to make the egg noodles  in a large bowl, beat the coconut cream with the sugar and the egg.  add the egg and stir just until blended.  season with soy sauce, lemon peel and dill.  add the minced green onions, soy sauce and the shredded egg noodles.  season well.  cover and refrigerate overnight.  cook the egg noodles, in the refrigerator, for one hour or until crisp.  to make the egg noodles  combine the cornstarch and sugar in a small bowl ; slowly beat the egg mixture into the cornstarch mixture until it holds together.  refrigerate until cooled.

Random Ingredients: egg noodle,vermouth,gruyere cheese,chocolate syrup,cream chicken soup,broth
Ingredient Phrases: 5 ounces sugar | 3 ounces cream of chicken soup | 1 teaspoon vanilla extract | 1/4 teaspoon vanilla ice cream | 1 lb unsweetened chocolate syrup | 1 package cream of chicken soup | 8 ounces dried vermouth | 2 cups shredded gruyere cheese
Recipe Instructions: put all ingredients in a medium bowl, then divide between greased 9inch pie casseroles.  bake 30  40 minutes  depending on oven you will need to add a little more cheese on top of the last 10 to 12 minutes of baking.  place in refrigerator to cook.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 cups sifted sushi rice | 1 cup finely chopped spring onion | 1 teaspoon finely chopped coriander | 2 teaspoons sugar | 1 teaspoon finely chopped mint | 1/2 teaspoon pureed curry paste | 1 package frozen chopped pecans | 1 cup light browned muslin or 1/2 cup other seafood rice, thawed and drained | 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
Recipe Instructions: in a small bowl, stir together the sushi rice, spring onions, coriander, sugar, and mint.  stir in curry paste and mix until the sugar dissolves.  mix in peas and muslin.  heat remaining oil in a wok or skillet over mediumhigh heat.  when hot, stir in lemon juice.  cook rice until rice begins to brown, stirring occasionally.  transfer to a platter.  serve warm or cold.

Random Ingredients: granny smith apple,korean chili flake,jalapeno pepper,mango,bicarbonate soda,puff pastry,coconut milk,curry powder
Ingredient Phrases:
1 package puff pastry, thawed if frozen and thawed | 2 packages mangoes ( about 1/3 cup.
    - or frozen ) | 1/4 cup korean chili flakes, chopped fine | 1 large granny smith apple, chopped fine | 1/4 cup coconut milk | 1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda | 1/2 teaspoon curry powder | 4 teaspoons baking powder | 2 teaspoons mixtures sour cream ( i use low fat maple syrup )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350f set an oven rack about 5 to 6 inches from the heat source for the pastry.  line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper, and spray with nonstick spray, making sure no sheets come up the sides of the sheet.  line the bottom of the baking sheet with parchment.  in a large bowl, combine mango, korean chilli flakes, apple, coconut milk, bicarbonate of soda, baking powder, sour cream, and sour cream.  toss to combine well.  bake in preheated oven for 1520 minutes, or until crust is light brown and apples are tender.  serve warm with mashed potatoes.

Random Ingredients: clove,pineapple,four cheese mexican,almond extract,ginger root,green chili pepper,pie shell,corn cob
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup finely chopped peeled fresh pineapple | 1/4 cup finely chopped peeled peeled slivered almonds | 1 teaspoon almond extract ( about 2 teaspoons ) | 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger root | 3/4 lb pie shell, baked about 3 hours or until firm, firm but firm to the touch | 4 slices four-cheese mexican blend ( about 4 large ) | 1 1/2 - 2 cups corn kernels or 1 1/2-2 cups any other small corn, kernels removed and rinsed, drained, reserving juice | 1/4 cup toasted grated four-cheese mexican blend
Recipe Instructions: in a medium saucepan heat 1 teaspoon of the almond extract and 1 teaspoon of the crushed ginger.  saute about 3 minutes.  add the pineapple, slivered almonds, almonds, and almond extract mixture and cook over low heat covered, stirring often, until evenly browned, about 30 minutes.  drain the pineapple liquid.  transfer the pineapple mixture to a large bowl.  in a small bowl combine the corn and the remaining 2 teaspoons of ground ginger.  mix well.  transfer the mixture to a pie pan and bake in a 350 oven for 40 minutes, or until the filling is nicely browned.  remove the pie from the oven and cut each serving in half.

Random Ingredients: plum tomato,dark chocolate,parmigiano reggiano cheese,cassava,red currant jelly,trout fillet
Ingredient Phrases: 1 package small tart fillets, cut diagonally into 1/2 inch cubes | 1/2 cup chopped fresh cherries | 1/3 cup cherry, with stems, diced small | 6 ounces plum tomatoes, halved | 1 cup dark chocolate, coarsely chopped | 2 1/2 teaspoons sherry wine | 3/4 teaspoon grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese
Recipe Instructions: in a medium bowl, combine the chopped cherries, cherry, tomatoes, chocolate, sherry, parmigianoreggiano cheese and the reserved cherries.  mix well.  refrigerate for 30 minutes.  preheat the oven to 375 degrees f 190 degrees c.  in a large baking dish, layer the fillets ; top with the cherry mixture.  bake in the preheated oven until fillets are browned and crispy, about 45 minutes.  remove from the oven and transfer to a serving dish.  serve warm.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 teaspoons curry powder | 1 1/2 lbs beef stew meat | 1 garlic powder | 1/2 teaspoon ground coriander powder | 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder | 6 ounces sour cream | 1/2 cup coconut milk, well blended | 1 1/2 cups green peppers, diced
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into thin strips and brown in olive oil in skillet until the meat is browned and crispy.  add curry powder, ground coriander powder, cumin and the cream, mix well and simmer on low for 30 minutes or until thickened and sauce is thickened.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 slices bacon, cut in strips | 1 can chopped ripe tomatoes ( optional ) | 1 cup french bread, shredded ( about 1/2 cup ) | 1/2 cup sour cream | 1/2 cup low-fat milk | 1 can sliced ripe avocado | 1/4 cup chopped fresh lettuce | 4 drops soy sauce
Recipe Instructions: cook bacon at a medium heat until crisp, about 1 - 12 minutes.  to prepare the topping, break up the tomatoes.  slice each tomato slightly.  remove any seeds from the tomatoes.  stir in the bread, sour cream, milk, and sliced avocado.  top with the lettuce, soy sauce and a squeeze of sour cream if desired.

Random Ingredients: morton lite salt,cooking oil,chipotle pepper,cream asparagus soup,thyme
Ingredient Phrases:
cooking oil | 1/2 lb fresh fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces | 4 large cucumbers ( about 1 cup ) or 4 cups frozen frozen peeled tomatoes | 3/4 cup fresh basil, chopped | 2 tablespoons fresh thyme, chopped | 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, chopped | 1/4 teaspoon sugar | 2 teaspoons fresh lime juice, grated ( or 1/4 tsp.
    - grated ) | 4 cups plain sour cream | 3 tablespoons reduced-sodium chipotle peppers ( or to taste ) | 1 medium sized garlic clove, minced
Recipe Instructions: bring 3 qts.  of the salted cooking oil to a boil over high heat.  add the asparagus and cook for 5 minutes, skimming off any brown spots, remove from the pot.  discard stems.  in the same pan heat the cooking oil over moderately high heat.  add the asparagus and cook for 2 minutes, skimming off any brown spots.  in a blender or food processor pure the tomatoes, basil and thyme until smooth.  add the lemon juice, sugar, lime juice, sugar and salt, mixing well.  add the chilled chopped cucumber and cook for 5 minutes, skimming off any scum left on the bottom of the pan, until the asparagus wilts.  add the sour cream, chipotles, and garlic and mix well.  transfer to the plate and garnish with the chopped parsley if using.  refrigerate until cooled before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 tablespoons eggplants or 6 tablespoons eggplants | 1 sprig fresh thyme | 4 slices whole thyme sprigs
Recipe Instructions: slice eggplant lengthwise and in a single layer on a very clean surface using the knife.  peel the eggplant.  place them on plate with the eggplant skinside up, on another dish or plate, and keep them in the refrigerator.  grill the eggplant skinside down until very light brown, 4 to 5 hours.  cut the slices into 1 or 2 thin slices to serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 pint double cream | 3 tablespoons sugar | 1 bottle red wine vinegar | 1 teaspoon sugar
Recipe Instructions: combine sugar and vinegar in a pan and stir gently until sugar dissolves.  gradually pour the cream into the pan in a steady stream and whisk gently until it begins to stick to the sides of the pan.  continue whisking until the mixture boils but slightly bubbles.  serve with lemon rind, cherry and powdered sugar.

Random Ingredients: masa harina flour,vegetable stock,roast pork,self rising flour,basil leaf,veal,beer
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon vegetable stock | 1/2 lb roast pork, cut into 2-3 pieces | 3 cups self-rising flour | salt and pepper | 5 cups beer | 2 tablespoons masa harina flour | 2 tablespoons chili oil | 36 -48 boneless skinless veal cutlets | 1 small basil leaf, shredded
Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 350f.  sift the flour and salt together ; rub into the roast pork.  combine the beer, masa harina flour, chili oil and the remaining ingredients in the bottom of a slow cooker.  pour the mixture into the meat pan, and bring to the boil, then season with salt and pepper, allowing the mixture to be absorbed by the pork.  reduce the heat to low, cover and cook on high about 15 minutes or until the meat pulls apart easily.  remove the meat and keep warm.  to make the gravy place the sliced veal cutlets in the slow cooker ; sprinkle with chopped basil.  cook on high for 10 minutes or until they have turned pink when pierced with a fork.  the gravy can be made 3 days ahead, and refrigerated.  serve the meat gravy with the chicken.
Recipe Titile: Slow Cooker Beef and Pork Lamb Stewed in Beer

Ingredient Phrases: 5 fresh water chestnuts, chopped | 1 can baby spinach, drained, washed and patted dry | 4 cups fresh strawberries, chilled and cut in half | 1 tablespoon water chestnut puree | 3 cloves garlic, minced
Recipe Instructions: put all the ingredients into a blender with a touch of salt and pepper.  in a serving bowl, combine the chilled spinach with the frozen strawberries and water chestnuts to form a rough consistancy.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 9 ounces ground beef | 3 ripe avocados, mashed ( you 'll need 1 avocado if you're going to use this ) | 2 cups salsa, of your choice ( mexican style style ) | 1 packet taco seasoning mix, or more ( mexican spicy seasoning is our favourite )
Recipe Instructions: toast tortillas in a microwave on high for 10 minutes or until crisp on the bottom.  remove from microwave and let cool enough to handle, about 10 minutes while you are assembling the chips.  in a skillet, heat the ground beef and avocado lightly.  when the burger is slightly browned, remove and set aside.  mix salsa, taco seasoning mix, and taco meat evenly in the bottom of a 13 x 9 inches baking dish, and spread the beans evenly over the meat.  sprinkle the avocado layer evenly over the beans and the beans are evenly distributed, and spread the remaining taco meat mixture evenly around the beans, leaving a thin layer of taco meat.
Recipe Titile: The Best Taco Meatball and Chips!

Random Ingredients: yeast,beef stew meat,mix,farfalle pasta,chicken bouillon cube,olive,basil,italian seasoning
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 pounds beef stew meat or 1 1/2 pounds lamb, cut into 1-inch cubes | 1 tablespoon dried basil ( optional, italian thyme, oregano, parsley, mint ) | 2 teaspoons dried onion ( optional, italian basil, parsley, mint ) | 2 teaspoons dried minced garlic ( optional, italian thyme, oregano, parsley ) | 1 teaspoon dried italian seasoning | 1/2 teaspoon beef bouillon cube | 1/2 teaspoon dried basil
Recipe Instructions: place all ingredients in a large bowl over low heat and stir together well.  add enough water to cover and bring to a boil.  cover and simmer until meat is tender and flavors are infused, about 30 minutes.  remove meat from pot and reserve.  serve over warm pasta with a salad of mixed veggies, fresh vegetables and more olive.

Ingredient Phrases: 2/3 cup all-purpose flour | 1/2 teaspoon sea salt | 1 ounce dried chickpeas, rinsed and dried | 2 teaspoons dried harissa | 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1 tablespoon red pepper flakes | 1 ounce fresh lemon juice | 1/8 teaspoon garlic clove, minced | 1/2 teaspoon black pepper | 1/2 cup dried coarsely chopped peanuts | 2 cups farfalle pasta, cooked al dente | 1 medium eggplant, large cut into serving pieces | 1/4 cup of thinly sliced apricot
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, combine the flour, salt,  chickpeas, harissa, dijon, cinnamon and pepper flakes.  in a medium bowl, combine the lemon juice and garlic, and stir to blend.  in a small bowl, stir together the shrimp and the drained chickpeas ; set aside.  preheat an oven to 375f.  lightly oil a 9x13 baking dish.  in a small bowl, toss the feta sauce with the dried chickpeas.  repeat for the other ingredients until the feta sauce is completely combined.  pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish, and bake uncovered for 40 minutes or until top is tender and bubbly.  top with the eggplants, apricots, and the reserved drained chickpeas.  cover with foil and bake an additional 45 for 15 minutes or until the cheese has melted and the sauce has absorbed.  serve warm with a slice of avocado, if desired.
Recipe Titile: Low Fat Falafel With Pesto and Chickpeas

Ingredient Phrases: 8 tablespoons sunflower seeds | 2 tablespoons molasses | 2 teaspoons baking powder | 3/4 cup vegetable oil
Recipe Instructions: grind all ingredients except oil in a food processor with spices, adding water if you need to.  roll mixture into 4 balls.  heat oil in a wok until hot.  stir fry balls in oil and fry until golden brown.

Random Ingredients: yogurt,parmigiano reggiano cheese,szechuan bean sauce,jumbo pasta shell,ice water
Ingredient Phrases: 1 package thawed jumbo pasta shells | 1 cup ice water | 2/3 cup fresh grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese | 1/4 cup light yogurt
Recipe Instructions: cook noodles according to package instructions.  drain and set aside.  stir the jumbo into a bowl with 3 to 4 tablespoons of the ice water.  stir in the grated cheese.  stir in the yogurt.  divide mixture into 6 serving bowls, top with noodles and serve.
Recipe Titile: Cheese-Spiced Tomato Bolognese, Peppers and Szechuan Bean Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil | 1 package firm acorn artichoke hearts | 1 teaspoon dried tarragon leaves | 1/4 cup peanut butter | 1/4 cup coconut milk | 1 package frozen peeled and quartered tofu slices
Recipe Instructions: heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.  stir in the artichoke hearts ; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes.  pour into a bowl, and reserve.  in a small bowl, whisk the peanut butter, coconut milk, and tofu together.  pour the mixture into a blender puree the tofu sauce by pulsing a few times until smooth.  place tofu in a blender puree until smooth.  remove the tofu from the sauce in the blender with a slotted spoon, and scrape up any drippings.  stir the sauce into the tofu.

Random Ingredients: butternut squash,banana,yogurt,cardamom powder,water chestnut,iceberg lettuce,milk ricotta cheese,spice
Ingredient Phrases: 1 butternut squash, peeled, cut into about 1/8x1/4-inch pieces | 2 cups milk or 2 cups water | 6 slices ripe tomatoes | 1/2 cup sugar | 1 teaspoon baking powder | 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon | 1/2 teaspoon cardamom powder | 3/4 cup yogurt | 3/4 cup yogurt | 1 cup iceberg lettuce, shredded | 1/3 cup banana, diced | 1/3 cup water chestnut, diced
Recipe Instructions: combine squash, milk and water in a large saucepan.  bring to a boil over high heat, reduce heat, cover, reduce heat to low and simmer over medium heat, covered, stirring occasionally 1 hour.  remove from heat ; slice into 1 to 1 - 12 inch squares.  place cubed squash into a 9x13 inch casserole dish.  mix sugar, yogurt and yogurt mixture together in a bowl.  stir in frozen corn with marinara or frozen corn in the dish.  mix yogurt mixture with crushed iceberg lettuce and banana.  cover and refrigerate.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  in a nonstick skillet with a removable bottom, heat the margarita mix over medium high heat until bubbling, about 2 minutes.  remove from heat.  meanwhile, chop and mix strawberries and banana together in a small bowl ; add to skillet with crushed corn ; stir to combine.

Random Ingredients: five spice powder,spice rub,garam masala,spring green,yellow onion,port wine,green chili pepper
Ingredient Phrases: 2 -3 tablespoons five-spice rub | 1 yellow onion, diced | 2 green chili peppers, seeded and diced ( optional ) | 1 -2 green chile pepper, seeded and diced ( optional ) | 5 ml port wine or 5 ml other heavy red wine | 2 teaspoons ground cloves-garam masala
Recipe Instructions: mix all ingredients well for a creamy rub.  store in an airtight jar in air tight containers for up to one week.
Recipe Titile: Spiced Five Spice Sweet Wine Rub Mix

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lbs pork tenderloin, trimmed and cut into 1-inch cubes | 1 garlic clove, minced | 3 carrots, chopped | 1 celery, chopped | 2 tablespoons honey | 1/2 fresh lemon juice concentrate or 1/4 cup bottled lemon juice | 1/2 cup pillsbury cucumber, chopped | 1/8 teaspoon peppermint extract | 1/2 teaspoon lemon zest | 1/2 teaspoon mustard | 1/4 teaspoon ground pepper
Recipe Instructions: place all the ingredients into a large bowl.  pour the ingredients over the pork and season with salt and pepper.  cover and marinate the pork covered, in the refrigerator for 1 - 12 to 3 hours or overnight.  remove the pork from the marinade and refrigerate until the pork is well chilled, at least 5 hours.  remove the pork from the refrigerator and allow to stand in the refrigerator for another 24 hours or overnight.  if the pork is extremely tender, refrigerate for 3 hours in an airtight container until chilled.  if not, refrigerate at least another 3 hours before serving.  serve immediately.  the pork can be preroasted or baked before preparing the filling to use if you have not refrigerated.
Recipe Titile: Sweet and Sour BBQ Pork Filling With Cherry Tomatoes

Ingredient Phrases: 2 button mushrooms ( sliced horizontally ) | 1 serrano pepper ( sliced in thin strips )
Recipe Instructions: place the mushrooms in a large saucepan with enough water to cover.  cover to keep them from sticking together.  let water evaporate while you cook each mushroom, then remove one mushroom slice per person, leaving the bottom one to rest.  place the remaining sliced mushrooms onto the bottom of a pan.  use tongs to drop the mushroom slices, placing on top of each other, if necessary.  cover mushrooms with the sauce and top with the rest of the mushrooms.  cook for 10 more minutes, or until mushrooms are firm and the sauce has thickened.  sprinkle the top with crushed red pepper, if desired and serve with tortilla chips or your favorite salsa or chard sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 ounces salsamic vinegar | 2 1/2 tablespoons fresh parsley sprigs, chopped | 1/2 cup slivered almonds, toasted ( toasted and crushed or grated to taste ) or 1/2 cup slivered almonds, toasted and crushed or grated to taste ( toasted and crushed or grated to taste ) | 1 cup flaked glazed unsalted dry bread or 1 cup french bread or 1 cup plain bread, toasted and crushed or finely grated to taste | 1 garlic clove, minced
Recipe Instructions: combine dressing ingredients in a large bowl.  toss well.  chill and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 1/4 cups fresh mint, chopped ( i like a fresh-flavored mint ) | 1/2 cup chopped fresh coriander seeds | 1/2 cup chopped mint | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh hot peppermint extract | 1 tablespoon apple pie spice mix | 1 tablespoon ginger, chopped | 2 teaspoons sugar | 1 teaspoon asafoetida powder
Recipe Instructions: in medium bowl, mix together first 7 ingredients.  set aside while preparing crust and filling.  on medium low heat, mix together first 7 ingredients.  set aside until ready to cut.  on high heat, put together apple pie spice mix, ginger and sugar.  mix in asafoetida powder.  spread evenly into bottom of 9inch pie dish.  pour mixture evenly over crust.  bake in 325 degree oven for 30 minutes or till light golden brown.  remove and cool, for 5minutes, before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 5 sheets phyllo pastry | 1/4 cup irish whiskey, at room temperature | 10 ounces skirt steaks | chives ( garnish ) | sugar ( garnish )
Recipe Instructions: arrange phyllo sheets in a single layer on a baking sheet.  arrange steak steaks on top.  combine whiskey, skirt steak, chives and sugar in a small saucepan.  bring to a boil, then stir in the syrup, scraping up any lumps.  cover with a lid, reduce heat to medium, and simmer until thickened, approximately 35 minutes.  remove from heat, sprinkle with whiskey mixture.  cover and refrigerate for at least 14 hours or up to 2 days.  to serve, slice off steaks from phyllo sheets and scatter 1 tablespoon whiskey sauce on a piece of thawed pastry, arrange on a baking board, and serve with cocktail sauce and shaved cheese.
Recipe Titile: Irish Tea Rolls With Chives, Irish Whiskey and Sherry Tea

Random Ingredients: amaretto,beef chuck roast,peach,cooking sherry,hokkien noodle,rocket,stew meat,table salt
Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs boneless pork loin, cubed | 2 tablespoons table salt | 1 tablespoon fresh coarse white ground black pepper | 2 1/2 quarts dry sherry | 1 cup hot cooking sherry | 2 tablespoons sugar | 2 tablespoons canola oil | 2 lbs beef chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes | 6 celery stems, coarsely chopped | 1 cup finely chopped carrots | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh ginger | 2 teaspoons chopped fresh garlic cloves | 2 teaspoons kosher salt | 1 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper | 1 cup cooked hokkien noodle | 1/4 cup sliced fresh peach
Recipe Instructions: mix the sherry, sugar, canola oil, beef, celery, carrots, ginger, garlic, salt, black pepper, hokkien, and dried sherry.  place the pork in a 13x9inch baking dish.  cover and marinate at least 4 hours.  prepare a large bowl or platter.  place the pork in a large bowl.  cover with sauce and marinate at least 8 hours.  heat the pan over mediumhigh heat.  add the oil and stir to coat the meat with oil.  season with salt and pepper.  brown the meat in batches with the pan drippings about 4 minutes per side, then transfer to a plate and keep warm.  preheat the oven to 325 degrees f.  set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source.  bake beef until browned on all sides, about 10 to 12 minutes.  cool meat and remove the skin ; discard.  slice crosswise into 34inchthick slices.  heat 2 tablespoons canola oil in a sauce canner over medium heat.  combine the meat, vegetables, and remaining ingredients.  reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer, covered, until the vegetables are tender and hot, 3 to 8 minutes.  spoon the pork into warm pieces.  place meat slices on a cutting board and top each slice with a slice of hokkien.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb veal cutlets, cut into thin strips | soya sauce | 1/2 cup ground chorizo sausage | 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped ( for garnish ) | 1/2 cup sourdough bread | msg | 1/4 lb smoked lamb, boneless ( boneless pork cutlets are better cutlet in half if you prefer ) | sage leaves or 1/4 cup sprigs fresh cilantro, for garnish
Recipe Instructions: heat a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat.  add a little olive oil to the pan to brown the veal on both sides.  remove veal, discard grease, and let cool completely on a paper towel.  in the same pan, saute the chicken for about 8 minutes on each side to soften and develop a nice char on each side.  remove chicken from pan and shred into bitesized pieces.  add the cooked veal to the pan with the chorizo and cilantro and stir to combine just until the meat is heated through.  add the smoked pork and return to the pan.  cook until evenly browned and heated through.  serve warm with sage leaves and chopped cilantro.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 lbs boneless skinless chicken breast roast, skin on | 1 cup chopped green onions | 1 cup chopped red cabbage | 1/2 cup frozen green lentils | 1 tablespoon oil or 1 tablespoon vegetable cooking oil | 1 1/2 teaspoons lime zest | 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes | 1 teaspoon garlic, crushed | 1 can crushed tomatoes | 4 medium tomatoes, chopped | 1 can red cabbage, shredded | 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice | 1/2 tablespoon reduced-sodium honey | 1/4 teaspoon black pepper | 5 cloves crushed garlic | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh lime juice
Recipe Instructions: place shredded chicken into dutch oven or large saucepan sprayed with cooking spray and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until chicken is no longer pink, about 6 minutes.  pour over cooked vegetables with any juices.  discard vegetables and let chicken stand in pan for about 10 minutes.  toss lentils, green onions, and red cabbage in a medium bowl with 14 cup water.  cover and refrigerate until ready to cook.  heat oil in a large, nonstick skillet over mediumhigh heat.  place chicken on top and cook, turning as needed, until juices run clear, 5 to 8 minutes.  transfer chicken to plate and keep warm.  drain lentil mixture, reserving some liquid in skillet.  return chicken over reserved fat to skillet and heat through, 12 to 15 minutes.  reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until lentils are al dente, about 5 minutes more.  add tomato, cabbage, lime juice, chili peppers and garlic.  cover and simmer 5 more minutes.  stir cilantro, lime juice, honey, and black pepper into lentils and chicken, and cook until tomato sauce is nearly smooth ; serve.  sprinkle with lemon wedges and serve immediately.  makes 6 servings.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 cups basmati kalamata olives | 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh kalamata olives
Recipe Instructions: sprinkle the salt and freshly ground black pepper over the basmati kalamata olives.  add the olives to the rice and toss.  serve hot or cold.

Random Ingredients: american cheese,italian parsley,cayenne pepper,masa harina,olive oil,pie shell
Ingredient Phrases: 1 pie shell | 1 large fresh italian parsley, finely chopped | 1/2 cup american cheese, grated | 4 tablespoons olive oil | 2 teaspoons cayenne pepper | 4 -5 medium apples - peeled, cored and cored, cored and cut into 1/2-inch chunks | 8 slices american cheese
Recipe Instructions: mash the cheese in a blender or food processor until smooth.  dish the parsley, americana cheese and  of the olive oil in a medium bowl ; season with the cayenne pepper and apple slices ; set aside.  mash the apples and butter in a small bowl until almost smooth.  heat the oil in a small nonstick skillet or dutch oven over medium high heat.  fry the apples and cheese until the cheese has completely melted.  place the pie in the skillet and heat, stirring constantly, until the top of the pie comes up the side of the pan, approximately 1 minute.  remove from the pan and set aside ; keep warm.  meanwhile, combine the cheese mixture with a fork, cheese, salt, black pepper and parsley leaves until well blended.  spoon the mixture into the pie shell and sprinkle with the reserved 12 teaspoon cayenne pepper.  sprinkle the rest of the cayenne pepper over the top.  bake in the preheated oven until the tops are golden brown and the cheese is bubbly and deep golden, about 25 minutes.

Random Ingredients: self raising flour,nutmeg,vanilla bean,corn syrup,pork,red curry paste
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 pounds ground pork | 1 teaspoon vanilla bean | 1/4 cup corn syrup | 1 package dried red curry paste | 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, to taste | 8 ounces self-raising flour
Recipe Instructions: place the ground pork in a bowl with the vanilla bean, corn syrup, curry paste and nutmeg.  mix together well and refrigerate overnight.  in a separate bowl, mix together the flour, corn syrup, red curry paste, and nutmeg and mix again.  refrigerate to firm up the meat.  heat 2 tablespoons of the oil in a heavy saucepan over medium heat.  cook the pork, in batches, until browned, about 5 minutes.  drain on paper towels.  return it to the saucepan.  cook the rest of the oil in the pan over medium heat until the oil is foaming.  add the meat and brown quickly.  turn the heat to medium and pour in the pan juices.  cook until the meat begins to turn a golden color and is no longer pink throughout, about 5 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Red Curry Pork, Peas and Corn

Ingredient Phrases: 1 rump roast, thinly sliced | 1/2 cup finely chopped fresh dill | 1 teaspoon mustard powder | 1 teaspoon mirin | 2 ounces carrot, finely chopped | 1 bottle ice
Recipe Instructions: place the beef in a crock pot over medium heat and cook on high for 810 minutes or until beef is crumbly to the touch.  drain, reserving 1/4 cup of cooking liquid, and drain again.  set aside for 15 minutes.  whisk together the reserved beef wine, mustard, mirin, and carrot in a large bowl ; heat to boiling.  season with salt and pepper.  stirring constantly until mixture gets thick and glossy, about 20 to 25 minutes.  remove beef from pan and set aside.  combine ice and reserved cooking liquid in a large bowl and fold into the beef.  place beef on top of the ice, stirring to coat, and reduce heat just to mediumlow.  cover and let stand for 30 to 40 minutes prior to serving.

Random Ingredients: part mozzarella cheese,pecan,coffee,kernel corn,brown lentil,ham,clove,coriander powder
Ingredient Phrases: 1 can whole kernel corn, undrained | 1/2 cup brown lentils | 1/4 cup whole kernel corn, undrained | 3 cups brown lentils | 1 package instant coffee | 1/3 cup chopped pecans | 1/4 teaspoon turmeric | 1 clove | 1/4 teaspoon ground coriander powder
Recipe Instructions: whisk together all ingredients in a blender, until smooth.  add salt to taste.

Random Ingredients: turkey breast,bay leaf,lemon juice zest,caraway seed,chicken breast half,red chilies,white sugar,cannellini bean
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil | 2 cups white sugar, plus more for drizzling | 3 large chicken breasts, cut in half | 1/2 lb ground turkey breast | 3 lemons, juice and zest of, plus zest of, plus zest of, plus 2 tablespoons lemon juice | 3 tablespoons fresh ground black pepper | 1 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper | 1 bay leaf | 1 tablespoon ground caraway seed | 2 cups cannellini beans
Recipe Instructions: in a medium saucepan, heat the oil over medium high heat.  add the chicken breast halves, brown on all sides, then remove to a plate.  add 13 of the sugar to the saucepan, then add the lemon juice and pepper, then season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  turn the heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer until the chicken is very tender and no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes.  add the bay leaf and caraway seed to the saucepan, then simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes, then remove from heat.  pour in the beans, cover with plastic wrap, and store overnight.  in the winter, cook the pasta in a pot of boiling salted water until al dente, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes.  drain and keep warm.  return the pan to the stove and pour the pasta and vegetables over the top.  cover with the sauce, and simmer until the pasta is tender, about 10 minutes.  remove the sauce from the heat, stir in a splash of lemon juice and a generous splash of freshly ground black pepper, and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups cooked russet potatoes, chopped | 1 cup shredded cooked broccoli floret | 5 cups picante sauce, as it is | 1 package shredded cooked lasagna noodles
Recipe Instructions: to make the russet potatoes place the potatoes in a large saucepan over medium heat, add the broccoli, picante sauce, and cover for 5 minutes.  stir to dissolve the vegetables and allow the flavors to develop to a nice bubbly consistency.  cook for 8 to  10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes have reached desired tenderness and are starting to brown.  if the mixture is too hot to melt, simply heat up the picante sauce to 375 degrees f.  sprinkle the cooked potatoes with the grated cheese and top it with the roasted vegetables and sprinkle with the monterey jack andor your favorite cheese.  serve warm or at room temperature, or place in freezer for an hour when completely cold.

Random Ingredients: garlic,tortilla,chicken bouillon granule,tomato ketchup,corn tortilla chip
Ingredient Phrases: 3 large chicken ( bite size ) | 1/4 cup tomato ketchup | 3 cans condensed cream of chicken soup | 1 teaspoon garlic | 4 teaspoons corn tortilla chips | shredded cheese ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot, brown chicken, and add tomato puree.  when reduced to about 2 cups, puree in a blender and add remaining ingredients except cheese.  when smooth, pour into casserole dish ; sprinkle with shredded cheese.

Random Ingredients: london broil beef,granny smith apple,cornflour,prawn,taco seasoning mix,catfish,cornmeal
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 lb cooked fish | cornmeal | 1/2 lb cubed catfish | 1 medium granny smith apple, finely diced | 1 medium granny smith apple, finely diced | 2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix ( kraft pesto works fine ) | 4 ounces cooked medium prawns | 1 tablespoon cornflour
Recipe Instructions: make the fillets.  to make the fillets heat a large skillet over mediumhigh heat.  brown the fish on both sides in the skillet then turn and brown completely on all sides.  drain on paper towels.  melt 1 tablespoon of the cornmeal in the skillet just prior to adding the apples to the skillet.  cook the prawns in the pan, then flip over and brown both sides.  add the cornmeal mixture to the prawns, then top each with a tablespoon of the chicken batter.  bake at 375 degrees for about 25 to 30 minutes or until prawns are done.  serve hot over rice and mashed potatoes.

Ingredient Phrases: 3/4 cup chicken stock | 1/4 cup water | 3/4 teaspoon pepperoni | 1 cinnamon stick, peeled | 1/2 cup finely chopped pecans | 1 teaspoon cumin | 2 cups chopped pecans | 2 cups frozen chopped roasted chicken | 1 cup sugar | 1 can baked sweet pepperoni ( canned )
Recipe Instructions: combine chicken stock, water, pepperoni, 12 teaspoon cinnamon, and 12 cup pecans in a medium saucepan.  bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, about 10 minutes.  stir in pepperoni, cinnamon, pecans, and cumin ; simmer until well blended, about 15 minutes.  stir in frozen pecans, and cook until crisptender, about 10 more minutes.  mix in chicken, sugar, roasted chicken, pepperoni mixture, and sweet pepperoni.  return to a boil and cook until sauce thickens, about 10 minutes more.

Random Ingredients: lebanese cucumber,sea salt,mango chutney,onion salt,flat leaf parsley,beef brisket,pearl barley,icing sugar
Ingredient Phrases: 3 lbs beef brisket, ends trimmed | 2 tablespoons lemon oil or 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 1 tablespoon finely chopped onions | 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder | fresh ground black pepper | 1/2 teaspoon sea salt | 1/2 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper | 1/2 teaspoon mixed spice ( such as hungarian spices, oregano, and pepper jack ) | 1 lb cucumber, peeled and coarsely chopped | 1 large tomatoes, seeded and coarsely chopped | 1 large green pepper, sliced ( about 2 cups ) | 1 cup pearl barley | 1/2 cup finely sliced seeded jalapeno pepper | 1/2 cup finely sliced sliced fresh flat-leaf parsley
Recipe Instructions: in a large, deep skillet over medium heat, saute onions and garlic powder over medium heat until soft, about 45 minutes.  add remaining ingredients if using garlic powder and cook, stirring, until flavors blend and vegetables become tender, about 3 minutes more.  add meat and cover.  cook for an additional 30 minutes until vegetables are just tender.  serve over rice on a platter.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 baking potato | 1 1/2 cups dried lard, drained | 1/2 cup sugar | 1 cup chopped fresh mint, divided | 1/2 cup blanched mixed mint, divided | 1/4 cup chopped chocolate ( optional ) | 1 tablespoon butter ( melted ) | 1 package raspberries ( fresh or frozen, i used a little frozen ) | 1/4 cup glace cherries
Recipe Instructions: cut up the potatoes into thin slices and fry in boiling salted water for 12 minutes until tenderabout 2 minutes.  drain in a colander and wipe dry with a paper towel.  put the potato slices in a buttered pan and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes.  drain and refresh under cold running water.  add the sugar, mix in the mint, the mixed mint with chocolate, and butter.  season with additional mint  mint  chocolate if using, and bring to a boil.  reduce the heat, cover and simmer until cool enough to handle, about 1 hour.  remove the potatoes from the pan, cover with foil, and chill for 2 hours to allow the flavors to develop.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  heat a deep pot over mediumhigh heat.  place the potatoes into the boiling hot pot, and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes.  remove from heat.  transfer to a plate.  place the raspberries, cherries, and mint onto the hot pot and toss gently to coat.  sprinkle with the glace cherries if using.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup tamarind pulp | 6 cups 1/4-ounce boiling water | 1 medium red chili powder | 1 1/2 teaspoons fresh ground red chili powder, prepared as directed on box, plus | 2 teaspoons pumpkin seeds, toasted
Recipe Instructions: combine tamarind pulp, boiling water and chili powder in a slow cooker with 5 cups of boiling water.  stir with a handheld beater until the mixture is dissolved and smooth.  remove from the heat and allow to cool for 20 minutes.  pour chilli powder mixture into a blender and blend until smooth but not too thick.  blend in more chilli powder mixture if mixture is too thick.  return the puree to the slow cooker and heat to a simmer using the same processor.  ladle into serving bowls and top each serving with pumpkin seeds.
Recipe Titile: Pumpkin Tender Soup W- Red Chilli Powder

Random Ingredients: chili paste,venison,sesame seed,collard green,sugar substitute,pesto sauce
Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs boneless venison steak, cut into 2-inch cubes | 1 teaspoon chili paste ( i like piquillo de frijoles ) | 3 limes, juice of | 3 tablespoons cornstarch | 1 tablespoon sugar substitute | 2 teaspoons garlic, minced | 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon | 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper | 1 teaspoon sesame seeds | 1/4 cup fresh lime juice
Recipe Instructions: stir together marinade ingredients in a bowl ; set aside.  cut venison into 1 12inch cubes and saute in juices on high heat.  add chicken pieces to mixture ; saute 6 to 8 minutes longer stirring often.  remove from heat.  in a bowl combine cornstarch, sugar, garlic, cinnamon and pepper.  stir in sesame seeds ; stir into stew.  cover and refrigerate at least 12 hours and overnight.  meanwhile, combine lime juice and lime zest in a bowl ; stir into stew.  cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour and overnight.  prepare salsa, pour over hot enchiladas ; let stand 30 minutes ; warm over stovetop or in skillet.  serve with sour cream.

Random Ingredients: coffee,yellow pepper,chili oil,sherry,asafoetida powder,red wine vinegar,eggplant
Ingredient Phrases: 3 ripe eggplants | 1 teaspoon chili oil | 2 tablespoons unsweetened chili oil | 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar | 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar | 2 tablespoons sugar
Recipe Instructions: clean the eggplants.  using sharp knife slice to make the eggplant slices thinly across the grain.  rub the stems of 2 large garlic cloves with chili oil and place on a large paper towel.  let soak for about 20 minutes.  heat 3 tablespoons of red wine in a large skillet over high heat.  when reduced about 2 tablespoons, add a splash of red wine and stir over high heat until it reduces to a low consistency.  place eggplant slices on the skillet and stir occasionally until eggplant is well coated in red wine sauce.  once the eggplant is done, remove eggplant with tongs and set aside.  heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of hot red wine in the skillet over medium high heat.  when about 3 minutes are up and the wine is a little thick and caramelized, remove the skillet from the heat.  repeat with the remaining 2 tablespoons wine.  serve while hot and accompanied by hot roasted coffee.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 cups sharp cheddar cheese, sliced | 9 eggs | 1/2 cup sour cream | 1 tablespoon fresh chives, chopped
Recipe Instructions: make sandwiches  beat the cheese with the eggs and sour cream until you reach the desired consistency.  dip your finger in the melted cheese mixture and press to coat the inside.  place one tablespoon of the chives into the center of each slice of bread.  roll each slice to form 2 sandwiches, then press in the cheese mixture.  top with remaining chives and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb red potato | salt | 1 tablespoon sriracha sauce ( or to taste ) | 2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, cored and chopped | 3 cloves garlic, chopped | 4 tablespoons sweet mustard | 2 tablespoons sugar
Recipe Instructions: peel potatoes and slice them crosswise into quarters.  slice potatoes diagonally into 8, each toasting each with salt.  in a food processor, place the vegetables, sriracha sauce, cilantro, and garlic until minced, and transfer to the bowl of a food processor.  stir in the mustard and sugar.  pour the mixture over the potatoes.  chill for about 2 hours before serving.

Random Ingredients: macaroni,sumac,brown lentil,salt,chicken breast tender,chicken breast fillet,coffee
Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons butter | 1/2 lb chicken breast tender, sliced into strips | 4 cups white rice | 1 can sweetened condensed milk | 1 cup chicken stock, with water | 2 tablespoons brown lentils, rinsed and drained | 1 garlic clove, crushed | 1 cinnamon stick, crushed | 1 tablespoon cloves, crushed | 6 tablespoons unsalted fresh parsley, minced | 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into small pieces | 1/2 cup light brown lentils, rinsed and drained | 1/2 cup macaroni, diced | 2 tablespoons orange rind, chopped | 1/2 tablespoon ground coriander | 1/2 teaspoon sugar, or to taste
Recipe Instructions: in a medium saucepan, melt 2 tablespoons of butter over moderate heat.  add chicken pieces ; cook 1 minute.  gradually stir in milk.  cook until rice is very brown, stirring frequently.  reduce heat, and add broth.  simmer uncovered, stirring often, for 5 minutes.  stir in 1 cup reserved rice and lentils.  heat to boiling, reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.  stir in garlic 1 at a time.  stir parsley, 1 tablespoon butter, and the remaining 1 tablespoon butter into strained rice.  let stand 10 minutes before serving.  garnish each serving with 1 tablespoon orange rind, 12 teaspoon coriander, 14 teaspoon sugar, and 14 teaspoon cinnamon.  serve immediately.
Recipe Titile: Orange Rice with Rice-Spiced Lemon and Garlic

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 lbs ground salami | 3 tablespoons flour | 6 slices slices bacon grease | 4 slices tahini | 1 teaspoon tamari | 1/4 cup kaffir lime leaf
Recipe Instructions: in a large frying pan, add the salami and cook over low heat for about 1 - 12 minutes.  remove from heat and let cool.  sprinkle with flour, then add crumbled tahini and cook for 3 minutes.  meanwhile in the meantime, cook bacon until crisp.  in a large bowl mix the flour, tahini, sesame oil and bacon grease.  add the salami and season with salt and pepper.  toss with the bacon grease and gently mix until everything is well blended and evenly distributed.  sprinkle with kaffir lime leaves.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb macaroni | 1/2 cup shredded zucchini | 2 cups reduced-fat shredded mozzarella cheese | 1/3 cup finely grated lemon- juice | 3 tablespoons olive oil | 1/2 green onion, finely chopped | 2 tablespoons parsley, finely chopped
Recipe Instructions: cook macaroni according to package directions and drain in a large salad bowl.  in a small mixing bowl beat in zucchini, macaroni, cheese, lemon juice, and olive oil.  stir in green onion and parsley.  season with salt and pepper, add more water if needed.

Random Ingredients: duck leg,green olive,substitute vegetable oil,macaroni cheese,vidalia onion,salad oil,almond,sausage
Ingredient Phrases: 1/8 cup roasted diced onion | 1/2 cup sliced fresh veal duck legs | 1/2 cup sliced fresh basil | 1/3 cup sliced fresh mixed greens of flat-leaf parsley - rinsed and coarsely chopped | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parmesan cheese | 1 tablespoon slivered almonds, chopped | 4 tablespoons salad oil | 1/2 lb ground turkey | 1/2 cup finely shredded macaroni cheese | 1 teaspoon dried mixed mixed nutmeg | fresh ground black pepper, to taste
Recipe Instructions: heat 1 tablespoon oil in heavy 2 to 3quart saucepan over medium heat.  add duck.  cook, turning occasionally, until browned ; remove cover and keep warm.  add onion to skillet and cook, stirring often, 3 minutes.  stir in basil, greens of parsley, cheese and almonds.  cover and cook until greens are wilted, about 23 minutes.  pour in meat ; cook 3 minutes more.  meanwhile, toast macaroni and season with salt and pepper.  arrange duck legs evenly on a plate.  sprinkle with macaroni, herbs and seasoning.  divide chicken atop sauce.
Recipe Titile: Frugal French Duck With Macaroni and Salad

Ingredient Phrases: 1 pound eggplant | 3/4 cup ghee | 3 tablespoons oyster sauce | 3 tablespoons lemon juice | 1/2 small lemon, juice of
Recipe Instructions: cut eggplant into strips, scoop out as much flesh as possible.  heat ghee in an ovenproof skillet, over mediumhigh heat, and place in the skillet ; cook and stir until browned, about 10 minutes.  add oyster sauce and lemon juice and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened, about 4 minutes.  stir eggplant strips into eggplant mixture and cover with plastic wrap ; refrigerate at least 30 minutes.  serve with fresh bread or chips.

Random Ingredients: hazelnut,flat leaf italian parsley,sugar,clear honey,red chilies
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon sugar | 1 1/2 teaspoons clear honey | 1 teaspoon dried crushed red chilies | 1/4 teaspoon dried crushed hazelnuts | 1/2 teaspoon coarse ground ground roasted flat leaf italian parsley, for garnish
Recipe Instructions: combine sugar and honey in a large, heavybottomed, saucepan ; bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring frequently, until sugar dissolves, about 45 minutes.  remove from heat ; cover and refrigerate to cool.  place chutneys into a small saucepan, cover with tightfitting lid, and steam until chutney bubbles, about 1 minute.  remove from heat immediately, and stir in hazelnuts ; set aside.  to serve, mound chutney on toast paper, and garnish with parsley.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup yellow bell pepper, chopped | 1/2 cup yellow bell pepper, chopped | 1/2 cup green bell pepper, chopped | 2 stalks celery stems, chopped | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided | 6 lbs potatoes, peeled and cubed | 1 bunch fresh cilantro stems, picked through | 2 slices monterey jack cheese
Recipe Instructions: in medium saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.  add onions, and saute until soft.  stir in bell peppers, celery stems, garlic, and 12 cup vegetable oil.  add potatoes and cilantro stems.  simmer until potatoes are fork tender, about 15 minutes.  top with 12 cup vegetable oil and 13 cup monterey jack cheese, if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 3/4 cup dry cornflour | 3 cups raisins | 3 tablespoons dijon mustard | 3/4 cup clear honey | 1 teaspoon vanilla extract | 1/4 cup raisins | 4 large ripe peels
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  mix dry cornflour and raisins in a bowl.  mix in the mustard, honey, vanilla, and vanilla extract.  mix well, and pour over the raisins.  bake for 15 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb cottage cheese | 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1/2 teaspoon dried spiced spiced spice
Recipe Instructions: put the cottage cheese, cinnamon, spiced spice and salt at room temperature ; blend well.  place the cheese mixture in a container and chill for at least 1 hour.  store the cheese in the refrigerator.  i freeze this in the freezer with no added salt.  it is important to take care not to make it too solid because it is very hard to work with after freezing.  the dough should only be about 30 to 45 minutes.  when the cheese is ready to use, prepare a light and crisp rolling pin from aluminum foil.  press the pin into a 9x13 pan and pour in the cheese mixture.  heat to boiling.  turn it down to a simmer and cook on top of the stove.  when you can see a thin layer of the cheese sticking onto the bottom of the pan, remove the pan to a plate and let it cool to room temperature before using.  store the cheese in the refrigerator.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 cans cannellini beans, drained | 1 can cannellini beans, drained
Recipe Instructions: place beans in a 3 qt saucepan with water until they reach a boil.  boil for 8 minutes.  drain beans, reserving liquid.  place beans and beans into large bowl.  stir in remaining sauce ingredients, mixing well.  add bean mixture to bean mixture and stir until well incorporated.  spoon mixture over bean mixture and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 potatoes, peeled and cubed | 3/4 cup yellow onion, peeled and quartered | 3/4 cup grated o'brien potato | 2 cans tuna steaks or ( 10 ounce ) cans tomato sauce | 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley | 2/3 cup blue cheese, shredded | salt and ground black pepper to taste
Recipe Instructions: place the potatoes, onion and 14 cup o'brien into a large pot, and cover with boiling water.  bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium, and cook until tender, about 25 to 35 minutes, or until tender ; mash with a potato masher.  discard the mash.  meanwhile, dice the tuna steaks or tomato sauce into small bitesized pieces.  in a small bowl, whisk together the parsley, fish sauce, parsley, cheese, salt, and pepper.  divide the mixture evenly among the potatoes.  arrange a portion of the tuna steaks or tomatoes on each of the mashed potatoes.
Recipe Titile: Classic Texas Shredded Potatoes With Blue Cheese and Tomato Cream

Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups white whole wheat flour | 1 cup baking cocoa | 1 tablespoon ground cardamom | 1 tablespoon baking cocoa | 1 tablespoon chopped almonds | 1/2 cup pesto sauce
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, mix together the wheat flour, baking cocoa, cardamom, cinnamom, and baking cocoa.  shape into a ball, and wrap in plastic wrap.  place on a baking sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes, until the edges are golden brown.  transfer the pan to the refrigerator to cool.  spread the pesto sauce over the baking pan.

Random Ingredients: heavy whipping cream,soya sauce,pear,creme fraiche,chili,shell pasta,turmeric,mango
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 lb shell pasta | 1 teaspoon chili | 1 teaspoon turmeric ( to taste ) | 1/2 teaspoon whole black pepper | 1 large pear | 1/2 cup heavy whipping cream | 1/4 cup coconut creme fraiche ( such as creme fraiche, or to taste ) | 1/2 lime, juiced
Recipe Instructions: cook, drain  pound the skin of the pear with a fork.  place into a large plastic bowl.  add the chilli, turmeric, 14 teaspoon pepper, and pears to the bowl.  add the whipped cream and 12 cup coconut.  bring to a boil and remove from heat.  add pears and season with salt and pepper to taste.  let the mixture cool and add the lime juice.  spoon mixture into 4 shallow bowls.  top each with a few small limes.  serve hot with rice.

Random Ingredients: marsala wine,pork rib,cider vinegar,enchilada sauce,carrot,amaretti cooky,gingerroot,sherry wine
Ingredient Phrases: 2 large carrots, peeled and sliced into 1 inch slices | 1 1/2 lbs skinless, boneless pork ribs, cubed | 1 tablespoon minced fresh gingerroot | 1 1/2 cups marsala wine | 1/4 cup bottled cider vinegar | 1/2 cup chopped fresh marsala wine | 1 teaspoon salt and pepper | 1/8 teaspoon salt & pepper | 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh carrots | 1/4 cup lightly toasted marshmallows
