Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 375 degrees f 190 degrees c.  place carrots in a large dutch oven.  cover with 2 tablespoons of salted water ; bring to a boil, then reduce heat to mediumlow, cover, and simmer until carrot is tender and carrots are tender, about 8 to 10 minutes.  drain.  remove carrots from the dutch oven.  slice carrots thin, and reserve.  in a saucepan over medium heat, whisk together ribs, ginger, and marsala wine until smooth.  return vegetables to pot, and heat to boiling.  reduce heat to mediumlow ; cover and simmer until vegetables are tender and liquid evaporates, about 15 minutes.  remove from heat, and return carrots to pot.  cover and refrigerate sauce.  in a small bowl, combine vinegar, marsala wine, and 1 teaspoon salt and pepper.  season mixture with salt and pepper to taste ; stir into carrot mixture.  arrange carrots in a greased, rimless 13by9inch baking dish ; top with sauce.  bake in the preheated oven until sauce is bubbling, about 30 minutes.  transfer sauce to a blender.  cover sauce, refrigerate, and store in a tightly covered container for up to 2 weeks.
Recipe Titile: Caramelized Carrots and Ginger BBQ Sauce

Random Ingredients: baking powder,prosciutto,peanut,chocolate ice cream,cooking spray,plain yogurt
Ingredient Phrases: 4 large bananas, sliced ( about 2-1/2 cups ) | 1/2 cup plain yogurt ( i use kikkoman brand ) | 1 cup sweet and sour cream ( i use kikkoman brand '' low fat cream cheese '' ) | cooking spray | 3/4 cup chocolate graham cracker crumbs | 1/2 cup cornflour | 2 tablespoons cocoa powder | 1/4 cup nonfat cream cheese, softened | 2 tablespoons chocolate peanut butter, softened | 3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract | 3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract | 1 cup coconut milk | 1 cup frozen sweet roasted peanuts, thawed and drained | 3 ounces chocolate peanut butter | 1/2 cup superfine quick-cooking whipped topping | 1/2 pint low-fat chocolate ice cream
Recipe Instructions: melt the banana butter and the peanut butter in a small sauce pan over medium heat.  stir in the granulated sugar and cook until the sugar is dissolved.  stir in the vanilla, cocoa, cream cheese, chocolate and peanut butter.  when the mixture is creamy and smooth, stir constantly, stirring continually, until the mixture has reached the consistency of a thick mixture.  allow the mix to cool and set aside.  place the coconut milk, sweet nuts and peanut butter in a medium saucepan and stir.  cook and stir the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly until warm.  remove from the heat.  combine the cacophissives and the whipped topping and set aside.  spread the mixture over the bottom of a 5 quart casserole.  sprinkle evenly with the remaining candy and pecans.  spread lightly in the middle of the mixture, then fold in the whipped topping, and fold in the chocolate.  cover with plastic wrap with a heavy lid and refrigerate.  store refrigerated in an airtight container for up to 4 days.  you may freeze the mixture at this point for up to 4 months.  to serve, fill a  mini muffin tins with whipped topping and top each with the chocolate topping and a dollop of icecream.  bake the topping in the bottom of a 350 degree f oven at 375 degrees f for 30 minutes.  immediately, sprinkle the banana butter onto top and bake for 10 minutes  or until the top is just done.  remove the tops from the muffin tins when it comes out of the oven, and remove the sides of the muffin tins with the sides on.  cool on a wire rack.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 ounces ground veggie chicken | 1/2 cup onion flakes | 1/2 teaspoon pepper sauce | 1/2 cup tomato sauce | 1/2 cup sour cream | 2/3 cup white mushroom pieces | 1/3 cup diced red bell pepper | 1 cup frozen white mushroom, thawed and chopped | 1/3 cup onion flakes | 1/2 cup minced garlic | 2 1/2 lbs tomatoes | 2 tablespoons sugar | 1 tablespoon dried oregano | 8 sheets lasagna noodles ( 1/2 cup, package ) | 16 ounces canned tomato sauce | 2 teaspoons salt | 1/8 teaspoon pepper
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees.  in large bowl, combine veggie chicken, salt and pepper.  in large skillet over medium heat, brown veggie strips.  stir in onion flakes.  remove from heat.  in separate bowl, combine tomato sauce, sour cream, white mushroom pieces, red pepper, white mushrooms, black bean sauce, onion flakes and garlic.  simmer 20 minutes.  drain and rinse in cold water.  drain.  set aside.  while vegetables are cooking, combine tomatoes sauce, sugar, oregano, chopped tomatoes with sugar, oregano flakes, mushrooms, crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper ; set aside.  in large nonstick skillet over mediumhigh heat, cook lasagna noodles 4 to 6 minutes or until forktender.  if you need to cook one more time, drain liquid ; remove and set aside.  meanwhile, in large pot over medium heat, stir together spaghetti and tomato sauce ; saute pasta for 5 minutes or until pasta is tender when tapped on the bottom.  stir in salt and pepper to pasta.  transfer to plate ; keep warm.  drain, rinse in cold water, and rinse in cold water again.  spread noodles on bottom of lightly greased baking sheet.  top with vegetable mixture.  sprinkle with tomatoes and onions, then sprinkle with cheese sauce.  spoon 12 into each of 8 lasagna sheets, spreading evenly.  cover with foil.  bake 25 minutes or until lasagna is browned and bubbly ; sprinkle cheese sauce over.

Random Ingredients: squash,half,yellow bell pepper,tamari,black cardamom pod,salt,red chili pepper
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons chopped whole coriander | 2 garlic cloves, pressed | 1 inch piece cinnamon sticks ( see notes ) | 1/3 cup sesame seeds ( see notes ) or 1/3 cup yellow bell pepper, crushed | 3/4 teaspoon ground turmeric | 7 tablespoons vegetable oil | 4 teaspoons salt ( adjust for taste ) | 1 1/2 teaspoons red chili pepper, seeds and pieces, to taste | 3 sprigs fresh coriander | 2 tablespoons cumin seeds | 6 -8 large squash, ends trimmed | 4 tablespoons ghee | 3/4 cup half-and-half ( see notes ) | 4 -10 black cardamom pods, crushed | 5 1/2 teaspoons garam masala ( see note ) | 1/2 cup half-and-half, crushed ( or use more if desired )
Recipe Instructions: in a pot, stir together the corriander, cinnamon, sesame seeds, cloves and cinnamon sticks.  bring to a boil.  reduce heat and simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally, until spices and corriander are fragrant, about 5 minutes.  transfer to a bowl, cover tightly tightly and keep warm.  add oil, salt, chilli peppers in small batches, turmeric, salt, red chile seeds and garlic, cooking until slightly fragrant, about 1 minute.  sprinkle the spice mixture over the squash.  add the remaining spices and season with salt.  heat over medium heat.  gradually stir in half and half and bring to a boil.  reduce the heat and simmer uncovered for 20 minutes or until the squash is tender.  sprinkle with ground cardamom pods and garam masala and simmer 5 minutes more.  adjust heat if needed.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup frozen blueberries | 1 lemon, zest of ( about 2 cups ) | 1/2 cup fresh blueberries, chopped ( about 1 cup ) | 1/2 cup fresh cherry jam ( you really want it to be fresh )
Recipe Instructions: combine the first 4 ingredients ; mix the jam ingredients together.  chill the jam for 1 hour and mix it together again.  place the jar of jam in a small container with the jam.  use it to pour the jam into jars with tightfitting sealings.  label and store in a cool place for up to 4 weeks.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 inch pork shoulder steaks, boneless | 1/4 cup water | 1 garlic clove, minced | 2 tablespoons green chili peppers, chopped | 2 tablespoons cardamom seeds | 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon | 1 cup coriander seeds | 1 stalk green chili pepper, chopped | 2/3 teaspoon ground cumin
Recipe Instructions: bring the water and pork to a boil in a saucepan.  reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 1215 minutes.  stir in the garlic, the green chile pepper, the coriander seeds, cumin, and the cloves of garlic.  heat 1 tablespoon water in a saucepan and cook the pork in the water until it has cooked through and has reduced by 14 teaspoon, about 10 minutes.  stir in the green chili, cardamom seeds, cinnamon, and the cumin.  cook and stir, covered, over low heat for 30 minutes.  stir in the green chili, coriander seeds, cumin, and the 2 t.  garlic powder.  stir in the pork, the coriander, and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can cream of chicken soup | 1 can chopped fresh basil leaves | 1/2 - 1 teaspoon butter
Recipe Instructions: put all ingredients in food processor and pulse to get a smooth mix.  pour over chicken and serve.

Random Ingredients: penne pasta,red cabbage,angel hair pasta,icing sugar,coppa,salami,skirt steak
Ingredient Phrases: 5 ounces salami, thinly sliced | 2 tablespoons fresh basil, sliced | 2 teaspoons sea salt | 1 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper | 4 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, rinsed well and chopped fine | 1 teaspoon sugar ( to season ) and/or 2 tablespoons freshly ground black pepper | 3/4 cup spaghetti | 1/4 cup red cabbage, shredded | 3 cups spinach, cut into 1/2 inch chunks | 4 cups celery tops, shredded | 1 head red cabbage ( halved ) | 6 ounces penne pasta
Recipe Instructions: cook salami and basil in a large pot of boiling salted water 5 minutes or until tender, drain and toss to coat.  in a small bowl combine all of the ingredients except the cooked pasta.  toss well to combine.  cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour or until chilled.  cook pasta according to package directions ; rinse with cold water and set aside 5 minutes.  toss the spinach and celery in a small bowl.  add the cabbage, spinach, and pasta ; toss to combine.  cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours to heat through.  ladle into serving bowls and top with some of the salad.

Ingredient Phrases: 30 ounces navy beans | 4 1/2 ounces fresh spinach, cut in half lengthwise | 4 teaspoons chopped fresh mint | 3 poblano chiles, seeded and chopped | 1/2 teaspoon sugar | 2 tablespoons cayenne pepper
Recipe Instructions: place beans in a bowl and cover with cold water.  leave 2 - 12 inches of steam if you have it on, then simmer until water runs clear and beans are tender.  remove from water and steep for 5 minutes.  drain beans before chopping.  chop chiles and add to beans, along with the mint, mint leaves and pepper.  mix well and form into small balls.  place balls on the counter tops of a baking sheet and sprinkle with powdered sugar.  bake at 300 feet for 2025 minutes, until lightly brown.  serve warm with tortilla chips.

Recipe Instructions: in a heavy saucepan, cook the coconut in 3 tbl of hot hot soya sauce for about 5 minutes, stirring constantly.  add the rum if using fresh and stir over medium heat until dissolved.  add the yogurt, mix well and let sit for 3 to 5 minutes.  to serve, spoon the coconut curry into individual serving bowls and top with mint and pine nuts.  enjoy it as is and enjoy the fresh coconut curry.

Random Ingredients: corn tortilla,self rising flour,breadcrumb,dark sesame oil,parsley,salsa,aubergine,feta cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 1 jar roasted boneless skinless chicken breast halves ( drained ) | salt and freshly ground black pepper ( to taste ) | 2 cups self-rising flour | 1 teaspoon dark sesame oil | 4 cloves minced garlic | 250 g cooked pimento pepper stuffed chicken breast halves ( cut into 12 inch pieces ) | 1/2 cup dry breadcrumbs | 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese | 1/2 cup roasted onion | 4 -6 fresh cumin leaves ( or to taste ) | 1/2 cup fresh parsley, chopped fine | 1/4 cup black pepper, freshly chopped
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 210c.  sieve flour through a sieve, then grind into a coarse powder with the butterblenders.  place chicken pieces into a large resealable bag, discarding some flour that has not been gathered.  shake well and leave to stand for 12 hours in the refrigerator.  sprinkle flour mixture on chicken pieces, turning to coat lightly with flour.  heat oil in a large heavybased non stick skillet over medium high heat, then heat to 190c.  sprinkle each piece of chicken with salt and pepper and brown both sides in the butter, stirring frequently, for 34 minutes in total.  remove from pan and set aside to cool slightly.  while chicken pieces are cooling, mix the bread crumbs, feta cheese, onion, parsley, parsley leaves, pepper and remaining flour in a small bowl, blending thoroughly.  with a pastry blender or food processor, process the mixture until smooth.  remove chicken pieces from bag, set aside.  spoon remaining flour mixture over chicken pieces, then place chicken inside one of the shells.  sprinkle with remaining crumbled feta cheese.  sprinkle with remaining crumbled green onions and scatter with cumin.  bake for about 2025 minutes until chicken is goldenbrown and cheese has melted.

Recipe Instructions: slightly coat a nonstick frying pan with cold water and lightly heat.  drop the roasted garlic and spices into the frying hot sauce, shake to mix lightly then coat both sides lightly.  heat and cook for 35 minutes, add the beans and cook for 56 minutes, reduce to low heat and cook for 1012 minutes more.  reduce heat to medium and cook for 4 minutes more.  spoon onto individual plates or shallow dish.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 cups cake flour | 1 can orange blossom water | 1 purple onion, sliced
Recipe Instructions: mix all ingredients together until blended.  allow dough to dry down for at least 15 minutes to soften.  roll out dough into about 1 inch thick floured surface to coat bottom of pan.  bake 15 to 20 minutes at 350 degrees f, rotating pan halfway through cooking time.

Random Ingredients: mostaccioli pasta,mini chocolate chip,nutritional yeast,confectioner ' sugar,confectioner sugar,serrano pepper

Recipe Instructions: lightly oil a 9x13 inch baking dish.  in another bowl, combine butter, sugar, salt, egg, vinegar, nutritional yeast, honey, flour, white sugar, olive oil, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves.  stir and coat well with the butter mixture.  in a large skillet, heat 13 cup olive oil over mediumhigh heat.  add peppers and cook 4 minutes.  set aside to cool.  in second skillet, heat 13 c olive oil over mediumhigh heat.  remove from heat.  in same skillet, saute chalupa in remaining 1 cup of olive oil, until tender.  serve with confectioners sugar and melted chocolate chips.

Random Ingredients: strawberry,corn oil,bay leaf,peanut butter,flour tortilla,pepperoni,pork fillet

Recipe Instructions: heat oil and pepperoni in large non stick skillet over mediumhigh heat.  cook, stirring occasionally, until golden brown  crisp, 5 to 7 minutes.  reduce heat to mediumlow and add in strawberries, onion, pork, sugar, and corn oil, stirring, until thickened, about 5 minutes.  add remaining ingredients except tortillas, simmer until slightly thickened  smooth, about 10 to 15 minutes.  serve warm or at room temperature.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup caster sugar | 3/4 cup irish whiskey | 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla | 5 2/3 ounces shortening
Recipe Instructions: make creams heat 1 - 12 teaspoons of caster sugar to 360 degrees f.  remove from heat and stir in the whiskey, vanilla and shortening.  mix well.  let cool.  store in a covered jar for up to 2 months until cold.  the longer the better  store in the fridge for future use.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil for frying or 3 1/2 tablespoons cooking spray | 6 beef chuck, thinly sliced | 1 can stewed tomatoes ( with juice, 1 1/2 cups ) | 3 tablespoons minced garlic clove, or to taste | 3 cups diced jalapeno peppers | 2 teaspoons minced fresh minced fresh jalapeno pepper or to taste | 1 lb low sodium tomato sauce | 1 lb ground sirloin, such as deli beef
Recipe Instructions: heat the oil in a heavy medium saucepan over medium heat.  drain the beef, reserving the fat.  place the beef on the pan and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 to 12 minutes.  transfer the fat to individual serving bowls.  spoon the tomato and garlic mixture over the beef.  sprinkle with jalapeno and let stand for 12 minutes.  add the chili and any juices from the beef and marinate for 10 minutes.  meanwhile, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in a deep skillet over mediumhigh heat.  when hot, sear the beef in batches over medium heat, turning once, until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes each side, and set aside.  reduce the heat to medium and add the tomatoes.  cook, stirring frequently for 10 minutes, until flavors blend and the juices have thickened.  stir in the beef mixture, tomatoes and reserved fat until all drippings are mixed.  season with salt and pepper.  spoon the chili over the hot plates and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 12 ounces slab bacon | 1 teaspoon english mustard powder | 1 teaspoon english-style mustard powder
Recipe Instructions: cut slabs and cut into slices.  combine mustard and powder in a small bowl.  sprinkle over all pork slices.  heat the remaining tablespoon of mustard powder in a small frying pan over medium heat.  cook until the pork is golden brown.  remove pork and let it cool on paper towels for 10 minutes.  when cool enough to touch, slice into slices, serve with slices of hard boiled egg.

Ingredient Phrases: 14 ounces frozen broccoli, thawed | 4 ounces fresh mint leaves ( chopped ) | 1 tablespoon ice water | 1 1/2 cups fontina cheese, shredded
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of water to a boil.  add broccoli and mint sprigs.  reduce heat, and simmer until tender and wellblended, 10 to 15 minutes.  meanwhile, prepare the fontina cheese according to package directions.  drain and stir in a couple of tablespoons grated parmesan cheese.  serve warm or at room temperature.

Random Ingredients: wine vinegar,phyllo pastry,raspberry,picante sauce,chili pepper flake,rye bread,cayenne
Ingredient Phrases: 2 chicken breast halves | 5 -6 raspberries ( whole ) | 6 slices rye ( or pith-covered dried figs ) | 3 garlic cloves, chopped | 1 cup wine vinegar | 1 cup picante sauce | 1/2 teaspoon fresh chili pepper flakes | 1 cup dry roasted dried chipotle chile pepper flakes ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 425f  place the chicken breast halves on a baking sheet, and roast for 1 hour on one side.  combine the remaining ingredients except for chicken, and pour over chicken in oven.  roast for 20 minutes, until chicken is completely cooked and the juices run clear.  serve immediately.  for an easy serving, place 3 to 4 slices of the chicken on a serving platter.

Random Ingredients: maraschino cherry,plum tomato,lemon juice zest,bread flour,marshmallow creme
Ingredient Phrases: 1/3 cup bread flour | 6 tablespoons water | 1 lemon, zest of | 1/2 cup fresh marsala cherry, chopped | 8 plum tomatoes, peeled & pitted
Recipe Instructions: place 1 tablespoon of flour in a deep skillet and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the ingredients are well blended but do not allow the flour to boil.  remove from heat, stir in 1 tablespoon of honey and lemon juice, then cover skillet with a tightfitting lid and let cook until the tomatoes are firm about 40 minutes.  turn the tomatoes over and continue cooking for an additional 57 minutes until the sauce is reduced by about half.  remove the lid and allow the mixture to cool slightly and set aside.  in a medium sized bowl, whisk together the remaining 2 tablespoons honey and half the rest of the lemon juice and add them to the dry ingredients.  toss the mixture into the mixture and season it with the remaining half of the lemon juice, then place the mixture back in the pot.  sprinkle the fruit with remaining remaining flour, cover and cook for about 3 hours, checking to make sure the fruit retains its shape and consistency.  the mixture should be thick enough to coat a spoon and spread evenly over toasted bread crusts.  sprinkle with remaining remaining 2 tablespoons honey and serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs garlic cloves, grated | 3 cups dry sherry or 3 cups lard | 1/4 cup light panko breadcrumbs | 2 cups ghee, divided | 1 teaspoon lemon juice, zest of | 1/4 teaspoon salt and pepper
Recipe Instructions: in heavy skillet, cook garlic in ghee until browned.  remove from heat, and set aside.  in small skillet, heat remaining 14 cup of the ghee.  add 1 tbsp of sherry, 12 of garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.  bring to a boil, reduce heat to gentle simmer, and cover.  cook until garlic is tender, about 20 minutes.  in a small bowl, combine garlic and next 6 ingredients.  transfer mixture to a warmed serving bowl.  cover, and refrigerate until required.  to serve, ladle mixture over the garlic mixture.  spoon tomato tops and garlic filling onto serving plate.

Random Ingredients: red chilies,ginger ale,coffee powder,lobster tail,plum tomato
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup chopped fresh plum tomatoes ( about 1 cup ) | 1 lb lobster tail, cut into 1-inch pieces | 3 garlic cloves, peeled and thinly sliced ( about 1 cup ) | 2 teaspoons ground cloves | 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1/4 cup brewed red chilies, coarsely chopped | 1/2 teaspoon cracked black pepper | 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, divided | 2 tablespoons sugar | 1/2 cup heavy cream, warmed
Recipe Instructions: cut lobster into bite size pieces.  combine tomatoes and lobster in medium saucepan over low heat.  add garlic, cinnamon, red chilli, and 1 tablespoon sugar.  cook, stirring frequently, for 2 minutes.  stir in remaining chopped tomatoes and lobster, stirring until mixture boils.  reduce heat to mediumlow and simmer 20 minutes or until sauce thickens.  stir in cream.  serve lobster with sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb sausage | 1 can amaretto | 1/2 cup all-purpose flour | espresso powder
Recipe Instructions: mix sausage, amaretto and  flour until the consistency of dough.  spread 1 teaspoon espresso powder over sausage mixture, mix well, pat it into a ball.  place sausage in a 13 x 9 inch glass or ceramic bowl.  place sausage over the surface of sausage mixture, sprinkle with espresso powder.  refrigerate for 30 minutes.  preheat oven to 325 degrees f.  wrap in foil.  bake for 30 minutes, but do not remove from oven.

Random Ingredients: barley,dijon mustard,plain yogurt,phyllo pastry,jasmine rice,cayenne pepper,cucumber,turmeric powder
Ingredient Phrases: 1 small white onion, chopped | 1/2 cup plain yogurt | 1/2 cup plain nonfat milk | 1 cup finely chopped fresh lemon juice | 1 tablespoon white wine | 1 teaspoon turmeric powder | 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon | 1 teaspoon ground coriander | 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper | 1/4 cup vegetable oil | 3 cups cubed kale ( in 1/4 inch cubes ) | 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro | 4 sheets phyllo pastry | 1/4 cup halved lemon zest
Recipe Instructions: mix the onion, yogurt and lemon juice.  pour in the milk and simmer for about 3 minutes.  pour in the wine, turmeric and cinnamon.  mix well, then season to taste with the cayenne pepper.  bring to a boil, then simmer for 25 minutes, or until thick.  remove from heat and mix with a fork.  melt the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  add kale, cover and cook until wilted, about 4 minutes.  drain kale and keep warm.  in a small bowl, combine the yogurt and lemon juice mixture.  add to the kale and cook until just wilted, 1 minute.  drain kale and keep warm.  divide kale mixture among phyllo sheets.  spread cilantro over the top, then layer cucumber slices.

Random Ingredients: tortilla chip,swiss cheese,french fry,sun tomato oil,chicken stock,sherry
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups french fries | 16 ounces fat-free refried beans | 1 can chicken stock cube or ( 28 ounce ) can chicken broth | 3 ounces taco sauce | sun-dried tomato packed in oil | 2 1/2 ounces cheddar cheese, shredded and divided | 15 ounces shredded swiss cheese | 3/4 ounce tortilla chips
Recipe Instructions: to make fries, microwave the fries for 10 seconds on high for best crispness.  transfer to a mixing bowl and set aside.  pour in 1 - 12 cups of the beans.  mix in 14 cup of the broth, 14 cup of the taco sauce and 12 cup of the cheese.  mix in 12 of the swiss cheese.  mix well.  pour 2 tablespoons of this mixture over the fries and toss.  top with 34 of the cheese.  cover with the remaining 34 of beans, the remaining cheese and 14 cup of cheese and continue to stir until thoroughly combined.  spoon this mixture into small tortilla bowls, filling with 12 of the filling.  sprinkle with 34 of the cheese.  roll and grill over high heat for 30 minutes, or until cheese melts.  to make the tortillas  preheat oven to 375f and grease gratin pan.  place 1 tortilla in the middle of each tortilla, top with a slice of cheese and then roll another tortilla until tortilla is used.  repeat until all tortillas are used.  bake at 375f for 30 minutes or until crisp.

Random Ingredients: cremini mushroom,bouquet garni,thyme,purpose flour,poppy seed,ziti pasta
Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil | 2 tablespoons sugar | 1 garlic clove, minced ( can use more ) | 2 tablespoons cremini mushrooms, finely sliced | 4 tomatoes, quartered | 2 basil, chopped | 6 cups all-purpose flour | 1 can cremini mushrooms, drained | 2 ziti pasta, cooked | 1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon poppy seed
Recipe Instructions: heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat.  add garlic and mushrooms, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.  add the tomatoes and basil, and continue to cook and stir until they begin to soften, about 5 minutes.  stir in the flour with the remaining tbsp of oil, and continue cooking over medium heat until the mixture boils and thickens, about 4 minutes.  fluff with a fork.  return the mixture to the saucepan, and stir in the ziti, adding as much water as necessary to keep it from sticking.  cook until the ziti is just tender, about 10 minutes, stirring frequently.  season with the remaining tbsp oil and poppy seed.  garnish with grated cheese and serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 -6 slices grilled turkey legs | 1/4 cup dried mint leaves | 150 g grits, mashed | 2 cinnamon sticks | salt and pepper, to taste | 2 garlic cloves, crushed | 1 red potato, peeled and cubed | 1/4 cup chopped parsley
Recipe Instructions: chop the turkey legs into small pieces.  place them in a large pan and cover with water to stop cooking.  bring to the boil and simmer until the flesh is tender about 20 minutes.  drain well to allow the meat to absorb more liquid.  cut each side of each potato into quarters.  dice the red potatoes into small cubes.  melt 12 cup of the butter in a frying pan.  grind 1 cinnamon stick in a mortar and pestle, add to the oil and saut until browned on all sides.  add the salt and pepper to taste and stir with the garlic.  when the butter has caramelised, add the red potatoes and parsley.  sprinkle with the parsley and serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: serrano pepper,saltine cracker,ginger,red chili pepper flake,anise seed,sage
Ingredient Phrases:
1/2 medium red chili pepper, seeds removed | 1 teaspoon dried anise seeds | 2 teaspoons ground gingerroot, crushed | 1/2 teaspoon dried juniper berries or 1/4 teaspoon dried anise 
    - 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon | 1 pinch whole nutmeg, grated | 4 ounces sugar-free honey substitute | 4 large eggs | 3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
Recipe Instructions: to make muesli, peel the sweet red chili pepper seeds.  cut, then coarsely grind them.  set aside the seeds.  to make filling, preheat an outdoor grill over mediumhigh heat.  using a mortar and pestle, pound the chili pepper seeds with 2 teaspoons of the anise seeds or 1 tablespoon of the cayenne, until they sizzle and give off a distinct aroma, about 8 minutes.  meanwhile, in a food processor or blender, process the dried spices, sugar and honey substitute until finely ground and the mixture forms a paste.  set aside.  using your thumb, pound the muesli into 1inch cubes.  place the cubes in the center of a greased bowl.  top with the ground spices and pour the filling over the mueslivers.  let set until you can handle them.  in a small bowl, beat the eggs with the cinnamon, nutmeg and anise.  whisk until light and fluffy.  add the mueslivers to the egg mixture.  season to taste and refrigerate.  to serve, place the muesli on a serving platter or platter and top with a dollop of sour cream.

Random Ingredients: cocoa,grain white rice,farfalle pasta,onion powder,russet potato,rye bread,ketjap manis
Ingredient Phrases: 1 russet potato | 1 lb round or 1 lb frozen russet potato | 2 cups water | 1 cup medium sized round beef, cubed | 2 teaspoons garlic powder | 2 teaspoons ground cumin seeds | 1 large onion, chopped | 1 teaspoon ground coriander | 2 teaspoons dried thyme | 1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper | 1 teaspoon ground cumin seed | 2 teaspoons salt | 1/4 lb medium grain white rice | 2 tablespoons ketchup | 1 small sweet green vegetable, peeled, cut into 5 pieces | 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice or 1 dash lime juice
Recipe Instructions: peel and deseed the potatoes and slice into strips.  peel and quarter the potatoes lengthwise.  mince the onion and garlic and set aside.  in a medium sauce pan, simmer the beef and the garlic powder and the cumin seeds for about 5 minutes.  combine the onion and garlic powder, cumin seeds, chopped onion, cayenne and salt and heat until the onions become translucent about 10 minutes.  add the potatoes and simmer until slightly tender, 30 to 45 minutes.  add the rice and cover and simmer for about 20 minutes until all the water has been absorbed and rice is tender, turning once.  in a medium saucepan, boil the tomato, oil and lemon juice and return to a boil until it thickens about 5 minutes.  add the rice and simmer for another minute.  season to taste and serve.  note you may want to sprinkle the cooked rice with a little more water if you are not using a blender, add more lemon juice or lime juice.  if you arent using a blender, adjust the cooking speed to lowmedium and add the chopped vegetables and lemon juice.

Random Ingredients: kidney bean,green chile,white sugar,chicken wing,sharp cheddar cheese,dark brown sugar
Ingredient Phrases: 14 ounces kidney beans or 14 ounces chicken wings | 1 lb lean ground chicken wings | 2 yellow onions | 2 medium green chile | 4 garlic cloves | 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano leaves | 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper | 4 jalapeno peppers, minced | 1 tablespoon white sugar | 2 tablespoons butter | 4 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, cut into thin strips | 4 ounces shredded sharp cheddar cheese
Recipe Instructions: clean, wash and rinse the kidney beans and chicken wings.  bring to a boil for 5 minutes and skim off any fat.  in a small heavy pan melt the butter over a medium heat and cook the onion and chile for 5 minutes, stirring and breaking them up, until tender.  add the garlic and oregano and cook about 5 minutes, stirring.  add the black pepper and jalapeno peppers and continue cooking until all the liquid has been released from the peppers.  reduce the heat to low and cook covered for 1 hour  stirring often.  remove from the heat and stir in the sugar, half of the butter and the garlic mixture ; simmer over low heat until mixture is thickened.  season with the pepper to taste.  cover and let cool on a rack in a cool place for 5 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 yellow potatoes, peeled, halved lengthwise and thickly sliced | 1/2 cup sour cream | 5 tablespoons icing sugar | 3 tablespoons french baguettes, sliced into 1/4 inch thick slices | 2 artichokes hearts, sliced into 1/4 inch thick slices
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 375 degrees f.  line a baking sheet with parchment paper or parchment to prevent parchment from sticking.  cut peeled potatoes in half lengthwise ; remove seeds and discard.  cut each half lengthwise into 14inch long slices, then slice each slice into 14inch wide slices.  in a bowl, add the sour cream and the icing sugar and mix to combine.  to assemble the potatoes, layer both artichokes, potatoes, and half of the potato mixture onto the prepared baking sheet.  on a lightly floured surface, roll out to 14inch by 3 inch rectangle.  place seam side down in baking sheet.  invert into baking sheet, and bake until bottom and sides of the dish are lightly tinged with brown, about 15 minutes.  transfer to a cooling rack to cool completely.  cut each slice to serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups water chestnuts, chopped | vegetable oil, for deep-frying | 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger root, to 1/2 inch | 1 tablespoon taco seasoning | 1 cup plain shredded cheddar cheese
Recipe Instructions: heat oil in skillet to 350f.  cook onions for 12 minutes or until soft.  cut vegetables into 1 inch cubes, and add to skillet.  cook stirring frequently, until onion is soft.  stir in ginger, and cook about 3 minutes or until fragrant.  stir in taco seasoning.  pour over vegetables in skillet.  serve with shredded cheddar cheese.
Recipe Titile: Tasty Green Tea (Chorizo, Red Eye, or Pineapple)

Random Ingredients: ginger juice,beef bouillon cube,curry paste,walnut oil,scallop
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon fresh curry paste | 1 teaspoon ground ginger juice | 1 garlic clove, minced | 1/4 teaspoon white sugar | 2 beef bouillon cubes | 1 1/2 tablespoons chopped scallion ( green onions ) | 2 2/3 cups chopped carrots | 1 package sliced scallops | 4 tablespoons walnuts oil
Recipe Instructions: place curry paste, ginger juice, garlic, sugar, bouillon cubes, scallions and carrots in crock pot.  cover and cook on low for at least 2 hours, stirring occassionally.  remove and discard the scallions, carrots and scallops.  pour over cooked vegetables and bring to a boil.  cover and cook on high, stirring occassionally, 2 hours or longer.  remove from heat ; stir in walnuts.  serve over hot steamed white rice.
Recipe Titile: Carrot and Walnut Gravy With Spiced Scallion and Garlic

Random Ingredients: pecorino romano cheese,coconut flake,chutney,anise seed,tomato green chilies,almond
Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups tomato green chilies, chopped small ( see recipe ) | 1/2 cup coconut flakes ( or more to taste ) | 1 can roasted blanched almonds, coarsely chopped | 1 1/2 teaspoons aniseed, or to taste | 8 ounces chutney ( or to taste ) | 1 lemon, juice of, to taste | 1/2 cup pecorino romano cheese ( shredded )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 425 degrees f 220 degrees c.  mix together the tomatoes green chile, shredded almonds, aniseed, and chutney in a bowl, and set aside.  make the sauce in a small saucepan, warm pectin and lemon juice in a little of the pan drizzling over the tomato paste ; stir to combine.  put the chutney in a blender with the chopped chiles.  process in batches for 5 minutes each batch.  stir in the juice from the lemon, and pour over the chutney.  spoon the sauce over the salad in a layer and top with crumbled cheese.

Random Ingredients: marjoram,dill,yellow onion,parmesan cheese,coffee,taco seasoning mix,liquid smoke
Ingredient Phrases: 1 package taco seasoning mix | 8 ounces light brown sugar, packed | 6 ounces marjoram, fresh, pampered, and finely chopped | 1/3 cup liquid smoke | 1/2 lb yellow onion, chopped fine | 4 cups fresh grated parmesan cheese | 1 jar coffee
Recipe Instructions: mix brown sugar, marjoram and liquid smoke together ; pour in onion.  mix remaining ingredients.  cover and chill at least 4 hours or overnight.  prepare the sauce by combining the remaining ingredients.  combine in a large bowl the pepperoni.  serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 days.

Ingredient Phrases: 8 cloves garlic, crushed | 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil | 3 ounces red onions, chopped | 500 g spaghetti, cooked and drained | 250 g fresh red potatoes, boiled and drained | 15 ml lime juice | 1 tablespoon sugar | 1 garlic clove, chopped | 1 tablespoon cumin | 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes | 200 g extra virgin coconut milk
Recipe Instructions: to the spaghetti, place the garlic and half of the onions in a blender and puree until finely chopped and fragrant.  set aside.  to the other ingredients, place the carrots and potatoes in a small sauce pan and bring to the boil.  when all vegetables are almost completely tender, transfer vegetables to a large saucepan and continue to cook for about 8 minutes, over boiling water, stirring to brown all the vegetables.  this can take about 10 minutes.  mix the lime juice, sugar, garlic, cumin and crushed red pepper flakes together in a bowl and bring to the boil over high heat.  stir in the coconut milk and bring to the boil again.  reduce heat to low and continue cooking 15 mins.  add the meat and vegetables to the pan and stir in the drained spaghetti and cook for an additional 5 minutes, until heated through.  sprinkle with the remaining onion and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 teaspoon gingerroot, peeled and crushed | 1 green capsicum, seeds reserved and thinly chopped | 1 bunch pear, roughly chopped ( about 1/4 cup chopped ) | 2 teaspoons fresh lemon peel, grated
Recipe Instructions: combine all dressing ingredients in a small bowl.  add to salad bowl and toss to coat.  serve and enjoy.

Random Ingredients: cream mushroom soup,gouda cheese,double cream,french bread
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup sour cream | 2 tablespoons butter, softened | 3/4 cup french bread, cut into 1-inch pieces ( i prefer french bread ) | sour cream | 1 1/2 cups fresh dill, chopped ( i like fresh ) | 2 cans sliced fresh mushrooms ( or fresh or canned ) | 2 teaspoons sugar | 1/2 cup margarine | 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
Recipe Instructions: blend sour cream and butter in a medium bowl, mix in bread and sliced dill.  dont use all of the fresh ingredients and refrigerate for at least an hour.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  grease two 9inch springform pan and line with aluminum foil.  line a rimmed baking sheet with foil.  bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  drop in prepared french bread slices about 12 inches in the boiling water.  once the baking sheet is completely dry and the bread has softened, turn the oven down to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  cover pot loosely with aluminum foil and place the pot at a rapid boil.  in a small saucepan over medium heat, cook the dill for 15 minutes.  drain and discard any remaining dill.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  in a medium bowl, whisk together the sugar, margarine, and parsley.  beat in sour cream mixture and whisk in the prepared crust and butter mixture.  cover and refrigerate for 20 minutes to thicken a bit.  serve hot, sprinkled with powdered sugar.

Random Ingredients: single cream,currant,adobo sauce chipotle pepper,flat leaf parsley
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup chopped flat leaf parsley | 1/4 cup finely chopped flat leaf parsley | 2 tablespoons adobo sauce, preferably mexican-style | 4 ounces double cream | 3 ounces chopped currants ( or dried mint )
Recipe Instructions: place flat leaf of parsley and parsley in mixing bowl and mix to coat.  mix the remaining ingredients in a medium bowl.  stir gently to combine.  cover and chill for at least 1 hour.  serve with a dollop of guacamole, a spoonful of sour cream, and a dollop of guacamole with a dollop of sour cream and a dollop of sour cream.  toasted currants and mint may also be used.

Random Ingredients: green bell pepper,guacamole,chili paste,vanilla sugar,turmeric,serrano chili,crouton,red chili
Ingredient Phrases: 150 ml chianti chili paste ( or hot ) | 400 g guacamole | 1 tablespoon turmeric | 1/4 teaspoon red chili ( preferably yellow ) | 2 teaspoons chili paste ( or a mix of 2 teaspoons each of the first two ingredients ) | 1/2 teaspoon vanilla sugar | 1/4 cup chianti green bell pepper, chopped in a blender ( or red or green bell pepper ) | crouton
Recipe Instructions: in a heavy saucepan, saute chianti, black pepper and turmeric in oil until blackened.  add cumin powder, turmeric and red chilli.  cover the pan and simmer for 5 minutes.  add chili paste and saute until fragrant.  pour some of the mixture into a pan and heat a little over a tablespoon for a nice heat.  add chili paste and heat a touch more.  add remaining masala and reduce to a light gravy, add sugar and cook till sugar dissolves and the gravy thickens.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large ripe ripe ripe pumpkin | 2 tablespoons golden syrup | 1/2 cup water | 1/3 cup unsweetened coconut, shredded | 1 tablespoon honey | 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 2 tablespoons olive, sliced | 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg | 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
Recipe Instructions: in a small bowl, combine chopped pumpkin, golden syrup, water, coconut, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg.  pour over pumpkin mixture to coat evenly.  refrigerate at least 1 hour.

Ingredient Phrases:
1 loaf breadcrumbs | 2 teaspoons low fat plain low-fat milk | 1 -2 teaspoon minced leeks ( divided ) | 4 -8 garlic cloves ( 1 inch in diameter.
    - ) | 1 teaspoon crushed pepperoni ( divided ) | 2 -3 tablespoons vegetable bouillon cube
Recipe Instructions: mix bread crumbs with milk, remove excess milk and chop in half.  blend all ingredients except cheese in blender.  add mixture to bread crumbs mixture and blend until smooth.  chill at least 24 hours.  store in airtight container.  bake at 400f to 475f until crust is golden brown.

Random Ingredients: kielbasa,chicken bouillon cube,bell pepper,onion powder,vinegar,dark brown sugar
Ingredient Phrases: 1 chicken bouillon cube | 1 can diced tomatoes | 2 tablespoons dark brown sugar ( optional ) | 1 tablespoon onion powder ( optional ) | 1 tablespoon fresh ginger, chopped | 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1 teaspoon salt and black pepper | 2 teaspoons bottled chicken bouillon cube ( or to taste ) | 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
Recipe Instructions: in a small skillet over medium heat, bring the oil to a boil and drop in the diced tomato, along with the brown sugar, onion powder, cinnamon, salt and pepper.  mix all ingredients together into a smooth sauce and bring to a boil.  reduce heat to mediumlow, cover tightly and reduce heat to mediumlow.

Random Ingredients: butter,baking potato,apple,beef sirloin steak,pineapple juice,ginger,romaine lettuce
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/3 cups roma lettuce, shredded | 1 package dry white onion, shredded - divided | 1 tablespoon finely grated fresh ginger | 6 cloves garlic, finely minced | 1 tablespoon grated fresh pineapple zest | 3 limes, juiced | 2 tablespoons pineapple juice | 15 slices apple, sliced | 1 1/2 cups sugar | 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar | 1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander | 1 tablespoon ground ginger | 1 teaspoon grated fresh oregano
Recipe Instructions: combine lettuce, white onion, and ginger.  place in large bowl.  combine pineapple juice, zest, lime juice, apple juice, sugar, vinegar, coriander, and ginger, with 2 tablespoons of the lime juice.  mix well.  whisk together remaining lime juice, cinnamon, oregano, and salt and pepper.  pour over sliced cooked roma.  let stand at least 3 hours before carving.  slice against the grain into 1 12inchthick slices.  let sit at least 45 minutes to soften slightly.  cut into 2-inchthick squares.  grill over medium high heat on grill, turning once, for 25 to 35 minutes or until golden brown.  set aside.  grill steak, turning once, until browned on the outside and well cooked on the outside.  transfer to cutting board to drain off excess liquid.  discard juices in pan ; cover with foil.  bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes or until heated through.  serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: extra sharp cheddar cheese,romano cheese,parsley flake,vegetable broth
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb fresh shrimp ( shelled, peeled only, and cut into bite size chunks ) | 4 sheets frozen mixed vegetables ( i like sweet corn ) | 1 can vegetable broth, plus | 3/4 cup cream cheese ( i've used 1/2 cup whole milk, i am more partial to use 2 % cream fat ) | 2 tablespoons sugar | 1/8 teaspoon lemon juice ( to taste ) | 1/2 teaspoon parsley flakes ( to taste ) ( optional ) | 1/2 cup extra sharp cheddar cheese, shredded ( divided use only if you are a large cheddar cheese lover! )
Recipe Instructions: cook the shrimp in cold water until just a tad pink but not fully cooked.  drain and keep aside.  boil the broth in a small saucepan, add the cream cheese, sugar, salt, lemon juice, parsley and cream cheese.  cook, stirring, until thickened.  remove from heat, set to low and stir in the shredded cheddar cheese.  pour about 14 cup of the chicken mixture into a serving bowl and toss to coat.  drizzle with reserved shrimp pieces.  serve immediately, garnished with more lemon juice and a sprinkle of freshly chopped fresh parsley.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 kg sweet jam, broken open and split | 1 medium limes | 1 jaggery | 1 cinnamon stick | 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder | 1/4 teaspoon sugar | 12 slices jaggery, coarsely grated | 12 slices cider vinegar ( to taste )
Recipe Instructions: heat half oil in a saucepan over medium high heat.  add half ginger and cinnamon stick ; cook for one minute.  add mustard powder and sugar.  cook for a minute or two.  add the jam, a handful at a time, stirring well, until it thickens the syrup.  add the remaining ginger, cinnamon stick and jaggery ; cook for a further minute.  add the jaggery, vinegar and salt and pepper to taste and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes.  add jaggery mixture with a stir and turn the heat down to low and simmer gently for 1 hour.  remove from heat immediately before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups all-purpose flour, mixed with | 3/4 cup vegetable oil | 2 large eggs | 1 cup cilantro stem, coarsely chopped
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  cream together flour, egg, and vegetable oil.  add cheese and mix well.  pour mixture evenly over flour mixture.  if mixture starts sticking to your bottom of the pan, cut down a little.  roll dough into small balls and place on an ungreased baking sheet.  bake in preheated oven until golden brown, about 45 minutes.  cool for 15 minutes.  sprinkle about 12 cup cilantro over quiche.  serve.

Random Ingredients: kalamata olive,angostura bitter,saffron thread,ice,olive oil,serrano pepper,bacon
Ingredient Phrases: 5 slices bacon | 1/4 cup shallot, minced | 3/4 cup olive oil | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 3 roma peppers, thinly sliced | 1 serrano pepper, thinly sliced | 1/4 cup kalamata olive, pitted and sliced into triangles | 1 tablespoon white vinegar | 3/4 cup ice
Recipe Instructions: place the bacon under the broiler until crisp.  cook until crisp when pierced with a fork.  in a large bowl, stir the shallot, oil, garlic, tomato, peppers, olives, and vinegar together.  toss well and let stand for 30 minutes.  place the chilled bacon strips and the olive mixture, together with the prepared bakers salt, pepper, and kalamata olives.  toss the mixture well.  cover and chill until ready to serve.  serve with fresh chilis, or with a spanish flat bread for dipping.

Random Ingredients: guacamole,chinese cabbage,green pepper,pea carrot,beef stew meat,crabmeat,pasta shell,zucchini
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb ground beef ( or regular beef, you have to add some chicken broth ) | 2 cans stew meat, undrained | 1 can tomato paste ( i like to use more ) | 1 tablespoon minced green pepper | 1 teaspoon cracked pepper | 6 cups chicken broth | 2 tablespoons dried chinese cabbage | 1 can diced green peppers ( do not use canned, just use the raw carrots ) | 1/4 cup dry crushed ice cream | 1 can tomato paste | 1/2 cup cooked ham, chopped fine ( optional ) | 2 cans sliced sliced carrots
Recipe Instructions: put everything except the ham into crock pot and cook on low for 8 to 10 hours or until meat falls off of bones and cooks about 12 hour or until thick.  after youve had all of the stew, take the top off of the crock pot and add all of the meat.  mix all the vegetables.  pour that into the bottom of the crock pot, then add the cheese into top.  cook on high for about 30 minutes.

Random Ingredients: sesame oil,taco seasoning,velveeta cheese,lemon,red capsicum,tamari,shrimp paste,galangal
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb cooked shrimp | 1 jalapeno | 1 lemon, juiced | 2 tablespoons shrimp paste | 2 tablespoons sesame oil | 3 tablespoons tomato | 1 tablespoon garlic clove | 1/2 cup rice | 1 red capsicum ( sliced ) | 2 tablespoons tamari | 2 tablespoons sugar | 1 tablespoon minced garlic | 1/2 lime, cut diagonally | 6 cups cooked rice | 1 tablespoon taco seasoning, i use taco seasoning blend | 4 slices velveeta cheese
Recipe Instructions: peel shrimp from shrimp and place in a bowl.  chop jalapenos in a food processor with the juice of one lemon.  set aside.  combine the shrimp, juice of 1 lemon, 1 tablespoon shrimp paste, sesame oil, 2 tablespoons tomato, and 2 tablespoons rice.  heat to boiling.  reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.  remove from heat and stir in capsicum and tamari.  stir in sugar, garlic, lime zest, rice, and taco seasoning.  place the rice, squid, and shrimp paste mixture into a large serving bowl.  spoon 2 tablespoons filling over the top.  top with velveeta cheese.  sprinkle with valtine and lime.  bake at 350 for 60  75 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 500 g fresh peppers, chopped | 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped | 1/4 cup packed brown sugar | 2 tablespoons lemon juice | 1/4 cup olive oil | sea salt, to taste
Recipe Instructions: place the fresh pepper tops and minced garlic cloves in a bowl.  season generously with salt.  marinate in the refrigerator for 23 hours.  cut the pepper tops and the crushed garlic cloves into small bits.  heat 1 tablespoon lemon juice in a large pan over low heat.  mix the olive oil with the onion and garlic and set aside.  season with the seasonings and the lemon juice.  heat the remaining oil in the pan, add the pepper tops and garlic pieces, and cook for 23 minute each side or until the onion is translucent.  season with fresh ground pepper, and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 3/4 lb beef stock | 3 tablespoons sour sauce | 3 -4 tablespoons ladyfingers
Recipe Instructions: boil stock in a heavy pan until reduced by about half then remove from the heat and stir in 2 tablespoons honey.  strain the mixture and return to the saucepan.  add the sour sauce, the ladyfingers and the meatballs.  simmer, stirring, over mediumlow heat for about 2 hours and serve warm.
Recipe Titile: Cajun Style Meatballs With Honey Batch Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 4 pork chops | 4 tablespoons peanut oil | 1/2 cup chopped onion | 2 -3 garlic cloves, minced | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint | 2 -3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro leaves ( plus 2 teaspoons as much as necessary ) | 2 -3 slices bacon drippings, or to taste | 8 ounces fresh coconut milk | 1/4 cup sugar | salt and ground black pepper to taste | 3 tablespoons toasted peanuts ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  coat a 10inch cast iron skillet with cooking spray.  in large bowl, toss pork chops with 3 tablespoons of oil.  add chopped onion, garlic, and mint.  stir in cilantro.  season with salt and pepper to taste, and toss to coat.  cook until pork is just golden in center, but still slightly pink in the center, 8 to 10 minutes.  cool, then shred.  add bacon drippings, coconut milk, and sugar mixture to skillet.  stir to mix well.  cook and stir for 2 to 3 minutes or until the mixture is thickened.  stir in peanuts if using.  transfer to a large bowl.  spray with cooking spray and toss to coat.  heat a large skillet over medium heat.  remove pork from skillet and set aside to set.  in same skillet, sear chops until well browned, about 8 to 10 minutes.  drain fat, reserving drippings in skillet.  return skillet to heat, and stir in remaining oil.  add pork, and return the drippings to the skillet.  reduce heat to low ; cover and cook 8 to 10 minutes or until pork is tender, about 10 minutes longer.  add peanuts, if desired.

Random Ingredients: hard egg,taco seasoning,pork belly,golden raisin,yellow onion,lavender,hamburger bun
Ingredient Phrases: 1 boneless pork belly | 1 large sweet yellow onion, cut into 1-inch pieces | 2 pimento-flavored lard or 1/2 cup olive oil | 4 slices lean hamburger buns | 2 -4 jalapenos, halved lengthwise | 2 hard-boiled eggs, cut into bite-size pieces | 1/4 - 1/2 ounce golden raisin | 12 turkey rolls
Recipe Instructions: brown meat in bacon grease.  drain grease from fat and fat pan ; set aside.  heat the oil in a large skillet over mediumhigh heat.  brown meat on all sides ; transfer to a small plate.  transfer to a plate.  pour the buns with onion and pimento paste onto a plate lined with paper towels.  stir fry bacon until crisp.  drain and set aside.  spoon eggs over the meat ; dip both sides of meat into egg, pressing to adhere ; sprinkle with  cup of the golden raisins.  place a sheet of aluminum foil over the edge of a cookie sheet lined with plastic wrap ; set under a microwave until the eggs are set, about 8 minutes.  bake in a 350 oven until set, about 3 minutes.  remove foil to plate and continue baking until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 25 minutes more.
Recipe Titile: Hamburger-Bubed Meatballs With Pico de Gallo (Brazilian Style)

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb chopped celery | 1 lb chopped scallops | 6 ounces roasted and drained sliced jalapenos | 2 garlic cloves | 1 small chopped red onion | 2 cups dark-leaf vegetable stock | 2 cans unsweetened pineapple, chunks | 2 cups grated cheddar cheese | 1 pinch dried basil | 1 tablespoon olive oil | salt and pepper
Recipe Instructions: rinse the vegetables, rinse thoroughly, and squeeze dry with a colander.  cut into large portions.  combine all veggies, spices, and stock in a pot and bring to a simmer.  cover the pot and simmer for approximately 1 - 122 hours to an hour.  while cooking, slice the jalapenos in half lengthwise.  using a very sharp knife, cut out the seeds and veins.  with a slotted spoon, remove one corner of each cut clove from the cheddar cheese and reserve on a plate.  in a small frying pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.  season the jalapeno mixture with salt and pepper.  stir frequently to prevent burning a bit.  add the vegetables and cook and stir about 5 minutes, or until heated through.  serve when the vegetables are soft and golden and crisp.  this will keep for 2 days in the fridge.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons butter, softened | 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts | 3 cups flour | 1/2 teaspoon salt | 3 eggs, beaten | 1/3 cup sugar | 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract | 3/4 cup brown sugar | 2 tablespoons white vinegar | 1/4 cup oil ( to fry ) ( optional ) | 2 tablespoons green enchilada sauce ( spanish or mexican-style )
Recipe Instructions: place flour, salt, and eggs into sauce pan i use a 1 qt skillet on high heat.  stir until the dough is smooth and holds together.  cook one or more minutes till no brown bits remain.  spray a large nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray and fry chicken breasts until cooked through.  reduce heat to mediumlow, and set aside.  pour in remaining ingredients while turning chicken to coat evenly.  return chicken breasts to skillet and simmer over hot nonstick skillet until cooked through, about 10 minutes more.  invert skillet onto a heated plate, and pour off oil.  serve with sour cream sauce.  makes about 1 dozen.
Recipe Titile: Pollo De Arrozón (Mexican Chicken Breasts With Chorizo Sauce With Sour Cream & Lime Sauce)

Random Ingredients: egg white,grain white rice,marjoram,fast rising yeast,chili powder,cream,chicken breast
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour | 1 teaspoon baking powder | 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda | 1/2 teaspoon salt | 6 ounces boneless skinless chicken breasts | 1 teaspoon sugar | 1 teaspoon instant dry yeast | 1 egg white | 4 tablespoons sour cream | 2 teaspoons fresh chili powder | 1 cup uncooked rice ( or frozen )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350f.  line two baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside.  combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt ; set aside.  mix chicken breast with sugar in medium bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed for 3 to 5 minutes.  beat egg white in small bowl, then add sour cream ; beat with electric mixer on medium speed at low speed for 4 to 5 minutes.  stir in chili powder.  in separate bowl, whisk egg white and sour cream until soft peaks form around center.  gradually add flour mixture to soft, dry batter in large bowl ; beat on medium speed for 1 minute.  gradually add sour cream mixture, mixing between additions.  stir in 2 cups water, one cup at a time, until thickened.  transfer to prepared baking sheets ; leave to cool.  cut each chicken breast diagonally into 6 pieces ; bake in a preheated 350 degree f.  oven for 816 minutes or until cooked through and crust is golden brown, stirring occasionally.  cool to room temperature.  slice diagonally into 34 wedges.  for the sauce in a small saucepan, bring boiling water to boil.  place chicken in saucepan and boil 5 minutes.  stir in half of the sugar mixture, remove from heat and set aside.  in saucepan, bring 2 tablespoons remaining sugar to boil.  reduce heat, simmer 1 minute.  stir in sour cream mixture and remove from heat.  beat egg white egg white until soft peaks form around center of each chicken breast.  return chicken and sauce to saucepan ; cover and let cool until firm, 1 to 8 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Crisp Thai Chicken Cakes and Rice

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup halloumi cheese, divided | 4 -6 slices cooked chick-peas, mashed | 4 tablespoons orange rind, grated | 2 cups chunky salsa | 1/2 cup golden raisin ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: sprinkle chunky salsa over the halloumi  mix well.  place half the halloumi on top of the chickpeas  place another layer of chickpeas, half the orange rind, and about half the salsa.  fold over  repeat in several places  place with your hands in center on a cookie sheet or a parchmentlined baking sheet.  bake at 375 f for 2530 minutes or until cooked.  serve warm.  note there is no need to substitute canned rind for orange or yellow, just use a large enough pan that will hold all raisins.  baking time does not include time in the oven.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs boneless boneless leg of lamb, trimmed of fat and cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes | 3/4 cup brown sugar | 6 cups shredded cooked pasta | 1/4 cup dry spaghetti sauce ( optional ) | 4 baking sheets ( or parchment paper )
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into 1 - 12 inch cubes.  combine brown sugar and remaining ingredients in a small bowl ; stir well.  set aside.  in another bowl, combine remaining ingredients and toss well.  spread onefourth of sauce on baking sheets.  bake in 375f oven, uncovered, about 45 minutes.  turn over halfway through.  bake 30 minutes longer.  to serve, divide beef mixture among 4 small muffin cups.  drizzle with more sauce and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 uncooked chicken thighs | 4 tablespoons cornstarch | 2 tablespoons lime juice | sugar-flavored glaze
Recipe Instructions: rinse and drain the chicken, remove and discard the sines and fat.  combine the chicken, cornstarch, lime juice, sugarstarch and glaze in a bowl and mix well.  pour over the chicken and toss well for 23 minutes or until chicken is well coated.  serve hot, garnished with lime wedges.

Random Ingredients: veal,lemon juice zest,shortening,vegetable broth,red chilies,snap pea,white hominy,banana
Ingredient Phrases: 14 ounces frozen snap peas, thawed | 1 lb veal steaks, cut into 3/4 inch cubes | 12 thick sliced red chilies | 1 tablespoon shortening | 2 tablespoons lemon juice, zest of, grated, divided | 5 bananas, pitted and cut into 1/2-inch slices | 3/4 cup vegetable broth | 1/4 cup banana slivered
Recipe Instructions: in a skillet over medium heat, cook the veal steak till tender  about 3 minutes for mediumrare.  transfer to platter.  in a saucepan, combine the snap peas, zest of, remaining 12 cup of the lemon juice or lemon juice, 14 tablespoons of the shortening, and remaining zest.  heat to boiling  and transfer to platter.  in a large skillet or dutch oven, melt the shortening mixture.  add the meat, bananas, vegetable broth, and remaining 12 cup lemon juice or lemon juice.  cover and cook on low heat for about 20 minutes, stirring frequently.  remove steak and pan juices to a platter for a few minutes of grilling.  serve hot.  cut into wedges and arrange wedges on plates and garnish with banana slices.
Recipe Titile: Spicy Spanish Steak With Sweet and Red Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb ground pork chops | 1/2 cup sugar | 1 tablespoon vanilla extract | 1/4 cup almonds, chopped | 1 teaspoon cinnamon | 2 teaspoons unflavored gelatin, or more to taste | 1/2 cup heavy cream | 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice | 1/2 cup sliced hazelnuts, chopped | 1/2 cup fresh whipped topping
Recipe Instructions: marinate the pork chops in sugar and vanilla, about 20 minutes.  in a large bowl, combine the ground pork, ground almonds, and powdered gelatin ; mix well.  stir the cream into the ground meat mixture, then stir in the lemon juice and nuts, cover and refrigerate overnight.  preheat the oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  roll the meatballs in whipped topping, about 5 minutes per side.  to prepare the glaze, combine the hazelnuts, whipped topping, and cinnamon until well blended, then drizzle the glaze over the meatballs.

Random Ingredients: bicarbonate soda,beef brisket,sun tomato oil,peanut butter
Ingredient Phrases: 1 whole beef brisket, trimmed of fat & strings | 1 tablespoon canola oil | 1 tablespoon peanut butter | 1/2 cup low-fat coconut oil | 1 small red onion, thinly sliced | 1 bunch fresh corn | 2 cloves garlic, minced | 2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda | 4 tablespoons sun-dried tomato packed in oil, chopped
Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 400f.  heat the oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat.  stir in the beef, and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.  mix the remaining ingredients in a bowl, and pour over the beef.  bake, covered for about 10 minutes, or until the meat is thoroughly cooked and sauce has cooked down.
Recipe Titile: Beef Brisket With Sun-Dried Tomato Sauce

Random Ingredients: cumin powder,tart apple,green chilies,white onion,garlic salt
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice | 1/4 cup plain yogurt | 3 slices white onions, quartered | 1/2 cup green chilies, chopped | 1/4 cup cumin powder | 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper | 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained | 2 cups cooked canned yellow and blanched tapas, drained | 1/8 cup garlic salt
Recipe Instructions: combine lime juice, yogurt, onion, chilies, cumin, cayenne pepper and black beans.  combine cooked black beans, garlic salt in a bowl and mix thoroughly.  serve with lemon wedges.

Random Ingredients: hamburger bun,caper,paprika,white wine,raspberry,cilantro leaf,salt black pepper
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 cups sliced cooked hamburger buns | salt and ground black pepper to taste | 1/2 cup white wine | 1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaf | 4 tablespoons vegetable oil for deep-frying | 3/4 cup loosely packed seeded peeled chopped fresh raspberries | 2 tablespoons capers | 1/2 cup loosely packed unsalted grapeseeded pickled jalapeno
Recipe Instructions: to make the hamburger buns, preheat oven to 40.  in a medium bowl combine the hamburger bun, salt, black pepper, wine, and cilantro ; pour over the hamburger mixture.  place raspberries, capers, grapeseeded pickles, and tomatoes in a medium bowl ; toss with the hamburger.  cover, and refrigerate in refrigerator 4 to 5 hours.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large red onion, chopped | 2 tablespoons canadian bacon, chopped | 3 tablespoons canadian bacon fat from the can | 2 garlic cloves, minced | 20 ounces baby spinach leaves, washed and chopped | 1/2 teaspoon cumin | 1/4 teaspoon fennel seed | 4 cups low fat chicken broth | 2 cans diced tomatoes | 3/4 cup olive oil | cayenne pepper
Recipe Instructions: in medium bowl, mix together onion, garlic, bacon and canadian bacon.  with garlic and onion mixture, mix in spinach leaves.  in large pot, stir together chicken broth and tomatoes ; bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 30 minutes.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 skinless chinese eggplant | 1 package dried cranberry, halved lengthwise
Recipe Instructions: cut eggplant into cubes.  put cranberries on the wall.  cut eggplant into halves and top each half with fresh cranberries.  chill until ready to serve.  serve over eggplants, garnished with fresh parsley.
Recipe Titile: Cranberry Eggplant With Cranberries on the Wall

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups dried wild rice | 1 tablespoon beef broth or 1 tablespoon beef veg stock | salt and white pepper | 4 cups tomato paste | 2 teaspoons garlic | 2 1/2 cups water | 1/2 cup onion powder | 2 1/2 cups diced mild-tender cooked beef-flavored pasta
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil.  add wild rice and cook until the rice is tender but still firm to the bite, 5 to 10 minutes.  drain and set aside.  in a large pot, heat the broth and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, until fragrant.  whisk in the tomato paste.  cook and stir until the sauce has thickened to a smooth paste and has a light brown color, 1 to 2 minutes.  in the same pot, heat the remaining beef stock and the salt and white pepper.  meanwhile, heat the vegetable stock, water, onion powder, and pasta according to package directions.  bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat to low, simmer for 10 minutes and stir occasionally until the pasta is tender but not watery, about 8 minutes.  season with season salt and pepper.  remove the pan from the heat and let stand for 10 minutes.  drain and set aside.  while the pasta is cooking, heat a large, deep skillet over mediumhigh heat.  add the diced ground beef to the pan and cook until evenly browned, about 5 minutes.  drain and set aside.  remove the heat and stir in the tomatoes, onion powders, and seasonings.  return the meat to the pan and stir the mixture into the skillet.  pour the mixture into the skillet and continue to stir until the sauce thickens slightly, about 5 minutes.  stir in the cooked pasta and return to the heat.  cook and stir until almost heated through, about 5 minutes more.
Recipe Titile: Crispy Tender Risotto with Wild Rice Pesto

Ingredient Phrases: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil | 1/2 lb raw beef or 1/2 lb boneless, boneless ground beef | 2 cups canned whole canned pimento squash, drained ( reserve juice ) | 1/2 cup frozen browned tomatoes, thawed and cut into wedges ( or use canned tomatoes with their juice ) | 10 dried white mushrooms, washed and stemmed, washed | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley | 1 jar canned cannellini beans, rinsed | 2 tablespoons sliced black mushrooms | 2 garlic cloves, minced
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into bite size pieces and brown in the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.  remove from pan and set aside, uncovered, with juices in skillet and add squash.  heat through until soft but not brown, about 5 minutes.  meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  add beans, mushrooms, minced garlic and cook 30 minutes longer.  remove from cooking water, and reserve beans.  drain, saving liquid.  spread a scant 12 cup of bean mixture in the bottom of a 9x13 inch or 9x13 baking dish.  place cooked beef mixture over bean mixture, and sprinkle with the reserved beans and mushrooms.  combine tomatoes with juice in a small saucepan over medium heat.  season with salt and pepper to taste and cook, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens, about 10 minutes.  sprinkle with reserved beans, pepper if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup olive oil | 2 lbs boneless beef chuck, trimmed of fat and cut into 1/2 inch cubes | 3 -4 garlic cloves | 5 tablespoons chopped fresh basil leaves | 2 tablespoons chopped fennel bulbs | 5 tablespoons minced fresh thyme leaves | 1 cup crumbled cooked chicken breast | 2 cups tomatoes | 1/2 cup fresh basil | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano leaves | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh fresh thyme leaves | salt and pepper
Recipe Instructions: combine remaining ingredients, stirring until well blended.  cover and chill for at least 30 minutes.  cook stew for at least 30 minutes before serving in crockpot to blend flavors.  makes 4 to 5 servings.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 -4 cups drained chickpeas, drained and rinsed | 1/3 cup dried red chile peppers ( optional, use more if desired ) | 1 cup dried green food coloring | 1/2 cup water | 3 tablespoons dijon mustard | 4 -6 teaspoons fresh minced garlic | 1 cup chopped fresh dill ( or green chiffonade ) | 1 cup chopped fresh parsley | 3/4 cup heavy cream ( more if desired )
Recipe Instructions: cut chickpeas in half lengthways.  drain, reserving liquid.  in a large bowl, combine drained chickpeas with food coloring, water, and dijon mustard.  mix well.  add garlic, minced dill, chopped parsley, and 1 cup water.  mix until dressing combines thoroughly.  add half of salad to the dry chickpea mixture.  continue stirring until all dressing is incorporated.  refrigerate until ready to serve.  drizzle additional salad dressing over salad and sprinkle with fresh garlic and dill.  serve immediately with whipped cream.
Recipe Titile: Baked Spicy Beef and Chickpea Salad

Ingredient Phrases: 12 sheets puff pastry, about 2 1/2 pounds | 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil | 4 large eggs, lightly beaten | 1/2 cup grated nutmeg | 3 cloves garlic, minced | 2 teaspoons fresh grated clove | salt and ground black pepper to taste | 1/2 cup grated gruyere grated scallion | 3 1/2 quarts broccoli florets, cut into 1 inch chunks
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350f brush 1 - 12 tablespoons olive oil over pastry and set aside.  in a medium bowl, beat together eggs and nutmeg and season with garlic salt and pepper.  whisk in nutmeg and salt and pepper mixture.  spoon 14 cup of broccoli florets into ungreased baking sheet.  in a bowl whisk together egg yolks, gruyere, remaining 1 - 34 cups broccoli, and remaining 1 - 1 - 12 tablespoons olive oil.  arrange 3 tbsp broccoli mixture around pastry and sprinkle with 2 tbsp gruyere, scallions, and 1 tsp kosher salt.  bake, uncovered, until broccoli has set and golden in spots, about 10 minutes.  let stand 510 minutes before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup cooked pollo con pollo | 1 loaf white breadcrumbs | 1/2 teaspoon turmeric
Recipe Instructions: place breadcrumbs in a large bowl, and whisk until crumbs are coated.  pour mixture into the bread crumbs, and mix until breadcrumbs are coated.  place breadcrumbs in a nonstick frying pan, and cook on mediumhigh until browned about 3 minutes on each side.  return to pan after each side is browned.  turn the bread crumbs over and brown bread crumbs on all sides.

Random Ingredients: green pea,chipotle chile,spaghetti,confectioner ' sugar,maraschino cherry,lemon juice zest,black pepper,yellow mustard
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups cooked spaghetti | 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh orange rind | 1/2 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper | 1 teaspoon kosher salt | 3 tablespoons finely chopped fresh maraschino cherries | 1 can reduced-fat diced green pea | 1/2 cup thinly sliced yellow mustard | 1 lemon, juiced
Recipe Instructions: bring a large saucepan of water to a boil.  cook pasta in hot water until al dente, about 8 minutes ; drain.  mix the dressing ingredients in a medium bowl, and season with salt.  cook pasta in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 8 minutes.  drain, toss with reserved dressing.  serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator while you make the sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil or 1 teaspoon butter, divided ( for the baking ) | 4 cups flour | 1 1/4 teaspoons baking soda | 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder | 1 pinch powdered sugar | 1/2 cup red wine vinegar or 1/2 cup apricot preserves | 1 teaspoon almond paste | 1 large banana, sliced in strips into rounds and drained ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  grease 9x13inch baking dish.  in large mixing bowl, combine flour, baking soda, baking powder and sugar.  add red wine vinegar, almond paste and banana and stir just to combine.  shape mixture into 12inch balls.  place 2 bananas around bottom of prepared baking dish and spread with breadcrumbs.  pour a half tablespoon of the batter over the bananas.  sprinkle remaining half with preserves and top with banana slices.  bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven or until golden brown.  allow to cool completely before cutting.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can cream of mushroom soup | 1 can diced portabella mushroom | salt and pepper to taste | 8 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, shredded | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives
Recipe Instructions: cook  mushroom and portobello mushrooms according to package directions ; drain.  stirring once or twice ; cook 12 minutes more.  melt the cream of mushroom soup in a medium saucepan.  add the cheddar cheese and stir ; cook a few seconds until the cheese melts.  stir in chives.  heat thoroughly.  cover and cook until bubbly ; 10 minutes more.

Ingredient Phrases: 5 beef tenderloin steaks | 1 teaspoon crushed red snipped chipotle chile | 1 tablespoon unsalted butter
Recipe Instructions: trim the steak and place in a roasting pan with about 12 inch of oil.  roast in a moderate oven at 425 degrees f for 15 minutes.  remove.  add a little water, salt, and pepper to taste.  season the steaks to your liking with salt, the chiles and 14 teaspoon of the chipotle mixture.  set grill over medium high heat and cover.  grill steaks for about an hour, until tender and browned on both sides.  remove, place on platter, and drizzle with butter and serve.
Recipe Titile: Chipotle Grilled Beef With Red Peppers

Random Ingredients: baby lettuce spring green,salmon fillet,blueberry,bacon,blackberry,flat leaf parsley
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 lb salmon fillet, skinned and coarsely sliced thin | 1/2 large fresh blueberries | 1/2 cup blackberry, well drained | 1 cup baby lettuce and spring greens, stemmed | 1 cup fresh flat leaf parsley, finely chopped | 1/2 cup bacon, crumbled
Recipe Instructions: season salmon fillet with salt and pepper.  arrange blueberries, blackberries, lettuce and spring greens in 1 shallow pan.  add bacon ; turn over salmon.  season with salt and pepper.  cover and refrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight, or longer if necessary.  preheat broiler.  broil salmon until almost on the bone, turning frequently, for 6 to 8 minutes, or until cooked through.  remove from oven and place on warm serving platter.  sprinkle with parsley, cover and broil for 2 additional minutes to crispiness.  serve salmon with slices of bacon on each side.

Ingredient Phrases: 500 g orzo or 500 g oat | cooking oat | 4 egg yolks | 2 cups icing sugar | 2 teaspoons baking powder | 1 cup sugar | 4 tablespoons caster sugar | 1 cup chopped walnuts ( from one walnut ) | 2 tablespoons orange zest ( or 1 small zest of a red orange ) | 1/4 cup orange zest ( or 1 small orange ) | 3 cups all-purpose flour | 2 tablespoons icing sugar | 4 cups roasted whole almonds, chopped | 2 tablespoons shredded soft unsalted butter
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 180c 220c fan forced.  place a large pan with 12c of the chopped walnuts in the middle of the oven.  place in the oven for 3 minutes until the nuts and walnuts are blistered.  remove from the oven, and set aside.  while the nuts and walnuts are blistered, prepare icing and sugar.  cut the orzo in slices in the top and the sides.  cut into cubes and set aside.  stir together the icing sugar, baking powder, baking soda and sugar until mixture forms a thin paste.  whisk in the chopped nuts and zest.  season with salt and to taste, and mix well.  spoon about half of the chopped almonds into the centre of the orzo mixture.  roll tightly then form triangles or circles to fill the centre of the orzo.  place in a baking tray, and roast for 2540min until golden brown.  remove from the oven, and set aside.  place the melted butter and chopped nuts in a saucepan over medium low heat, and bring to the boil.  simmer for 1 minute, stirring constantly.  beat in the flour, sprinkle with icing sugar and reduce heat to keep warm.  remove from the heat and leave to cool.  mix together the almonds, icing sugar and butter in a bowl.  stir in the chopped nuts and zest.  mix in to the cooled orzo mixture and scatter half of the almonds directly on top.  bake for about 30 minutes or until golden brown.  cut into squares and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 lb sweet and sour sweet and sweet potatoes, peeled and cut in 14 inch dice | 1 cup semi-sweet chocolate, chips | 1/2 cup low fat milk ( optional ) or 1/2 cup reduced-fat short-grain whole milk ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: mix sweet and sour potatoes and chocolate chips in medium saucepan over medium heat until melted, about 3 minutes.  pour liquid into medium size bowl and bring to boiling.  reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens slightly, about 2 minutes.  remove from heat and set aside.  scoop off skins with a potato masher.  heat chocolate chips and milk in double boiler over a medium heat to boiling ; return to boil and stir until chocolate chips are melted and melted all over, about 20 seconds.  transfer half of potato mixture to saucepan and top with half the chocolate mixture.  chill until chocolate chips just begin to set, at least 2 hours or up to 1 day.  chill until cold, at least 12 hours.  cut sweet potatoes into 14 inch pieces.
Recipe Titile: Chocolate Baked Sweet and Sour Potatoes

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large yellow squash | 1 can crushed dried cranberries | 3 -4 cups vegetable stock | 1 cup vanilla yogurt ( or vegan version )
Recipe Instructions: peel squash and place in a plastic bag.  shake to ensure the squash is completely covered with juice.  let sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes.  remove skins from squash, squeezing out seeds and membrane.  place squash on a flat work surface, and cut into cubes.  toss in liquid, yogurt, and orange section into blender and blend until smooth.  refrigerate for 1 hour.  this can be made ahead to serve.  note  if you can wait a half hour or two to blend the flavors, you may want to refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.  use the blender before serving.  you may have the same choice if you want to serve the dip right away.

Random Ingredients: cucumber,savory,lettuce,chicken bouillon cube,celery rib,swiss cheese,yellow rice,corn oil
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup fresh white wine | 1/2 cup light corn oil | 4 cups chicken bouillon cubes | 2 large yellow rice | 2 cups baby carrots | 2 fresh celery ribs, cut into quarters | 1 tablespoon vegetable oil | 3/4 cup red peppers or 1 tablespoon yellow pepper flakes | 1 lb butternut squash, peeled cut into 1/2-inch cubes | 1 small cucumber, peeled cut into 1-inch cubes | 1 large mushroom, sliced | 1 can corn and beans, drained, rinsed, and rinsed | 1 can sliced green onion | 1/4 cup celery rib, sliced | 1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves, rinsed and minced | 1/4 cup green onion, thinly sliced | 1 garlic, peeled ( optional ) | 2 teaspoons curry powder | 1 1/2 tablespoons savory, chopped ( can add a lot more ) | salt | black pepper | 2 tablespoons worcestershire sauce
