Recipe Instructions: in a large heavy pot over medium heat, cook the wine and rice in the wine until liquid is evaporated, about 5 minutes.  reduce heat to low and cook and stir the bouillon cubes until the water is absorbed ; reduce heat to mediumlow to let the liquid infuse the rice and vegetables into the pot ; pour off the liquid ; and stir in the red peppers, squash, cucumber, mushroom, corn, green onions, celery and cilantro ; cook and stir to coat squash and squash with the vegetables ; cook until the vegetables are softened and beginning to turn white, 1 to 2 minutes.  add the carrots and the green onion to the vegetables ; cook, stirring, until the vegetables have browned on all sides, about 1 hour more.  reduce heat to low and cook for another 1 to 2 minutes until the vegetables are tender and the liquid is evaporated, about 3 to 4 minutes longer ; stir in the cilantro, green onion and garlic if using and cook and stir until flavors blend, 5 to 10 minutes more.  season soup with curry powder, savory, and salt and pepper.  simmer soup in a pot on medium low to simmer until vegetables are tender, 1 to 1 - 12 hours.  uncover and cook until soup is hot, about 1 - 12 hours more.  remove any vegetables that arent tender and stir the soup in the soup until it thickens.  garnish with chopped fresh cilantro leaves and serve.
Recipe Titile: Chicken and Mushroom Soup With Sweet Potato and Cauliflower

Random Ingredients: anaheim chilies,caster sugar,cayenne,stewing beef,serrano pepper,vegetable broth,coriander powder,ketchup
Ingredient Phrases:
250 g stewing beef, cut into bite sized pieces.
    - | 2 medium anaheim chilies | 300 g pumpkin | 2 garlic cloves | 150 g fresh coriander powder | 1 teaspoon curry paste | 25 ml vegetable broth | 250 g ketchup | 300 ml frozen vegetable stock | 250 g frozen mixed vegetables
Recipe Instructions: for the stew, in a dutch oven with 2cm of space, brown the beef and chiles in a heavy based saucepan on all sides in a little oil over medium heat until the meat is almost cooked.  remove the beef with a slotted spoon, drain the excess fat, discarding the liquid.  return the beef to the pan and pour in the chopped vegetables.  bring to the boil, reduce heat to low, cover and cook for 40 minutes or until most of the liquid has been absorbed.  the stew can be served over rice or with boiled rice for lunch.

Random Ingredients: watercress,cream chicken soup,self raising flour,curly leaf parsley,flat leaf parsley,beer,celery rib
Ingredient Phrases: 5 cups self-raising flour | 1 1/2 teaspoons instant coffee | 1 1/2 cups cold beer | 8 ounces self raising flour | watercress, leaves only, chopped to 1 inch | 1 cup small curly leaf parsley ( stems and seeds removed, or more if you're feeling inclined ) | 1 cup frozen curly leaves or 4 fresh currants | 1 cup sour cream or 1 cup heavy cream ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: combine all ingredients except the sour cream in a large bowl and combine well.  set aside.  refrigerate in the refrigerator 1 hour to 1 hour, until chilled.  pour into a 6quart baking dish in the bottom of the oven.  place a rack in it and heat to 350 degrees.  bake at 350 degrees until done, about 10 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Barbados (Spanish Curried Chicken and Watercress Soup)

Random Ingredients: cumin seed,salt pork,white sesame seed,shiitake mushroom,cantaloupe,jasmine rice,bacon bit,vanilla bean
Ingredient Phrases: 1 tablespoon smoked bacon bits | 2 cups chopped fresh shiitake mushrooms | 1/2 cup chopped white sesame seeds | 1 cup chopped cantaloupe ( red or green ) | 1/4 cup jasmine rice ( i prefer the japanese one, but you can sub regular rice ) | 2 teaspoons ground cumin seeds | 1/4 cup white sesame seeds | 2/3 cup pitted and sliced jasmine rice
Recipe Instructions: in a large stock pot with a lid, cook rice for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.  mix the smoked bacon, shiitake mushrooms, white sesame seeds, cantaloupe, and jasmine rice into a bowl.  add the smoked bacon mixture to the vegetables.  bring to a boil, reduce the heat, cover, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes or until the grains are tender, stirring occasionally.  season to taste with cumin and season to taste.

Random Ingredients: canola oil,epazote leaf,catsup,wasabi paste,golden caster sugar,ice,cream cottage cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 3/4 cup sugar | 1 can sweetened condensed cream | 1 cup applesauce | 2 -3 tablespoons canola oil | 1 tablespoon mustard | 2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar | 1 tablespoon golden caster sugar | 2 green onions, sliced | 1 cup chickpeas, drained and rinsed | 2 cups ice | 1 tablespoon catsup ( optional ) | 1/2 teaspoon dill | 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley | 1/4 cup chopped fresh dill, chopped ( optional ) | 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, chopped ( optional ) | 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rose leaves, chopped ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a large saucepan, combine the sugar, cream, apple cider vinegar, golden caster, green onion, chickpeas, ice, catsup, and seasonings, stirring with a wooden spoon, until well blended.  bring to a simmer over medium heat and cook, stirring constantly, for about 7 minutes.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup sugar | 1/3 cup oats ( or cornstarch ) | 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper | 1 teaspoon vanilla essence | 1/2 cup crushed coconut | 1/4 cup wholemeal oatmeal | 1/3 cup shredded coconut
Recipe Instructions: in large saucepan, beat sugar with 1 teaspoon of the oats.  stir in the cayenne salt, vanilla, coconut and coconut cream until smooth.  stir in half of the drained oats, and cook for 1 minute on low heat.  add the remaining 4 ounces of nuts.  cook for 1 minute on high heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens slightly and becomes a sauce.  add the half of drained oats, and mix and serve as a side dish, garnished with the shredded coconut if using.

Random Ingredients: flat leaf italian parsley,coriander seed,peanut oil,bulk italian sausage,cabbage,pasta,milk ricotta cheese,vanilla
Ingredient Phrases: 2 packages fresh cabbage | 3 cups uncooked pasta | 1 lb bulk italian sausage | 3 teaspoons cinnamonshire sauce | 2 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley, chopped | 1/2 teaspoon crushed coriander seed | 2 tablespoons peanut oil | 1 tablespoon milk ricotta cheese
Recipe Instructions: cook pasta al dente in large pot of boiling salted water, drain and set aside.  in large bowl, mix together cabbage, 14 cup of the cooked pasta, and half of the sausage with 12 cup of the water.  cook and stir until cooked through, approximately 5 minutes, stirring or pausing to mix.  pour remaining pasta mixture into large bowl.  mix together remaining 14 cup of pasta, ricotta cheese, hot sauce, parsley, coriander seed, peanut oil, and milk ricotta cheese in blender or food processor ; blend until smooth.  heat remaining 1 teaspoon of oil in saucepan and brown sausage with fork 4 minutes or until no longer pink.  add cabbage mixture to spinach mixture.  add remaining sausage to saucepan and bring to boil.  cook until sausage is no longer pink, about 3 minutes.  remove from heat, stir in remaining 1 teaspoons of oil.  serve with spaghetti sauce and croutons.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 cups corned beef or 6 cups boneless pork ( boneless is ok too, but any boneless pork will do ) | 3 tablespoons fresh sage ( or cardamom pods )
Recipe Instructions: rinse corned beef well with cold salt, running water under it.  put the corned beef into a large pot over high heat and add a few tablespoons of the sage to it, so that it does not stick to the bottom of the pot.  add the corned beef and cook on medhigh heat for 68 minutes, until most of the fat has rendered out of the meat.  remove from the heat, stir in 3 tablespoons of the sage to the pot, add the corned beef mixture and cook on top of the stove over medhigh heat for an additional 1 hour, until the meat is very tender.  do not boil the mixture.  when all the meat has been cooked, place it on a plate and cover with a clean kitchen towel or foil.  let it stand for 15 minutes, then carefully lift the lid and leave the corned beef in the pot over high heat for an additional 40 minutes, until youve reached your desired tenderness.  you can make this soup in two batches and the top will be nice and soft, but be careful not to add too much salt or butter or fat, or the salt will be really bitter.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 baguette ( shredded ) | 1 cup light cream ( optional ) | 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese | 1 banana
Recipe Instructions: mix cream cheese with the bananas in a medium bowl.  in a separate bowl, mix cheddar with cream.  fold each banana lengthwise in half.  sprinkle with cheese and bananas.  cover  microwave on high for 45 minutes.  remove from microwave, place on a large cutting board and cut into 16 diagonal slices.  slice into 2 squares each.  place on a serving platter and top each with a slice of avocado and shredded baguette.

Random Ingredients: chicken stock powder,mango,topping,black cardamom pod,half,spinach leaf,chocolate
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup vegetable oil | 1/4 teaspoon black cardamom pod | 1 teaspoon vanilla pod, ground | 1 3/4 cups cooked chicken stock ( i prefer low-sodium ) | 3/4 cup chopped spinach leaves | 3 tablespoons chopped pitted mango ( you can use any type of fresh fruit you like ) | 3 tablespoons chopped blanched almonds | 3 tablespoons finely chopped desiccated coconut | 5 cups half-and-half cream | 4 large chopped fresh spinach leaves | 4 tablespoons chopped fresh lemon juice | 1 teaspoon sugar
Recipe Instructions: heat oil in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat.  add cardamom pod, vanilla pod, garlard, and 1 - 12 cups chicken stock ; stir to dissolve.  reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 12 to 15 minutes, or until fragrant.  stir spinach, mangoes and almonds into hot oil.  pour stock mixture over spinach mixture and cook, stir constantly until spinach mixture begins to soften, about 5 minutes.  stir 1 cup chopped green onion into spinach mixture ; cook and stir until onion begins to darken slightly, about 2 minutes.  stir halfandhalf into spinach mixture.  cook and stir until sauce has thickened slightly, about 3 seconds.  stir lemon juice and sugar into spinach mixture ; simmer gently until flavors combine, about 10 minutes.  place spinach mixture in a blender and puree until smooth.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package brown gravy mix | 1/2 cup shredded dried horseradish | 1/2 cup chopped ripe raisins
Recipe Instructions: in a large heavy cast iron pan over mediumhigh heat, combine gravy mix and horseradish.  season with salt and pepper.  pour gravy on top.  cook, stirring once for 1 minute ; remove from heat.  spoon about 1 - 12 tablespoons gravy over top and stir to coat.  let stand in slow cooker for 3 hours.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 pinch fresh basil | 1 tablespoon powdered sugar | 3/4 cup butter, softened | 1/2 cup white flour | 1/2 cup white bread flour | 3 egg yolks, slightly beaten ( or 1 egg yolk ) | 1 pinch vanilla extract | 1 cup cremini mushroom
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 400f in a bowl, mix the basil, sugar, and butter together and form a ball.  roll out onehalf of dough and then line a 9x13 jellyroll pan.  spread over the mushroom base and make a border on top of it with your thumb and press it together, forming a border, until all the mushrooms are in the mushroom base.  press the border together to seal the mushrooms and then gently fold the ends of the mushroom mixture firmly in in to form a dough.  refrigerate dough as it is prepared, at least one hour.  preheat the oven to 425f grease a baking sheet.  place a dough strip on the prepared baking sheet to form one long rectangle, about 18 thick.  brush a baking sheet with oil and brush on the mushroom and cremini filling for a decorative effect.  bake for 1520 minutes or until golden brown.  let cool completely on a wire rack.  serve warm or warm.

Ingredient Phrases:
2 -3 lbs boneless skinless chicken breasts or ( 15 ounce ) chicken breast, cut into 2-inch slices | 1 - 1 1/2 lb onion, large | 1 -2 cup yellow onion, diced | 1/4 - 1/4 cup red pepper ( to taste ) | 0.
    -5 envelope frozen whole black beans | 1/2 yellow pepper, sliced thin | 2 tablespoons minced fresh chili sauce | 1 teaspoon ground cumin | 1 teaspoon ground black pepper | 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin powder | 1 teaspoon grated fresh lime rind | 2 cups shredded italian seasoned bread | 1 can chopped green beans | 4 slices italian-style bread, split
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 400f.  in crock pot place chicken, onion, yellow onion, red pepper, black beans, yellow pepper, chili sauce, spices, 14 c of the cumin, salt and freshly ground black pepper.  sprinkle a layer of bread in crock pot place green beans and remaining cumin mixture, mix well, cover with lid and cook on low for 68 hours at least.  after 68 hours, shred chicken.  in same pan, combine remaining cumin and fresh lime rind and saute on high for 10 minutes.  top with remaining bread, place on a cookie sheet and bake 15 minutes or until brown.  sprinkle top with remaining cumin and serve at once.
Recipe Titile: Mexican Chicken with Black Beans & Cumin

Random Ingredients: lard,egg yolk,green cardamom pod,tahini,poblano chile,romaine lettuce,mandarin orange segment
Ingredient Phrases: 1 medium poblano chile, seeded and cubed ( yellow section ) | 3/4 cup lard ( or extra-virgin olive oil ) | 3/4 lb mandarin orange segment | 2 green cardamom pods | 1 cup blackeyed mandarin orange segments | 1/2 cup blackeyed almonds | 1/3 cup all-purpose flour | 1 egg yolk | 1 tablespoon tahini ( or to taste )
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, combine the chiles, lard, mandarin orange segments and green cardamom pods.  mix thoroughly.  add the mandarin orange segments and almonds to the lard mixture and toss to coat.  pour into a 9x13inch baking dish ; season with flour and top with the almonds and pistachios.  bake uncovered in a 450 degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until the almonds are golden.  drain on a paper towellined plate, sprinkle with tahini and serve.
Recipe Titile: Pebbollas With Almonds and Poblano Peppers

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 lb salmon, skinned and cut into bitesize pieces ( about 1 ounce ) | 1/2 onion, diced | 4 tomatoes with medium chilies, chopped ( about 6 ounces ) | 8 slices raw shrimp, skinned & deveined | 2/3 cup water | 1 can sweet-and-sour cream-style sweet-and-sour pickles | 2 jalapeno chiles, julienned | 1/2 cup dried liquid honey | 1/4 cup dried crushed tomatoes with green chilies
Recipe Instructions: combine salmon, onions, tomatoes, shrimp, and water in a large bowl.  mix until smooth ; set aside for later use.  mix creamstyle sweet and sour pickles, jalapeno pepper, and honey together in a bowl ; pour over the salmon mixture.  stir until well blended ; set aside.  pour the strained sauce over the salmon mixture to coat well.  arrange the sliced shrimp in a single layer on top of the reserved salmon sauce mixture ; pour over the tomato mixture evenly.  cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours ; refrigerate 4 hours or overnight, turning occasionally.  remove from refrigerator  serve chilled while chilling.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup vegetable oil | 3 tablespoons chili powder | 3 tablespoons white sugar | 2 tablespoons dark rum | 8 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, sliced into 1-inch pieces | 1 can organic evaporated milk or ( 28 ounce ) can cornstarch | 7 cloves garlic, crushed
Recipe Instructions: heat oil in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat.  stir in chilli powder, add sugar, cook and stir until sugar dissolved, then reduce heat to medium and stir in rum.  cook until chicken begins to brown, 4545 minutes.  remove chicken and set aside.  stir evaporated milk and garlic into the saucepan and bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until thickened slightly, about 1 minute.  add chicken, lower heat, cover and cook until the sauce is thickened slightly, 20 to 25 minutes more.  serve with szechwan jam.

Random Ingredients: bean,chicken breast half,peanut oil,soymilk,rosemary leaf,marinara sauce,cooking spray,sherry wine vinegar
Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups chicken breast halves, pounded thin | 1/3 cup bean sauce | 1/3 cup peanut oil | 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper | 1 teaspoon lime juice | 1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon dried marinara sauce | 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic, minced | 12 ounces jarred roasted peanuts | 2 cups low-fat soymilk | cooking spray | 1 tablespoon bottled basil, chopped | 3 tablespoons canola oil | 1 1/2 teaspoons fresh rosemary leaves, chopped
Recipe Instructions: in medium bowl, combine chicken with sauce and oil.  shape into 12inch wide loaves and place on paper towellined baking sheet ; preheat oven to 400 degrees f 200 degrees c.  spray a 12inch shallow baking dish with cooking spray.  arrange chicken on prepared baking dish.  bake in preheated oven 45 minutes, or until heated through.  remove chicken from baking dish.  in skillet, heat canola oil over mediumhigh heat.  brown chicken on all sides, about 10 minutes per side.  reduce heat to mediumlow and stir in basil and remaining sauce.  drizzle sauce over chicken.
Recipe Titile: Crock Pot Chicken Tacos With Basil Sauce, Beans, and Peanut Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 4 tablespoons swiss chard, washed and coarsely chopped | 4 tablespoons unsalted canned focaccia bread, cut into 2-inch pieces
Recipe Instructions: place chard, water and focaccia in a large bowl to cover.  bring to a boil, cover and simmer 10 minutes.  set aside.  preheat the ovens broiler and heat the broiler.  remove the potted vegetables and cut into quarters.  cut each quarter into quarters ; place the quarters in a large bowl and pour some chard broth into each quarters.  cover and bake uncovered for 40 minutes or until the bread is cooked through.  serve hot.

Random Ingredients: peanut oil,strawberry,oregano,green chili,grain rice,cherry tomato,scallion,garam masala
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups long grain rice | 2 tablespoons peanut oil | 2 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander | 1/2 teaspoon fresh ground mustard | 1/2 teaspoon ground coriander | 1/4 teaspoon turmeric | 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh ground mint or 1/2 teaspoon dried mint | 1 cup chopped green chili | 10 cherry tomatoes, halved | 2 cups chopped fresh strawberries | 3/4 cup sliced almonds, toasted | 1/2 cup chopped scallion
Recipe Instructions: in a large saucepan, heat the peanut oil over medium heat.  add 1 teaspoon of the coriander and 1 teaspoon of mustard and cook until fragrant, but not brown.  stir in the mustard, coriander, turmeric, mint, green chili, and cherry tomatoes.  cover and reduce heat to low.  microwave at mediumhigh for 5 minutes until heated through.  remove from the heat and cool to room temperature.  remove the seeds.  in a large bowl, stir together the cooked rice, 2 tablespoons oil, and the remaining 1 teaspoon of coriander.  cover and refrigerate until the rice is done.  stir in the mint, green chile halves, and strawberries.  spread the mixture into a 9 x 13 baking dish coated with cooking spray.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 can black bean sauce | 2 cups pasta or 2 cups water | pepper flakes | 1 jar pickling spice ( i find this spicy to be a good addition! )
Recipe Instructions: boil and stir pasta and sauce in large saucepan.  stir occasionally.  let simmer for 10 minutes.  add pepper flakes and cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.  add tomatoes, pepper sauce and cooking spices and cook covered for another 5 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Black Bean Sauce and Pasta Risotto

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb stewing beef | 2 tablespoons instant sugar | 1/4 cup chopped celery | 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda | 1/4 teaspoon baking soda | 1 can tomato puree | 4 tablespoons barbecue sauce | 3/4 cup dates, sliced
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into 1 to 1 - 14 inch strips, leaving 2 strips total.  brown meat in a skillet on all sides.  add 3 t of sugar and celery.  mix in baking soda.  stir in remaining 1 t of sugar and baking soda.  cook and stir for approximately 45 minutes or until the mixture is thickened enough to coat the back of a spoon.  remove and discard meat from skillet.  stir in remaining 3 t sugar  and 2 t celery and the tomatoes.  stir in the sauce and dates.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package cream cheese | 2 ounces whipping cream | 1 1/2 cups chopped celery & leaves | 1 can diced tomatoes | 1 can italian style stewed tomatoes | 3/4 cup white mushroom, chopped ( or any green onion you like ) | 1 1/4 cups canned beef fat free cream | 1/4 teaspoon italian seasoning
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, blend cream cheese, 14 cup of the celery chopped and the sliced tomatoes.  in blender add broth, the canned stewed tomatoes and sour cream and blend, adding more to taste to suit your taste.  in a large skillet, heat fatfree cream over medium heat until mixture thickens.  season mixture with italian seasoning and stir.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs boneless pork shoulder | 1 1/2 cups chopped yellow onions | 1/4 cup chopped carrot | 1/2 cup chopped jalapeno pepper | 1 1/2 cups shredded monterey jack cheese | 2 packages taco sauce ( or any other seasoning seasoning you like ) or ( 16 ounce ) package regular taco sauce | 1 large carrot, julienned ( white or jalapeno, i used a combination of both ) | 2 cups canned mild red beans - rinsed and drained | 1 cup fat free light paremade salsa | 30 ounces reduced fat mild chunky salsa | 1 teaspoon ground cumin
Recipe Instructions: in a slow cooker, place the pork, onion, carrots, jalapeno pepper, and cheese.  add the taco sauce ; cover and cook on low for 3 hours.  in a large mixing bowl, combine the salsa and cumin.  add the pork mixture back to the refrigerator to thicken.  this can be refrigerated, covered, or refrigerated for up to 24 hours.  remove the pork and onion mixture from the slow cooker ; shred the pork by hand.  stir in the beans and salsa and paremade.  add 14 cup fat or light fat and mix until blended.
Recipe Titile: Mexican Jerk Pork Stew - Slow Cooker

Random Ingredients: corn oil,red chilies,hot red pepper flake,pork tenderloin,pizza crust,pizza sauce,tea,cheese
Ingredient Phrases:
0.
    -5 package low fat pizza sauce ( or mild sweet chili sauce or dry ) | 1/3 cup frozen corn oil ( can use frozen ) | 1 pound pork tenderloin | 2 quarts hot red peppers or 2 quarts roasted red pepper flakes, divided ( depending on thickness ) | 1 cup dry roasted red chilies, divided ( depending on thickness ) | 1 1/2 teaspoons crushed roasted red pepper flakes ( optional ) | 3 quarts low-fat cheese, crumbled ( not fat free )
Recipe Instructions: prepare sauce according to package directions.  in a slow cooker or a slow cooker bowl, pour sauce, squash oil, pork tenderloin, red pepper, and chili flakes ; cover and cook on low setting for 8 to 9 hours or on high setting for 8 to 9 hours, stirring occasionally, or until pork is tender and falling apart.  remove pork from sauce ; remove foil with a slotted spoon.  let cool completely.  spread 12 cup sauce over meat, reserving sauce for next use.  heat 12 cup sauce over low heat, stirring often, until melted, about 30 seconds.  remove steak from the pan ; add pork to sauce ; toss to coat.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 red chili peppers, diced | 1 teaspoon red chili pepper | 2 1/4 cups cider
Recipe Instructions: mix all ingredients together in a medium saucepan.  simmer 15 minutes or until very thick.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 aubergines | 1/2 cup sugar | 1 tablespoon fresh ginger ale | 1 tablespoon fresh grated fresh peeled grated grated fresh tangerine | 4 eggs | 8 slices gruyere cheese, thinly sliced | 1/2 teaspoon grated fresh nutmeg | 2 fresh pearls, peeled and sliced | pear slices, toasted
Recipe Instructions: arrange aubergines between two sheets of heavyduty plastic wrap in a large resealable plastic bag and refrigerate for up to 24 hours.  preheat a large nonstick skillet over medium high heat.  in the skillet, cook the sugar and remaining 1 tablespoon of the ginger at a simmer until the caramel and sugar have dissolved, about 5 minutes total.  remove from the heat, and slowly whisk in the eggs.  beat in the gruyere, then gently whisk in the melted sugar.  arrange the slices of pear on top, and brush the aubergine slices with the beaten egg mixture, using a spatula to gently coat.  continue with the pearls and pearls, alternating layers of cooked aubergines, beaten eggs, and gruyere.  pour 14 cup of the water into the skillet, and bring to a boil, then remove from the heat.  cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 12 minutes before carving.  remove pan from the heat and cool completely, then cut into serving pieces, and serve.
Recipe Titile: Oubergine, Saubergine, Braid - Tender Steamed With Muffins

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package boneless skinless chicken breasts | 1 large onion, minced | 1 can chopped mexican-style diced tomatoes | parsley
Recipe Instructions: brown chicken with onion over mediumhigh heat.  stir in diced tomatoes with juice, cover and cook until chicken is very tender.  mix in chicken broth and sauce and serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 24 white mushrooms | 4 tablespoons mayonnaise | 1 bottle madeira wine
Recipe Instructions: heat an oven to 325 degrees f and line a shallow baking pan with foil.  pour a tablespoon of the honey mustard into the foil and place the mushroom slices on the prepared baking sheet.  bake in the oven for 45 minutes.  let the mushroom slices cool a little before serving.

Random Ingredients: mango chutney,bay leaf,vanilla ice cream,corn,cauliflower,wheat bread,portabella mushroom cap,beef roast
Ingredient Phrases: 1 roasting beef roast | 8 slices whole wheat bread, cubed | 2 tablespoons portabella mushrooms, sliced | 4 ounces peeled and sliced portabella mushrooms - drained | 1 1/2 tablespoons sugar | 1 bay leaf | 2 -3 cloves garlic, finely chopped | 2 -3 tablespoons chutney, chopped ( or to taste ) | 1/4 cup fresh strawberries, stemmed, halved, and juiced | 2 cans low-sodium condensed coconut milk | 2 teaspoons vanilla ice cream | salt and pepper to taste ( to taste )
Recipe Instructions: place roast on bottom rack of 4 quart preheated 375f oven, preferably with sides covered but not touching.  in a bowl, combine beef roast, mushroom, and portorcheese slices, tossing to combine.  cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.  in a small bowl, combine sugar, bay leaf, garlic, chutney, and strawberries.  season with salt and pepper.  place mushrooms in center with beef mixture on bottom of bread.  cover loosely with foil ; refrigerate 30 minutes.  remove foil ; cut into cubes and place on warm oven tray.  arrange 2 mushrooms on sandwich ; top with 3 slices of cheese.  top each with slice of mushroom and 12 tomatoes.  cut sandwiches in half ; garnish with remaining sauce.  serve immediately.  to store sandwiches, dust sandwiches with corn.  place sandwiches in refrigerator.  preheat oven to 350 degrees f 180c ; bake until cheese is melted, about 15 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Cauliflower Stuffed Portobello Mushroom Sausage Sandwich

Random Ingredients: vanilla ice cream,chicken bouillon granule,ham,allspice,salt black pepper,pork shoulder,linguine
Ingredient Phrases: 1 pound boneless pork shoulder, cut into chunks | 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice | 3 tablespoons vanilla ice cream | 3 tablespoons chicken bouillon granules | 3 teaspoons salt and black pepper to taste | 1/4 cup finely ground allspice | 6 ounces linguine ( italian or chunky )
Recipe Instructions: place pork in a large pot.  heat the juice of one lemon over medium heat.  increase heat to medium.  drop the pork into the boiling liquid and cook for 10 minutes, and remove with a slotted spoon into the liquid.  transfer to a large bowl.  season with salt and pepper, and stir in the allspice and cook for 5 minutes.  stir in the linguine.  remove from the heat and set aside.  sauce whisk the lemon juice and ice cream into the sauce and cook, whisking constantly, until the mixture thickens.  pour into a slow cooker.  cover and cook on high for 1 - 12 hours.  remove cover and cook on low 20 minutes longer, cooking on high just longer.  remove from heat and set aside.

Random Ingredients: lemon lime beverage,white pepper,tart apple,russet potato,jasmine rice,lychee,beef,blueberry
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup shredded russet potato | 2 cups chopped kale | 1 lemon lime beverage ( can use regular or lime for best flavour ) | 4 cups light blueberries | 2 cups white jasmine rice | 2 teaspoons grated lemons or 2 teaspoons fresh grated lime rind | 2 cups shredded cooked beef | 2 cups chopped fresh mint leaves
Recipe Instructions: combine potatoes and kale in a pot.  add 12 cup icewater and salt to taste.  bring to a boil.  simmer until tender, about 20 minutes.  stir in the lime beverage and reduce heat to low.  cook until mixture is hot but not bubbly.  stir in rice to cover.  continue to cook until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender, about 30 minutes.  stir in shredded beef ; cool slightly.  garnish with fresh mint, if desired.

Ingredient Phrases: 10 large ripe plum tomatoes ( ripe ) | 2 -3 tablespoons parsley, chopped | 1 garlic clove, minced | 1/2 cup corn oil, for frying | 2 cups thinly sliced fresh bread crumbs | 1/4 teaspoon pepper sauce | 2 tablespoons olive, pitted and minced | 1/2 cup tomato basil sauce | 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice
Recipe Instructions: heat a grill to mediumhigh, or heat broiler.  cut out tomatoes and arrange in a single layer on top of a plate, and leave the skin side up.  roast tomatoes in the preheated pan for 5 to 10 minutes on each side, until softened.  add tomato mixture and seasonings if needed.  serve over rice or toast.

Random Ingredients: confectioner ' sugar,salt pepper,fennel seed,white fish fillet
Ingredient Phrases: 1 head white fish fillets | 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar | 1 lemon, juice of | 3 tablespoons parsley flakes, to taste | 1 tablespoon chopped chives | 1 tablespoon fresh parsley leaves, chopped | 1 teaspoon salt and pepper | confectioners'sugar, for dusting
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil and add the peking fish.  cook for 6 minutes or until just cooked, stirring once.  remove and set aside.  rinse the fillets with cold running water and pat dry with paper towels.  cut fillets into 2inch lengths.  combine in a large mixing bowl the vinegar, lemon juice, parsley and chives and season with salt and pepper.  melt mustard over medium heat in a 10inch nonstick skillet.  add the fish and cook for 1 minute.  stir in the parsley.  add salt and pepper, and cook, stirring often, for about 2 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.  pour in confectioners sugar ; sprinkle over the fish and season with salt and pepper.

Random Ingredients: chicken stock vegetable,green cardamom,egg noodle,cumin,soy sauce,ginger,monterey jack cheese,rye flour
Ingredient Phrases: 2 teaspoons mustard | 1 teaspoon cumin | 1 teaspoon coriander | 1 teaspoon soy sauce | 1/4 teaspoon fresh ginger | 4 ounces chicken stock or 4 ounces vegetable stock | 100 g yolks, whole | 100 g green cardamoms, sliced | 50 g monterey jack cheese, grated | 5 large eggs, beaten | 2 cups toasted sesame oil or 2 cups peanut oil
Recipe Instructions: combine mustard, cumin, coriander, soy sauce, ginger, chicken stock and yoolks in small saucepan.  heat and cook over medium heat until thickened, 5 minutes.  mix together yolk, cardamoms, monterey jack and egg yolks if using ; beat till blended.  fold in zest and cardamom mixture.  melt oil in a 4 x 6 pan over medium heat, stirring regularly.  stir frying until golden brown.  stir in sesame oil in pan ; season with salt and pepper  add to pan.  fry gently until golden brown and cooked through, about 5 minutes.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 pears | 1 english muffin | 1 can pumpkin puree | 1/2 teaspoon ground hoisin sauce ( optional ) | 1/2 teaspoon caraway seed | 1/2 - 1 teaspoon ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 350f.  combine the pear puree, pumpkin, hisin sauce and pepper in a small bowl, stirring to distribute.  spread the mixture evenly between the muffin cups.  bake for 1012 minutes, or until the top is browned.
Recipe Titile: Pear and Pear Baked in English Muffin Cups

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups chopped kalamata olives ( cilantro or chives ) | 1/2 cup chopped chipotle chile | 6 whole chipotle chiles
Recipe Instructions: blend all ingredients in processor until smooth ; spoon into sterilized jars.  serve at room temperature.

Ingredient Phrases: 8 ounces broccoli, diced | 2 teaspoons soy sauce for sauce
Recipe Instructions: boil the broccoli for 10 minutes.  add garlic to the broth.  stir until sauce is reduced by half.  pour this into a blender and blend until smooth.

Random Ingredients: london broil beef,five spice powder,veal,beef chuck
Ingredient Phrases: 3 lbs lean ground beef | 3 teaspoons five-spice powder | 3/4 cup olive oil | 1/4 cup packed brown sugar | 2 teaspoons dried oregano | 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper | 2 bay leaves | 1 teaspoon dried parsley | 1 teaspoon dried thyme | 2 cloves garlic, minced | 4 -6 tablespoons minced yellow onions | 2 tablespoons smoked bacon | 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed | 1 can whole tomatoes, drained | 1/3 cup grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese
Recipe Instructions: brown ground beef cubes.  sprinkle with salt, then crumble in oil.  heat the oil in a large heavy skillet over mediumhigh heat.  when hot, add the browned beef cubes, stirring frequently, 2 minutes ; add the browned beef, bay leaves, parsley, thyme, and garlic.  cook about 5 minutes, or until beef is browned and fragrant.  stir in onion and bacon ; cook until onions are tender.  stir in chickpeas, tomatoes, feta, and cheese.  season with salt.  return beef to the skillet and drizzle the rest of the oil and season well.  cook until gravy has thickened a bit.  bring to a boil, reduce heat to mediumlow, and simmer another 35 minutes ; season with salt and pepper.  season stew to taste with salt and pepper before serving.

Random Ingredients: cumin seed,red chili pepper,sultana,creole seasoning,cranberry,chuck roast,avocado,yellow onion
Ingredient Phrases: 4 cups red chili pepper | 4 tablespoons cumin seeds | 1 tablespoon yellow onion, sliced | 4 ounces fresh cranberry, cut into 2-inch chunks | 18 ounces champagne vinegar | 3 lbs chuck roast, cut into 2-inch chunks | 1 red chili pepper, seeded and sliced into 1/2 inch pieces | 2 avocados, peeled, pitted and chopped
Recipe Instructions: add all ingredients except the chicken to a saucepan and simmer over mediumlow heat until chicken is tender but still soft about 10 minutes.  drain off excess liquid.  discard all but 14 cup water.  heat the saucepan over high heat until very hot and stir occasionally so the chavender not burn or become mushy.  pour chicken, reduce heat to mediumlow, and simmer for about 10 minutes, until chicken is just tender about 10 minutes more if the chavender becomes overly browned.  reduce heat to low and stir occasionally and continue cooking for about 45 minutes, until just tender about 15 minutes if the chavender becomes too browned or too mushy.  sprinkle with 2 slices of avocado and serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups fresh kidney beans ( or 2 cups dried kidney pods ) | 1/2 cup dry yeast ( your own can of homemade ) | 1/2 cup sugar | 1/4 cup apple juice | 1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato packed in oil ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: mix the beans into a saucepan.  add the yeast, sugar and oil.  simmer, uncovered, for 15 to 20 minutes.  remove from the heat.  stir in the bean mixture.  the mixture should look as if it was stirred to dissolve the yeast into the bean sauce.  return to the stove and stir in the remaining ingredients.  stir in more apple juice if desired.  simmer, covered for 1 hour or until the beans are tender.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 slices rye bread | 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar | 1/4 cup olive oil | 2 large red onions, chopped | 1 head fresh basil leaves, chopped | 2 tablespoons prepared balsamic vinegar
Recipe Instructions: pour 12 cup of balsamic vinegar over the crust.  sprinkle onion in with olive oil.  arrange in shallow baking pan.  bake at 350 for 1 hour or until golden brown and tender.  remove from oven and let cool to room temperature.
Recipe Titile: Roast Beef, Cranberry and Basil Bruschetta

Ingredient Phrases:
2 cups butter or 2 cups margarine | 1 1/2 cups milk | 1/2 cup white sugar | 1 egg | 1 1/4 cups corn kernel | 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour | 1/2 cup semi-sweet chocolate pudding mix | 4 ounces sliced scoops of semisweet brown gravy ( approx.
    - 4 ounces )
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, beat butter and 2 tablespoons milk together in large mixer.  add buttercreamy mixture and beat at low speed until very smooth, about 10 to 15 minutes.  add sugar and beat at medium speed for 3 minutes until thick and creamy.  whisk flour and pudding mix with an electric mixer until blended well.  mix in scoops of brown gravy.  spoon the mixture onto a lightly greased 11x7inch baking dish and dust with 1 teaspoon frosting.  top with chocolate mousse.  bake at 350 for 30 minutes.  cool 5 minutes and cut into squares if desired.

Recipe Instructions:
