 Curry and Egg Salad 
 
## Ingredients ##
 1 cup crushed ice in a bowl, but do not beat  or it will become too thick to make the sauce.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups baby spinach, washed and dried, reserving a little extra water | 6 -8 cups whole peeled fresh tomatoes | 1/4 cup chopped green onion | 1/4 cup chopped green onion | 1 teaspoon paprika | 1 cup low sodium chicken broth, made with ( such vegetable stock ) | 1 cup tomatoe pepper sauce ( optional ) or 1 cup canned tomato sauce | salt & freshly ground black pepper | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil ( or peanut butter ) | 1/2 cup romaine lettuce, diced
Recipe Instructions: in large saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.  add spinach ; cook 2 minutes stirring ; drain.  stir in onion, paprika, broth, tomato with juice and 12 cup water, and bring to a boil ; reduce heat to mediumlow, cover and simmer 5 minutes.  remove from heat.  stir in tomatoe pepper sauce, remaining 12 cup water, and green onion.  cover, and allow to simmer 5 minutes.  transfer to serving dish.  stir in lettuce.  spoon over salad.  bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes, until heated through and garnish with romaine and tomato.  serve immediately garnished with additional parsley and a small amount of fresh lemon zest.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs ground meatballs | 1/4 cup chopped pitted kalamata olive | 1/2 cup chopped green onion | 1 cup chopped fresh dill weed | 1 teaspoon cumin | 1 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1 teaspoon chili powder | 1 teaspoon cayenne | 1 teaspoon ground methi, or to taste | 1 teaspoon chili powder | 2 teaspoons cornstarch | 1 teaspoon salt | 1 garlic clove, crushed | 1 teaspoon turmeric powder
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 450 degrees f 220 degrees c.  lightly grease a baking sheet.  place meat in a medium bowl.  sprinkle with 1 teaspoon chopped garlic, 1 tablespoon minced green onion, and 1 teaspoon grated lemon zest and mix well.  combine the remaining ingredients in a bowl.  shape into 7 patties about 3 inches long and 12 inch wide.  bake in the preheated oven until golden brown and crisp, about 20 minutes.  flip the patties, and bake an additional 15 to 20 minutes.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 carrots, grated | 1/2 onion, finely sliced | 3 cloves garlic, lightly crushed | 3 -4 tablespoons plain fat-free yogurt | 1 1/2 cups white rice | 10 -15 chicken breasts, boiled ( or chicken thighs if preferred ) | 1 1/2 cups cauliflower heads ( or any variety of broccoli ) | 2 cups mushrooms ( or any variety of garlic, fresh or canned, fresh or canned, fresh or canned ) | 1 1/2 cups red potatoes ( or any combination of broccoli, or any combination of cauliflower, green, red or fresh, canned chicken or vegetables ) | 3 cups plain low-fat milk ( skimmed low fat ) | 3 tablespoons tomato paste | 4 teaspoons black pepper | 2 teaspoons curry powder ( to taste )
Recipe Instructions: heat oven to 375  degrees.  combine grated carrots, onion, garlic and 1 tablespoon yogurt.  mix in rice, and simmer uncovered for 1520 minutes.  mix in chicken, mushrooms and garlic mixture mixture.  reduce heat to low and add chicken and cauliflower to rice mixture, cover and cook until cauliflower is tender and chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes.  add potatoes or peas, and cook uncovered for another 5 minutes.  season with curry powder, black pepper and curry powder mixture.  stir in milk, tomato paste, and curry powder mixture.  cook for 1 minute.  add chicken and cauliflower back in, cover and cook for 2 minutes longer.  serve at once.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 whole chicken thigh or 1 piece lamb | 2 tablespoons dried coriander seeds or 2 tablespoons nutmeg ( can be found from iranian cookbook ) | 2 green peppers, deseeded, roughly chopped in a mortar | 2 cups canned black beans, drained | 1 can chopped tomatoes | 4 cloves garlic | 1/4 cup pistachios nuts
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f.  spray oven rack with pam and line a baking sheet with baking paper.  place chicken, soaked coriander seeds, peppers, tomatoes, garlic, and pistachios nuts in a shallow roasting pan, cover with foil and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.  remove foil and continue to roast until the chicken is no longer pink inside and the skins are lightly charred, 1520 minutes more.  transfer to a platter and allow to rest for 15 minutes before slicing.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 ounces coffee beans | 4 ounces white wine | 3 ounces vanilla sugar | 6 eggs | 1 cup margarine, melted | 1 tablespoon instant espresso powder
Recipe Instructions: in a saucepan over medium heat, bring beans, sugar, and vanilla to a boil.  place the coffee beans in the hot coffee beans.  cover and cook an instantread thermometer for 30 minutes, stirring regularly.  reduce heat to mediumlow and let steep for 30 minutes.  stir in the eggs and melted margarine, and blend at low speed until well mixed.  pour into a 10 to 12 inch springform pan, and bake for 40 minutes or until set and golden.

Ingredient Phrases: 12 pork meatballs | 1 head of cabbage | 1 small head celery | 2 garlic cloves | 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder | 3 tablespoons flour | bread crumbs ( optional ) | 1 pinch salt and pepper | 7 ounces vodka ( vodka works well ) | 8 slices bacon ( or bacon slices )
Recipe Instructions: place meatballs and celery in a large baking dish with enough water to cover and cover with water to come at you about halfway up the sides and bottom of the dish.  bake the meatballs in the oven, covered, at 450 until meatballs are done.  remove to a plate.  combine celery, garlic powder and flour, mix well and then add bread crumbs and salt and pepper to taste.  spoon about 12 cup meat mixture into each bread crumb, seal the dish tightly and bake at 450 degrees for 1012 minutes or until internal temperature registers 180 degrees.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups tap water | 1 cup celery, thinly sliced | 4 large garlic cloves, minced | 1 lb lean ground turkey bacon | 3/4 cup butter | 5 tablespoons fresh sage, chopped | 3 tablespoons freshly chopped fresh sage, chopped | 3 tablespoons olive oil | 1/2 cup white wine | 1/2 cup dry white wine | 1/2 cup chopped onion | 1/3 cup crumbled dried fennel bulb | 1/3 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes | 1/4 teaspoon sea salt and black pepper | 1/4 teaspoon coarse ground black pepper
Recipe Instructions: bring water to a slow boil in a pot.  add celery, garlic, and bacon.  reduce heat and simmer, covered, about 2 - 12 hours.  meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix all the ingredients except the salt and pepper ; set aside.  add the bacon to the pot along with the sage and fennel, and simmer for one hour.  reduce heat and simmer, covered, about 10 minutes.  stir in the reserved bacon drippings.  simmer gently until the meat is firm, stirring occasionally.  taste, for salt and pepper, and adjust the seasonings.  spoon meat meat into a serving bowl.  top with the remaining ingredients.  season with salt and pepper and serve.

Random Ingredients: anaheim chilies,cumin seed,lasagna noodle,cayenne,extra virgin olive oil,celery rib,almond
Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil | 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper | 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin seed | 2 lbs lasagna noodles, cooked | 1 1/2 ounces chopped celery ribs | 3 garlic cloves, minced | 2 anaheim chilies, seeded and chopped
Recipe Instructions: in a large saucepan, heat olive oil.  add cumin seeds and stirfry over mediumhigh heat until fragrant, 10 to 15 seconds.  add onion and garlic, cover, and cook till soft, 5 to 8 minutes.  add chilies and cook until fragrant, adding reserved oil occasionally.  add noodles and cook on medium heat until no longer pink but still slightly plump, 4 to 5 minutes.  combine flour and salt and stir thoroughly into noodles.  sprinkle garlic mixture over noodles.  cover, cook until sauce reduces by half, about 8 to 10 minutes.  remove cover and cook noodles longer if needed.  sprinkle with remaining cayenne, if desired.
Recipe Titile: Lasagna Stuffed Shells With Roasted Garlic, Almonds and Black Pepper

Ingredient Phrases: 300 g white button mushrooms | 200 g coriander leaves | 4 tablespoons ghee | 4 steaks or 4 beef fillets, trimmed | 1 teaspoon mustard
Recipe Instructions: slice the mushrooms into small cubes.  put all the ingredients in a food processor and process until the mixture is like coarse meal in food processor.  keep aside to marinate for about 30 minutes.  mix well and roll into long strips.

Ingredient Phrases: 16 whole tomatoes with green chilies | 2 tablespoons light thai chilis, preferably tamari or chile paste ( available at asian grocery stores ) | 2 tablespoons tomato paste
Recipe Instructions: peel and cut whole tomatoes into half or whole tomatoes.  combine all ingredients.  marinate on baking sheet overnight or up to 8 hours until tomatoes are tender.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 slices bacon | 12 slices boursin merlot
Recipe Instructions: mix the bacon with the mixed in the bacon drippings and mix in the merlot until evenly coated into the bottom of the Burgers.  cook in batches in a covered pan until cooked through but firm to the bite on the outside, 3 to 4 minutes per side.  serve at once.  note i have also made this with buttery mustard, but it is too bland with cherries.  a great addition to warm rolls with a nice sourdough yogurt.

Random Ingredients: cumin seed,chicken breast,red chile pepper,chard leaf,mustard powder,lime juice zest,beef broth
Ingredient Phrases: 8 inches boneless skinless lamb roast ( about 4-5 pounds ) | 6 tablespoons cornstarch | 1 tablespoon chopped fresh ginger | 2 tablespoons minced garlic | 1 tablespoon grated fresh coriander | 2 tablespoons mustard powder | 1 tablespoon mild red chili pepper ( chile paste, optional ) | 1 teaspoon ground turmeric | 1 teaspoon ground cumin seed | 1 tablespoon ground mace paste | 2 teaspoons ground black sesame seeds | 1 tablespoon finely diced red onion | 6 tablespoons grated green chili pepper | 1 tablespoon minced fresh carrot or 1 inch piece celery | 2 teaspoons chopped red pepper flakes | 1 tablespoon garlic, chopped | 2 teaspoons fresh chili juice | 1 tablespoon lime juice, zest of | 4 sprigs fresh chervil | 2 cloves chopped coriander
Recipe Instructions: combine cornstarch with the ginger, garlic, ginger, coriander, mustard, chili, turmeric, cumin, mace, and 14 tsp green chilli paste.  combine marinade ingredients in a resealable bag.  marinate lamb in the mixture for at least 1 - 14 hours or overnight.  preheat the oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.  combine the lamb with 2 tablespoons cumin sauce and place on a baking sheet sprayed with cooking spray.  combine the marinade ingredients at the same time ; cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour to overnight.  preheat the oven to 325 degrees f 175 degrees c.  remove roast from marinade and shred it, about 2 per meat, in batches and refrigerate 1 hour to overnight.  remove and discard any excess marinade.  remove the lamb from the marinade and shred it again, about 2 per meat, in batches and refrigerate at least 1 hour to overnight.  heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a skillet over mediumhigh heat.  add the lamb and cook, turning to brown all sides, about 3 minutes per side, until golden brown.  remove from pan and discard any excess marinade.  discard marinade and discard remaining marinade.  place the beef into the skillet, cover, and heat to boiling.  reduce the heat to mediumlow and simmer until meat is very tender, about 4 to 5 minutes.  stir in reserved marinade and 1 - 12 cup water.  cook until thickened, stirring frequently, about 5 to 6 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Chicken and Lamb With Green Chili Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 6 pork shoulder or 6 pork mince | 2 lbs pork smoked mince | 6 slices boston lettuce leaves, torn | 1 slice boston lettuce leaf
Recipe Instructions: place the pork mince on a heavy cookie sheet.  dust it with seasoned salt and pepper to taste.  roast in a charcoal grill for about 1 hour, or until lightly browned.  let the pork mince cool for about 4 hours to make it easier to handle.  combine the smoked pork and pork meat mixture in a medium glass bowl.  place in a hot pot and heat until warm, then remove from the heat.  cover the bowl with a clean cloth, and let the mixture sit for about 4 hours.  remove the bowl from the heat and let the mixture rest for 5 to 6 hours.  divide the pork mixture evenly between the 2 bowls.  place a slice of lettuce leaf alongside each piece of pork mixture.  pour the marinade on the boston lettuce strips.  sprinkle the dressing evenly over all.  chill for at least 4 hours, or up to 1 week.
Recipe Titile: Smoked Pork and Pork in a Crowd (Boston)

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cups fresh beef sirloin | 2 red onions ( sliced ) | 1 medium bosc pears ( sliced ) | 4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil | 2 tablespoons bosc pear ( diced ) | 1 -2 tablespoon parsley ( finely chopped ) | 1 teaspoon fennel seed | 2 teaspoons saffron | salt and pepper | 1/2 cup sugar | 1 pinch salt and pepper
Recipe Instructions: boil beef till tender.  put salt, pepper and the beef in pan and saute till browned all over.  add water and bring to a boil.  add pear skins, onions and tomatoes and cover.  simmer about 10 minutes.  add oil and stir till fragrant.  remove from heat and add paprika, saffron, sugar and salt, stir.  add sugar as well.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 3/4 lbs fresh dried blackberries | 1 1/4 cups dry sherry wine | 1 large fresh coriander, coarsely chopped | 3 -5 tablespoons oyster pieces, crushed | 1 1/2 cups fresh fresh dry white berries
Recipe Instructions: rinse blackberries well in boiling, salted water.  drain and place into a resealable plastic bag.  add fresh blackberries and dry sherry and seal.  cover and turn to coat.  seal for 1 - 2 hours at room temperature, turning once, until well dried.  transfer to a plate.  reserve remaining water.  remove woody outer leaves from coriander leaves and trim to 1 inch length.  brush dry woody leaf tips lightly with reserved dry sherry water.  place pieces in bowl.  combine remaining 12 cup dry sherry water and remaining 1 - 12 cups sherry water, and pour into the mixture.  gently stir to form a sauce.  allow to marinate up to 4 hours or overnight in refrigerator.  discard leaves from coriander and discard.  refrigerate jelly overnight in refrigerator until ready to use.  remove from refrigerator about 1 hour before making filling.  heat jelly in a small flameproof skillet over mediumhigh heat.  cook and stir jelly over medium heat for about 15 seconds.  stir in coriander.  allow to dry, about 3 minutes.  stir in the fresh berries.  place pan over mediumhigh heat and heat over high heat until jelly begins to bubble.  remove pan from heat.  turn jelly over and remove jelly from heat.  stir in reserved dry woody leaf tips, coriander and oyster.  refrigerate jelly at room temperature until cold.  refrigerate jelly until chilled.  preheat oven to 425 degrees f.  carefully lift jelly onto a sheet of foil that will not catch any air.  remove jelly from foil and transfer to cookie sheet.  remove jelly from freezer.  cool jelly to room temperature before removing cookies to a serving platter.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup peanut oil | 1/2 teaspoon garam masala | 2 teaspoons flat leaf parsley, chopped
Recipe Instructions: heat oil in a pan using a little oil in the pan.  stir fry the curry paste for 5 seconds and add garam masala, flat leaf parsley and stir fry for a minute.  add chopped peanuts and stir fry until the peanuts brown.  serve straight from the pan.

Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cucumber, peeled and diced | 3 roma tomatoes, chopped fine ( can use cilantro, chopped ) | 1/2 teaspoon mustard powder ( divided ) | 1 1/2 cups water | 1 1/2 cups frozen snow peas or 1 1/2 cups frozen corn | 1/3 cup chopped onion ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a large ziplock bag, combine the cucumber, tomatoes, mustard powder, water and snow peas ; toss to mix.  stiffly press the mixture onto the dampened, dry bottom of the ziplock bag.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs ground beef | 1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda | 1 cup apple cider
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into strips.  mix together crumbs, spices and liquid.  bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.  add the cider and simmer, stirring with a stick of knife, until meat is almost fully cooked, another 20 minutes.  serve with a hearty salad or over crackers.

Random Ingredients: chuck roast,meatball,garlic,coffee,celery,self raising flour,broccoli floret,pork tenderloin
Ingredient Phrases: 1 beef tenderloin | 8 cloves garlic | 1 lb ground chuck roast | 1/4 teaspoon crushed pepper | 1 teaspoon caronade seasoning | 1 cup chopped peeled broccoli floret | 6 ounces frozen meatballs | 4 tablespoons vegetable oil
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into 1inch cubes.  rinse beef thoroughly under cold running water and pat dry.  season beef with garlic, pepper and caronade.  season meat with salt and pepper and put into a large skillet over medium heat.  cook until meat is no longer pink.  add meatballs and continue cooking until done, about 25 minutes.  sprinkle beef with the remaining spices and broth with enough water to cover meat.  allow meat to cook until very tender.  preheat oven to 425 degrees.  bake meat for 45 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Barbecued Beef With Beans and Broccoli

Ingredient Phrases: 2 pounds liver, cut into strips | 3/4 cup red wine, plus extra for steaming | 3/4 cup red apple cider vinegar | 2 ounces bacon, cut into strips | 1 apple cider vinegar | 2 tablespoons crushed chipotle chiles | 1/2 cup raisins | 3/4 cup palm oil
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot of water to a simmer and bring a quarter pound of pork belly to a boil.  cook the tail strips in boiling water until almost brown ; drain.  transfer the bacon to a shallow dish.  set the pork belly aside.  in a large bowl, mix red wine and vinegar.  in another large bowl, combine the apple cider vinegar and bacon until thoroughly combined.  heat the red wine mixture until a simmer ; pour over pork belly.  let pork belly marinade for 20 minutes, tossing once.  heat a large pot of cooking oil in a 10inch skillet over mediumhigh heat.  cook and stir liver until well browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side.  remove from oil and set on large serving platter.  spoon in raisins.  pour the cooked liver mixture over the pork belly and sprinkle with chopped apple cider vinegar, salt and pepper to taste.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons vegetable-oil | 4 ounces ground meat ( boneless or boneless pork ) | 10 ounces sliced courgettes | 1 tablespoon minced garlic ( or to taste ) | 2 tablespoons chopped peeled fresh anaheim chiles pepper | 1 eggnog | 1/2 cup red wine ( or cabernet sauvignon blanc ) | 3 tablespoons tarragon or 3 tablespoons white wine | 1 package frozen fettuccine pasta ( al dente or large ) | 1 box tortellini ( bow tie, i use the italian-style alfredo ) | 1 tablespoon chopped green onion
Recipe Instructions: heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  add the ground meat and cook until browned, breaking up any meat that has not browned into a paste.  transfer to the cooked skillet.  add the courtece, garlic, and chile peppers, and fry for 1 minute.  reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for 5 minutes, or until the flavors have blended.  mix in the eggnog, wine, and pasta, stirring to combine.  bring to a boiling, stirring frequently, then reduce the heat to mediumlow and cook 1 minute or until the pasta has cooked through.  add the green onion, cover, and cook until the cheese has melted.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 tablespoons mascarpone cheese, softened ( not instant! ) | 2 cups grated potato | 1 1/4 cups mascarpone cheese ( low fat ) or 1 1/4 cups parmesan cheese ( low fat )
Recipe Instructions: warm the mascarpone on a medium heat.  gradually add the potato ; stir just until the cheese is melted.  drain and blend.  set aside.  spread on a baking sheet in a single layer.  spread the grated cheese over the mascarpone.  sprinkle the mascarpone with one cup of the grated cheese.  bake for about 20 minutes.  remove from oven and enjoy.

Random Ingredients: silken tofu,chipotle chile adobo,steak,egg noodle,rye bread,savory,ice
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 lbs round steaks, flank and ends trimmed | 12 ounces thin whole egg noodles | 1/3 cup jumbo salsa | 1/4 cup sweet onion, finely chopped | 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper | 3/4 cup finely chopped celery | 1/4 teaspoon ground chipotle chile in adobo | 3 tablespoons lime juice, divided | 6 tablespoons cold black olives, pitted and halved | 2 tablespoons fresh sage | 8 ounces fat free sour cream | 3 ounces light sour cream, about 5 ounces
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, combine the egg noodles, jumbo salsa, 12 cup jumbo salsa, sweet onion, salt and pepper, celery, chipotle chile in adobo, remaining jumbo salsa, olives, sage and sour cream.  toss to coat.  cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight but up to 24 hours.  meanwhile, grease a 9x13 inch pan with oil.  place the meatloaf pieces on the pan.  cook and stir until the meatloaf is browned and cooked through.  turn the meatloaf to brown the other side.  transfer to a baking sheet and keep warm.  heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat.  add the 6 tablespoons of jumbo salsa and stir for 20 seconds.  transfer the skillet, uncovered, to the preheated skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon oil and stirfry until the oil turns a deep golden yellow.  add the remaining 14 cup of black olives, sage, and sour cream and cook until the liquid is almost melted.  top each steak with about 13 of the meatloaf mixture and top with the remaining meatloaf mixture.  place on a baking sheet and bake, uncovered, until heated through and the bottom is set, 15 to 20 minutes.
Recipe Titile: Sopa De Ajo - Mexico's Style Meatloaf

Random Ingredients: pepper,flat leaf parsley,pasta,leek,fennel seed,taco seasoning mix
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb pasta or 1 lb small pasta | vegetable oil | 1 lb ground fennel seed | 1 lb fresh flat leaf parsley, chopped | 3 garlic cloves, finely chopped | 8 ounces tomato packed in oil, drained and chopped | 1 teaspoon pepper | 1 packet taco seasoning mix
Recipe Instructions: add pasta to food processor, and process until smooth.  place in 2quart heavy saucepan of boiling salted water.  heat until al dente, drain, and add fennel seeds.  cook 10 minutes then drain.  remove from heat and set aside.  add dried parsley and garlic to pasta.  cook, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes.  add crushed garlic to pasta and cook, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 1 minute.  remove from saucepan.  add pepper to pasta and stir to coat with oil.  add taco seasoning packets to pasta and toss to coat thoroughly.  cover, and refrigerate for 10 minutes.  just before serving, heat large skillet over med heat until hot.  add oil, garlic, and parsley, and cook 5 minutes.  turn off heat.  add tomato, and cook 10 minutes more.  add pasta mixture, pepper, and taco seasoning mixture.  stir through.

Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons prepared horseradish, crumbled | 3 tablespoons white wine | 1/2 cup prepared mustard powder | 1/2 cup dry white wine | 400 ml white wine, chilled | 1/2 - 1 tablespoon coarsely ground white onion | 5 green tomatoes, quartered lengthwise
Recipe Instructions: mix the horseradish, wine, mustard powder, white wine, and onion together in a bowl ; add the green tomatoes, scraping up the brown bits.  whisk together the prepared horseradish mixture and prepared mustard sauce, using a pastry blender.  cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes before using.

Random Ingredients: sherry wine,mint leaf,active yeast,corn tortilla,salmon,cumin seed
Ingredient Phrases: 2 packages active dry yeast | 1/2 cup dry sherry wine | 2 1/8 cups corn tortillas, drained | 1/2 teaspoon corn oil or 1/2 cup corn waxy oil, plus more for dusting | 4 cups salted fresh tomatoes, chopped | 1 teaspoon ground cumin seeds | 1 teaspoon ground coriander seeds | 1/2 cup fresh mint leaf, halved and separated, to garnish | 1/4 teaspoon shaved red bell pepper
Recipe Instructions: in a large bowl, combine yeast and wine.  cover and let stand for 1 hour or overnight.  grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.  wipe out the pan with paper towels or a paper towel.  combine tortillas, 2 cups water, 12 teaspoon corn oil and 14 teaspoon salt in a large bowl.  stir in 1 teaspoon salt ; sprinkle corn oil over each.  divide the tomatoes into the tortillas.  sprinkle 1 tablespoon oil over each.  fold a pastry sheet up around the rim of the baking pan.  lay the corn tortilla on the pan and top it with the prepared tomato mixture.  sprinkle with the mint, red pepper and 12 teaspoon salt ; sprinkle with additional salt if necessary.  bake in the preheated 375 degrees oven for 25 to 30 minutes.  cool on paper towel, or place in a tightly covered container and chill.  to make the pate, beat the 14 cup of warm water and 1 tablespoon of corn oil until the liquid is smooth.  mix in the remaining 1 tablespoon salt to make a stiff paste.  transfer to serving bowl and let stand at room temperature for 10 minutes before serving.  if serving ahead, refrigerate overnight, but store refrigerated.  to make the pate, combine the remaining 1 tablespoon corn oil and 1 teaspoon salt to make a stiff paste.  transfer and allow to stand at room temperature for 10 minutes before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 lbs chicken | 2 cups couscous | 1/2 cup flour | 2 cups greek olive | 1/4 cup vinegar | 1/4 cup sugar | 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley | 2 tablespoons cornflour
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees.  place the couscous, flour, greek and vinegar into a saucepan and bring to a boil.  reduce heat to low and cook for 4 hours.  drain chicken and place in a large casserole dish.  mix together oil, parsley and corn flour ; pour over chicken.  bake 1520 minutes, or until tender.  remove chicken from casserole, drain, and cut into small pieces.  transfer to serving platter and cover with sauce.  cook in remaining warm sauce until sauce is slightly thickened.  serve immediately.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans plum tomatoes, crushed | 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro | 1/4 cup olive oil | 1/4 cup chopped fresh oregano | 1 tablespoon dried crushed thai red chili pepper | 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper | 1 package fettuccine pasta | 8 ounces cooked and drained pitted green grape, rinsed and drained | 3/4 cup grated parmesan cheese ( or to taste ) | 2 cups diced roasted, peeled seeded and chopped fresh cilantro
Recipe Instructions: in large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat ; cook the onion, chili and peppers until the onions are soft, 5 to 8 minutes.  stir in the diced tomatoes and cook for 1 minute.  sprinkle in the crushed chile peppers ; cook until the chili peppers burst.  stir in the fettuccine pasta ; cook until heated through, 5 to 8 minutes.  stir in the remaining canned tomatoes and remaining sauce.  cover and cook over mediumlow heat until al dente, stirring occasionally.
Recipe Titile: Fresh Green Grapes With Pesto and Red Chile Sauce

Ingredient Phrases: 4 tablespoons brown mustard | 1 tablespoon instant coffee | 1 teaspoon fresh chives, chopped | 2 tablespoons brown mustard | 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper
Recipe Instructions: combine first 6 ingredients.  add coffee and mix well.  refrigerate to serve.

Ingredient Phrases: 30 dried tomatillos | 1/1 cup canola oil | 3 medium yellow onions | 4 cloves garlic, minced | 1 cup ice water | 1 teaspoon sugar | 1/2 pint white rum ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: in a large, large saucepan over mediumlow heat, cover the tomatillos with lightly salted water, then bring the water and oil to a boil.  remove from the heat and let the water cool to room temperature, then drain well.  preheat an oven to 3 in a large saucepan, heat the canola oil over medium heat and whisk the onions, garlic and salt and sugar into the hot oil until just about translucent.  mix the salsa with the tomatillos and stir well.  continue stirring for about a minute, but keep stirring.  pour the tomatillo mixture into the saucepan and continue cooking until the mixture becomes thick, about ten minutes.  remove the lid from the saucepan and stir in the rum and sugar.  the pure mixture should be thickened if it does not have the juice.  pour the pure mixture into a baking dish and cover with parchment paper to freeze 30 days.  remove one of the parchment paper and place the remaining pan with the tomatoes on top.  cover the dish with foil and bake the top rack for 1 hour.  bake uncovered 30 minutes more, until the top has risen to the top and the bottom has set.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package golden syrup gelatin | 1/2 ounce dried cranberry | 1/2 teaspoon ground pistachio nut | 1/4 cup chopped cilantro stems
Recipe Instructions: stir the gelatin with cranberries, nut and cilantro in medium bowl.  add ice to thicken completely.  spoon mixture into a freezer bag filled with ice.  seal refrigerated bag, and freeze overnight to room temperature.  to make glaze spread glaze over cooled ice, and stir to combine.  to make syrup pour syrup over glaze, and mix until sugar dissolves.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 3/4 cups margarine, chilled | 1 cup shredded carrot, divided | 1 tablespoon chopped celery salt | 1/2 cup chopped dried dill
Recipe Instructions: in a mixing bowl, combine 1 1/2 cups margarine and carrot mixture.  mix well.  whisk in 1 cup carrots, celery salt, and dill.  whisk until completely blended.  cover and keep refrigerated.  use 1 scoop of cereal if ready to place on a plate.  bake at 425 degrees for 5060 minutes.

Random Ingredients: tofu,asafoetida powder,sirloin tip roast,taco seasoning,pecorino romano cheese,bread crumb,veal,curd cottage cheese
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb asafoetida meat liver | 1 tablespoon taco seasoning | 3 tablespoons white vinegar | 3 tablespoons white vinegar | 2 tablespoons white sugar | 1 ounce tofu, crushed and cooled for 1 min, drained and rinsed | 1 lb ground sirloin tip roast, cooked & crumbled | 1 cup shredded monterey jack cheese | 2 tablespoons fresh bean sprouts, rinsed | 1 tablespoon fresh green onion, chopped | 1 can refried beans, drained & rinsed | 8 ounces diced cooked and chopped veal liver | 24 small bag dry bread crumb | 8 ounces shredded sharp cheddar cheese | 2 ounces tomato sauce | 1 cup light sour cream | 1 garlic clove, minced
Recipe Instructions: combine liver, taco seasoning, vinegar  sugar in a medium sized stock pot.  bring to the boil, covered, for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.  return liver mixture in the pot to the pot and cook uncovered until liver is almost done, 3 to 5 minutes.  combine beef and cheese mixture in small saucepan ; cook over medium high heat for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring often.  add beans and vegetables to the liver mixture ; simmer stirring often for 10 to 20 minutes until beans are tender.  drain liquid from broth, reserving liquid.  if broth is salty, add more broth if necessary to keep meat liquid slightly syrupy, add 3 or 4 tbsp water.  add shredded cooked and chopped meat, stir to blend.  toss in refried bean sprouts and green onions.  add sour cream.  spoon the meat mixture onto the warmed cheddar cheese slices and sprinkle with garlic.  serve.  you may substitute tomato sauce if desired.  serve on the side, garnishing with fresh basil.  serve immediately or serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: sage leaf,pineapple chunk,bicarbonate soda,tequila,fish,cream mushroom soup,canola oil
Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans light cream of mushroom soup | 1 can cream of crab soup | 1/2 can crushed pineapple chunks | 2 teaspoons fresh lime juice | 1 can unsalted cashews or 1/2 sweet corn kernels, chopped fine | 1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda | 1/4 teaspoon sage leaf, fresh
Recipe Instructions: in a large pot, combine first 9 ingredients and simmer over mediumlow heat for 5 minutes.  stir in cashews, bicarbonate of soda and sage.  remove from heat and set aside on a plate.  in a separate large heavy based saucepan, combine pineapple slices, lime juice, canned soup and crushed cashews, pour over mushroom mixture and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture boils.  serve over rice and top with additional cashews and rice if desired.

Random Ingredients: basil,chile,gruyere cheese,hamburger bun,pasta,sun tomato oil,tamarind paste
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb hamburger buns ( or other thin style hamburger bun ) | 12 ounces crushed tomatoes packed in oil, drained | 1/2 - 3/4 cup fresh basil, chopped | 1/2 - 3/4 cup zest from 1 teaspoon ground chili powder | 1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon tamarind paste, see note | 2 tablespoons sun-dried tomato packed in oil, drained and chopped or 2 tablespoons hot sauce, see note | 1 package firm ripe sun-dried tomatoes with oil, drained and chopped
Recipe Instructions: preheat the oven to 400 degrees f.  in a food processor or blender, pulse the hamburger or other thin style hamburger, crushed tomatoes, basil and zest until smooth.  if you prefer a thinner version, you can do this in batches.  spread the meat mixture into the prepared buns, and top with the sun dried tomatoes if using.  cover with foil and bake, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes, until done and well browned.

Random Ingredients: clove,spinach leaf,active yeast,beef shank,cream tartar,mustard green,brandy
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 tablespoons instant active dry yeast | 1 1/3 cups fat-free cream of tartar | 1 tablespoon brandy | 1 teaspoon dried mustard greens | 1 whole beef shank ( about 1/2 pound ) | 6 sprigs finely chopped garlic
Recipe Instructions: combine yeast with half the cream of tartar ; reserve remaining liquid.  combine brandy, mustard greens, beef shank, and garlic in small bowl ; stir until smooth.  add salt to mixture ; stir in remaining ingredients.  cover and let stand 30 minutes.  remove beef shanks from bowl and cool completely in refrigerator.  let beef cool completely in refrigerator ; cover and refrigerate overnight.

Ingredient Phrases: 12 ounces frozen meat, cut in pieces | 1/4 cup whipping cream ( more for serving ) ( optional ) | 1 teaspoon instant whipped cream ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: place frozen meat in a 10quart saucepan ; bring to a slow boil.  reduce heat, and cook until meat is firm, stirring once.  remove and stir in cream.  return to a slow boil.  reduce heat to mediumlow ; cover,  simmer until sauce reduced by half, at least 20 minutes ; let stand overnight or the longer you cook the meat the better the meatballs will be.
Recipe Titile: Easiest Meatball Casserole    1 Pressure Cooker (Or Other Baked Meatballs)

Random Ingredients: flat leaf parsley,strawberry yogurt,bean sprout,tabasco sauce,single cream,black cardamom pod
Ingredient Phrases: 3 cups plain beans sprouts | 12 ounces strawberry yogurt | 1 teaspoon garlic clove, minced | 3 garlic cloves, minced | 1 bunch flat leaf parsley, chopped | 1 bunch fresh scallion, finely chopped | 1/4 cup black cardamom pod | 1/8 teaspoon tabasco sauce | 2 tablespoons cornstarch | 1 cup single cream
Recipe Instructions: place the bean sprouts in a soup pot and cover with 2 inches of cold water to come 1 cup full.  meanwhile, boil the yogurt in large pot of boiling water until it is slightly syrupy.  remove all but a couple tablespoons of yogurt from the pot then remove the soup pot from the heat then stir in the garlic, parsley, scallion, cardamom, and tabasco.  place in a bowl and let sit for 10 minutes.  whisk together the cornstarch and cream in a small saucepan then slowly pour over the soup.  season with salt, pepper and freshly ground black pepper.  let cool for a minute then strain and pour into serving bowls.  top with chopped green onion, if desired.  variations  you can use black pepper in place of pepper.  for your own variation i like to place a scoop of water around the edge of the salad to hold your lettuce in place when adding.  add a scoop of water and a scoop of strawberry yogurt and the mint.  dont use the mint if you want a bit of tang.

Random Ingredients: red chilies,white wine vinegar,bamboo shoot,hoagie,salt,self rising flour,crimini mushroom,fish sauce
Ingredient Phrases: 3 tablespoons lime juice, zest of | 3 teaspoons fish sauce | 1/2 teaspoon chinese five spice powder ( jiang pinyan ) | 3 cups bamboo shoot, cleaned, cut in half horizontally ( bamboo or silken tofu ) | 5 tablespoons white wine vinegar | 1/4 cup fish sauce | 1/4 cup chili sauce | 1 cup hoagie ( firm tofu, sliced into 3 inch pieces ) | 3 tablespoons fish sauce | 1 1/4 cups self-rising flour | 1 teaspoon salt | 1 teaspoon dried red chili ( or to taste ) | 1 teaspoon ground ginger | 1/4 cup fresh lime juice | 3/4 cup chopped red onion | lime | 1 teaspoon white sugar
Recipe Instructions: in a small saucepan bring water to boil with the lime juice, fish sauce, bamboo and white wine vinegar to make a sauce.  cook, stirring, over mediumlow heat until very thick, about 7 minutes.  set aside.  cut chillies in half horizontally ; cut the pulp into pieces about 12inch thick.  mix all the remaining ingredients in a separate pot.  in a small bowl, combine the flour, salt, chili sauce, hoagie, flour, lime juice juice and onion.  mix together well until well blended.  pour the flour mixture into the chilli mixture and stir to coat.  season with 12 cup sugar.  set heat to mediumlow.  cook until the gravy is thick and bubbling, stirring constantly, for 5 to 10 minutes, or until thickened and bubbling.  add water to the sauce and simmer until the liquid reduces by 10 to 12 minutes.  to serve, stir the hot chilli mixture into warmed steamed casserole or platter.
Recipe Titile: Shaoxing Hot Chilli and Beef Stew

Ingredient Phrases: 1/4 cup kielbasa or 1/4 cup red cabbage, rinsed and thoroughly drained | 1 1/2 cups hamburger, cooked | 2 tablespoons soy sauce | 1 medium yellow onion, finely chopped | 2 cups japanese soy sauce or 2 cups korean soy sauce | 8 ounces green cabbage, shredded
Recipe Instructions: heat a wok with 1 t.  water and add the kielbasa or red cabbage, then reduce heat to medium, and heat until cabbage begins to soften,about 5 minutes.  while cabbage is frying, cook hamburger with soy sauce.  stir in onions, and cook 5 mins.  while onion is cooking, chop kielbasa, and chop green cabbage into pieces.  add the cabbage to the wok and stir to coat evenly.  cover and cook 1 to 2 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.  while filling is cooking, prepare green cabbage according to the package and toss with the hot hamburger until evenly coated.  serve with brown rice alongside.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 egg | 2 cups cooked chicken breasts, cubed | 1 can whole italian tomatoes | 1 can tomato sauce | 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese | 1 teaspoon italian seasoning | 2 -3 slices bacon, cooked, thinly sliced
Recipe Instructions: cook the egg in the bottom and sides of an 8 skillet until egg begins to set but is not firm.  add chopped chicken, chopped tomatoes, tomato sauce, and 12 cup mozzarella cheese.  cook on medium high until chicken is no longer pink.  turn heat down to low and add bacon.  cook to crisp and remove bacon from pan.  place bacon in a single layer on a baking sheet and brush with some of the egg and bake at 350f with no additional grease left.  let stand 15 minutes.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 5 lbs salted gooseberries | 3 tablespoons butter, divided | 1/2 lb apricata or 2 lbs apricots | 1/2 cup toasted pine nuts, coarse coarsely chopped, or 1/2 cup dried apricots | 1/2 teaspoon ginger paste | 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon | 1 1/4 cups coarsely chopped unsalted pistachios | 1/2 teaspoon ground fenugreek seeds, toasted
Recipe Instructions: place salted gooseberries in a small saucepan, cover with cold water, and cook till tender yet firm to the bite, about 40 minutes.  drain well.  meanwhile, heat half the butter in a large saucepan over low heat ; cook the apricots, nut mixture, ginger, cinnamon, 14 cup of the pistachios, and 1 - 12 cups of the fenugreek ; stir and keep an eye on the heat.  cook for 23 minutes, stirring every 10 minutes.  drain well and allow to cool.  place 1 - 14 cups of chopped pistachios and the fronds of the pistachios over the salted gooseberries ; mix well to combine all ingredients.  cover and refrigerate for 5 hours.  remove from refrigeration before serving.
Recipe Titile: Stuffed Fingers, Panna Cotta or Creme Puffs

Ingredient Phrases: 2 cans great northern beans | 1/4 cup onion, diced | 2 1/2 cups club soda | 1 can dry northern beans
Recipe Instructions: pour beans into a medium sauce pan and simmer over medium high heat until heated but still slightly caramel brown, about 10 minutes.  cool beans and grind.  meanwhile, puree onion in a blender or food processor.  return onions to pan, cover and bring to a boil.  reduce heat and simmer until onion is soft, approximately 510 minutes.  stir in sugar and 12 cup beer.  continue cooking until mixture thickens slightly, about 1 hour.  sprinkle the beans in a serving bowl with remaining beer.  serve with chips or crackers.

Random Ingredients: leaf basil,chili,taco seasoning,lemon juice zest,arugula,macaroni,snow pea
Ingredient Phrases: 1/3 cup chopped fresh leaf basil | 1/3 cup chopped fresh tarragon | 1 package taco seasoning | 1/2 teaspoon chili | 3/4 cup shredded carrot | 1/4 cup chopped snow peas | 1/4 cup drained canned reduced calorie macaroni | 1 cup fresh leaf parsley, chopped
Recipe Instructions: heat broiler and spread basil and tarragon on bottom of 11x5inch baking dish.  top with  of salt and  taco seasoning ; sprinkle with  carrot and snow peas.  broil 3035 minutes or until heated through.  set aside.  mix macaroni, 2 tablespoons parsley, and sauce together in a medium bowl ; top with shredded carrots and snow peas.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 beef roast | 1 ounce firm tofu | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 500 g crushed shrimp | 1 pinch italian parsley, crushed | 1 pinch crushed dried italian parsley
Recipe Instructions: place the meat in a large pot and sprinkle with the olive oil.  heat the oil in a wok or frying pan until very hot and add the cooked beef.  once he is golden, add the sliced tofu and quickly fry on all sides.  add the parsley and simmer for 15 minutes or until the liquid is reduced by a third.  if the meat is very mushy, cover and refrigerate for a couple of hours.  serve with steamed white rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 package couscous | 1/2 cup chopped onion | 1/2 cup chopped fresh dill seed | 1 teaspoon ground cumin
Recipe Instructions: fill a large saucepan with water and bring to a simmer over high heat.  add cous cous cous and cook for 1 to 2 minutes or till browned.  drain immediately.  stir in onion and dill seeds.  mix well and return to a simmer over medium heat until the flavors blend.  add cumin to taste and serve.

Random Ingredients: chili powder,soymilk,caster sugar,tabasco sauce,farfalle pasta,asparagus spear,salsa,cardamom
Ingredient Phrases: 12 lbs farfalle pasta | 2 teaspoons caster sugar | 3 pinches chili powder | 1/2 teaspoon coriander sprig | 1/2 teaspoon cardamom, finely chopped | 2 large eggs, lightly beaten | 2 cups soymilk, mixed with | 10 cups salsa, with sour cream | 10 -12 dried black olives, stemmed seeded, dried and dried | 2 red onions, chopped | 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar | 10 sprigs fresh tarragon | 4 slices bacon, shredded
Recipe Instructions: bring a large pot with salted water to a boil.  add farfalle pasta and cook until al dente, 810 to 10 minutes.  drain.  stir sugar, chili powder and coriander into dry ingredients set aside.  beat at low speed until blended.  beat until combined, then stir in eggs, soymilk and salsa mixture.  toss until combined.  mix flour, eggs, and vinegar together into dough in a large bowl ; knead lightly to combine.  divide dough into 4 equal portions.  roll each portion into a 4 x 2 inch rectangle.  place one slice of bacon on each of four slices of farfalle.  sprinkle each with one tablespoon chopped asparagus.  arrange a layer of sliced onions on each of 4 opposite sides of the farfalle ; top with bacon.  repeat with remaining slices and bacon.  arrange 12 of the olive pieces atop each cut up farfalle.  repeat with remaining olives ; pour salsa over each.  cut each cross half crosswise across the grain.  tie ends of each with string.  heat a frying pan over medium heat.  add balsamic sauce, and cook until sauce forms a thin paste, about 2 minutes.  remove from pan and let sauce cool.  add remaining ingredients to pan and heat to a boil, stirring frequently, for about 2 minutes.  transfer pan to heatproof bowl.  sprinkle remaining bacon on top of the fish, then top with remaining olive sauce.  cover and cook until fish is cooked through about 35 minutes.  serve immediately.
Recipe Titile: Carnaroli Baked Fish With Balsamic Sauce

Ingredient Phrases:
1 bunch radish, stalks | 4 cups water | 1/3 cup dry white wine vinegar | 1/2 cup dry sherry | 1 -2 tablespoon dry mustard | 1/8 teaspoon sugar | 6 large fresh small tart shells, preferably white ones, with a large stalk on ( about 9-12 oz.
    - ) | 12 ounces cooked white mushrooms | 1 large cup brown cardamom pod, crushed or 1 cup dried chip-miz or 1 cup dried mint | 8 whole nopales ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: place the boiling water, vinegar, sherry, mustard, sugar and the mushrooms in a small saucepan over medium heat.  stir occasionally in the crushed cardamom pods and the roasted mushroom pieces.  bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered until the liquid is reduced by one third and the mushrooms have shrunk, about 1 hour ; then transfer to a serving bowl.  to make the nopales, cook the nopales in boiling salted water according to package directions until the skins are just firm but not very dark, 30 to 40 minutes or until they are tender but still hold their shape.  place a little of the liquid from above into a small sauce pan.  add the remaining liquid and the nopales and the crushed mint ; and simmer, uncovered, for 10 to 15 minutes stirring regularly, until the liquid has thickened to a thick sauce.  strain some of the liquid.  spoon some liquid into a 2quart saucepan, and heat over medium heat.  add the noodles and the remaining liquid and cook, stirring, until the noodles are light golden and the flavors have blended.  spray one baking dish with cooking spray and sprinkle with the remaining liquid.

Ingredient Phrases: 6 trout | 1 can chicken bouillon granules | 2 cups fresh brontonian gravy
Recipe Instructions: cook the trout in boiling salted water.  drain completely and set aside.  peel the trout and cut into 8 pieces.  rinse in cold water and remove stems.  bring large pot of water to a boil and add bronton ; boil, covered for 1 minute.  drain, rinse in cold water with vinegar, then strain into a large jug and fill to 12 full with stock, bringing the water to a rolling boil while you add the bouillon granules.  add 1 cup of the gravy from the pot, cover and reduce heat to low.  bring stock to a boil and return the pot to a boil.  return the trout, bronton with gravy, and 2 cups of the water to the stock, and return the pot to a boil.  remove from heat and serve immediately.

Random Ingredients: egg noodle,cream tartar,water chestnut,orange zest,bulgur wheat
Ingredient Phrases: 1/2 cup water chestnut, crumbled | 1/4 cup bulgur wheat, crumbled | 1/2 cup cream of tartar | 1 large egg noodle | 1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon ground orange zest
Recipe Instructions: heat 2 tbsp of oil in wok then add noodles then add in water chestnuts, wheat and cream of tartar, fry for 10 minutes until noodles start to brown.  add in orange zests  cook 1 minute.  to serve place a large platter or glass with 2 tbsp olive oil on top.  serve with brown rice.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 ounce raw kidney bean ( thawed and drained ) | 1 tablespoon kalamata olives ( fresh and whole, not canned ) | 4 garlic cloves ( minced ) | 1 large tomatoes | 1/2 cup sweet basil leaves ( fresh ) | 3/4 cup fresh mint leaf ( fresh ) | 1 teaspoon sugar
Recipe Instructions: in large heavy skillet, warm broth.  add beans, olives, garlic, tomatoes, basil, mint and sugar.  bring to boil, reduce and simmer 1 hour.  add beans, chilis and remaining ingredients except for fresh mint.

Random Ingredients: savory,cardamom seed,red capsicum,rice flour,pasta shell,veal,safflower oil
Ingredient Phrases: 1 1/2 lbs veal shoulder, trimmed of scales with fat | 1 tablespoon sunflower oil | 6 medium garlic cloves, minced | 1 tablespoon cardamom seed | 2/3 cup rice flour | 1/2 cup rice wine | 5 sunflower oil | 1 small paprika | 1 medium red capsicum, cut into 2 inch squares | 1/4 cup black pepper
Recipe Instructions: heat the sunflower oil over mediumlow heat in a small heavy skillet.  add the veal and cook 2 minutes or until done.  stir in the garlic and cardamom and bring to a simmer.  stir in the rice flour, rice wine, sunflower oil, and black pepper.  let cook gently until flavors combine, about 1 hour.  pour into 8 pasta shells, and let cook for 8 minutes.  serve with a dollop of the glaze.  note to make the glaze, combine 6 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon paprika, 2 cups sunflower oil, 1 tablespoon salt, and 12 teaspoon black pepper in a small bowl.  place the mixture into a saucepan, cover, and bring to a boil.  reduce heat and simmer, covered, until the sauce has reduced by 1 cup, 30 to 45 minutes.  serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 lbs beef brisket or 1 lbs beef brisket | 4 tablespoons coffee or 4 tablespoons margarine | 1 can crushed pineapple in juice ( or more, more ) | 2 teaspoons sugar | 1/2 teaspoon paprika, plus to taste | 1/2 teaspoon ground raisins | 3 tablespoons chopped fresh apricots | 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed pineapple juice | 2 tablespoons ground carmelized carrot ( optional )
Recipe Instructions: cut beef into thin ribbons on the diagonal.  in large pot over mediumhigh heat, melt the margarine or butter.  add brisket, and cook 10 minutes or until well heated.  add the pineapple juice and remaining ingredients and simmer 5 minutes or until liquid is reduced.  serve with rice.

Random Ingredients: lemon juice zest,bay leaf,garam masala,rum,cocoa powder,rye bread,green onion
Ingredient Phrases: 9 ounces rye bread | 1/2 cup brewed rum | 2 tablespoons green onions | 4 teaspoons garam masala | 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon | 2 bay leaves
Recipe Instructions: cut the loaf into 2 inch lengths.  slice the rye diagonally in half lengthwise then cut the long side into quarters.  place slices of bread in a baking dish with the sliced bread.  mix the marinade ingredients and pour over the bread.  cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake in moderate oven for 45 minutes.  remove from oven, let rest, let cool.  spread the cinnamon over the bread, then sprinkle with the bay leaves.  serve.

Random Ingredients: orange,salad oil,kaffir lime leaf,cremini mushroom,oatmeal,tomato soup
Ingredient Phrases: 2 whole chicken breasts | 2 tablespoons vegetable oil | 1 shallot ( chopped and divided ) | kaffir lime leaves | 1/2 teaspoon baking soda | 2 cups all-purpose salad oil | 1 teaspoon baking soda | 1/2 cup sliced pitted prune-flavored sweet shallot | 1 cup diced pitted ripe tomatoes diced | 1 cup sliced cremini mushroom | 1 teaspoon vegetable oil | 3/4 cup thinly-sliced sultana ( italian salad dressing )
Recipe Instructions: heat oil in a dutch oven or large wok.  saute chicken breasts, shallots, lime leaves, and baking soda in oil until chicken is golden brown, about 5 to 7 minutes.  pour off and discard oil.  remove chicken and reserve.  mix yogurt in a large bowl.  add sliced shallots, diced tomatoes and mushrooms, and vegetable oil to yogurt mixture and mix well.  stir in parmesan if desired.  place chicken in a large baking dish.  pour tomato sauce over.  sprinkle cheese over chicken.  cover dish with aluminum foil and bake 20 minutes for firm.  meanwhile, prepare salsa.  to make sauce, whisk the cremini and the olive oil in a small bowl.  add mushrooms, shallots and mushrooms and let simmer for 10 minutes.  to assemble, place chicken breasts on serving platter, sprinkle with reserved cheese mixture and serve hot.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 medium potatoes | 1 cup long grain doritos | 16 ounces mexican cheese blend | 1 tablespoon chili | 1 1/2 tablespoons mustard powder | 1 1/2 teaspoons hot pepper powder | 1/2 pint mayonnaise
Recipe Instructions: combine all ingredients.  place on baking sheet.  cover and let stand at room temperature for 10 minutes.  serve at room temperature.

Random Ingredients: green chilies,jalapeno,cookie,stewing beef,oregano leaf,allspice,taco seasoning,maraschino cherry
Ingredient Phrases: 1 lb stewing beef | 1 can pinto beans with liquid | 1 ounce jalapeno | 1/2 cup frozen diced green chilis | 2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix | 3 tablespoons prepared chili seasoning mix ( or more to taste, i like more chili flavor ) | 2 tablespoons dried oregano leaves | 1/4 cup shredded cored and chopped dried maraschino cherries | 1/4 cup freshly squeezed green chili salsa
Recipe Instructions: preheat oven to 350 degrees f.  rub beef with seasoning.  put in a roasting pan ; cover with water and let soak 15 minutes.  set aside on a rimmed baking sheet for about 5 minutes.  combine beans, 12 of the jalapeno and 1 tablespoon taco seasoning mix in a large bowl ; set aside.  pour 12 of the pinto bean mixture into the roasting pan and place over mediumhigh heat.  cook until hot but not smoking, about 5 minutes, turning frequently.  stir in 14 cup diced green chilis.  continue cooking until sauce begins to set, about 5 more minutes.  stir in taco seasoning.  pour remaining pinto beans back into the pan ; cover and let cook 5 minutes more.  in a large bowl, mix together remaining jalapenos, green chilis, cilantro, and 12 cup green chili salsa.  spread a small amount of the chunky sauce over the beef ; top with remaining jalapenos, green chilis and remaining jalapeno sauce.  drizzle remaining sauce over top.  bake at 350 degrees f for 10 minutes, or until hot.  serve chili warm.

Ingredient Phrases: 4 flour tortillas, warmed | 1 cup sour cream cheese, at room temperature | 3 cups shredded spinach, rinsed | 1 medium red onion, chopped | 1/2 teaspoon red capsicum, chopped | 1 cup cubed cooked chicken | 2 tablespoons unsweetened almond | 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut milk | 12 slices asparagus | 4 cups shredded chicken fat-free cream cheese | 1/2 cup sliced asparagus | 1 teaspoon baking potato, cut into thin strips | 3 ounces diced red capsicums
Recipe Instructions: spread 12 cup cheese spread evenly over each tortilla, and sprinkle with 13 cup spinach and 12 red and 1 red onion slices.  roll tortillas in the shredded cheese, then sprinkle with remaining spinach and red onion strips.  repeat with remaining tortillas.  roll in asparagus and almonds, cover tightly with foil and refrigerate for 15 minutes.  heat 3 t.  oil in a large skillet, and cook tortillas in hot oil until golden brown, about 5 minutes.  turn and fry briefly until browned and cooked through, about 1012 minutes.  set aside.  spread half of the cream cheese and half of the fatonion topping over the tortillas.  top each tortilla with half the chicken meat and half of the chicken fat over the spinach mixture.  roll tortillas up, and place them in the palm of your hand so as to overlap them.  place the remaining cream cheese and remaining onion on top and spread over the top.

Ingredient Phrases: 10 slices toast, sliced | 3/4 cup warm chickpeas
Recipe Instructions: heat oven to 180c toast the toast and place in the microwave for 5 minutes on high.  remove toast from microwave to clean it, and set microwave aside to cool slightly.  spread toast evenly on bottom of a 6 by 6 baking dish, then scatter chickpeas evenly over bottom.  spread the beans over the toast.  sprinkle with onions, parsley, and sliced spring onions.  place baking dish in oven, and toast slices, covered, for 2 minutes.  sprinkle with remaining chopped spring onions, if desired.  let stand for 5 minutes before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup prepared tortilla | 1 1/2 cups chopped black beans | 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese | 1/4 cup chopped walnuts | 1/4 cup chopped black olives | 1/4 cup chopped black olives
Recipe Instructions: place a cup of prepared tortilla in a heavy bottomed pie plate.  spread all beans, cheese, walnuts, olives and remaining ingredients over the tortilla.  cover and chill overnight or at least 1 hour.  preheat oven to 425 degrees f 220 degrees c.  cover and bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, until meat is forktender or a meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f 74 degrees c.
Recipe Titile: Black Bean and Roast Beef Casserole

Ingredient Phrases: 1 pound pizza dough | 1 cup fresh beef broth | 1 container of shredded pizza dough
Recipe Instructions: press dough on pizza dough and form into patties about 1 inch wide.  place in freezer for 30 minutes or until firm.  brush with beef broth and press to flatten.  bake at 350 degrees f 175 degrees c, or until pizza dough sounds hollow when tapped.  cool on a rack for 30 minutes.  serve hot.

Random Ingredients: sultana raisin,pizza sauce,corn tortilla,cocoa mix,dark beer
Ingredient Phrases: 1 - 1 1/4 cup margarine | 1/2 cup dark beer | 1 teaspoon corn | 2 teaspoons sugar | 1/2 cup cornstarch | 1 can cream-style evaporated milk | 6 ounces sour cream | 2 cups shredded monterey jack cheese | 1 1/2 cups thinly shaved corn | 1/2 cup sweet salsa ( mexican style ) | 2/3 cup crushed corn | 1/2 cup crushed cayenne powder
Recipe Instructions: heat margarine up until very hot.  add 12 cup corn.  stir to blend with margarine until corn is well coated.  put on low setting and cook until corn mixture is bubbly.  add remaining sauce sauce, sour cream, and cheese.  mix well then add to crock pot.  cover and cook on low for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and cheese is bubbly.  remove from heat.  cool 10 minutes.  preheat oven to 350 degrees.  divide the cheddar mixture into four equal portions and sprinkle evenly over the top.  bake for 30 minutes.  remove from oven and top with cheddar mix.

Ingredient Phrases: 1 large garlic clove | 3 bell peppers | 1 cup frozen peas | 1 can black beans | 1 can peas
Recipe Instructions: chop the garlic.  saut it until its soft, add the onion and then season with salt.  add 1 can of water into the pan, bring to a full boil and remove from heat.  chop up the bell pepper in chunks so it wont be tough.  combine and serve hot.

Random Ingredients: honey,watermelon,white sesame seed,vodka,sherry wine vinegar,hot chili powder,poppy seed
Ingredient Phrases: 1 cup koya dried white sesame seeds | 3 1/2 cups watermelon, cut into 1-inch chunks | 4 tablespoons sugar | 2 tablespoons white sesame seeds | 2 tablespoons honey | 1 1/2 teaspoons hot chili powder | 2 teaspoons kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper | 2 tablespoons sherry wine vinegar | 1 1/2 cups boiling white rice, such as dry white rice | 1 lemon, juice of
Recipe Instructions: place 1 to 2 tablespoons watermelon in a mixing bowl ; toss with 2 teaspoons of sesame seeds ; toss with white sesame seeds and honey.  add sweet chilli powder, kosher salt, 14 teaspoon pepper, and 2 tablespoons white sesame seeds ; mix well.  add vinegar and remaining sesame seeds ; toss with rice.  add lemon juice and toss with sugar.  cover and set aside for 8 hours before serving.  bake for 30 minutes in a 350 degree f oven or 400 degree c oven for 15 minutes under broiler.  place rice in an ovenproof bowl and toss with watermelon.  cover and set aside for 30 minutes before serving.

Ingredient Phrases: 2 tablespoons chinese noodles, cooked ( kimchi ) or 2 tablespoons cooked cooked kimchi, cooked ( kimchi ) | 1/4 cup beer | 2 teaspoons tabasco sauce | 1/4 cup rice wine vinegar
Recipe Instructions: put the noodles in a blender, and puree for 30 seconds.  stir in the beer and tabasco.  pour in the rice wine vinegar, mix well.  chop up the salad very finely and mix well.  chill in the refrigerator at least 30 minutes.  to serve warm the noodles in a pot of lightly salted water, then dip into the salad and serve.
